27a2(mdo 'grel): brgya byin stan phyed thob par gyur// de yi sems ni gzhan gang las// sran ma lhag ma sa la ltung // de tshe 'di ni 'bras bu'i mthar// skabs gsum pa las lhung bar gyur// gang zhig rmi lam g+hu/ 
27a3(mdo 'grel): ma'i gnas skabs su yang nam yang mi 'gro ba'i// rnam rtog phreng ba cung zad 'khrugs pas gang la nye bar rab sbyar ba// de ni sbyin pa'i dpag bsam shing gis mtshungs med 'bras bu rab rgyas 
27a4(mdo 'grel): tshe// 'byer ba'i longs spyod spyod pa nyid du gal pa bsnyen pa nam dag zung // sangs rgyas bcom ldan du sa pa yis// rang gi skye pa gzhan brjod cing // dge slong rnams la rjes bstan du// sbyid pa 
27a5(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu'i dpal 'di gsungs// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las nga las na'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab 
27a6(mdo 'grel): skye bzhi pa'o// lha rnams kyis bslangs bsgrubs pas shin tu 'khrugs shing 'o ma'i chu gter ring zhig 'angang // rang bzhin nyid kyis 'bras bu rab tu gcod tse dag bsam shing yang 'ang 
27a7(mdo 'grel): rolo// nga zhig lus na ba cug nga yang gA meng rdzogs 'dzin 'dang ba mi mnga' ba// sa nig gcig za de ni was rgyas sbyin pa'i lus 'ad gams par gyur ba yin// ka la shas na \u0f7f 
27a8(mdo 'grel): phyogs na pa// blan med pa'i thang kyar ni// bzang po'i zag ces bya ba ste// sa i can du byung ba yod// gang du grags stan me tog dkar// bran tshigs can gyi 'bras bu bzang // sbyin pa'i bya 
27b1(mdo 'grel): 'khri shing ni// grong khyer pa rnams dga' slad gyur// grong khyer sum rgyal mig gi mes// gang du skrag pas yid 'byung ni// stobs med g.yo zhing brtse ba yi// smin ma 'khyog po nyid kyis bsrungs// 
27b2(mdo 'grel): gang du gser gyi khab pa'i phreng // mu tig tshogs rab 'bar bas mdzes// lhun po'i rtse yi phreng ba ni// rgyas pa'i rgyu skar 'phro ba bzhin// der ni dpal ldan zla ba'i 'od// sa 'dzin rnams kyi mchog 
27b3(mdo 'grel): tu gyur// nyin mo'i zla 'od mdzes pa yis// gang zhig ke la sha bzhin byas// gang gi lus 'od zla nya yi// 'od ltar rdzogs pa'i 'phrog byed kyis// gsal byed can min snang ba'i mtshan// byams 
27b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i yon tan zad ma gyur// 'di mthong nyid ni rgyu skar rnams// 'dod pa'i rims ni bsten gyur zhes// mkha' la gdugs kyi zol dag gis// 'di ni zla bas bsgribs pa bzhin// dam pa'i mdzod 
27b5(mdo 'grel): na gnas pa'i dpal// rtag tu 'di yis rab steng zhes// gang zhig mthong la pad+mo can// zum par rab du thob pa bzhin// sde yi nga rgyal rab btang nas// gtong ba dkar ba'i dpal gyi dpal// 
27b6(mdo 'grel): gdugs dang cod pan rab gsal rnams// grong khyer ba rnams dag la btang // de yi 'byor pa dul ba yis// dpal gyis brgyan cing mtho ba mdzes// gzhu ltar gug pa'i yon tan rgyud// gzhan 
27b7(mdo 'grel): ngadag rtse ru 'dzegs pa nyid// stong phrag bzhi bcu dag dang ni// brgya phrag dag gi lo rnams kyang // lus can rnams kyi tsher gyur pa// de dus rtsod la sdang ba byung // 'jig rten skyong las lhag pa'i 
27b8(mdo 'grel): dpal// 'jig rten skyong de'i grong khyer ni// phun sum tshogs pas gang ba dag/ stong phrag drug cu byung bar gyur// mchod sbyin byed po de yi dpal// grags pa'i thig le bsod nams brgyan// 
28a1(mdo 'grel): mchod sbyin du ba'i 'khri shing dag/ 'khyog pos g.yo ba'i lan bu mdzes// de yi blon po zla chen po// rab 'bar zla ba'i snang ba bzhin// phran tshogs ku mung ldan pa ni// rtag tu 
28a2(mdo 'grel): rnam par rgyas bgyid gyur// g.yo med mtshan ma shes rab kyi// kha dan rgyal srid chu gter gyi// rna ba 'dzin pa gang gis ni// gtso bo'i grags pa pha rol bsgral// de yi blon po glang po ni// sa 
28a3(mdo 'grel): 'dzin zhes bya sa yi khur// bzod pa gzhan yang byung gyur te// phyogs kyi glang po lnga pa bzhin// gang zhig pur bu'i lugs kyi ni// ma bye gros kyi gsang sngags kyis// mi mthun phyogs kyi 
28a4(mdo 'grel): dpa' bo dag/ sbrul gyi dug bzhin btang bar gyur// blon po de yis mi bdag dang // rgyal po yis kyang de brgyan pa// skyes bu dam pas yon tan dang // yon tan gyis kyang skyes bu bzhin// byas shes 
28a5(mdo 'grel): dradrang ba'i rje bo dang // dam pa'i g.yog ni rab gus pa// legs byas las skyes kho na yi// skal pa ldan pas rnyed par 'gyur// rje yis skyes bu dam pa'i nang // gang gi yon tan shes pas 
28a6(mdo 'grel): rig/ 'di nyid kho na phun tshogs kun// ring du 'khyam pa'i ngal ba so yin// sbyin la zhen bas sa bdag ni// 'jig 'gyur gang gi 'bras bu can// blon po gzhan dang de gnyis kyis// nam zhig/ 
28a7(mdo 'grel): rmel sa mthang ba d+hA/ mnam ngan par bzung ba// mthang bas ngag/ 1rbAn []// rnam pa ngan chags par gyu// mags sa 
28a8(mdo 'grel): gnyen la sogs pa// dka' thub nags gnas drang srong che// 'di rnams kyang ni mtshan ma dag/ mthong bas yid dman de skad brjod// bar der skye ba snga ma ni// tshangs pa'i srin po tshangs
28b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i gnyen// ma rungs bzod dka' skye bo ngan// phrag dog drag po'i mig ces pas// rgyal po'i yon tan kun rab 'bar// sbyin pas rab bskyed grags stan thos// yon tan med de 
28b2(mdo 'grel): yon tan la// sdang ba'i gdung bas yang dag bsams// kye ma kyi hud mi bdag 'di'i// grags pa mkha' la nyin mtshan du// grub pa dri za tshig mnga' yi// bud med tshogs kyis sgrogs
28b3(mdo 'grel): par gyur// de yi yon tan bstod pa'i khab// rtag tu bdag gi rna bar zhugs// ci bya yon tan gyis mtho gzhan// rang bzhin nyid kyis yong mi bzod// des na sbyin pa'i ngang can de'i// sbyin pas 
28b4(mdo 'grel): bsgrubs pa'i grags pa dag/ phyin nas mgo slong dgag pa yis// nyams pa 'di ni bdag gis byas// gal te mgo bo mi ster na// sbyin pas blang ba'i grags nyams 'gyur// ci ste ste na bdag 
28b5(mdo 'grel): gi no// zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// de ltar yun rings bsams nas ni// dri ldang ri zhabs mthar gnas pa// g.yo ldan ma rungs drag po de// bzang po'i brag tu song bar gyur// mig 'phrul sbyor 
28b6(mdo 'grel): bshes pa de// rab tu zhi zhing rigs pa'i chas// byas shing sdig pa'i kun rtog ldan// sa bdag grong khyer sleb par gyur// srid pa'i nags 'dir rtag tu ni// yon tan skyon gyis yang dag gang // 
28b7(mdo 'grel): dpag bsam shing rnams rab skyes te// dug gi shing rnams skyes par gyur// ma lus nyams pa mtshon byed cing // 'jigs rung skrag par byed pa dag/ ltas ngan lta bu'i mi srun pas// su la 
28b8(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs skyed mi byed// yon tan ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyis// dazar gyur rab gsal mi mthun phyogs// skyon la brten par mi srun dang // rab rib dag la dbye ba ci// legs pa rnams kyi 
29a1(mdo 'grel): yid btsugs 'joms// rnam par sdang ba'i dug bzod dka'// logs ring skye bo mi srung sbrul// 'jigs su rung ba su yis sbrul// grong khyer der ni rab zhugs tshe// zong khyer/ 
29a2(mdo 'grel): lha ni gzugs can ma// skrag pa'i mig ni g.yo ba yis// sa skyong la ni mngon phyogs smras// tshangs pa'i gnyen ni mgo slong ba// 'di ni khyod can nye bar 'ongs// 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba khyod kyi ni// 
29a3(mdo 'grel): 'tshe ba gcod byed 'di gzhom 'os/ kha dag gis bsam pa dri ma can// de ni grong khyer sgo ru bgags// de mthong ba ni bdag gi yid// skrag cing dga' ba ma thob po// 'di smra grong khyer lha mo la// 
29a4(mdo 'grel): slong ba bgags pas ngo tsha dag/ rab skyes bzhin ras dman gyur pa// sa skyong gis ni rab tu smras// lha mo slong ba mngon 'ongs pa// 'di ni ma zlog nang du thong // slong ba'i bsam pa 'bras med 
29a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i// shugs ring bdag gis yongs mi bzod// slong ba don gnyer rnams don du// khrus nyams bsod nams rab tu thob// gang phyir lus ni dus bzhi'i grangs// gnas kyang rnam par 'jig
29a6(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur// slong ba re ba nyams pa dag/ 'di rnams mdun du mi bzod gang // de nyid skye bo legs rnams kyi// 'tsho ba 'gro bar mchod par 'os// bdag gi rjes su mthun pa ni// dge bar 'os 
29a7(mdo 'grel): pa khyod kyi mdzod// de yi bsam pa rnam bcom pa'i// gdung ba myur du bzlog par mdzod// de skad sa bdag tshig thos nas// g.yo ba med par nges pa yi// bsam pas yid ni rab gdung ba// lha mo 
29a8(mdo 'grel): snang ba min par 'gyur// de nas gya gyu can de 'ongs// mi srun sog le'i spyod tshul can// mi bzad drag po'i shing dag ni// gcod la rang nyid sbyor ba bzhin// slong la sgo ni rab phye ba// mi 
29b1(mdo 'grel): bdag khang pa de 'ongs la// sa bdag 'jig pas 'jigs pa'i sa// sa 'dzin dang bcas 'dar bar gyur// sgra gcan bzhin du gdod ngan de// mi dbang zla ba'i drung du 'ongs// mi shis don 
29b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin shis pa ni// brjod pa sngon du 'gro bar byas// rgyal po dge gyur gnyis skyes bdag/ dben par grub pa sgrub pa po// slong pa kun gyi lha yi shing // khyod can 'dod pa thob phyir 'ongs// rtag 
29b3(mdo 'grel): tu gang gi gzigs pa bdud rtsi'i char chen yid ni skye bo dam pa'i grogs// bzod pa khong khro'i rdul rnams rab sel chu bo blo gros sdug bsngal gyis gzir ma// dpal 'byor dri med sbyin pa'i chu 
29b4(mdo 'grel): ni mngon 'thor tshig ni bden zhing rigs par ldan// 'gro ba rnams kyi gnyen du skyes pa de ni khyod nyid gcig po kho na yin// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i mgo yis ni// bdag gis 'grub ces 'ga' yis 
29b5(mdo 'grel): smras// de ni byin mdzod khyod las gzhan// su yis mgo bo sbyin par nus// gsal ba'i don gter yid bzhin nor// dpag bsam ljon pa la sogs yod// rnyed dka'i don ni rab ster mchog 
29b6(mdo 'grel): khyod lta bu ni shin tu nyung // de yis der brjod mi bdag ni// mi g.yo yangs pa'i bsam pa can// slong ba gzigs pas kun dga' dag/ rdzogs pa yis ni de la smras// gang zhig bdag gi 
29b7(mdo 'grel): legs 'tsho dag/ slong ba rnams kyi don grub slad// rnam par mi rtog yo byad du// zad 'gyur bram ze bdag legs so// bdag srog pha rol don du ni// nam zhig 'gyur zhes re ba yod// gal te 
29b8(mdo 'grel): khyod kyi de blangs pa// 'di ni bsod nams cis ma yin// 'jig rten 'dir ni slong rnams la// gang gang byin pa de de brtan// grub pa'i yo byad bdag gi mgo/ bsngags par 'os pa gzung 
30a1(mdo 'grel): bar mdzod// sa spyod snying stobs legs ldan pa// rab dga' ldan pas 'di brjod tshe// blon po chen po zla chen dang // sa 'dzin dag gis de la smras// rje bo khyod kyi tshes dang po// 
30a2(mdo 'grel): rang nga gi srog ni bsrung ba nyid// 'gro ba khyod ni 'tsho ba na// srog chags thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur// gang phyir khyod lus kun gyi gzhi// mgo bo byin par mi 'os so// rin chen gser gyi rang 
30a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin mgo/ bram ze 'di la sbyin par mdzod// slong ba'i don mthun re ba dag/ gang gis don kun gyis rdzogs pa// de dag yang dag bsrungs pa yis// thams cad bsrungs pa nyid du 'gyur// 
30a4(mdo 'grel): sdig pa'i sems ldan gnyis skyes 'di'i// rnam rtog 'di ni 'jigs su rung // gang phyir slong ba'i dpag bsam shing // rtsa bcad nye bar 'tsho bya min// rin chen gser gyi mgo thob nas// 
30a5(mdo 'grel): 'di ni 'gro 'gyur mgo yis ci// bkres pa rnams kyis yid bzhin nor// rnam par brtags nas bag ma bya min// blon po'i gtso bos 'di smras tshe// rin chen gser gyi rang bzhin mgo// de 
30a6(mdo 'grel): ni bdag gis grub pa la// nyer ma kho med ces bram zes smras// de nas cod pan mi bdag gis// rab bkrol mu tig 'di rnams ni// mgo dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis// kun nas mchi/ 
30a7(mdo 'grel): ma'i rgyun bcas bzhin// skad cig de la grong khyer ba'i// cad pan rnams ni sa gzhi la// phyogs ni sreg mtshungs mgal me dang // skar mda' dag dang lhan cig lhung // rgyal pos mgo ni 
30a8(mdo 'grel): rab stir ba// rnam pa kun tu yongs rtags te// mthong bar mi bzod blon po ni// de dag lus ni gtang ba byas// de nas skyed tshal rin chen mang // zhugs te sa yi bdag po yi// rab rgyas 
30b1(mdo 'grel): tsam pa ka 'og tra// mgo bo gcod du yang dag gshegs// skyed mos tshal gyi lhas mthong nas// mgo bo gcod par brtson de la// rgyal po thub tshod ma mdzad ces// mya ngan dag gis 
30b2(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs pas smras// 'dar ldan 'khri shing rab smras pa// bung ba myos tshogs sgra dang ni// yal 'dab rab tu g.yo ba yi// lag pa dag gis zlog pa bzhin// rnam par brtag pa g.yo med de// 
30b3(mdo 'grel): skyed tshal lha yang dang byas nas// dri med byang chub la dmigs pa'i// smon lam dag dang ldan par gyur// grong dang rin chen rang bzhin tshal// 'di ni bsod nams phung po sa mtho// sems can 
30b4(mdo 'grel): yang dag sgrol 'os pa// ston pa'i mchod rten 'byung gyur cig/ bdag gis brtag pa 'di yis ni// bsod nams cung zad gang bsgrubs pa// de yis 'khor bar lus can rnams// 'khor ba med par 
30b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur bar shog/ de ltar dmigs nas mi bdag gis// tsam pa ka shing lo ma la// skra tshogs kyis btags bcad nas mgo/ gnyis skyes la ni rab tu byin// de nas mi yis bdag po'i snying stobs
30b6(mdo 'grel): spro zhing gsal ba'i smon lam dang // gang yang dri med bsod nams snang ba phyogs mthar rnam par 'phro ba yis// rmongs pa'i mun chen rnam par sel zhing yongs su myang 'das la brten pa dang // 
30b7(mdo 'grel): srid par goms pa'i ngal ba rab sel 'gro la skad cig dag gis gyur// de ltar sngon skyes spyod pa'i mtha'// bshad nas bcom ldan rgyal ba yis// sbyin pa dag pa'i dam chos dag/ dge slong 
30b8(mdo 'grel): rnams la bstan pa bsgrubs// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las zla ba'i 'od kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 
31a1(mdo 'grel): 'dab ste lnga pa'o// // sbyin pa la brtson brtson 'grus rgya che'i gnas// dag pa'i bdag nyid snying stobs rgya mtsho dang // spro ba che ldan rnams ni gzhan don la// kye ma bsam gyis 
31a2(mdo 'grel): mi khyab bzhed pa yin// gang zhig mkhar rnyog ri bo sul bcas dag la rtse dgas bag ma la 'dzeg dang // gang dag chu tshogs 'khrugs cing gyen 'thor rgya mtsho dag la rol pas ba lang rjes// gang 
31a3(mdo 'grel): yang nags tshal stug po'i khrod la dga' ba der khang pa'i thang bzhin 'god byed pa// de ni bdag nyid che rnams snying stobs kyis bsgrubs rgyas pa'i brtson 'grus rnam rtsen yin// sngon ni sangs 
31a4(mdo 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das// man ngag rab tu gsal ba yis// mnyan yod grong khyer pa rnams kyi// mi shes las skyes mun pa gsal// de ni nam zhig ma ga d+ha ra// dge slong tshogs kyis yongs 
31a5(mdo 'grel): bskor zhing // tshor pa'i skye bo'i rjes 'brang bcas// rang nyid rgyu zhing gshegs par gyur// nor chen don mthun rjes 'brang zhing // nags kyi lam nas gshegs pa de// tshem rkun tshogs kyis 
31a6(mdo 'grel): mthong gyur nas// sA la'i nags su nam bsams pa// sems can phan dges bcom ldan 'das// 'di ni sngon la gshegs su gzhug/ nor gyi phung pos gang ba yi// don mthun byi nas gzung 
31a7(mdo 'grel): bar bya// de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen gyis// de rnams 'dod pa mkhyen gyur nas// rnam 'gyur mi mnga' bzhin 'dzum pas// 'di dag ci zhes de la gsungs// das rab dang 'dzum pa yi/ 
31a8(mdo 'grel): snang bas rab rib bcom pa bzhin// de dag gdug pa yongs btang zhing// snyan pa'i tshig gis de la spras// bcom ldan bdag cag 'tsha ba 'di// smad par 'as pa las kyis sprul// ngan 
31b1(mdo 'grel): ma yin zhing las min// bdag cag gdug pa lhan cig skyes// rang bzhin gyis ni sdig bdag nyid// ngo bo nyid kyi sa las kyi ni// sbrul gyi mche rnon ji ltar sel// des na bdag cag 'tsho ba ni// 
31b2(mdo 'grel): nyams byar mi 'os gshegs par mdzod// khyod ni gshegs na don mthun gyi// nor rnams thams cad bdag cag 'phrog/ de skad de dge tshig thos nas// snying rje yongs su rdzogs pa'i thugs// 
31b3(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyi blo gros ni// skad cig khyogs la 'phyang bar gyur// de nas don mthun nor rnams kun// yongs bgrangs de dang mnyam pa ni// de tshe thob pa'i gter dag las// chom rkun tshogs 
31b4(mdo 'grel): la de yis byin// yang gshegs byon pas lam du ni// rim pa de lta bu nyid kyis// don mthun sgrol phyir de yis nor// lan drug de rnams la rab byin// yang ni lam de nas 'ongs te// rjes su 'brang 
31b5(mdo 'grel): dang bcas de la// de yi zas ni mgron gnyer ba'i// blo gros chom rkun rnams la byung // dam pa mthong bas dri bral te// yang dag bshad pas dge ba yang // 'grogs pa goms pas legs pa'i 
31b6(mdo 'grel): lam// za ma stegs dag nas 'gro bar 'gyur// mi dge thams cad yongs zad las// de rnams 'dod pa dag pa kun// der ni bcom ldan rgyal ba dag/ drang por gzigs pas mkhyen par gyur// don 
31b7(mdo 'grel): spyod pa dang don mthun dang // bdog pa gtong dang snyan par smra// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po la// nges pa'i bdag nyid gang dag dang // gang zhig snying stobs ldan rnams kyi// tshangs pa yi ni gnas 
31b8(mdo 'grel): bzhi po// snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms dang // byams pa zhes bya yongs 'dzin dang // ma chags yongs su sdang ba med// marmongs pa de dge ba'i rtsa// gsum ni thugs la zhen pa yi// bdag nyid 
32a1(mdo 'grel): chen po gang dag dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab rtag bsten zhing // thabs dang smon lam ye shes dang // stobs kyis rab tu bsten pa'i thugs 
32a2(mdo 'grel): yongs skyob dpa' bo gcig pu dang // rtag tu gnyis med gsungs nyid dang // rig pa gsum gyi gsal ba dang // dri med bzhi dang legs par ldan// phung po lnga las rnam grol zhing // skye mched drug ni
32a3(mdo 'grel): 'byed pa dang // byang chub yan lag bdun dang ldan// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad nyer ston// kun sbyor dgus dman rgyal ba ni// stobs bcu'i bdag nyid ldan dag gis// 'jig rten skye bo'i// 
32a4(mdo 'grel): spyod tshul la// mi mkhyen pa ni ci zhig yod// de nas shin tu snying rje yis// zhabs la mgos gtugs de dag la// de bzhin no zhes bcom ldan gyis// de yi zas la zhal gyis bzhes// de mthong sdig pa
32a5(mdo 'grel): zad gyur pa// de dag gis ni mnyam du phul// dge slong tshogs kyis bskor ba yis// zas kun cho ga bzhin du blangs// de 'og de yi smon lam ni// ye shes snang ba'i thur ma yis// de dag mig ni yang 
32a6(mdo 'grel): dag phye// rab tu gsal ba'i gnas mthong gyur// de dag 'phral la drag por ni// chags bral yongs smin rab tu dang // rab tu byung dang ldan thob nas// 'gro ba'i mchod bya nyid du gyur// de dag 
32a7(mdo 'grel): 'phral la dge ba de// sngon du nye bar gnas mthong nas// dge slong rnams kyis 'di ci zhes// dris shing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// 'di dag bdag dang 'brel pa 'di// don mthun bsrung 
32a8(mdo 'grel): zhing bslu ba yis// gling du 'gro ba'i skye ba ni// gzhan dag la yang grub par gyur// rnam rgyas spo ba sgrub byed kyi// rab mchog mkhas pa dga' ba'i sa// ba ra NA si zhes pa'i grong // mtho ris sde yi 
32b1(mdo 'grel): mtshams gyur yod// gang na dri med chu dubs ni// 'dzin pa lnga yi rgyan 'dzin dag/ rtag tu lus can rnams kyi snying // brtse ba bzhin du dang bar bgyid// bzod pa bzhin du 'byung po kun// bag pa ba 
32b2(mdo 'grel): bde bar gnas pa gang // 'tshe ba med bzhin dam pas bsten// rig pa bzhin du mkhas pas 'dod// de na mi bdag tshangs par ni// brtag bya rnam byas pad+mar brten// tshangs sbyin zhes byas 'jig/ 
32b3(mdo 'grel): rten ni// 'jig rten gsum pa bzhin du bsrungs// der ni ded dpon dga' ba'i ste// zhes pa rnam thos bu lta bu// chu rnams dag gis chu gter bzhin// nor gyi don mthun gnas su gyur// de sras// 
32b4(mdo 'grel): shin du dga' zhes pa// skye bo legs pa'i gnas su gyur// gang la brten pa'i yon tan tshogs// don rgyas nyid du rab tu gyur// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan 
32b5(mdo 'grel): shes rab ldan// byed po rnam par chags slad gang // legs byas dpal du byas pa bzhin// de ni dri med rig kun dang // sgra rtsal shin tu yangs par yang // ro ldan yid 'ong chu gter cher// chu 
32b6(mdo 'grel): bopo bzhin du zhugs par gyur// spyod pa yon tan gyis brgyan cing // lus ni mtshan gyis brgyan pa gang // skyes bu mchog la chags pa bzhin// bsngags par 'os pa'i dpal gyis bsten// bsod nams 
32b7(mdo 'grel): kyis nyos mtho ris su// yab ni dus kyis gshegs pa'i tshe// de yis tha snyad khur dag ni// phrag pa'i ngos la gnas par byas// des bsams bdag gi dpal 'byor 'di// rim pas 'ongs/ 
32b8(mdo 'grel): shing yangs pa ste// de lta na yang slong kun gyi// re ba yongs su mi rdzogs snyam// sngar 'ongs slong bas zos nyid che// gang zhig phyis slong 'bras bu med// skyes bu dam pa la gnas dpal// 
33a1(mdo 'grel): shin tu che ba des kyang ci// rta gtong slong ba gcig de yang // gang gi sad dung yong ma rdzogs// rin chen 'byung gnas byed po yis// yangs par byas pa'ang 'bras bu med// 
33a2(mdo 'grel): yang na brnag pa rgya che ba'i// slong ba su yis yongs rdzogs te// a gas+t+ra yi khyor chu yi// hub tu rgya mtsho chen po song // dpal ni gcig la slong ba mang // slong ba kun khengs bzod pa gang // nor de 
33a3(mdo 'grel): bdag gis yong mi 'thob// ci bya 'di ni shin tu gdung // dpal dang nor bu la sogs kyis// lnga drug nyid khengs gzhan min zhes// chu gter da dung rta gdong me// gdung ba nang du 'bar ba bzhin/ 
33a4(mdo 'grel): slong ba phyir phyogs kha yi ni// sdug bsngal shugs rings yongs mi bzod// de slad bdag gis 'bad pa yis// grangs med nor ni bsgrub par bya// de ltar yun ring bsams nas de// don
33a5(mdo 'grel): mthun chen pos bskor nas ni// rin chen gling gi grong khyer du// byin nas rin chen bsdu ba byas// de 'og don byas slar log ste// 'ong ba de ni chom rkun pa// don mthun nor 'brog sbyor ba la// 
33a6(mdo 'grel): nags na rgyu bas lam du mthong // de dag don mthun nor blang phyir// bab col du sbyor des mthong nas// rang gi nor kun byin nas ni// rjes su 'brang ba'i nor rnams bsrungs// phyi nas rim pa 
33a7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin nyid// rin chen gling gi 'gro 'ong gis// don mthun bskyab phyir tshem rkun la// nor ni lan drug rab tu byin// phyis kyang lam ni de nyid nas// 'ongs pas de bzhin chom rkun pa// don mthun 
33a8(mdo 'grel): nor ni 'phrog pa la// lhag par brkam pa de dag mthong // des bsams kye ma bdag gi nor// chen po yis ni yongs su sim// 'di dag pha rol nor 'phrog la// brtson pa las ni phyir ma log/ 
33b1(mdo 'grel): nor gyis 'gro ba khengs byas shing // bdag gis yang yang brjod gyur kyang // kye ma ma la chom rkun ni// sdug pa 'di dag yongs ma khebs// rigs pa'i spro bzhan gyur cing // lan smra kun du 
33b2(mdo 'grel): bcom pa dang // smad par 'os pa'i dam bca' bzhin// ngan par skyes pa bdag skye smad// me yis rab du gdungs pa de'i// skye ba med par mtshan mo ni// lo brgya lta bur rab tu gyur// mya ngan 'dam 
33b3(mdo 'grel): du bying ba yi// glang po'i dbang po bzhin ma g.yo// dbugs ring de la rmi lam du// lha ni mthu chen ldan pas smras// blo bzang mya ngan ma byed cig/ don med lus ni rab skem yin// rnam brtag dam 
33b4(mdo 'grel): par mngon 'dzegs pa// khyod kyi 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyur// blo ldan brtson 'grus can rnams kyi// 'bad pas 'grub par mi 'gyur ba// rmi lam rnam rtog rnyed dka' dang // 'jig rten 'di na de
33b5(mdo 'grel): yod min// gang yang nus pa de dpe med// gang zhig gnyis skyes gcig gi yang // gsung gi kyal ka kho na yis// 'bigs byed sa dang mtshungs par 'gyur// bdag nyid chen po'i bya ba'i dus
33b6(mdo 'grel): mi mnyam pa yang mnyam par gyur// ring ba rnams kyang nye bar 'ong // chu yang skams nyid du 'gyur/ gzhan don khyod kyi brtson pa 'di// 'bras bu nyid du the tshom med// snying stobs spyod pa bslab 
33b7(mdo 'grel): yi// the tshom lta yang mi 'byung ngo // lha rnams kyis bsten pa da ra'i// gling na rin po che dag yod// gang zhig gcig gi mthu yis kyang // 'jig rten gsum po khengs par bzod// gang phyir mi
33b8(mdo 'grel): yis 'das nas// de ni shin tu che ba'i sa// bsod nams rang bzhin gyis 'thob ste// snying stobs legs byas min pas min// bu dag yid ni gdung bzong // brtan pa'i blo gros rnam par 
34a1(mdo 'grel): bsgrubs// ba da ra yi gling 'gro la// rab tu spro ba yongs su bzung // khyod ni snying stobs mthu rgyas shing // 'khor ba rab tu sgrol bar bzod// de thob bya phyir phyogs dang ni// lam gyi 
34a2(mdo 'grel): rim pa 'di dag nyin// nub kyi phyogs kyi chan yod// shin tu che ba'i gling dag ni// bdun brgya rab tu 'das gyur cing // de bzhin du ni rin chen bdun// chu klung bdun dang rjes 'gro dang // bzlog 
34a3(mdo 'grel): 'gro zhes pa'i chu yi gter// rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis der// pha rol 'thob po bsod nams can// de nas de mtshungs ming can dri// rlung gi rab rib rmongs par byed// sman chen don yod ces pa 
34a4(mdo 'grel): yis// mig gnyis gang du rnal gnas ster// de nas kun 'khor zhes chu gter// gang du drung ni be rAm b+has// 'bying zhing 'byung bas srog chags rnams// kun 'khor bdun las sgrol bar byed// de 
34a5(mdo 'grel): nas kun 'khor zhes pa'i re// gang na mtshan rgyu dung gi lte// 'jigs su rung zhing srog 'phrog pa// skabs gsum pa yang skrag byed gnas// de na sman chen dung gi lte// sbrul ni nag pos dkris gyur pa// 
34a6(mdo 'grel): mig dang mgo la bzhag pa na// bsod nams ldan pa yongs su skyob// de nas chu sngon zhes pa'i mtsho// gang na srin po mig dmar yod// ma kir zhes bya'i sman 'dzin dang // sangs rgyas rig byed rig 
34a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i dbang // de nas chu sngon zhes pa'i ri// gang na mgrin pa sngon po ni// mtshan rgyu mig ni rab 'bar ba// srin po lnga brgya dag dang gnas// de na don yod ces pa'i sman// mthong dang dbugs dang reg pa 
34a8(mdo 'grel): dang // mche bas rab spros dug gi me// rtag tu sbrul gyi dug rnams bsrung // gso sbyong brtul zhugs ldan pa dang // byams dang snying rje'i bdag nyid kyis// sbrul ni nag po rab bskrad nas// sman chen 
34b1(mdo 'grel): de ni thob par 'gyur// de yi mig sman zur phud ni// byas na srin po'i shing rta ri// 'bras med bug pa phra mo can// bsod nams ldan pas sgrol bar 'gyur// de nas be raM b+ha zhes ri// de rjes gang gis pa/ 
34b2(mdo 'grel): rol gzhan// 'jigs rung zangs kyi nags zhes pa// sA la chen po'i nags kyi nang // de na sbrul ni sbram chen dag/ zangs mig ces pa bzod dka' ba// drag po'i dri ldan gang gi rlung // nyid kyis 
34b3(mdo 'grel): 'tsho bar mi byed gnas// zla ba drug du nyal gyur pa'i// kha chu yis ni dpag tshad khyab// ltogs pas gdungs nas zla drug ni// gnyid dang bral bas chung bar gyur// 'od ma'i rtsa ba rdos bsdams phug/ 
34b4(mdo 'grel): rab tu bye bas dri dang ldan// nyin dang mtshan du rab 'bar ba// mig sman du 'os sman thob 'gyur// sdang med ces pa sangs rgyas kyi// rig pa bzlas pas sbram chen ni// 'jigs rung de dang gzi 
34b5(mdo 'grel): brjid che// gzhan gyis kyang ni 'jigs mi 'gyur// de nas ri ni che ba bdun// 'od ma'i tsher mas gtams gyur pa// zangs glegs gis mtshan rkang pa yis// brtson 'grus ldan pas thar bar 'gyur// 
34b6(mdo 'grel): de rjes shal ma li nags dang // 'gyur byed chu klung rnam bdun dag/ brgal nas rtse gsum zhes pa'i ri// rab tu mtho ba dag tu sleb// de na rtse gsum zhes pa yis// tsher ma rdo rje 'bigs byed yod// 
34b7(mdo 'grel): zangs kyi glegs bu nges sbyar ba'i// rkang pa dag la mi 'jug go/ chu klung rtse gsum zhes pa dang // de na lcags kyi rtse yi ri// chu klung ngos dang lcags phur gyi// ri bo de nas des lha'i klung // de nas 
34b8(mdo 'grel): bco brgyad 'khyogs ces pa'i// ri bo 'grod par dka' ba dang // de nas de dang mi mtshungs klung // de rjes phra mo zhes pa'i ri// de nas du ba'i mig ces ri// phyogs ngos du bas tshig gyur pa// ma rungs 
35a1(mdo 'grel): sbrul gdug dkyil 'khor gyi// mthong ba reg pa'i drug gis khyab// de yi rtsen rdzing bu'i mtha'// rdobs bcings pa'i phrag chen po// phug gang nor bu 'od khru dang // sman chen 
35a2(mdo 'grel): byed ces pa yod// de phye de yi mgo dang ni// rkang lag lho la mngon par byugs// gsang sngags stobs dang bcas bgrod na// ma rungs sbrul gyis gnod mi 'gyur// de nas sbrul gdug ri bo
35a3(mdo 'grel): bdun// sems can drag pos kun tu khebs// de lta'i chu klung dag kyang ste// chu'i phun tshogs pa mtha' med// de dag ma lus rab brgal te// gzhan pan brtson pa bsod nams kyis// rtse mo 
35a4(mdo 'grel): mkha' la reg gyur pa// dkar ba'i ri la 'dzegs par 'gyur// de nas de yi ngos gzhan la// ro hi ta kri zhes grong khyer// dpag bsam shing gis nye bar mdzes// mtho ris dang mtshungs mthong 
35a5(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur// de na ded dpon snying stobs ni// chen po ma g+ha zhes pa yod// sems can kun la phan par dgyes// brgya byin bzhin du rnam par grags// shes bzang blo gros skyon med des// bar da 
35a6(mdo 'grel): yi gling dag tu// 'gro bar brtson pa khyod kyis ni// lam gyi gdams ngag kun byed 'gyur// 'di brjod bdud rtsi'i rlan gyis bzhin// 'os pa'i tshig gis shin tu dga'// mang du spro ba bskyed byas
35a7(mdo 'grel): nas// lha mo 'phral la mi snang gyur// shin tu dga' ni rab sad nas// thams cad de de bzhin zhes bsams// rang gi spro ba sngon btang nas// snying stobs la ni zhon te chas// de yis bstan pa'i lam/ 
35a8(mdo 'grel): nas ni// ngal ba rnam bcom des bzod pas// lo ni bcu gnyis rdzogs pa na// ro hi ta ka'i grong khyer sleb// skabs 'dir der ni don mthun ba dag/ ma g+ha las kyi sbyor ba las// gso ba dka' ba'i 
35b1(mdo 'grel): nad kyis ni// lus ni rnal du ma gnas gyur// de nas rgyal po'i khab lha'i khyim// nang du 'jug pa ma thob nas// de yi sgo na shin tu dga'// bya ba bsgrub slad 'dug par 'gyur// de nas sman pa'i zol 
35b2(mdo 'grel): gyis ni// de ni nang du 'jug pa thob// nye bar rigs pa'i gtam shes pa// su yi gus pa'i sa ma yin// tshe yi rig byed sgrub shes shing // 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid shes pa des// zla drug 'jug nyid de yi/ 
35b3(mdo 'grel): tshor// shes nas bsams pa 'khrugs par gyur// dga' zhing phan pa'i sman mang dang // de yis rim gro legs byas pas// dus ni shin tu thung ba yis// shin zhu ga' dang mdza' bor gyur// / 
35b4(mdo 'grel): de la mdza' bas sman sbyar rnams// de yis 'dod pa bya bar gyur// mdza' bos cung zad byin pa gang // de dag kun la yid dga'o// de nas bde ba'i rim 'gros de'i// nad ni chung ba nyid du gyur// dam/ 
35b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i grogs las sdug bsngal zhi// de las nad dang bral bar gyur// de nas mag+ha mdza' ba las// yid phebs skyes la shin tu dga'// slad nas rang gi gtam gyi tshe// spyod tshul mtha' ni rig 
35b6(mdo 'grel): par byas// ba dar yi gling bgrod la// bdag nyid che de'i spro ba dag/ gzhan don g.yo med shes gyur nas// ma g+ha sa ya mtshan de la smras// kye ma snying po med pa yi// 'khor ba 'di na snying po'i gzugs// 
35b7(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyi bsam pa'i dpung gnyen ni// nor bu 'ga' zhig yod pa yin// na tshod gzhon zhing mdzes pa'i gzugs// gzhan gyi don la gcags pa'i ying // yon tan phun tshogs bsod nams ldan// 
35b8(mdo 'grel): gnas 'di khyod nyid kho na'i yin// 'di snyedas 'di rab bzlas nas// khyod ni gzhan gyi don du 'ongs// khyod kyi stong grogs bgyid pa la// 'on kyang bdag ni mchog tu gzir// mtshams ni nges pa 
36a1(mdo 'grel): lus can gyi// srog ni nges par 'gro ba nyid// khyod kyi 'dod pa'i rgyu nyid du// bdag gi de mthar gyur kyang bya'i// da ltar shing du zad pa gang // de ni zad par yongs su bzang // gzhan
36a2(mdo 'grel): gyi don du srog dag kyang // zad pa rnyed pa brgya dang mnyam// bdag gis pa da ra yi gling // ma mthong 'on kyang bdag gis thos// chu gter chen po phyogs lung ston// de nas de yi mtshan ma shes// de 
36a3(mdo 'grel): skad brjod nas sa bdag gis// grogs bzang mnyen pa'i tshig kyang dor// de yis bkra shis gru gzings ni// shin tu dga' dang lhan cig bzung // de nas bsam pa yangs pa ni// de dag 
36a4(mdo 'grel): gzings la zhon gyur te// rjes su mthun pa'i rlung dag gis// dpag tshad brgyar yang 'gro bar byed// gnas dang gnas su chu gter che'i// chu ni kha dog sna tshogs mthong // 'di dag ci zhes 
36a5(mdo 'grel): ltad mo'i slad// shin tu dgas dris ma 'ga' la'o// rgya mtsho 'di yi chu la ni// lcags kyi ri bo lnga dag yod// gzhan yang zangs dang dngul rang bzhin// de rnams grib ma'i bye brag gis// kha
36a6(mdo 'grel): dog sna tshogs gnas dang gnas// khongs gnas rab 'bar sman dag gis// chu gter 'di ni 'bar bar mthong // 'di brjod ma g+ha dus kyi mtshams// thob cing nad kyis thebs par gyur// srog 
36a7(mdo 'grel): btang dam pa'i grags pa dag/ brtan pa'i 'tsho ba rnam par btsugs// ji ltar bdag nyid che snying stobs// rdo rje byugs pa bas kyang brtan// de ltar gal te tshe gyur na// srid na bsgrub byar cis mi 'gyur// 
36a8(mdo 'grel): gzings ni ngogs byin shin tu dgas// de dang bral ba las skyes pa'i// mya ngan bsal nas grogs po yi// lus ni legs par bya ba bsgrubs// rten ni rnam par chad pa'i tshe// gang zhig bya la brtan 
36b1(mdo 'grel): par yad// 'ad bdag rnams s+ho// rgyu sa skabs mam pa' rnags// dun gzangs lananabyas// ga na yang dag // gcan ngas nas na// nags 
36b2(mdo 'grel): stug po'i nang du zhugs// bdag nyid chen po'i blo gros ni// dman pa 'bral bas ma yin zhing // gdung dang dgra rnams mngon skyong dang // nad dang nyon mongs spyod pas min// der ni nam mkhar son 
36b3(mdo 'grel): 'i ri// phyogs ngos ma lus bkag gyur pa// mdun du bgegs ni gzugs can bzhin// bzad par dka' ba de yis mthong // rmongs pa bzhin du sbyor ba'i bi// de mthong thabs ni dman gyur 
36b4(mdo 'grel): cing // zhabs su yal 'dab ma la stan la// rtul nas de yi skad cig bsams// kye ma bdag ni zhugs gyur nas// ji snyed dus ni rab tu 'das// gang du'ang ba dang yi ming // ming yang nges par 
36b5(mdo 'grel): mthos so// bsod nams zong gis bdag gi ni// bsngon pa'i thogs mchog byung ba gang // de yang las kyi dpa' rlabs kyis// dus min gdos pa chag pa bzhin// thabs nyams thabs ni 'di 
36b6(mdo 'grel): la yang // shin tu che ba'i 'bad rtsol gyis// bdag ni nges par rnam mi bzlog/ grub pa'am yang na shi bar gyur// 'gro ba gsum po 'dir skyes pa// gzhan la phan bying srog dag ni// rbad 
36b7(mdo 'grel): par gyur pa de gcig phra// skye 'gro rnams su mchod par 'os// der ni de lta bas ma 'khrugs de// snying stobs rgya mtshor shes gyur nas// ri la gnas pa'i mchod sbyin ni// blon po zhes pa 'ongs 
36b8(mdo 'grel): nas spras// shar du dpag tshod byin gyur nas// sa 'dzin rtse mo gsum pa ni// sa las byas pa'i them skas la// 'dzegs la de nas 'gro bar gyis// de skad gnod sbyin gdams ngag gis// 
37a1(mdo 'grel): rin chen de yis rnam brgal bas// rtse mo shin tu mtho ba yi// shel gyis 'dzin mdun du mthong // bya rnams kyis kyang bgrod dka' ba// 'jam pa'i zag ni gcig pu der// de
37a2(mdo 'grel): yi yid la re ba ni// yud tsam bya ba med par gyur// shin tu mazo zhing rten dang bral// rang gi rtogs bzhin g.yo med par// de la rnam dpyad yun ring de// ri mo bkod pa bzhin du gyur// de nas
37a3(mdo 'grel): zla 'od ces pa yi// gnod sbyin brag gi phug gnas pa// snying stobs phun tshogs de la ni// mngon phyogs ya mtshan ldan pas smras// 'di nas shar du rgyang grags tsam// song bas tsan dan 
37a4(mdo 'grel): nags tshal ni// rlung zhon gyis bskyod 'khri shing ldan// sngon med rnam 'phrul mthong bar 'gyur// der ni rab gsal byed ces pa// phug na gtams pa'i sman chen po// lus can bsrung phyir// 
37a5(mdo 'grel): rin chen la// rab tu btus pas 'thob par 'gyur// de yi 'od kyis snang byas pa'i// skas kyis shel gyi ri la ni// 'phral nyid du ni yang dag 'dzegs// 'dod pa thob phyir 'gro bar byos// 
37a6(mdo 'grel): sman chen de ni don byas bzhin// skad cig gis ni 'gro bar gyur// 'dod pa thob pa glog ltar g.yo// de phyir mya ngan bya ba min// de ltar sgrub byed gnod sbyin gyis// bstan pas de yis sa 'dzin dag/ 
37a7(mdo 'grel): yang dag 'dzegs pas mdun du ni// gser gyi khang ldan grong khyer mthong // lhun po brtsegs pas rgyas pa bzhin// rab gsal rnams kyi sprul pa bzhin// ngo mtshar kun gyis byas pa bzhin// 
37a8(mdo 'grel): de mthong ya mtshan ldan par gyur// grong khyer lam ni mi med cing // gser gyi sgo glegs chen po yis// de yi sgo ni bcad mthong nas// de ni nags kyi mtha' na gnas// skabs 'dir nyin mo'i 
37b1(mdo 'grel): mthar gyur te// mtha' med mkha' lam lam bgrod pas// tsha zer can ni yongs ngal bzhin// nub kyi ri dang nye bar sleb// 'od stong nub par gyur pa'i tshe// mngon par 'gro ba mun can ma// rgyu 
37b2(mdo 'grel): skar bdag po 'dod gyur nas// dal bus rab tu 'gro ba bzhin// de nas rab gsal 'byor pa yis// phyogs kun yongs rdzogs gyen du phyogs// dri med byang chub sems dpa' bzhin// bdud rtsi'i 'od de/ 
37b3(mdo 'grel): shar bar gyur// mun pa'i tshogs ni ma lus pa// rab tu zhi bar nus shing rgyas// yid ni dngas byed zla ba'i 'od// snying stobs spyod tshul bzhin du mdzes// nyin bral las skyes phyogs rnams 
37b4(mdo 'grel): kyi||mun pa'i rmongs pa zla bas phrogs// gang phyir ring na bzhugs pa yi// bdag nyid che rnams gzhan pa na mchog/ zla ba'i zer gyis shin tu dga'// skad cig lus ni khengs gyur nas// bya ba'i
37b5(mdo 'grel): rgya mtsho rba rlabs dag/ 'khrug pa'i rgya ni gnyid thob gyur// mtshan mo zad par gyur pa'i tshe// yon tan yon gyis gus bcas pa// mthu chen lha yis rmi lam du// de la mngon par phyogs nas 
37b6(mdo 'grel): smras// e ma kA ye snying stobs can// de nyid dam pa'i mngon zhen pa// legs byas khyod kyis ngal du ba ni// gzhan gyi don du rgya chen byas// nyon mongs lhag ma chung ngu 'dir// yid ni 'byung bar/ 
37b7(mdo 'grel): mi 'os so// snying stobs dman pa med rnams kyi// rang dbang nyid du thams cad 'grub// gser gyi grong khyer gang 'di dang // gsum ni pha rol gzhan dang gzhan// gong nas gong du rnam par bkra/ 
37b8(mdo 'grel): 'di na rin chen grong khyer yod// khyod kyis sgo ni brdungs pa na// de dag las ni mi'am ci// bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu drug dang // so gnyis rim pas phyir 'byung 'gyur// khyod kyis dbang po thul ba yis// 
38a1(mdo 'grel): de yi bag med rig par bya// ring po min par 'dod pa dag/ 'thob par 'gyur te gzhan pa ci// lha mos gus bcas 'di brjod la// de nas rab sad shin tu dgas// grong khyer 
38a2(mdo 'grel): sgo la mngon phyogs te// lag pa yis ni lan gsum brdungs// de nas mi 'am ci mo bzhi// g.yo ba'i rlung gis bskyod pa yis// ngo mtshar ljon pa'i snye ma bzhin// yid ni rangs par byed gyur cing // 
38a3(mdo 'grel): 'dren byed dag gi bdud rtsi'i char// bzhin ras zla ba'i 'od zer gyis// nyin mo'ang bla 'od ldan par byas// dga' bas mthong des shin tu dga'// 'dod pa rgya cher yang dag mchod// de ni mngon par 
38a4(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa yis// mdza' bos mthon gces bzhin du byas// zla ba chu shel stan 'khod pa// de la dran pa 'tsho ba'i sman// lus dang bcas par skyes pa bzhin// stan ni bzung byas de dag gis// 
38a5(mdo 'grel): rtse dga' dgod pa'i 'od zer dag/ yang dag rgyas par gyur pa ni// mdza' ba'i brang skyes ga par dag/ sngon du ster ba bzhin du smras// yon tan dam pas brgyan pa'i dbyibs// khyed can 'ong bar 
38a6(mdo 'grel): 'os pa yang // gang gi khyim du rang nyid 'ongs// kye ma bdag cag bsod nams can// bdud rtsi la ni su zhig sdang // tsan dan la ni su mi sred// zla ba la ni su gus dman// dam pa rnams la su mi
38a7(mdo 'grel): 'dod// gang yang bud med rang nyid ni// gleng bskal bzang nyams pa'i rgya// de lta na yang khyod mthong ba// nyid kyis mu cor byas phyir smra// mi 'am ci yi zong khyer 'di// bdag cag dang bcas mdza'/ 
38a8(mdo 'grel): bas ster// legs par brjod ldan rin chen yang // dge bakhyod kyi rang dbang nyid// de skad de dag rnams kyi tshig/ mdza' bar 'os thos shin du dgas// so yi zla 'od snying stobs ltar// rab tu 
38b1(mdo 'grel): dkar ba spro zhing smras// phebs par smra ba'i bdud rtsi 'di// su yi gus mad gnas ma yin// khyed rnams dag gis gus byas pa// bdag gi yang ni gus pa'i gnas// 'di mthong nyid ni
38b2(mdo 'grel): bsngags par 'os// de la'ang rjes su 'dzin pa 'di// mu tig 'khri shing gdung sel la// tsan dan gyis kyang byugs sam ci// rnam pa 'di lta'i dri med dag/ zla ba'i 'od bzhin gyur pa dang // rnam pa
38b3(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten spyod tshul ni// yang dag rigs shing mdzes pa yin// rigs shing mdzes pa'i spyod pa dang // rab tu dang shing dri med yid// mnyes gshin pa dang 'jam pa'i tshig/ su yi gus pa'i sa ma 
38b4(mdo 'grel): yin// mchod pa'i yo byad 'os gyur pa'i// kun spyod 'di ni bdag gis blang // bud med gzhan dbang yin pa'i slad// khyed kyang bdag nyid sbyin mi 'os// gzhon nu ma dngos las 'das pa// khyod ni gzhan
38b5(mdo 'grel): gyis yongs su bzung // byams shing gus pas ma dang ni// phebs pas bdag gi sring mo yin// gang zhig gzhan gyi 'byor pa dug/ gzhan gyi bud med ma dang ni// gzhan 'tshe bdag nyid 'tshe ba nyid// de 
38b6(mdo 'grel): dag phyogs ni gnod pa med// phra ma rdzun dang tshig rtsu ba dang // bkyal pa smra ba spangs pa'i tshig/ gang gi kha na rtag pa nyid// de dag phyogs rnams kun tu shis// gang zhig brnab sems bral ba'i 
38b7(mdo 'grel): sems// gnod sems dag ni yongs su spangs// log par lta bas dman gyur pa// de dag legs pa'i lam la brten// mi dge bcu yi lam dag las// nges par log pa'i rang bzhin can// de dag
38b8(mdo 'grel): dge ba'i sde rnams kyis// bkag pa med pa'i mtho ris lam// nor gyis mtho ba rnams kyi nor ni blo gros nyid// dbang pos rnam rgyal rnams kyi mig ni rig pa nyid// skyes bu mchog gyur rnams kyi 
39a1(mdo 'grel): bsod nams brtse ba nyid// yid ni gtsang ba rnams kyi 'jug dog bdag nyid do// skyes bu rnams kyi rnam pa de lta'i yon tan dag/ legs gnas 'di ni khrims kyi dri ma med par
39a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur// rin chen mu tig dam pa'i tshogs las shin tu lhag/ tshul khrims dag ni dam pa rnams kyi rgyan du brjod// sems can don gnyer dbang po thul ba de yis ni// yon tan rjes mthun de skad brjod 
39a3(mdo 'grel): pa thos gyur nas// tshim par gyur cing ltad mo'i don bzhin mkha' las ni// zla ba'i 'jig rten sa la spro zhing de yis smras// nor bu bzhin du yon tan rab 'bar rin zang med// dge ba khyod kyi mdzes pa'i/ 
39a4(mdo 'grel): 'od ni mthong gyur pa// gang zhig mgo dang rna ba snying ka nyid la yang // rtag par dam pa rnams kyis rgyan du khyod nyid bgyis// bdag nyid dang mnyam grags pa'i mthu ldan rin zang che// nor bu 'di ni khyod 
39a5(mdo 'grel): kyis rab tu bzung bar mdzod// gang zhig rgyal mtshan la bzhag dpag tshad stong phrag tu// slong ba rnams kyi 'dod pa char du 'bab par 'gyur// de skad brjod nas rin chen rab mchog gzhon nu mas// 
39a6(mdo 'grel): rab tu dang bgazugs can bzhin du de la byin// des kyang de ni mnga' ba'i nye bar srung bas blangs// dngul las byas pa'i grong khyer dag ni gnyis par byin// de ni gus pas de y-inyis 'gyur dag gi ni/ maM ma 
39a7(mdo 'grel): ci mo rnams kyis de la mchod pa byas// rim pa de dag nyid kyi rnam dag blo gros kyis// de yi nyis 'gyur mthu ldan nor bu thob par 'gyur// de nas gsum pa'i grong khyer bai DUr+ya rang bzhin// mdzes pa'i mig 
39a8(mdo 'grel): can bcu drug de dag de yis mthong // de dag rnams la de bzhin nyid du nor bu ni// de yi nyis 'gyur mthu ldan rim gro dam pas thob// de nas mdun du rin chen bzhi yi rang bzhin gyi// grong khyer grong khyer kun las 
39b1(mdo 'grel): lhag pa'i dpal ldan pa// bzhi par byin de mi'am ci ni mdzes ma de'i// nyis 'gyur dag gis yon tan lhag pas de don gnyer// legs bsdams de yis de bzhin nyid du dam chos kyi// gtam dag zhar la
39b2(mdo 'grel): byung bas tshim gyur de dag ni// rab rgyas ut+pal sngon po'i phreng ba ltar ring ba'i// zur mig gis 'phangs 'od dang ldan pas de la smras// rin chen 'byung gnas zla ba ba dar zhes pa// nged kyi ming po mi'am 
39b3(mdo 'grel): ci yi rgyal rigs yod// rdzu 'phrul yongs kyis rang gi ming gis mtshan gyur pa// rin thang che ba'i gling 'di de yi bzhugs gnas yin// 'od zer tshogs ni gsal ldan rin chen 'di yang bsod nams rten 
39b4(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis// gso sbyong zhes bya'i brtul zhugs nges pa'i tshe ga rgyal mtshan la bkod na// 'dzam bu'i gling du mtha' dag 'gro tshogs mngon 'dod don rnams char nyid 'bebs// gzhan don brtan par gyur
39b5(mdo 'grel): pas khyab par bgying slad de ni gzung bar mdzod// de ltar mdzes ma rnams kyis 'chi med shing 'bras legs btus gus bcas shing // lhag par mdza' sdug ldan pas skal bzang nor bu byin pa blangs
39b6(mdo 'grel): byas nas// mgyogs 'gro rab dga' sprin shugs zhes bya rlung las rgyal ba la zhon te// de yi lam gyi gdams ngag thob pas de yang rang gi grong khyer song // dus tshod der ni dri med grags ldan sa yi 
39b7(mdo 'grel): bdag po tshangs pas byin// yangs pa'i dge bas mtho ris lam du rab gshegs pa ra NA si ru// dpal ldan 'jig rten bskyab blo rnams bskrun slong ba kun gyi 'bras bu ster// shin tu dga' ni grong 
39b8(mdo 'grel): kyi gso bas chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang bskur// de nas mgo bkru tshaga'i rim pa yis// gso sbyong dgal nar gnas bco lnga la// rin po tsha rgyal mtshan rtser btags nas// sna tshogs 'dod pas 
40a1(mdo 'grel): yongs su gang bar byas// gzhan la phan pas 'bras bu ldan par gshegs bgrod byas shing lo brgyar ni// rgyal srid chen po la gnas 'jig rten mtha' dag khengs byas mi bdag gi/ gnas
40a2(mdo 'grel): la sras bzhag nye bar zhi ba thams cad thob cing de nyid shes// gang yang 'di ni tshangs pa'i dngos po dam pa ngag tu gshegs par gyur// rin chen gling du mngon bgrod pa// shin tu dga' yi skye ba der// 
40a3(mdo 'grel): gang sngon bdag gis khengs byas pa// chom rkun de kun 'di dag go// de skad ston pa gtso bo yis// rang gi spyod tshul mtha' yi gtam// sbyin dang brtson 'grus man ngag gis// dge slong rnams la rjes bstan 
40a4(mdo 'grel): bsgrubs// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las bang ra'i gling du 'gro ba'i yal 'dab ste drug pa'o// / dge ba'i smon lam dag pa'i gzi 
40a5(mdo 'grel): brjid dang // dben pa dri med snang ba'i rtogs byed ldan// gang zhig yongs su bsgrags pa tsam nyid na// srid pa'i rmongs 'brog de nyid bsngags par 'os// grong khyer ser skya zhes par ni// n+ya gro d+ha yi nags tshal gnas// 
40a6(mdo 'grel): sngon tshe 'khor ni stong phrag la// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan mdzad// mi dman kun dga'i tshogs kyi bcung // tsan dan ltar bsil de yi ni// gsung gi bdud rtsi gsan pa yi// snyims pas bsod 
40a7(mdo 'grel): nams ldan pas 'thungs// chos ni nyan pa'i tshogs pa der// rgyal po zas ni gtsang ma yis// bsod nams nye bar bstan pa'i chus// dri ma dang bral dga' ba thob// de nas rgyal rigs las skyes pa// 
40a8(mdo 'grel): shAkya ming chen ngag gis der// chos kyi gdams ngag thos gyur nas// rang gi khyim du byin te smras// kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'di// bdag cag gis ni don chen la// bcom ldan sangs rgyas 
40b1(mdo 'grel): chos dang ni// dge 'dun grub dang myang 'di'i slad// de yi tshig de thos gyur nas// khyim thab zla 'od gdams ngag gi/ khyad par thob pas dga' ba dang // don du gnyer las de la smras// skyes bu bsod 
40b2(mdo 'grel): rnams skal ldan rnams// bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes bzung 'os// bdag cag bud med smad 'os rnams// de yi man ngag 'os ma yin// de skad khyim thab tshig thos nas// des spras bzang mo bcom 
40b3(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das// 'gro ba'i bla ma'i snying rje yi// gzigs pa dag la dbye ba med// kun la nyi ma'i 'od zer snyoms// chu 'dzin dag gis char pa snyoms// sems can kun la thugs brtse ba// bcom ldan 'das 
40b4(mdo 'grel): kyis gzigs pa snyoms// skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo yi// tshig gi phyi dro khyod kyi skabs// bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du ni// rgyal po zas gtsang byed pa nyid// de skad bdag po'i tshig snyan gyis// shAkya 
40b5(mdo 'grel): bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod nams nags// gtsang ma der ni de song gyur// der ni steng stobs dpag bsam shing // snying stobs me tog 'bras bu che// rab tu zhi ba'i bdud rtsi 
40b6(mdo 'grel): yis// yang dag bran pa de yis mthong // rlung gis ngung pa'i 'bri shing bzhin// de yis ring nas der phyag 'tshal// rna rgyan g.yo ba'i zol gyis ni// rmongs pa yongs su gtong ba bzhin// gser 'od 
40b7(mdo 'grel): rin cher rgyan rnams kyis// brgyan pa dag ni mthong gyur nas// dge slong kun dga' bo zhes pas// shin tu phan brtson de la smras// ma mkhyod kyi cha lugs 'di// dregs pas rgyags zhing rab
40b8(mdo 'grel): shes stong // thub pa'i dka' thub nags su ni// pi rigs 'di ni chags bral gnas// yon tan gyis bsdams chags pa yi// bu cor rgyan rnams kye ma 'dir// bdag cag gzung bar mi 'os 
41a1(mdo 'grel): shes// khyod la nye bar 'doms pa bzhin// de yis 'di brjod gzugs bzang de// skyengs pa'i gdong ni dman pa yis// rgyan rnams thams cad bkrol nas ni// rang gi khyim du bskur
41a2(mdo 'grel): bar gyur// de nas thams cad 'khod pa la// dge ba ston mdzad bcom ldan 'das// dngos po mi rtag pa nyid du// nye bar ston pa'i rtsom pa mdzad// gang gis rtag tu mi rtag nyid// rtag pa nyid bzhin 
41a3(mdo 'grel): 'gro bar ni// srog chags rmongs pas 'dzin byed pa// 'di ni rmongs pa'i mthu chen no// bden par yid ches rmongs pa yis// 'jig rten mi bden pa la dga'// dngos po kun gyi dngos med ni// nyams/ 
41a4(mdo 'grel): myong gnas pa rig pa med// skye ba'i thos pa'i lam du yang dag chags ldan kha cig sgra yi bstan bcos dag dang ni// gzhan ni rig byed lam dang rtog ge rtsod pas gzhan te kha cig rgyud ni yongs 
41a5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin dang // gzhan dag rnam mang sgyu rtsa la mkhas dang lhan cig nyid du 'jig par 'gyur ba'i skad cig gnas// de la yang ni mi 'jigs pa bzhin rol rtsed dag gi rmongs rnams dga' ba rab tu 'dzin// 
41a6(mdo 'grel): mi bzang yul gyi gnod pa'i lus ni nyon mongs phung po dag gi gnas// rab rmongs las byung srid par brtsub mya ngan zang gi rnam par gsal// mtha' dang bral ba'i srid pa'i nad 'di ji ltar rnam 
41a7(mdo 'grel): par ldog 'gyur ba// de ltar bya dang bya min phan pa'i sa la rnam dpyod ldan pas dpyad// bcom ldan rang nyid 'di la sogs// 'du byed mi rtag yang dag ldan// chos kyi gdams ngag dge ba ni// 
41a8(mdo 'grel): rigs par gsung bar brtson pa'i tshe// de ni shAkya'i bu mo gcig/ bu mo gzhon nu ma yi mtshams// bzod dka'i lang tsho la gnas pa// gzugs dang skal bzang nyid kyis dregs// nu ma'i ngos 
41b1(mdo 'grel): su mu tig gi/ do shal dga' ba'i bdag po yi// grags pa'i snying po gsal 'dra la// zur mig g.yo bas yang dag bltas// ming chen chung ma zla 'od kyis// rtse gcig min pa'i sems 
41b2(mdo 'grel): ldan de// do shal rnam par blta ba dag/ mthong nas chags bral bzhin du bsams// chos ni nye bar ston tshe yang // g.yo ba'i do shal 'di la lta// dngos po rnams kyi skad cig ma// 'di dag rmongs 
41b3(mdo 'grel): pas mi nyan nyid// rang gi do shal bstan nas 'di// do sha la spro ba bdag gis dbrog/ lhag pa mthong ba kho na yis// lus can dregs pa zhi bar gyur// 'di bsams de yis 'bangs mo ni// ro hi 
41b4(mdo 'grel): ta zhes bya la smras// ro hi ta song bdag gi ni// do shal khyim nas mgyogs su long // de yis de skad brjod pas de// der ni chos mnyan la zhugs pa// dus min 'gro bas yid byung nas// shugs dang 
41b5(mdo 'grel): bcas pas skad cig bsams// kye ma bdag gi dge ba 'dir// bar chod 'di ni yang dag skyes// gang phyir gzhan dbang 'tsho gyur pa// bdag gis chos nyan mi 'thob bo// bsod nams dri bzang rgyas 
41b6(mdo 'grel): gyur cing // snying rje'i ge sar 'khrigs gyur pa// bcom ldan zhal gyi pad+mo las// gsung gi sbrang rtsi mchog gis 'thob// kye ma rang dbang rnam par gcod// lus 'jig bde ba nyams byed pa// sdug 
41b7(mdo 'grel): bsngal 'am par srog chags rnams// ga mag ni sdug bsngal brgyad ma yin// lag gisang la du bgyis thub pa// zla rngan bya dag le chu maM thigs// thugs rang shin tu tshabs bka'// ma 9 
41b8(mdo 'grel): slad dag gis 'thung// dpon po mthong na khengs nyams shing // yon tan nyams dang gzi brjid mchod// zhi zhing ngal ba 'di dag ni// g.yog byed dag gi dang po'i 'bras// g.yog ni rkang pa 'ching 
42a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i lcags kyi lcags sgrog zhum zhing nga rgyal 'chags pa'i sa// rtag tu nges par rang gi bya ba 'gog cing gnyid dang bde ba 'joms par byed// re ba'i chags zhe na tshogs kyi lam 
42a2(mdo 'grel): dang legs 'grogs longs spyod kyi ni rdo rje dang // rmongs pa rnams kyi ri dgas skom skyed mya ngan sa bzhi lus ni zad byed yin// de ltar yun ring bsams nas ni// de yi bka' yis de song ste// 
42a3(mdo 'grel): lus ni g.yog tu btsongs rnams la// rang dgar gnas pa ga la yod// gzhan gyis bskul bas dman gyur cing // 'gro ba de ni bcom ldan 'das// snying rje rgyas pa'i lha yi ni// spyan gyis gzigs 
42a4(mdo 'grel): nas skad cig bsams// skye ba 'di la 'di yi ni// 'tsho ba'i mtshams lhag yongs su rdzogs// sdug ma 'di ni 'khor ba las// bdag rang nyid kyis gdon par bya// de nas las kyi sbyor ba yis// 
42a5(mdo 'grel): lam du 'phral la bgrod de la// be'u la chags rmongs bcas pa'i// ba yi ru yis brdung bar gyur// skye ba gzhan gyi lhag gnas kyis// yid ni sangs rgyas la dmigs shing // bcom ldan 'das kyi 
42a6(mdo 'grel): bka' drin las// de yi rang bzhin dran des bsams// 'khor ba chu srin 'byung gnas kyi// skye ba'i 'khor mor srog chags rnams// las kyi rba rlabs kyis dkrugs pas// kye ma 'bying zhing 'byung ba'i
42a7(mdo 'grel): rim// skyes bu rnams kyi dpral ba yangs pa'i rdo yi glegs bu la// bde med las kyi sprul pa gsal ba'i rtags can gzod dag gis// skye dang 'chi ba rab spros yi ge dag tu bkod gyur pa// 'di dag rnams 
42a8(mdo 'grel): ni lag pas yongs su byis pas bskyod pa min// gang gis mngal nas brtsams te rim gyis lhung dang rga dang 'jig pa'i dus rnams dag/ gang du yang ni lus kyi rtsi sa ris gzhan pa nyid du 'gyur ba 
42b1(mdo 'grel): ma yin pa// las kyi dbang gis mi rnams dag gi rab mang sred pas rnam par bkra ba dag/ bkod pa 'di ni rma bya'i sgo yi tshogs dang mtshungs par yongs su smin par 'gyur// de ltar bsams te 
42b2(mdo 'grel): sngon du nye bar gnas skabs bzang po dang po'i rnam gzhag rab gnas pa// mi bzang 'bangs mo'i dngos po brnag pas skyengs par gyur pa bzhin du g.yo ba med nyid gyur// smon lam khang pa dkar po 
42b3(mdo 'grel): dam pa'i chos kyis dag pa'i blo ni yongs su gzung byas nas// 'khor ba dag tu slongs par byed pas dri ma can bzhin de yi srog ni btang bar gyur// de nas mtho ris phun tshogs nye// sing ga la yi 
42b4(mdo 'grel): gling du de// 'o ma'i rgya mtshor zla ba yi// ri mo bzhin du rab gsal skyes// de ni mngal zhugs skyes pa'i dus// mkha' las mu tig char pa g.yos// sing ga la bdag bu mo de// mu tig 'khri shing zhes 
42b5(mdo 'grel): par gyur// de ni tshe bar skyes pa yis// bsod nams bzhin du 'jo sgeg 'dzin// yan lag rnams kyi rnam 'byed kyi// chog shes bzhin du lang tsho thob// de nas nam zhig mnyan yod kyi// grong khyer ba yi tshong 
42b6(mdo 'grel): pa rnams// chu srin 'byung gnas rab basbal nas// sing ga la yi gling du song // de ni de dag mtshan mo'i mthar// rab sad ngal bsos dga' ba yis// chos don tshig bcad kyis bcings pa// sangs 
42b7(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyis gsungs glu ru blangs// pho zang ba gam la gnas pa// mi bdag bu mos rna ba yis// bdud rtsi de thos de dag rnams// bkug ste 'di dag ci zhes dris// rab dga' ldan ma de la des// 'di ni 
42b8(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// sems can kun la thugs brtse bas// rang bzhin du 'os gsungs zhes smras// sangs rgyas mngon brjod thos nyid kyis// de ni spu long gis rgyan lus// yang dag 
43a1(mdo 'grel): rig pa legs ldan mthu// rab tu bskyed pa'i sa gzhir gyur// sgra ni sprin gyi lta bu yis// rma bya bzhin du de rangs nas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan zhes pa 'di// su zhes yang ni de la 
43a2(mdo 'grel): spras// de nas de la dad pa dag/ bskyed par gus pa de dag gis// bsod nams rang bzhin bcom ldan gyi// spyod pa'i lugs ni ma lus smras// de nas de yi gtam gyis de// sngar skyes dge ba rgyas pa thog
43a3(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan slad du gsol ba yi// spring yig de dag rnams la bskur// dus kyis chu gter yang dag bsgral// rang gi grong khyer thob nas des// bdag nyid che la phyag 'tshal te// de yi gtam bshad sprir 
43a4(mdo 'grel): yig pul// thams cad mkhyen pa bcom ldan gyis// de ni sngon nyid mkhyen gyur kyang // mu tig 'khri shing la brtse bas// rang nyid kyis ni spring yig bklags// kye ma bsod nams tshong zong dag gis rnyed par 
43a5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa khyod ni dran pa nyid// rgud dang gdung ba dang ni sred pa 'joms pa'i srid pa'i sman bzang ci yang yin// bcom ldan las byung gtam gyi rim pas nyer bskrun yang dag rig pa myong ba'i sa// bcom 
43a6(mdo 'grel): ldan 'di de bdag gi bdud rtsi yang dag bgo skal chen por gyur pa yin// de ltar mdor bsdus spring yig don// bcom ldan rang gis rtogs gyur nas// cung zad 'dzum pa'i 'od zer gyis// phyogs 
43a7(mdo 'grel): kye sems can rab gsal mdzad// de nas 'od tshogs rjes rgyas shing // ri mo mkhan gyis mi nus pa'i// rang gi sku gzugs ras la bkod// bcom ldan gyis ni de la springs// de yi bka' yas 
43a8(mdo 'grel): nas yang // tshong pa de dag gzings la zhon// sing ga la yi gling phyin nas// de la zang sku rab tu bstan// gser gyi seng ge'i khri bkod pa'i// ras la de bzhin gshegs mthong nas// de las byung ba'i 
43b1(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan gyis// skye bo dgongs pa gcig bzhin gyur// de yi 'og na bris pa ni// bsod nams kyis thob mthong gyur pa// skyabs su 'gro ba gsum dag dang // bslab pa'i gnas ni lnga yang ngo // lugs
43b2(mdo 'grel): las 'byung dang bzlog bcas pa'i// rten cing 'brel par 'byung dang bcas// de bzhin 'phags lam yan lag brgyad// mchog gi bdud rtsis rdzogs gyur pa'o// de yi steng du legs bshad ni// 
43b3(mdo 'grel): gser gyi yi ge rab mdzes par// dgongs pa mnyam gzhag bcom ldan 'das// rang gi bkod pas mdzes gyur pa// skye dang 'chi ba'i nyon mongs kyis btab gdung ba drag por brgyas dag/ mi bzang 
43b4(mdo 'grel): yul ni g.yo ba'i sbal gyi phreng bas dkris shing dkrugs gyur pa// rab rib rab rgyas rab rmongs phug gi khang pa 'di las phyir thon la// sangs rgyas chos la skyabs su song zhig der ni srid la 'jigs 
43b5(mdo 'grel): pa med// dag byed rgyal ba'i sku gzugs la// sa yi bdag po'i bu mos bltas// thog med dus nas bsags pa yi// mi shes bag chags btang bar gyur// rab mtho gser zhun lta bur mdzes pa'i 
43b6(mdo 'grel): sku// phrag mdzes dpung pa pus mo'i bar mngon dga'// bsam gtan la chags phyed ni zum pa'i spyan// mdzes sdug rgyan bzhin rab tu mtho ba'i shangs// ngo bo nyid kyis mdzes par rtogs bya ba// 
43b7(mdo 'grel): rgyan med snyan gyi zhags pa ring du 'phyang // thun mtshams sprin chags lha yi ri bo bzhin// lo 'dab gsar pa ltar dmar na bzas mtshan// 'od kyis phyogs la tshul khrims ston pa bzhin// zhal gyi zla 
43b8(mdo 'grel): bas kun dga' sbyin par brtson// bzod pa'i yon tan sa la slob pa bzhin// bsod nams las skyes skal bzang lan gsum du// bskor nas btud pas rna ba'i ut+pal dag/ 'phyang ba mkhur 
44a1(mdo 'grel): la reg des mthong nas// snying po med pa'i lus la lta ba spangs// bden pa'i mthu ni dam pa skyes par gyur// rgyun tu yang dag zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dag/ rab tu gsal byas de tshe byang chub/ 
44a2(mdo 'grel): thob// de yis bde gshegs mthur ni rnam bsam shing // ya mtshan dga' ba'i sa yis mngon par smras// kye ma rmongs pa'i mun chen 'phrog byed pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dang ldan pa'i
44a3(mdo 'grel): sku// ring du gnas kyang rnam par rgyas pa yis// dpal 'di dge ba'i chu skyes dag la ster// skad cig gis ni srid bsgral dam pa yis// smon lam thob cing nang gi byed rab dang // kye ma sred pa'i yongs
44a4(mdo 'grel): gdung zhi ba'i slad// zhi ba'i bdud rtsi'i chu bo rab 'phyur bzhin// 'di brjod de yis bcom ldan la// mu tig rin chen rnams kyi skyes// dge 'dun mchod slad tshong pa yi// skye bo la bskur btang bar 
44a5(mdo 'grel): gyur// de dag chu gter che sgrol nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin// de yi mu tig rin chen tshogs// phyag 'tshal nas ni de la phul// der ni tshong pas de yi gtam// bshad pa thos nas dge slong ni 
44a6(mdo 'grel): kun dga' bo zhes bya bas dris// de nas bcom ldan rgyal bas gsungs// gang 'di shAkya'i khyim du sngon// ro hi ta zhes 'bangs mor gyur// de nyid mu tig 'khri shing du// smon lam dam pa'i las kyis 
44a7(mdo 'grel): skyes// nor chen zhes pa'i tshong pa ni// ba ra NA sir sngon byung gyur// de yis khyim thab bsod nams can// rin chen ldan zhes bya bar gyur// dbang po lnga pa nyid gyur tshe// bud med de yis mchod rten rtser// do 
44a8(mdo 'grel): shal chen po gus ldan pas// mchod pa byas nas phul bar gyur// bsod nams rnam smin des de nyid// sing ga le yi bdag po yi// bu mo mu tig 'khri shing gyur// yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'ang thob// 
44b1(mdo 'grel): de nyid skye ba gzhan la ni// phyug pas rgyags shing rmongs gyur nas// mchod la smod cing sgrin gyur pa// de yis yun ribs 'bangs mor gyur// dge dang mi dge'i las gang gang // skye ba'i zhing la skye
44b2(mdo 'grel): bos btab// de dang de yi rang bzhin de// yongs su smin pa'i 'bras bu spyod// dge ba mtha' dag rtsa ba grags pa'i me tog dpal rab 'bar// legs spyad 'bras bu'i tshogs bskyed chos kyi 
44b3(mdo 'grel): 'khri shing mi rnams kyi// sdig dang nyon mongs rtsa ba 'khrul zhing lhung dang rmongs pa dang // mtha' yas yongs su gdung gyur dug gi 'khri shing dag kyang yin// rab rtsub mya ngan du gsal 'khor ba'i// 
44b4(mdo 'grel): lam ni shin tu gdung ba 'dir// drag por rjes su gdung ldan sdig pa sdig pa bor cig skye bo dag/ rtag tu bsod nams bsod nams mdzod cig bsod nams bsten pa rnams dag gi/ bsod// 
44b5(mdo 'grel): nams bdud rtsis bran pa'i bsod nams grib bsil shing gi sa gzhi bsil// de ltar smon lam dam pa'i 'bras// bshad pa yis ni gdams ngag 'di// dge slong rnams ni gus pa'i slad// 
44b6(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan rang gi mdzad pa yin// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las mu tig 'khri shing gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i
44b7(mdo 'grel): yal 'dab ste bdun pa'o// // bsam pa rigs pa rnams kyi thugs dag ni// gnod pa byed pa la'ang snying rje rgyas// drag por gyur pa la yang 'dab ltar mnyen// zhe sdang tsha gdung la yang shin tu 
44b8(mdo 'grel): bsil// grod khyer rgyal po'i khab ces pa// lha yi grong ltar rgya cher sngon// khyim bdag dpal sbas zhes bya ba// nor byin lta bur byung bar gyur// skye bo legs la sdang zhing dregs// yon tan rnams la 
45a1(mdo 'grel): / gus pa btang // rtag tu nor gyis rgyags myos te// dam pa rnams kyi blo la rgod// sra zhing shin du 'khyogs pa dang // stong zhing mu cor sgrog pa yi// dung nyid la bzhin mi srun la// dpal 
45a2(mdo 'grel): 'byor yon du sten par byed// de la nam zhig zad byed pa// bla ma mi srun mnyen gyi bus// dben par dman pa'i gtam la chags// bsod nams dag la sdad las smras// gang 'di bya rgod spungs 
45a3(mdo 'grel): zhes pa'i// ri la dge slong lnga brgyas bskor// bde gshegs kun mkhyen zhes grags shing // 'gro gsum mchod bya nyid gyur pa// 'di yi rdza 'phral mchog dag ni// ci yang bdag gis ma dmigs 
45a4(mdo 'grel): te// 'on kyang blun pos bcom ldan 'das// bcom ldan 'das zhes mtho ba thob// rtag tu rnam par ma dpyad nyid// pha rol brjod pa'i rjes su brjod// skye bo phal cher grag pa yi// lam du song ba'i// 
45a5(mdo 'grel): rjes su 'gro// de yi brtul zhugs la sogs kyis// nges pa tshul 'chos nyid du rtogs// chu skyar mi smra rkang gcig gi/ brtul zhugs bzung nas nya rnams za// des na nye bar bgam pa'i slad// 
45a6(mdo 'grel): de la bslub 'ga' zhig bgyi// g.yo sgyu can rnams sgyu ma yis// rmongs nas gzhan yang yongs sim 'gyur// de yis de skad brjod thos nas// las kyi rmongs pa'i dpal sbas ni// sdig pa'i 
45a7(mdo 'grel): g.yang la mchong ba'i slad// de yis bsten pa'i rigs pa yis// khyim du gsang dong seng ldeng gi/ sol ba rab 'bar gyis khengs dang // dug ldan zas kyang byas nas ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis drung du// 
45a8(mdo 'grel): so // rdzun gyis bskrun pa'i gus pa yis// de yis zas la mgron du song // thams cad rnam rig kun mkhyen gyis// de bzhin no zhes 'dzum bcas gsungs// dug dang me sbyor la 'khros pa'i// khyim 
45b1(mdo 'grel): thab chos ni smra ba mo// gros ni zags su dogs pa yis// dpal sbas kyis ni khyim du bcings// de nas spyod tshul mkhyen gyur kyang // 'gro bas phyag 'os gdong bzhi sogs// lha rnams kyis ni phyag
45b2(mdo 'grel): 'tshal zhing // bcom ldan rang nyid gshegs par gyur// dpal sbas kyis ni brtsams pa ste// grong khyer ngag tu skye bos rig/ sdig can rnams kyi sdig pa ni// shin du sbas kyang phyogs rnams rgyug/ de 
45b3(mdo 'grel): nas dge bsnyen dag gcig ni// bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs te// me dang dug la sems byed cing // zhabs la rab tu gtugs nas smras// rdzun gyis phyag 'tshal snyan par smra// gsang nas/ 
45b4(mdo 'grel): me dang dug zas ster// bcom ldan rab tu 'bad pa yis// skye bo ngan 'di yongs btang 'os// dogs pas snyan smra la brten nas// 'phags pa min rnams dbugs 'byin byed// gang phyir spang 
45b5(mdo 'grel): rtsis kha byugs pa'i// spu gri ming na rgyu ma gcod// yon tan lo sdang mi srun pas// yon tan can gzhan bstod mi bzod// gang gi dam pa dgyes 'gyur nyid// de yis skye bo ngan pa khro// 'jig rten gsum 
45b6(mdo 'grel): kyimi bdag gis// 'dab brgyarnam par rgyas byung kyad // skrag can 'di yi gnas thob na// 'grub lang ba min pa ci// da nas bcom ldan cung zad ni// 'dzum pa'i zer dkar dag gis nga'i// gnang 
45b7(mdo 'grel): pa mi bzad rab rib dag/ ring nas yongs su sel bzhin gsungs// bdag gi lus la mes reg dang // dug gis kyang ni tshugs pa min// gzhan la sdang bas dbul rnams la// skyon gyis kyang ni 
45b8(mdo 'grel): nyer 'tshe med// gang gis sems ni mi khro ba sil// zhi ba'i bdud rtsis bran gyur pa// de la me yis ci bya ste// yul gyi dgra la dug gis kyang // zhe sdang skyon gyis gzir ba la// bdud rtsi dug nyid 
46a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin du spyod// me tog rdo rje bzhin du spyod// tsan ngan sreg byed bzhin du spyod// byang chub sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas// snying rje byams pa dag dang ldan// dud 'gro'i skye gnas song/ 
46a2(mdo 'grel): gyur kyang // lus ni me yis mi 'tshig go/ ka ling ka yi mi bdag sngon// ri drags tshogs rnams 'joms pa la// yang dag brtson pas dum bu'i gling // zhes pa'i nags tshal sregs par gyur// 
46a3(mdo 'grel): nags tshal rab tu 'bar ba der// bye'u ti ti ri gcig bu// byams pas byang chub la dmigs pas// sreg byed rab tu zhi bar bsgrubs// de slad 'khu med yid ldan rnams// gang du yang ni 
46a4(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa med// snying stobs phun sum tshogs pa yis// dge mtshan 'di dang gzhan yang nyon// char med mi bzang dus su ni// thub pa 'ga' yi bsti gnas na// mi dang 'dra bar brjod pa yi// / 
46a5(mdo 'grel): ri bong zhig ni yun ring gnas// 'bras bu rtsa ba yongs zad pas// ltogs ring thub pa mthong gyur nas// bsam pa de yi gdung bas gzir// g.yo med kun tu brtags pas smras// bcom ldan 
46a6(mdo 'grel): bdag gi sha dag gis// da ni srog gi rten po dag/ mdzod cig chos ni bsgrub bgyid pa// khyod kyi lus ni bsrung bar 'os// 'di brjod nags sreg 'jug gi mer// thub pa byams pas yang yang du/ 
46a7(mdo 'grel): 'bad pa yis ni bzlog gyur kyang // ri bong gi ni lus po 'phabs// de yi snying stobs mthu yis ni// 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis dkrigs pa'i me// 'jam pa'i sgra sgrogs bung ba can// pad+mo'i rdzing bur
46a8(mdo 'grel): rab tu gyur// de yang lha yi lus kyis der// pad+ma chen po dag la gnas// thub pa phyag 'tshal ldan pa la// chos rnams rab tu bstan pa byas// de ltar byang chub zhugs pa rnams// 'jigs pa med 
46b1(mdo 'grel): min dug gis min// de skad gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das// dpal sbas kyi ni khang par gshegs// des ni de ru zhugs nyid na// zhabs ni g.yas pa bzhag pa yis// me yi dong ni mtsho skyes/ 
46b2(mdo 'grel): can// bung ba 'jam sgrogs ldan par gyur// mtsho skyes khri la bzhugs pa de// dpal sbas kyis ni mthong gyur nas// de mthong sdig pa nyams pa yis// zhabs la bdud de rab tu smras// bcom ldan/ 
46b3(mdo 'grel): bdag ni sdig can gyis// rim las 'das 'di bzod par bgyi// gti mug gis long lhung chags la// dam pa rnams ni thugs rje lhag/ bdag ni mi dge'i bshes gnyen dag/ rab tu rmongs pas 
46b4(mdo 'grel): sdig pa yis// lam la nye bar gdams pa byas// de la khyod nyid dran pa skyabs// khyod kyi zas dang btung ba kun// bdag gi dug gis bsgos pa byas// phyi nas gdung ba'i rang bzhin dug/ kye ma 
46b5(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid rang la 'pho// 'di brjod dpal sbas mchi ma dang // bcas pa'i mig la snying rje'i gter// bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas gsungs// dge slong dge 'dun nyan par byed// legs// 
46b6(mdo 'grel): pa yi mug ma byed cig/ bdag cag khyod la phyir ma phyogs// 'jigs rung khon gyis dug spangs pas// nged la dug gis gnod pa med// khyod ni ba ra NA sir sngon// dpal ldan mi bdag tshangs 
46b7(mdo 'grel): byin gyur// de yi srog dang mnyam pa yi// dga' ma dpe med ma zhes pa'o// de nas de yi grong khyer mtha'i// nags gnas rma bya'i rgyal mo ni// gser du snang ba zhes pa'i sgra// de yis nam zhig 
46b8(mdo 'grel): thos par gyur// gling bu pi wang gdang sa lta bu// de yi sgra ni thos gyur nas// dge mtshan ldan pas 'di ci zhes// mi yi mgon la de yis dris// rgyal pos smras pa nags mtha' 'dir// rin chen 
47a1(mdo 'grel): sgo ldan rma bya yod// gang gi mgrin nas bsgrags pa 'dis// 'jig rten rnams ni snyan pas khyab// de skad smras pa'i mi bdag gis// shin tu mdza' sdug rab 'bad pas// de// 
47a2(mdo 'grel): mthong don du gnyer ba la// rab tu rgod cing yang smras pa// de lta'i ngo mtshar gzugs can rnams// mdzes ma mthong ba rnyed pa dka'// de lta na yang 'bad pa na// de la yongs su ngal ba bya// de 
47a3(mdo 'grel): skad brjod nas mi bdag gis// rgya yis 'tsho ba de gzung phyir// ma thob na ni gsod pa dag/ yang dag rig par byas nas gtab// yongs su dpyod pa'i mig rmongs pas// dbang du byas pa mi 
47a4(mdo 'grel): shes nyid// bud med rjes chags kyis bcom pas// bya ba min pa rnams kyang byed// mdza' las ma rungs khyim thab kyi// rkang pa'i stegs su gyur rnams kyi// blo dang dga' dran grags pa rnams// 
47a5(mdo 'grel): phrag dog gis bzhin rnam par nyams// de 'og bya bas gnas gnas su// zhags pa'i bcing ba bkod pa rnams// rma bya'i rgyal po'i mthu yis ni// kun tu rnam par chad par gyur// 'bad 'bras 
47a6(mdo 'grel): med las sdug bsngal zhing // mi bdag bka' yis 'jigs gyur te// mthong nas rma bya'i rgyal mo ni// snying rje 'khrugs pa nyid du gyur// de yi bsam pa kho mo dag/ 'chings par ma gyur sa 
47a7(mdo 'grel): bdag gi/ bka' ni drag pos 'jigs gyur pa// kye ma sdug pa rgya yi 'tsho// de ltar bsams nas snying rje yis// gsal bar smras te de btang nas// mi bdag bkug ste de khyim du// de nyid dang ni 
47a8(mdo 'grel): lhan gcig song // pho brang nang der rtag tung // sa bdag btsun mo bcas pa yis// mchod cing yongs su dris pa las// gum pas rnam par spro zhing gnas// mthon mthing nar bu'i khang pa ni// 'jam/ 
47b1(mdo 'grel): ldan chu 'dzin 'od la des// 'dab ma mdzes bkra dbang po'i gzhu// chags pa lta bur 'khrul pa byas// de nas de yi rim grol// gus dang bcas pas lha mo bskos// phyogs las rgyal ba'i bgrod 
47b2(mdo 'grel): pa la// nam zhig sa yi bdag po song // de nas lha mo dpe med ma// bdag po song bas bag med cing // gzugs dang lang tsho'i dreg pas long // rigs kyi lugs ni mthong ma gyur// gzhon nu 
47b3(mdo 'grel): 'bangs la chags ldan ma// 'dod pas rnam par bslad ma de'i// ngo tsha shin tu ring song ste// yang yang dmigs pas 'jig pa bzhin// dri ma ldan zhing gya gyu no// rna ba dag la reg par bzod// g.yo ba 
47b4(mdo 'grel): g.yo ba'i mig can dang // mig ni legs pa rim pa mtshungs// 'khor ba chu srin 'byung gnas su// rnam pa mang pos myos byed cing // srog 'phrog nag po brtsegs pa yi// ri mo bud med rnam par// 
47b5(mdo 'grel): rgyu/ me tog pas kyang shin tu 'jam// sog le bas kyang rab tu rtsub// bud med sems ni bkra ba dag/ su yi yongs su gcod pa shes// ma chags dga' mas mgul byas nas// gang 
47b6(mdo 'grel): zhig dga' bar bgrod byed de// bsil zhing dri med 'jam pa yi// ral gri'i rno rgyun 'thung bar byed// des bsams bdag gi pho brang na// rma bya'i rgyal mo tshul khrims shes// skyes bu'i lugs 
47b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin kun brjod pa// zug rngu 'di ni gnas par gyur// bdag gi spyod 'dis bdag la// gdon mi za bar 'chad par 'gyur// las ni smang 'os re zhig byas// da ni bdag gis ci zhig bya// 'di ni 
47b8(mdo 'grel): gnad shes mchog gi blo// pha rol zur gyi 'dzin lta zhog/ bdag gis byas pa'i sdig pa yi// dogs pa sems med rnams la'ang skye// de ltar bsams nas de yis ni// de la dug ldan bza' 
48a1(mdo 'grel): bgyin// chags smyos mi sun dbang gyur pa'i// bud med ci dang ci mi byed// de yis nye bar thar ba yis// bza' dang btung ba dug ldan gyis// rma bya'i rtsal me ma rgyas shing // mdang / 
48a2(mdo 'grel): bzang yid 'ong mdzes par gyur// lhams rnal gnas nga mthong nas// gsang ba rab mched dogs pa yis// dal bu la bus mya ngan gI// nad byas bzung nas sreg btang gyur// de ltar de yi 
48a3(mdo 'grel): dug gis kyang // nang dang ldan pa nyid ma gyur// chen po rnams kyis sems yangs pa// dag ni drug med nyid du bgyingad // 'dod chags drug yin gti mug dug/ zhe sdang dag kyang mi bzang drug/ sangs/ 
48a4(mdo 'grel): rgyas chos dang de bzhin du// dge 'dun bden pa bdud rtsi'i mchog/ gti mug rga tshegs chen po 'jigs su rung ba'i dug rnams so// chags pa'i ltos 'pho chen po 'jigs su rung ba'i dug rnams/ 
48a5(mdo 'grel): snang ba'idags kyi phreng ba 'jigs su drang ba'i dag rnams sa// oM bzang drug rnams sde ba'i ris pa gzhan ni yod pa m-ig/ 'dra ba'i lta ba gzhan la yang // dpal rdzas kyis ma yi pa 
48a6(mdo 'grel): chas ni 'dod ma de la byas// de yang 'phral la bar ldan b+har// de skad brjod nas bcom ldan 'das// yang dag snying rjes gzigs pa'i chul/ bas pa dag la mngar phyogs pa'i// dpal sras 
48a7(mdo 'grel): rdul dang bral ba byas// de nas dpal skas dge ba shes pas rab tu gsal ba'i gnas thob phyir// dri med dran pas skyabs su 'gro ba gsum nyid dran gyi gzhan ma yin// rgyal dang yongs su 
48a8(mdo 'grel): 'dres pas bsod nams thab ste gang phyir dam pa rnams// mthong bar gyur pa dge ba che dang rab tu dga' dang bde ba'i sbed// mi shes rmongs pa sel ba'i bcom ldan 'das ni snying rjes bsod nams 
48b1(mdo 'grel): la brtson pas// gnod byed sdig pa bsten pa'i dpal sras kyang ni 'bad pas rjes su gzung byas nas// 'ching ba'i khang par yang srid mdud pa 'di dag rnams su gang gis mi 'gyur ba// srid pa 
48b2(mdo 'grel): yang dag gzhi la slad dge slong rnams la kho na dang bral ba'i bstan pa bsgrubs// zhes pa'i dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las dpal
48b3(mdo 'grel): sbas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad pa'o// // skal ldan rnams la mi shes pa ni legs pa'i rang bzhin las byung dge nyid gyur// rmongs pa rnams la dge ba mi phan nyid 'gyur 'di
48b4(mdo 'grel): ni rim pa 'di yis mtshon// mtshan phyed smag ru ma mun pa sman gyi nags la mchog tu mdzes pa rab tu ster// gang yang nyi ma'i gzi byin 'ug pa'i rigs kyi mig ni kun tu nyams par byed// sa bdag gzugs/ 
48b5(mdo 'grel): can snying po yi// grong khyer rgyal po'i khab ces par// rab bzang zhes pa'i grong khyer pa// yongs rdzogs khyim na gnas pa byung // lta ba kun la rnam sdang zhing // gti mug rab tu rgyas pa des// rmongs las 
48b6(mdo 'grel): zad byed pa nyid la// mngon par gus pa lhag par gyur// de yi chung mtsho rigs can// bde ldan ma zhes bya ba yis// mngal bzung zla ba nya ba yi// dkyil 'khor shar gyi phyogs kyis bzhin// ka lan dka'i 
48b7(mdo 'grel): gnas shes pa// 'od ma'i tshal du yang dag gnas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan pasod snyoms la// nam zhig de yi khang par gshegs// de ni chung mar bcas pa yi// de la mchod byas gus bcas pas// pu ni// 
48b8(mdo 'grel): mngal na gnas gang de// ci yi gzugs 'gyur de la dris// de yis bka' stsal khyod kyi bu// lha mi'i phun sum tshogs spyad nas// nga yi bstan la rab byung nas// yang dag ldan pas grol bar 'gyur// de skad 
49a1(mdo 'grel): gsal bar bka' stsal nas// bcom ldan rang gi gnas su gshegs// khyib bdag khang par zad byed pa// pU ri ka ni mngon par 'ongs// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de// rab bzang/ 
49a2(mdo 'grel): ges ni smras par gyur// zad byed pas thos phyur bar ni// khong khro'i dug gis 'khrugs par gyur// shin du yun ring des rtsis nas// ngal bas bza' ni shes byas te// dris lan bcom ldan gyis gsungs/ 
49a3(mdo 'grel): gang // de lta'i rnam pa kho nar mthob// des bsams kye mthe tsom dag/ med par de yis bden par brjod// 'on kyang de yis smras pa'i dngos// gzhi la slad bdag ni mi bden brjod// bdag gi tshig gis rab 
49a4(mdo 'grel): bzang gis// gal te kun mkhyen de rig na// de las dge slong la gus 'dis// zad byed la dad gtong bar 'gyur// de ltar bsams nas khro ldan pa// de yis rab bzang dag la smras// kun mkhyen nga rgyal can de 
49a5(mdo 'grel): yis// 'di dag mi bden pa nyid brjod// lha yi phran tshogs lha la'o// mi yis ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur// 'on te rab byung bden nyid na// de yis 'di ni bsam par bya// dpral dang ltogs pas gdungs pa 'am// 
49a6(mdo 'grel): gang la 'tsho thabs gzhan med pa// bya rgyal 'os pa de de yis// skyabs ni dge sbyong brtul zhugs yin// khyim bdag bdag gis mthong ba ni// gal te bdag gi tshig chad na// bzlog pa byis pa 'di skyes pas/ 
49a7(mdo 'grel): rigs ni yongs su gdung bar 'gyur// 'di brjod zad byed pa song tshe// khyim bdag gi ni yun ring du// rnam par dpya nas mngal ldang slad// sbyor ba de dang de dag bsgrubs// gang tshe rdzas kyi sbyor ba yis// mngal// 
49a8(mdo 'grel): ni yongs su ma g.yos nyid// de tshe 'di yis dben par ni// chung ma drag pos mnyed de bsad// de nas sdig can de yis de// bsil ba'i tshal gyi drar khrod du// rab tu bskyal tshe zang byed pa// de yis gtam 
49b1(mdo 'grel): thos dga' nas smras// a ho kye ma kun mkhyen 'dis// byis pa la brjod de bden ldan// bu ni ma skyes ma dag ni// lnga pa nyid 'gyur 'di de yin// de yis brjod pa'i byis pa yi// lha mi'i dpal mchog de ni 'di// 
49b2(mdo 'grel): 'di yi rab byung de yang 'di// gang zhig dkur ni shi gyur pa'o// de skad de dag rab smra zhing // nye bar dgod pas thams cad nas// dur khrod lta ba kho na'i phyir// skye bo yang dag 'dus par gyur// skabs der sangs rgyas 
49b3(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das// 'byung po dgongs pas lha yi ni// spyan gyis de dag kun mkhyen nas// 'dzum pa dang ldan skad cig bsams// kye ma gti mug gis bcings pas// rmongs pa ring du gnas pas kyang // lus 
49b4(mdo 'grel): can rnams la snang ba sgrib// sprin gyi rnam par 'gyur ba bzhin// kye ma dge ba zad byed pa'i// zad byed pa des sdig pa'i las// khyim bdag dman pa'i blo can de// bya ba min pa'ang byed du bcug/ 'di bsams snying 
49b5(mdo 'grel): rje rab rgyas pa'i// bcom ldan rang nyid dge slong gi/ tshogs kyis bskor nas myur bar ni// bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod gshegs// bcom ldan rang nyid dur khrod na// rgyu ba shes nas rgyal po ni// gzugs can snying 
49b6(mdo 'grel): po blon dang bcas// sa de nyid du 'ongs par gyur// de 'og rab bzang chung ma ni// sreg pa'i me la bcug pa dang // chu skyes la gnas byis pa dag/ dku brtol nyi ma bzhin du 'thon// me 'bar dbus na gnas pa de// 
49b7(mdo 'grel): gang che sus kyang ma blangs pa// de tshe skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis// hA hA zhes pa chen por gyur// de nas bde bar gshegs pa'i bkas// 'tshe byed ces pa'i gzhon nus gsos// rmongs pa lta bur ngang 'gro
49b8(mdo 'grel): yis// gzhon nu 'od ldan de blangs gyur// rgyal bas gzigs pa nyid kyis ni// byis pa rab tu len pa'i tshe// ro ba sreg me dag de la ni// ha ri tsan dan ltung bsil gyur// byis pa 'tsho zhing me las grol// rab tu 
50a1(mdo 'grel): mdzes pa mthong gyur nas// skyengs pas zad byed pa rnams ni// skad cig shi ba bzhin du ga nas// de nas rab bzang ya mtshan gyis// rnam par 'khrul la bcom ldan 'das// 'byung po kun 
50a2(mdo 'grel): la phan dgyes pas// bu 'di blang bar gyis zhes gsungs// de yang the tshom dag las blo// ci bya snyam pa'i khyogs las 'phyang // zad byed rnams kyi bzhin nyid la// bslab pa'i slad du skad cig bltas// de la 
50a3(mdo 'grel): des smras dur khrod kyi// me skyes byis pa 'di mi blang // gsal bar gang du 'di gnas pa// de khyim brlag pa nyid du 'gyur// de skad de dag tshig gis de// rmongs pa sa gang che de ma blangs// de tshe rgyal ba'i
50a4(mdo 'grel): bka' yis ni// sa yi bdag pos byis pa blangs// me dang mtshungs pa'i 'od ldan pa// de yi ming ni me skyes zhes// bcom ldan nyid kyis mdzad par gyur// sa skyong khang par byis pa ni// rab tu bskyed par 
50a5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa de'i// zhang po yul gzhan song ba dag/ dus kyi yang dag 'ongs par gyur// de yi sring mo shi ba dang // bu skyes spyod tshul rig gyur nas// khro bas 'dar zhing mngon phyogs te// ra ba bzang la ni yang dag
50a6(mdo 'grel): smras// rmongs pa zad byed la gus shing // de yi tshig gis chung ma bsang // khyod kyi rang gi bu dor nas// legs byas ming ni ci zhig byas// rang bzhin gyis ni sems med cing // gzhan gyi sngags kyis kun tu 
50a7(mdo 'grel): bslad// skye bo ngan pa rgod na yang // rnam par 'dzem byed ro langs bzhin// gal te rgyal po'i khab nas bu// da lta nyid du mi len na// bud med bsad pa bsgrags nas de// khyod nor chad pas gcod du 'jug/ 
50a8(mdo 'grel): de yi de skad brjod pas des// 'jigs nas sa bdag khab nas bu// len du bcug pas sa bdag ni// 'dod dang ldan par ring na gtad// de nas rab bzang dus kyi pa ni// dus kyi dbang du song bar
50b1(mdo 'grel): gyur// me skyes rnam par 'byor pa'i gter// 'od kyi nyi ma bzhin du gyur// slong ba rnams ni dpag bsam shing // lha mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob// sangs rgyas tshes dang dge 'dun gyi// skya ba sa la de yis blo// 
50b2(mdo 'grel): gris byas// de la gus pas nyer bskrun pa// rmad byung lha yi rin chen tshogs// bsod nam sa rin chen sgrub brtson des// dge slong dge 'dun rnams la phul// chu gtenyer cher ni chu bo bzhin// de lta'i khyim du
50b3(mdo 'grel): lha'i ris las// rnam mang phun tshogs ngo mtshar can// rang nyid kho na 'ongs par gyur// de yi khyim du bcom ldan 'das// rtsa dang rin chen mtshungs blos kyang // de yi ngor ni rin po che'i// smod ni yongs su 
50b4(mdo 'grel): gzung ba mdzad// des na lha yi gos zung dag/ rang gi khrims bzhin dri ma med// grags pa rnams kyi dpe bzod pa// bsod nams zong gis nyos nas thob// de nas na ma zhig de yi gos// bkrus nas
50b5(mdo 'grel): brlan pa nyid 'od bkod// yang dag g.yo bas rab bskyod nas// sa yi bdag po'i spyi bor lhung // me skyes de yis gos dag ni// sngon med rab mdzes mthong gyur nas// lha yi dpal la ya mtshan pa la// 
50b6(mdo 'grel): rgyal po rang dpal rtsa bzhin sems// zas la mgron gnyer mi yi bdag/ me skyes khyim na gnas pas de'i// rin chen rang bzhin khang pa dag/ mthong nas mtho ris yin par sems// de nas dus kyis
50b7(mdo 'grel): sa skyong ni// chos kyi ngang tshul ma skyes dang // bu ni rgyal srid la chags pa'i// g.yo yis nges par bkrongs par gyur// rgyal po yon tan dam pa can// rdzogs ldan lta bu de 'das tshe// rgyal po mchog gi 
50b8(mdo 'grel): bu de yis// chos min bzhin du rgyal srid thob// me skyes dag gi khyim gyi dpal// sa bdag la dkon des mthong nas// yang dag mngon par song ste smras// khyod ni pha mas rnam par gsos// khyod dang 
51a1(mdo 'grel): spun tshes dag gis// 'byor pa phyed ni bdag la stsol// gal te min na nor skal la// 'khu las rtsod pa nyid rab skye// gya gyus sdang bar byed pa de// de skad brjod pas ma skyes ni// khang pa 
51a2(mdo 'grel): rin chen gyis gang ba// de la byin nas khyim gzhan song // lha yi rin chen yid 'phrog rgyas// 'jig rten phan byed dpal 'byor de// me skyes kho na'i rjes su 'breng // nyin mer byed la 'od zer bzhin// yang yang 
51a3(mdo 'grel): me skyes kyis spangs kyang // pAn tshogs de ni lan bdun du// ma skyes can song mi bdag gis// ma reg chung ma khyo can bzhin// chom rkun la sogs rigs pa yis// rnam pa kun tu 'phrog brtson zhing // khros
