166a6(mdo 'grel): rnon po yis// rnam par bcad bzhin dge slong rnams// lan gyi tshig ni mi brjod par// de btang nas ni gzhan du song // de nas ngag gis sdig pa des// phyi nas 'gyod pas gdungs gyur te// gnyis skyes de yis// 
166a7(mdo 'grel): ma nyid btang / rab tu byung ba btang ma gyur// bdag gi bu ni dge sbyong gis// phrogs zhes cho de smra de yang // smon mar gyur cing lus btang nas// dmyal ba dag tu gnas pa thob// de nas dus kyi sdig pa dag/ rang 
166a8(mdo 'grel): gis byas pa'i ser skya ni// las kyi mjug tu tshi ba rtsub kyis// chu srin 'di nyid dag tu gyur// dge slong smad la gang smras pa// de dag 'di yi gdong 'di dag/ gang phyir las kyi sa bon las// 'bras bu 
166b1(mdo 'grel): mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin skye// zhes gsungs der ni bcom ldan gyis// rtag pa'i chos ni bstan mdzad nas// tha dad byang chub sgrub byed pa'i// skye bo dag la rjes gzung mdzad// de nas rgyal ba rang gnas su// gshegs 
166b2(mdo 'grel): tshe de yi rang bzhin yid// chu srin kha zas rab spangs nas// lus btang lha yi gnas su song // de ni skad cig bde gshegs la// sems ni rab tu dang ba las// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams su// dpal ldan
166b3(mdo 'grel): dri med mdzes par skyes// de nas zla ba nya ba'i bzhin// phreng ba dang ldan rna rgyan mdzes// kun dga' rnam pa dang bcas bzhin// de ni bde gshegs lta bu 'ongs// lha yi me tog rab tu gtor// cod pan gyis ni 
166b4(mdo 'grel): sa la reg/ 'od kyi phyogs kyi 'khor lo bkang // de yis de la gus phyag 'tshal// nye 'khor de la bcom ldan gyis// chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad// gang gis bden mthong rgyun zhugs kyi// 'bras bu thob nas de
166b5(mdo 'grel): song gyur// de ltar bya ba dka' yang de ni rtswa bzhin sdig pa'i 'dam dag las// bton zhing skye bo'i tshogs pa de dag kyang ste sdug bsngal bsgrubs pa yis// gdung bar nges par lhung ba rnams kyi nyon mongs rtsub
166b6(mdo 'grel): mtshungs med dag/ ma lus bsod nams ngang tshul rnams kyis bde blag nyid du 'joms par byed// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'bri shing 
166b7(mdo 'grel): las/ ser skya'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu pa'o// // lus kyi snod son dge dang mi dge ba// mnyam pa nyid du skyes bu longs spyod des// lus can rnams kyi rnam mang las skyes 'bras// / 
166b8(mdo 'grel): gang phyir ma spyad kun tu zad mi 'gyur// bcom ldan bde bar gshegs pa sngon// grong khyer rgyal po'i khab kyi ni// ka lan da ka'i gnas shes pa'i// nags kyi nang na rnam par gnas// gzugs can snying po 
167a1(mdo 'grel): sa yi bdag/ ded ni dpal gyis rnam par grags// rin chen 'byung gnas gzhan pa bzhin// dus dang grong khring sa sgrogs nas// bya bar mi bdag dpal dang ldan// grags pa zla 
167a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i chu gter che// u drA yan zhes pa byung // de yi btsun ma zla ba'i 'od// ces pa zla ba'i bzhin ngas can// sras ni drag po'i rtsal dang ldan// rgyal tsha ba gcud bud can zhes gyur// he ru ka dang b+hai ruka/ zhes 
167a3(mdo 'grel): pado yis blon po gnyis// 'dul la dkar po phur bu bdag/ bgrang bar bya ba min par gyur// sa bdag lta yi 'od zer can// de gnyis spring yig gis mdze 'a gyur// ring du gnas dang nyi ma dang // pad+ma/ 
167a4(mdo 'grel): yi ni 'byung gnas bzhin// de gnyis ma du pho nya yis// sngon med rin chen tshogs bdag dang // grogs nyid mchog tu yongs rdzogs pas// mdza' ba'i gter ni thob par 'gyur// dam pa'i mdza' 
167a5(mdo 'grel): babari gnas kyang // mchog tu ma zad grags pa bzhin// mi sran mdza' ba nyer nas kyang // brtan pa ma yin rtsa 'bar bzhin// nam zhig gzugs can snying po la// mchog gi go cha gser 'od 'bar/ 
167a6(mdo 'grel): lha yi rin chen gyis mtshan pa// mi bdag u drA ya nas spangs// drag mtshan ma rnams bsrung 'os pa// rnam bkra rin chen ga cha ni// grogs kyis springs pa legs blangs nas// rgyal pos blon po 
167a7(mdo 'grel): rnams la smras// sa bdag de yis lugs bzang bzhin// lhag par mdza' ba go byed cing // thams cad gzung bar bzod pa yi// go cha 'di ni bdag la springs// 'di la lan du sbyin 'os pa// de las / 
167a8(mdo 'grel): lhag pangs ma mthong // phan dang gnod pa dag la yang // lan ni chung bzug rngu yin// 'di las lhag pa cung zad gcig/ bskur 'os khyed rnams thams cad kyis// bsam par mdzod ces brjod nas ni// 
167b1(mdo 'grel): mi bdag bsam pa 'khrugs par gyur// de nas blo ldan blon po ches// yun rings bsams nas de la smras// dbyar gyi rnam pa zhes bram ze// rig kun legs par pha rol phyin// 'di las yon tan mang 
167b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i skyes// rgyal po gcig kyang yod ma yin// gal te nus na 'bad pa yis// de ni rab tu spring bar mdzod// gang zhig bcom ldan sangs rgyas 'di// khyod kyi yul na nye bar gnas// lha rnams dag gi gus kan+da 
167b3(mdo 'grel): kyi// thang ka de yi gzugs kyis mtshan// ma lus 'jig rten dge ba yi// me tog sar pa'i dpag bsam shing // ri mo rmi lam kun rtog la'ang // de nas bsod nams che bas mthong // zhes pa blon po'i tshig thos 
167b4(mdo 'grel): nas// de bzhin zhes brjod sa yi bdag/ song nas bcom ldan la btud de// don de nyid ni rab tu gsol// de nas de yi rjes gnang ste// ri mo mkhan po mchog rnams la// bcom ldan spu gzugs bri ba'i las// mi 
167b5(mdo 'grel): yi bdag pos myur bar bskos// rgyal ba'i sku ni lta byed pa// de dag gzugs kyis dbang byas nas// spobs pa dang ldan tshad dag ni// rab tu bzung bar nus ma gyur// de nas bcom ldan sku gzugs ni// dri 
167b6(mdo 'grel): med ras la 'phos pa dag/ gzugs bzang bsgom pa mngon shes des// dal bus yang dag rdzogs par byas// 'gro ba'i mig gi bsod nams rnams// gzugs can yang dag bsags pa bzhin// / 
167b7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas sku gzugs thang ka de// de nas sa gzhi skyong bas springs// gzugs can snying po'i lag rtags can// spring yi gzang ka'i sngon byung ba// mi bdag u drA ya na ni// rab tu dga' bas rang gis 
167b8(mdo 'grel): bklags// bde bar gshegs pa'i zhabs pad bkod pa'i bsod nams nye gyur pa// skabs gsum grong gi khyad par rgya che ma ga d+ha yul nas// dge ba byas pa'i gzugs can sa yi bdag po gzugs can/ 
168a1(mdo 'grel): snying // chos kyi gnyen gyis sa gzhi'i thig le khyod la rab smras pa// ri bong mtshan ma'i 'od ldan bcom ldan sku gzugs chags sdang dug ni nyams par byed// sred pa yang dag zhi byed 
168a2(mdo 'grel): srid pa'i rmongs chen nad kyi sman dang phan pa dang // rab dang mngar ba'i bsod nams bcud len khyod kyi mig gi snod du rab blugs pa// 'di ni khyod la rab springs skal ldan mgrin pa'i bar du rab tu 'dod pas 'thung // dam 
168a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i las la rab tu sbyor zhing yon tan tshogs rnams 'dzin pa rtag tu slob// bya ba ngan las rnam par zlog cing brtan pa'i bde ba 'thob la mchog tu bskul// rgyun chad med pa nyid du bdag nyid kun gyis zol med pan pa 
168a4(mdo 'grel): bskyed byed pa// dam pa'i dge ba'i grogs kyis yid 'od phan pa 'di las mchog ni ci zhig bya// zhes pa'i spang yig grogs mdza' ba'i// bdud rtsil 'os don myangs nas// glang po la gnas thang sku yi// 
168a5(mdo 'grel): sngon du rgyal po rab tu song // blon bcas mdun na 'don bcas de// mngon par dga' nas kun dga' las// gser gyi seng+ge'i khri stengs su// de ni rab tu bkram nas bkod// mdzes sdug bsod nams dag/ 
168a6(mdo 'grel): gi gnas// bde gshegs sku de mthong gyur nas// skye bos sangs rgyas rab rgyas la// phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal zhes pa smras// sangs rgyas mngon brjod thos nyid na// spu long gi sa brgyan dbyibs gyur ci// 
168a7(mdo 'grel): lha yi me tog char phab tshe// sa yi bdag po ya mtshan gyur// der ni bcom ldan spyod pa yi// bdud rtsi'i bsod nams thob nas de// chu 'dzin sgra yis mgrin sngon dang // rab 'dod ldan pa mtshungs par 
168a8(mdo 'grel): gyur// rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis ni// rjes mthun pa zlog pa dang bcas pa// thang ka'i 'og tu mthong gyur nas// de yi rmongs pa rnam par grol// de nas sa bdag rgyun zhugs kyi// 'bras thob bden pa 
168b1(mdo 'grel): mthong ba yis// grogs la dge slong rdzongs shes pa'i// 'phrin gyi lan ni rab tu springs// de nas gzugs can snying po yis// bcom ldan 'das la gsol byas nas// kAt+yA ya na dge slong ma// ri ma zhes pa'ang de la 
168b2(mdo 'grel): springs// de nas mchod pa sgrub byed pa// mi bdag udrA ya na la// 'phags pa kA d+hA ya na des// der ni chos rnams bstan pa mdzad// de yi chos ni bstan pa yis// skye bo rab mang 'dus pa rnams// rgyun dang lan cig 
168b3(mdo 'grel): phyir mi 'ong // dgra bcom 'bras bu'i gnas thob gyur// grong khyer der ni rgyal dang ni// skar rgyal zhes grags khyim bdag gnyis// zhi slad de mthun rab byung nas// yongs su mya ngan 'das pa thob// dus kyi de yis 
168b4(mdo 'grel): gnyen rnams kyis// lus kyi 'jug tu mchod rten bsgrubs// de ming gis mtshan da lta yang // mchod rten phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal byed// btsun mo'i 'khor du dge slong ma// ri ma zhes ni bya bas kyang // rim gyis 
168b5(mdo 'grel): lha mo zla 'od la// rtag tu chos ni bstan pa mdzad// de nas nam zhigs skyong ni// rtse dga'i khang par song gyur pa// mtshan ma shes pa de yi ni// 'tsho ba zhag bdun mtshams su rigs// de nas 'khor ba'i spyod tshul 
168b6(mdo 'grel): shes// nor 'dzin bdag pos de la ni// sngon la rab tu 'byung ba yis// dge ba'i gnas thob rjes su gnang // legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba// mi bdag tshig gis dge slong mas// lha mo rab tu phyung ba'i 
168b7(mdo 'grel): lus// nyi ma 'dun pa nyid la btang // rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams su// lha yi bu mo nyid du ni// 'phral nyid rab tu gyur pa de// rgyal ba yi ni nags su song // der ni bla nya'i bzhin ras can// lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan pa des// 
168b8(mdo 'grel): shAkya thub pa mthong gyur nas// dga' bas de yi zhabs la gtugs// lha yi me tog rab mthor ma// de la de bzhin gshegs pa yis// gang gis bden pa mthong byed pa'i// chos ni bstan mdzad de song gyur// 
169a1(mdo 'grel): de yis mkha' la zla ba yi// gzugs bzhin bdag po'i grong khyer phyin// mtshan mo nyal ba bslang nas ni// byang chub rab tu gsal bar byas// de ni tho rangs rang gnas su// song ba'i tshen nor/ 
169a2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin bdag/ rang byung mngon par phyogs pas bu// gtsug phud can ni dbang bskur te// de nas blon po dag la de// skye dgu bskyab pa'i phyir gtad nas// de ni mi bdag gzugs can snying // grogs po'i grong khyer dag tu 
169a3(mdo 'grel): song // gdugs dang rnga yab dang bral ba// de 'ongs gzugs can snying po yis// rab btud mi bdag nyer spyad ni// mdzes shing gtsang ba rnams kyis mchod// ngal bsos khri la 'khod de la// de dang phrad pas rab dga' 
169a4(mdo 'grel): zhing // dpal dang bral bas sdug bsngal ba'i// ya mtshan ldan pa de yis spras// mtha' yas kun gyi mag bo la// rgyal po dga' ni ngal bsog// brgya byin dag dang mtshungs pa khyod// 'di bzhin nye bar ji ltar gyur/ 
169a5(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin bzhin ras ma bral zhing // blo ldan gros ni sbas pa can// dpa' bo khyod kyi rgyal srid ni// gzhan gyis phrogs pa srid ma yin// zhes la grogs kyis dris la des// 'dzum bcas de la rab smras pa// 
169a6(mdo 'grel): rgyal po 'byor pa thams cad du// 'gro zhing bdag la gzhan mi dga'// yul nyams myong las phyir phyogs pas// sred dang bral ba bdag rang gis// dbang phyug longs spyod snod dag ni// lhag ma bzhin du 
169a7(mdo 'grel): dag btang // dge ba'i grogs paM khyod kyis ni// bde gshegs sku gzugs thang ka gang // phan slad rab tu spangs pa de// bdag gi chags bral bla mar gyur// do ni khyod kyi bka' drin gyis// bcom ldan 'das kyi 
169a8(mdo 'grel): drang phyin nas// khyim nas khyim ni med nyid du// rab byung thob par bdag 'tshal lo// zhes pa grogs kyi tshig thos nas// de de bzhin zhes rnam bsams te// de yi dben pa la gus ldan// gzugs can 
169b1(mdo 'grel): snying pos de la smras// sa yi bdag po khyod kyi blo// dam pa mang pos bskur ba yang // 'khor ba las ni phyir phyogs pa// skal ldan 'di 'dra ji ltar skyes// chog shes 'byor pa thob gyur pas// skal pa bzang 
169b2(mdo 'grel): po mchog tu mdzes// yid ni chags bral gyis brgyan pa// sems can dag pa'i mtshan nyid yin// dam pa rnams ni 'khor ba nye bar zhi slad rmo ngos chen myu gu nyams byed pa// skye ba gzhan la nyer bsgrubs 
169b3(mdo 'grel): chags bral gnas ni gal te yid la byed pa na// rgyal srid chen po gzi chen rdul bcas kyis ci bsgrubs dga' sgrub byed rnams kyis ci// longs spyod skad cig spyod rnams kyis ci sdig ster sdug 
169b4(mdo 'grel): bsngal bde ba rnams kyis ci// gang gis nor mchog sog las phangs pa'i nor ldan pa ni bde brag nyid du gtong // gang zhig 'jig rten gsum po 'dod kyang 'dod pa'i bdel phyir phyogs 'doms pa'i tha/ 
169b5(mdo 'grel): gang gis kun rmongs sdug bsngal gyis gzer 'gro ba 'di ni rjes su brtse ba'i gnas// bsod nams dag gis blo ldan rnams kyi zhi ba ci yang 'khor ba'i g.yon der 'gyur// zhes brjod gzugs can// 
169b6(mdo 'grel): snying pos de// 'od ma'i tshal gyi gnas khrid nas// rab tu btud byas bcom ldan la// de yi byung ba'i mtha' rnams gsol// bde gshegs rnam pa mthong gyur nas// dga' bas yun rings bsams byas te// 
169b7(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid bya ba byas par ni// u drA ya na yis kyang bsams// mgo bo phyag 'tshal gyis 'brel ba// de yi lus la bcom ldan gyi// gzigs pa 'khor ba gcod byed na// rab byung nyid dang lhan cig pas// 
169b8(mdo 'grel): de nas dge slong dngos po thob// lag na lhung bzed chos gos ldan// grong khyer du ni bsod snyoms bslangs// skye bo ya mtshan ldan par byas// gtsug phud can gyis rab dang blos// chos kyi skye dgu basbyangs// 
170a1(mdo 'grel): byas nas// dus kyis chos min mngon 'dod cing // rnyog pa dag dang ldan par gyur// gser 'od gsal ba'i glog dag ni// rnam par rol pa'i sprin phreng bzhin// phun sum tshogs 
170a2(mdo 'grel): pas su yaM yid// dri ma can du byed ma yin// hi ru ka dang b+hi ru ka/ blon chen dag gi chos min gyi// las la dga' zhing dbang ma gyur// khro ldan jo bo de btang gyur// de nas gnas su rgyal po yis// dbyug pa// 
170a3(mdo 'grel): thob blon por bcug/ sems kyi rjes 'jug mkhas pa yis// dman par chags pa de la smras// skye dgu rnams la mdza' bas yang dag chags// rgyal po gzhung ngan dag tu smra bar byed// g.yon can blon po
170a4(mdo 'grel): rnams ni rang nyid kyi// grags pa rab tu sgrogs par byed pa yin// gang zhig rje bo'i don du ni// chos la mi rtsi bde la min// don min grags min 'tsho ba min// de dag mchog tu gus pa'i g.yog/ nges par til 
170a5(mdo 'grel): mtshungs skye dgu rnams// rgyal po'i don byed ma bcag pas// ma yin ma nyams pas kyang min// ma gdungs pas min ma gzir min// zhes smras de dag rgyal srid kyi// bsam pa la ni rgyal pos bskos// 
170a6(mdo 'grel): chags pas spyod tshul ngan pa yis// skyabs med skye dgu gzhom par zhugs// sa yi bdag po bla gros ngan// rnam par mi spyod spyod tshul ngan// sna chen bden pa nyams pa'i tshe// skye dgu rnams ni ga la 'tshe/ 
170a7(mdo 'grel): de nas nam zhig yun rings na// lam du u drA ya na yis// rang yul nas 'ongs tshong ba la/ mi bdag yul 'khor gtam dag dris// de yis smras pa lha khyod kyi// sras pos yi bdag po dge/ 'on kyang 
170a8(mdo 'grel): dam pa'i blo dang bral// blon po ngan pa'i dbang du song // de na jo bo'i bka' yi skye dgu rnams// nye bar gdung ba rab rgyas ci yang gyur// gang gis da lta de ni yul ngan skyes// grong pa'i 'jig rten nyin dang mtshan/ 
170b1(mdo 'grel): mor gdung // gangad na nyi mas mun pa spro byed gang na zla ba me char 'bebs// gang na bdud rtsi las ni rab drag nag po brtsegs pa rab gsal skye// gang na skyob byed mi yi bdag pos skye dgu rnams kyi srog 'tsho 'phrog/ 
170b2(mdo 'grel): nyer 'tsho tsha ba rab rgyas de na tshe de dag ni su zhig nyan// mi bdag gis gdung skyo la bcags// tshong pa'i tshig ni bzod dka' ba// gdung ba'i rang bzhin de thos nas// brtse ba'i gter des de la smras// bdag gi/ 
170b3(mdo 'grel): tshig gis 'di nas khyod// song la skye dgu dbugs dbyung mdzod// nga nyid 'ongs nas gtsug phud can// chos la rab tu dgod par bya// zhes pa des brjod kun dga' ldan// tshong pa rim gyis rang yul du// 
170b4(mdo 'grel): song nas sngon du skye dgu rnams// del bus dbugs ni dbyung ba bsgrubs// gtam de rab tu grags pa'i tshe// blon po dbyug pa tho ba dag/ 'das pa'i sa skyong 'ong ba yis// skrag ste mi yi bdag la// 
170b5(mdo 'grel): smras// legs pa rnams kyis smad pa'i gtam// rgyal po rgan po rab byung ba// rgyal srid 'bad pas don gnyer ldan// zhes pa lha cig kun tu tho sa// brtul zhugs drag pos yongs su dub// gus 
170b6(mdo 'grel): pas longs spyod la mngon phyogs// rab byung ngo tsha thabs gcig tu// btang nas de slar 'ong bar 'gyur// rgyal po chags bral ma smin pas// 'phral la nyid du gang btang ba// de rnams slar yang 
170b7(mdo 'grel): de dag la// sngon las lhag par dga' bar 'gyur// 'jig rten lugs dang 'gal ba yi// yul rnams la ni khyad par du// srog chags yang dag 'dod 'gyur te// gnod pa'i zas la nad can 
170b8(mdo 'grel): bzhin// bde ba rab rgyas las yongs gtang // gzhan gyi lag tu nye bar song // blun po dag gi a mra bzhin// phal cher thams cad dga' bar 'gyur// de slad gzi byin chen po'i gter// 
171a1(mdo 'grel): khyod ni khri las rab bskyod nas// gnas brtan ri bong can rnams bzhin// de ni rgyal srid spyod par 'dod// lus ni chos gos kyis skyo zhing // gos mchog mngon par 'dod 
171a2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'di// mgo zlu ma la ni rin chen gyis// mtshan pa'i cod pan 'dod par 'gyur// rin chen khang pa gsar pa yi// longs spyod 'byor par rnams bskrun pa'i// rtsi dga' btang nas nags kyi gnas// ngal dus 
171a3(mdo 'grel): ldan pa su yis bzod// ri dgas rmig pas rtsub cing tsher mas gtams pa'i thang ka la// gang zhig 'jam pa'i mal stan bdir 'ong de dag ji ltar nyal// gang gis zla zer ltar bsil chang 'thungs de dag
171a4(mdo 'grel): nags skyes kyi// glang po'i chang gis dro zhing kho ba'i chu ni ji ltar 'thung // khyod la mi bzod bgrod pa ni// da lta nyid du nye bar gnas// lugs shes rnams kyi dang po'i gros// rgyal sras nges par ltung byed pa'o// 
171a5(mdo 'grel): de slad rgyal po ma 'ongs pa'i// sngon du jo bo khyod kyis gsod// phyi ma le ba ni 'bab pa dag/ gal te ma bsregs mar me 'joms// shes pa de dag tshig gis ni// sa bdag myur du 'khrugs par gyur// 
171a6(mdo 'grel): mi srun sprin gyis su yi yid// dri ma ldan par byed mi 'gyur// dogs bcas sog le bzhin du ni// rtsub mor gyur des der smras pa// bdag dang khyed gnyis mdun du ni// gnod pa 'di ni thun mong nyid// khyed gnyis/ 
171a7(mdo 'grel): nyid kyis khyad par gyi// tshul dang thabs la gnas pa'i blos// bya ba'i de nyid rnam spyod pa// gang rigs de ni bsgrub par mdzod// ces te rgyal pos spro bar byas// de dag gis mgyogs gsod byed btang // 
171a8(mdo 'grel): bsad phyir u drA ya na yis// mdun gyi lam ni rab tu bsdams// des kyang skye dgu yongs bskyab slad// bu la bsko bar brtson pa yis// bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs te// bdag 'gro'o zhes zhu ba 
171b1(mdo 'grel): byas// rang gis byas pa spyod mdzod ces// thams cad mkhyen pas rjes gnang nas// las kyi zhags pas yang dag drangs// de ni sgra sgrogs grong khyer song // lam du bron med 'ong ba de// blon po gdug pas/ 
171b2(mdo 'grel): bskos pa yi// gshed ma de dag rnams kyis bsad// skye bo ngan pas kun spyod bzhin// bsad pa de yi chos gos dang // lhung bzed sogs bzung de dag gis// blon po dag la mgu ba'i slad// rgyal 
171b3(mdo 'grel): po'i bya ba byas pa smras// sdig pas rab dga' de dag gis// mi yi bdag la rab tu bstan// pha yi chos gos khrag gis ni// spags mthong 'phral la rmongs par gyur// dal gyi 'du shes thob pa des// 
171b4(mdo 'grel): ji ltar bdag nyid dmyal ba ni// 'jigs rung gting du ltung ba yis// mya ngan de bzhin bla ma'i min// des smas dbang phyug sbrang rtsir chags// sdig par ldang ba ma mthong ba// bdag gis skye bo mi srun
171b5(mdo 'grel): las// kye ma 'bras bu yang dag thob// kye ma kyi hud rten sa med// 'jigs rung dmyal ba'i gting du ni// mthon por 'dzegs rnams mi srun dang // 'grogs pas 'phral la ltung byed gyur// gdug pa blon
171b6(mdo 'grel): bo'i blo gros kyis// bdag gis sdig chen 'di dag byas// da ni ltung bar 'gyur ba bdag/ gtsang byed kyis kyang gtsang mi byed// mnyam du pa dang dgra bcom dag/ bsad pa bdag ni su yis sgrol// gang du 
171b7(mdo 'grel): bdag gis snod gcig tu// dug ni srog byed ldan par mtshungs// dogs med yab ni rgan po dag/ rab byung zhi ba bsten pa la// chags las bdag gis rang gi sems// mtshon ni rnon po'i bya ba byas// 
171b8(mdo 'grel): gang zhig bsams pa nyid na 'dir bskyed byed de ni thos par yong mi bzod// gang zhig mthong nas sems med rnams kyang mya ngan dag la rab tu gcags par byed// gang la 'gyod pa drag po'i me yis ma 
172a1(mdo 'grel): rungs rnams kyang 'jam po nyid 'gyur ba// de la'ang brtse med blo ldan rnams ni ral gri rnon po'i bya ba rab tu spro// zhes brjod sdug bsngal dag gis gdungs// bzhin ni cho nges mu tser 
172a2(mdo 'grel): ldan// ma rungs blon po de dag ni// nang du 'jug pa khro bas bzlog/ yon tan khyad par yongs shes des// he ru ka dang b+hi ru ka/ yab kyi sngon gyi blon po gnyis// rab tu dang bas mgyogs par pos// de nas rgyal 
172a3(mdo 'grel): pos bsams pas rig/ mya ngan gyis ni skya bor gyur// dal gyis blon po gdug pa yis// de yi ma la mngon phyogs smras// lha mo khyod sras dpal dang ldan// rang bzhin gyis ni bsam pa drang // nang mi rab gcod/ 
172a4(mdo 'grel): rtsub mo yis// rgyal srid bsrung ba yod mi shes// pha ni rab tu byung ba yang // 'di yi rgyal srid 'phrog tu 'ongs// bdag cag gnyis kyis rab zhi byas// de la ci zhig brjod par bya// gal te lugs kyi rgyud ldan pa'i// / 
172a5(mdo 'grel): rim 'di dge ba'i rim min na// dge slong de yang rgyal srid ni// mngon par 'dod de ji ltar rim// sa bdag pa bsad khros pa yis// bdag cag gnas nas rnam par bskrad// rang nyid lta'ang mya ngan gyis// log 
172a6(mdo 'grel): par ci la yongs ma skyems// bdag cag gis ni legs byas byas// jo bo'i nyes byas nyid du gyur// dngos po kun la g.yog po rnams// gnod pa nyid dang ldan par 'gyur// rgyal po 'das la ci zhig 'gyod// 
172a7(mdo 'grel): gang byas de dag byas pa nyid// lha mo bsam pas rid pa'i bu// khyod kyis ci slad btang snyoms byed// de dag gis 'di brjod thos nas// de dag tshig la gus pas bsgrubs// ta ra li ka zhes pa yi// rgyal 
172a8(mdo 'grel): po'i ma des dal bus smras// khyed kyi gros la nyer bstan pa'i// rgyal pos sngon gyi byas pa yis// dmyal bar ltung bar byed pa'i las// 'di ni mtshams med gnyis su gyur// 'di yi pa bsad las skyes 
172b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i// mya ngan bdag gis bzlog par bgyi// dgra bcom bsad skyes sdug bsngal ni// khyed gnyis kyis kyang bzlog par mdzod// ces pa dal gyis de la bstan// sa bdag drung du de song nas// mya ngan gyis non zla ba 
172b2(mdo 'grel): ni// yongs zad lta bu de la smras// chos dang chos min rang bzhin gyi// rgyal po'i rgyal srid nyes pa mang // de la sdig dogs mya ngan gyis// bu khyod ci la yongs su gdung // gal te nges par pha bsad las// 
172b3(mdo 'grel): bla ma la byams khyod gdung ni// khyod kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad der// de ring khyod la ngo cha gtong // khyod kyi chos nyid pa de min// khyod ni gsang ba gzhan las skyes// rang 'dod zas dang bde bas bu// bud med rnams
172b4(mdo 'grel): la khrel yod min// zhes pa de tshig snyan min yang // dben par rgyal pos thos gyur nas// pa bsad sdig pa drag po yi// sdug bsngal dag gi gdungs pa btang // shar gyi ri bos nub kyi ril sbyor ba'i bya ba rab 
172b5(mdo 'grel): tu byed// skad cig gis ni sa dang sa 'dzin 'bral ba'i rol rtsed rnam par sgrub// 'di dag 'phral la me ni chu las rnam spro de yang sreg byed las// srid gsum dag na bud med rnams kyi bsgrub bya min pa ci yang 
172b6(mdo 'grel): med// de nas dgra bcom bsad pa nyid// zug rngu lta bus gzir ba yi// mi bdag de yi sa las de ni// phyir btsas chos shes rnams la dris// de nas blon ngan de dag gis// rgyal dang skor rgyal mchod rten// / 
172b7(mdo 'grel): gyi// nang du byil chung ngu gnyis// sha yi bslab pas chags byas nas// bkag par gyur kyang spyi brtol gyis// mi bdag 'dun sar rab zhugs te// gdung ba drag pos yongs gdung ba// rab zhi don gnyer 
172b8(mdo 'grel): de la smras// lha cig khyod ni rdzun nyid kyis// sems ni mchog tu gdung bar byed// 'jig rten 'di na de nyid du// thams cad dge ba'i dgra bcom med// gal te de dag bden pa na// mkha' la dang pa'i 
173a1(mdo 'grel): rgyal po bzhin// de dag rdzu 'phrul gyis bgrod pas// gzhan gyi gsod pa ji ltar srid// de slad dgra bcom yod min na// de bsad sdig pa ga la yod// gang na grong khyer yod min pa// 
173a2(mdo 'grel): de na mtshams kyi rtsod pas ci// gang dag khyim bdag rgyal dang ni// skar rgyal dgra bcom gnas thob pa// de dag de ltar nga rang gi/ mchod rten nang du byi lar skyes// de dag gsal bar mngon sum gyis// mthong la the 
173a3(mdo 'grel): tshoms su zhig byed// gal te yid ches yod min na// rang nyid nges par cis mi lta// zhes pa brjod nas sa bdag yid// khyogs la 'phyang ba bzhin byas nas// mi srun de dag de dang ni// lhan cig mchod rten 
173a4(mdo 'grel): lta ru song // sngon med ltad mo 'bebs pa yis// de ni skye bo yang dag 'khrigs// rgyal po blon bcas lta brtson tshe// gdug pa'i blon po g.yon can gyis// shal goms pas 'brel byas pa// rgyal
173a5(mdo 'grel): dang skar rgyal zhes brjod pas// byi la chung ngu gnyis po dog/ dal bu yis ni mthong bar byed// rgyal dang skar rgyal de dag gis// gal te dgra bcom smra nyid na// bden pa de yis khyed gnyis kyis// 
173a6(mdo 'grel): mchod rten la ni bskor ba'ang mdzod// sha ster tshe na de dag gis// de skad skad cher brjod pa yis// byi la de dag mgyogs par ni// nges par 'thon nas bskor ba byas// mi bdag rjes 'brang
173a7(mdo 'grel): bcas pa yis// mthong nas 'phral la yid ches thob// khu tshur du ni rlung rdol pad+ma nam mkha'i phyogs la ri mo dang // lce rtsel yang spro dang sdud pa'i rol pa rab mang bkod pa dang // gzhan yang ci min// 
173a8(mdo 'grel): phyugs dang byis pa'i blo la rmongs sgra mig 'phrul dag/ skad cig yongs 'dres yid ches gzugs can g.yon can rnams kyis ston par byed// de nas bde gshegs bstan pa la// rgyal po mchog/ 
173b1(mdo 'grel): tu yid ches bral// 'phags pa kAt+yA ya na yi// mdun du dad pas mchod pa bzlog/ de nas rgyal po'i grong khyer bkag/ phyi rol nyid der gdul bya la// brtse bas rjes 'brang bcas te gnas// dge slong ma// 
173b2(mdo 'grel): ni rim yang // de nas kAt+yA ya na ni// gang tshe sngon du mi yi bdag/ 'ong ba mthong nas skye bo yi// tshogs pas smod pas 'jigs nas gshegs// blon po snga ma dag gis bskul// de ni gshegs pa mthong/ 
173b3(mdo 'grel): gyur nas// gdug pa'i blon po kho na ring dang // ldan pa dag gis rgyal la smras// rgyal po bkra shis min pa'i ster// dge sbyong mgo reg skra med 'di// lam du de ring bdag cag gis// mthong bas ci 'byung yod// 
173b4(mdo 'grel): maM shes/ 'di ni rgyal ba sdig can gyi// bzhin la bdag mi lta zhes brjod// byed la 'di nas skad cig gcig/ deng du song sted de ltar gnas// gzhung ngan thos pas de thos nas// mi bdag gis ni 'khor rnams 
173b5(mdo 'grel): la// phyag dar rdul gyi spar mo yis// ring du gnas 'di g.yogs zhes smras// gdug pa'i 'bangs ni de dag gis// rdul gyi spar mos g.yogs pa can// nang du zhugs pas bzlog pa'i slad// de yis/ 
173b6(mdo 'grel): mchog gi khang pa sprul// khro bas 'khrugs pa'i sbrul rnams dang // khrag ni 'thungs pa'i stag dag kyang // zhi las 'jam pa nyid 'gyur te// sa yi bdag po'i 'bengs ma yin// de nas mi bdag song ba'i
173b7(mdo 'grel): tshe// rdul phur brgya yis g.yogs de la// he ru ka dang b+hai ru kas// sdug bsngal las mngon phyogs te smras// rgyal po ma rungs ngan byed kyis// 'phags pa khyod kyis 'o brgyal thob// gang gis mdun du 'di// 
173b8(mdo 'grel): mthong ba// bdag cag gi ni mig rnams smad// rmongs pa'i mun pa sdig spyod du// skye bo ngan pas mi bdag bsgyur// las 'di mthong bas bdag cag kyang // sdig pa'i skal pa dag dang ldan// saM gzhi 
174a1(mdo 'grel): sdig mang gis gdungs 'di// bla mnga' khyad kyis btang bas byas// bzang dka' mi sran gnas pani// btang bar 'as par sum 'ad// na ban bar ma 'gyur bzad pa'idan/ 
174a2(mdo 'grel): nyebar zad mi 'gyur// tho ba rtsub mo'i skyon rnams dag gis blo gros la yang reg mi 'gyur// ngan sems zag rngu dang mtshungs yid la mi gnas dam pa rnams dgal// 'jig rten na ni skye bo ngan pa rnam

174a6(mdo 'grel): khron bdag sdug bsngal// 'di yi grong du dang po yi// nyin la rlung chen 'bab par 'gyur// gnyis pa la ni me tog char// de nas gzhan la gos kyi char// dngul gyi chur ni bzhi pa la// lta ba la yang gser

177a7(mdo 'grel): las// legs byas tshogs ni ma byas pa// des na rin chen phung po 'di// khyed la sol ba'i phung por gyur// rin chen rnams ni 'bad nas bzung yang bsod nams zad pa las// ring du 'gro zhing skal pa ldan 
177a8(mdo 'grel): pa las kyang nye bar 'ongs// nor rnams sgrub pa dag ni rgya che mya ngan mtshan ma nyid// nar ni legs byas dag la rab zhugs rigs pa'i sems nyid do// de slad khyed kyis dge slong gi/ dge 'dun zas la sta gon 
177b1(mdo 'grel): mdzadzod// longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa'i tshegs// bdag gis khyed la phun tshogs bgyi// zhes brjod de yis nor dang zas// phun sum tshogs pa byin pa des// sangs rgyas la sogs dge 'dun rnams// de/ 
177b2(mdo 'grel): dag gis ni nyin cig mchod// dge 'dun ji lta bzhin mchod nas// skad cig smon lam de dag gis// bdag cag nam yang dbul por ni// ma gyur cig ces bya ba byas// de nas mkhas pa'i tshig dag gis// de dag 
177b3(mdo 'grel): song bas mdun du ni// sol phung de nyid rin chen gyi// phung po nyid du gyur pa mthong // de nas mkhas pa gzhon nu ni// mthu dang ldan pa'i khyim nyid du// rnam par bzhag pa'i gter dag ni// bgegs med brgya dag/ 
177b4(mdo 'grel): byung bar gyur// chos shes de yi lugs bsrung slad// rgyal po gsal rgyal nyid la ni// gter gyi drug cha phul de yang // de las so la ba nyid du gyur// bzhon nu nyid kyi bsod nams kyis// gter gyi tshogs 'di/ 
177b5(mdo 'grel): spyad bya yin// zhes pa'i tshig ni bar snang las// de nas sa yi bdag pos thos// gzhon nu nyid kyi tshig gis ni// gter rnams dag ni gtor nyid du// slar gyur ngo mtshar bcas pa yi// mi bdag gis ni de khyim 
177b6(mdo 'grel): springs// de nas nor rnams ma lus pa// gzhon nu bsam pa yangs pa yis// byin nas phun sum tshogs pa rnams// dbul po'i khyim du gnas par byas// de nas 'khor ba snying po med// rnam par dpyad/ 
177b7(mdo 'grel): phyir chags bral ba// brtan pa de yis mi rtag nyid// yang dag bsams nas pa la smras// yab cig dka' thub nags su bdag/ 'gro ba re zhig gnang bar mdzod// skye ba brgya yi lhag ma yis// 'byor
177b8(mdo 'grel): pa 'di yis bdag nyon mongs// 'jig rten gsum gyi phun tshogs thob// gang du smad bya nyid 'gyur ba// 'byung po kun gyi tshe yi ni// snod 'di shin tu chung ba nyid// gang zhig grang la rgyun tu bdag gis reg bya 'jam 
178a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i gos kyis g.yog bya zhing // gang zhig gdung la bdag gis dpal gyi dum bu bsil ba'i byug pas byug bya ba// gang gis don du dug mtshan me dang lag 'gro'i tshogs las mchog tu 'jigs// 
178a2(mdo 'grel): pa thob// bdag gi lus 'di gnod pa dag las yongs su bsrungs kyang 'jig pa nyid du 'gyur// longs spyod las ni chags bral bdag/ dga' ba'i rab byung blangs nas ni// nags su gnas shing bsam pa yis// / 
178a3(mdo 'grel): gdungs pa sems kyi gzir ba 'phrog/ ces brjod yab kyis khas blangs ni// byas shing yul la chags pa yi// 'ching ba de yis yongs btang nas// sha ri'i bu yi gnas su song // der ni de yis rab
178a4(mdo 'grel): byung ste// lag na lhung bzed chos gos can// de yi rjes 'brang nyid gyur nas// brtul zhugs kyis bsdams rnam par rgyu// zhing pa rnams kyis bstan pa yis// zhing nas zhing la 'jug pa'i chu// lam nas// 
178a5(mdo 'grel): bgrod pa der mthong nas// ya mtshan las ni 'di ltar bsams// kye ma sems med chu rnams kyang // bsgrubs pa'i lam nas bgrod pa yis// las ni yang dag sgrub mthong ste// lus can rnams la 
178a6(mdo 'grel): ma yin no// zhes bsams bgrod pas mdun du ni// mda' mkhan dag gis mda' bsros shing // drang por byed pa mthong gyur nas// blo ldan mchog der rab tu bsams// mda' ni sems med 'di dag 
178a7(mdo 'grel): rnams// gdungs pas drang po nyid 'gyur te// lus can 'khyogs po rnam dag ni// 'khor ba'i gdung bas kyang ma yin// zhes sems mdun du shing mkhan gyis// shing rta'i 'khor lo nyid byas pa'i// brtan pa'i
178a8(mdo 'grel): gzugs rnams mthong gyur nas// slar yang yang dag sems par gyur// kye ma sems med shing rnams ni// bzo yi sbyor bas skad cig las// las su rung ba nyid 'gyur te// lus can rnams kyis 
178b1(mdo 'grel): sems ma yin// 'di dag bsams zhing yang dag song // chos bzang nges pa la gus pa// de yis slob dpon la smras pa// mnyes gshin pa la bu yis bzhin// 'phags pa nyid ni bsod snyoms la// di ring 
178b2(mdo 'grel): bdag gi ched du gshegs// khyod kyis bstan pa rang nyid kyi// brtul zhugs bdag gis bsam par bgyi// zhes te zas kyi bya ba ni// mkhan po la gsal mkhas pa ni// de song tshe na des bstan pa'i// 
178b3(mdo 'grel): gtsug lag khang gi khang par zhugs// der ni g.yo med skyil krung bcas// lus ni drang po nyid du byas// dran pa mngon du byas nas ni// de yis rang gi chos la bsams// de ni ting 'dzin la zhugs tshe// 
178b4(mdo 'grel): nor 'dzin 'dzin byed byed dang bcas// ma lus chu gter chu rlabs kyis// du ku la yi gos can g.yos// nges pa'i bsam gtan de shes nas// bgegs med grub slad brgya byin gyis// phyogs su 
178b5(mdo 'grel): bsrung slad phyogs skyeng nas// zla ba nyi mar bcas pa bskos// de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen gyis// de yi dge rtsa sbyin pa las// grub pa nye bar gnas pa dag/ mkhyen nas skad cig yang dag bsams// 
178b6(mdo 'grel): 'di yi dgra bcom nye ba la// gal te shA ri'i bu 'ongs nas// ske ni rab tu brdungs pa na// bar du bgegs 'di the tshom med// de nas de ni 'ong ba yis// mngon du bdag rang nyid song ste// sna tshogs dri ba la 
178b7(mdo 'grel): bsten pa'i// gtam gyis dus ni dbrog par bya// de ltar dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das// rang nyid phyogs der byon nas ni// dge slong de ni 'ong ba dag/ gtam gyis thegs pa nyid du byas// lha yi mthu 
178b8(mdo 'grel): las mkhar bgrod rnams// sgra med lus ni bsdams gyur pa'i// 'jig rten du ni mkhas pa yis// rlung nyid sgron ma nyid mtshungs thob// de yis rgyun zhugs 'bras bu las// steng du lhan gcig phyir/ 
179a1(mdo 'grel): 'od thob// phyir mi 'ong gi 'bras thob nas// de nas dgra bcom 'bras bu thob// de nas gtam gyi 'jug tu ni// bde gshegs gshegs te rang gnas su// shA ri'i bu yi zhugs 
179a2(mdo 'grel): pan// slob ma nyi ma bzhin du mthong // srid pa'i 'ching ba rnams btang zhing // 'phral la thar pa de mthong nas// de yi grub pa dus bzhi brgyas// thob bya de ni de yis bsngags// de yi dgra bcom gnas 
179a3(mdo 'grel): thob par// 'gro la grags pa de thos nas// dge slong rnams kyis de yi gtam// dris shing bcom ldan rgyal bas gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// 'od srungs ba ra NA ser sngon// 
179a4(mdo 'grel): dge slong stong phrag nyi shu dang // lhan cig grong khyer pa rnams kyis// dad pas phul zhing gtsang ma yis// longs spyod yid 'ong thams cad kyis// mchod cing dus ni ji snyed cig/ sems can phan par brtson// 
179a5(mdo 'grel): pas gzhugs// der ni dge slong mchod la chags// khyim dang khyim du zhugs pa na// dbul po zhes pa'i dbul po yis// shugs rings phyung nas rab bsams pa// gang zhig skal pa dman pa yis// 
179a6(mdo 'grel): dge slong gcig kyang 'gron ma gnyer// shin tu dbul las dge ba yis// bya ba btang ba bdag 'dra dman// ngag tshad tshig ni mtshams sbyor rnams la rigs pa yod min zhing // bya ba nyams zhing byed/ 
179a7(mdo 'grel): pa dang bral de nyid dman gyur pa// tha snyad kun las phyi rol gyur cing don dang bral ba yis// sgra rnams bzhin du skyes bu rnams ni skye bos dor bya yin// 'di bsams me yis zil gnon cing // nor gyis// / 
179a8(mdo 'grel): dman nyid smod byed pa// de la legs byas skul byed pa'i// las pas mngon du phyogs te smras// nor gyis dman pa khyod kyis kyang // skye ba gzhan du dge thob slad// ji zhig ltar yang dge slong ni// 
179b1(mdo 'grel): gcig kyang ci slad mgron mi gnyer// zhes pa de yis brjod pa na// zug rngus zug pa slar bsnun bzhin// dge slong zhal zas ma 'byor pas// de ni mchog tu gdung bar gyur// tshong dpon khang par ji/ 
179b2(mdo 'grel): zhig ltar// bkres ber yongs gnyen de song nas// 'bad pas shing ni gcod pa yis// las kyi rin gyis cha shas thob// de yis chung mas dag pa'i 'bras// de nyid du ni grus byas nas// 
179b3(mdo 'grel): de yi gla rngan cha shas thob// gus pas rje bo dag la phul// de nas dad pas dge slong gis// zas ni brtson par brtson gyur pa// snying stobs dag pa de yi ni// rjes su sgrub byed brgya byin gyur// 
179b4(mdo 'grel): mdza' bo brgya byin gzugs bsgribs pas// lha yi bza' ba kha dog dang // dri dang ro ldan bsgrubs pa'i tshe// dbul pos dge slong rnyed ma gyur// 'byor ldan langs spyod phyug pa yi// grong pa 
179b5(mdo 'grel): pa yongs mkhyen nas// zhal zas rab tu blang ba mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zas bdag/ dbul zhes rgyal pos nor rnams kyi// rab tu 'bad pas gsol btab kyang // dbul bas// 
179b6(mdo 'grel): nges par khas ma spangs// de nas bcom ldan mchod byas te// de yis smon lam rab tu btab// yon tan nor ni yang dag rdzogs// dbul la drin par bdag gyur cig/ 'od srungs rang gi 
179b7(mdo 'grel): gnas gshegs shing // lha dbang mtha ris song ba'i tshe// lha yi rin chen thams cad kyis// dbul ba'i khyim ni khengs par gyur// de nas brgya byin bka' las ni// de yi khang pa skyed tshal 
180a1(mdo 'grel): mdzes// bi shwa karma sa rin chen gyis// ka bas rnam par brgyad par byas// dri med dbang phyug yang dag thob// de yis zhag bdun 'od srungs ni// dge slong kun dang bcas 
180a2(mdo 'grel): pa dag/ 'byor pa longs spyod rnams kyis mchod// gang gi khyim ni bud med bkres pa ring n+ding buche dul srong rnams kyis// sman yongs dor khri stan sremag phreng ldan g.yo med zung na sbrang bu sgrogs// byi la'i phrug 
180a3(mdo 'grel): gu dag ni thab tu nyal zhing du 'bod gzhan pa bzhin gyur pa// de yi dpal ni me bdag chags pa'i gnas nyid dag gis su zhig mtshan mi byed// sbyin pa'i mthu ni bdud rta ltar// dag pa da yis dbul po ni// skye ba gnan 
180a4(mdo 'grel): dumakhas pa nyid// thab nas dgra btsam dadu gyur// de k+tar kun rigs yon tan la gus pas// mkhas pa'i skya bas ma dbyung ba gsungs// rnam dag ston pa'i bsad nams de la'as// ngas par bcu 
180a5(mdo 'grel): nas dge slong chags des bsngags// nas pa dge ba'i dbang bas byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag pas mgyi 'khri shing las/ mkhas pa'i rtags pa brjod pa'i yul 'dab ste/ 
180a6(mdo 'grel): ba ni bcu rtsa gnas pa la// / snyed skabs kyis ni nyi ma'i 'ad zer mun pa la bzhin gsal// chos dag gis ni rin chen tshogs rnams mkha' las 'bab par 'gyur// brtan pa yis ni rlung pa 
180a7(mdo 'grel): thams cid rab tun par 'gra// sbyin pa yis ni byugs rnams langs spyod sel pa bzang bar 'gyur// mnyan yad rgyal byad cha 'dus na// bam ldan pa ba gshegs pa yis// dge ba nga 
180a8(mdo 'grel): rnams la// dzas ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad// sran gyi dus ni gzhan dag la// skyab tshal brgyad rtsi'i cha// dpal ldan gsar mdog ces bya ba'i// sa yi bdag pa byung bar byur// de ma thang khyer gas 
180b1(mdo 'grel): zhes pa// brgya byin 'chi med ldan bzhin du// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang yin kyang // bzhugs gnas yid du 'ong bar gyur// 'dren par 'os shing grags pa dkar// mdzes par zhugs shing yon tan 
180b2(mdo 'grel): rigs// gang gis mu tig do shel bzhin// skye dgu'i bya ba snying la zung // skye dgu'i las kyi rnam smin gyis// char med mchog tu mi bzad cing // skye dgu rnams la 'jigs stor ba// de yi grong khyer 
180b3(mdo 'grel): dag tu byung // snying stobs bstan pa 'phrog byed cing // thams cad yongs su gdung byed pa// char med de ni sa 'dzin gyis// yid ni yongs gdung rgyu nyid gyur// bcos thabs thams cad nyams pa des// 
180b4(mdo 'grel): blon po'i gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor na// bsam pas g.yo ba med mdun du// shin tu yun rings bsams nas spras// bcas thabs med pa'i char mngon// nye bar lhung 'di skye dgu rnams// bdag gi 'bad 
180b5(mdo 'grel): pas yongs bskyang ba// byas pa 'bras bu med par byed// sa spyod sdig pas skye dgu rnams// mchi ma'i char ni rab 'bebs shing // 'byor med gsal byed phyogs rnams kyis// char ni nges par 'chad 
180b6(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur// skye dgu 'jigs pa che la gang // rgyal pos sgrub par mi byed pa// de yi zur phud cod pan 'dzin// gsal bar zlos gar lta bu yin// gang tshe rgal pos 'grol phan// de tshe 'jig rten 
180b7(mdo 'grel): rdzogs ldan dus// gang tshe rgyal pos 'gro mi phan// nges par 'jig rten rtsod ldan dus// mi bdag rnams kyi sdug pa'i las ni skyabs med skye dgu mugs nyen gyur cing // mi mthun phyogs lhung mngan sum 
180b8(mdo 'grel): mtshon pas 'jig cing nad dang sdug bsngal nye bar gnas// rab rgyas nyon mongs dag gis shin tu nyam thag ma bsdams kyi hud ces pa sgrogs// shin tu mi srun mdza' bos bslangs rnams mya ngan byed 
181a1(mdo 'grel): cing mdza' gcugs med par 'gyur// de slad bdag gis skye dag rnams// mtha' dag mdzod kyis bsrung bar bya// rgyal po skye dgu yongs skyob pa// bsod nams rin chen 
181a2(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin gter// zhes brjod de yis rang gi ni// mdzod dang bangade ba la sogs kun// rtag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyis// longs spyod nye bar spyad byar byas// de nas de yi zas kyi tshogs// dus kyi mu ge 
181a3(mdo 'grel): drag po yis// 'god pa che bas skyes bu ni// gcig gi zas kyi lhag mar gyur// de nas gnas skabs de la ni// nyi ma'i 'od can rang sangs rgyas// nam mkha' las ni mngon phyogs te// de la zas ni bslang
181a4(mdo 'grel): bi mdzad// nges pa'i the tshom de la ni// bdag nyid kyis ni srog gi gzungs// ma brtags rab dang blo ldan des// de dag thams cad de la phul// dad pa can des rang srog gi/ 'tsho bas mgron du byas pas de'i// 
181a5(mdo 'grel): de yi snying stobs dang tshul nyid// bsngags shing mkha' la rab tu gshegs// de nas mkha' la sprin phrang chu ris can// gnyis 'thung che la bung ba'i phreng bzhin dang // nub phyogs bu mo'i 'gram par a ga ru/ 
181a6(mdo 'grel): nag po'i dog pa lta bur rab tu brtsams// nam mkha' bar snang dag gis mtha' dang ni// ut+pal sngon po rab rgyas nags kyi mdangs// bung ba'i khyu yis bzhin du sprin gyi tshogs// ro dang ldan pas g.yogs
181a7(mdo 'grel): g+har rnam par mdzes// de nas zhag bdun sal skye dgu rnams// 'dod pa'i kha zas ma lus char du bab// de yis 'og tu 'bral sogs pa'i char// de nas rim gyi rin chen tshogs char yang // de ltar 
181a8(mdo 'grel): legs byas phun tshogs la dga' sa yi bdag po dag/ gser mdog de ni sa bdag kun gyi cod pon nor bu bzhin// mchog tu mdzes shing skye dgu rnams kyi srog ni bsrung bas mdzes// gang phyir skye bo 
181b1(mdo 'grel): dam pa'i mthu ni gzhan don rab sgrub byed// gang zhig sa yi bdag po gser mdog de// da ltar nyid sku yi bdag nyid 'di// de skad gsungs nas bcom ldan rgyal ba yis// blo ldan dam pa rnams la chos bstan 
181b2(mdo 'grel): mdzad// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// gser mdog gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste// bzhi bcu rtsa gsum 
181b3(mdo 'grel): pa'o// / gzhan la phan par 'jebs pa'i mthu dang ni// kun gyi nyer 'tsho 'byor pa chen po ste// 'bras bu cher 'os 'di dag dge rnams kyi// bsod nams myu gu'i dang po'i 'bras bu yin// 
181b4(mdo 'grel): rgyal byed tshal gyi kun dang ston// rgyal ba bzhugs shing mngon dgyes tshe// dpal ldan khyim bdag lha yi rje// zhes pa mnyan yod dag na gnas// bu khyod kyis ni khengs ldan de'i// bu ni gser gyi lag 
181b5(mdo 'grel): gyur te// gang gi lag gnyis rmad byung ba// gser gyi rang bzhin dag tu 'gyur// de yis lag gnyis dag la dngul// snga dro snga dro 'bum phrag gnyis// rab tu skye ba gang gis ni// slong ba'i dpag bsam 
181b6(mdo 'grel): shing du gyur// de yi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams// dus kyis yongs su smin gyur pa// rab gsal dben pa chen po yis// rgyal ba la ni gus pa skyes// de nas rgyal byed tshal du de// song nas bcom ldan 
181b7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs// mthong ste kun dga' ldan pa yis// de yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal byas// bcom ldan gyis kyang 'khor ba yis// bdud rtsi'i grogs po dge ba yi// phonya gzigs pa de la 
181b8(mdo 'grel): gtad// ston pas gzigs pa nyid gyis de// kun rmongs rab rib rab spangs pa// nyi ma'i 'od kyis pad+ma ni// rab tu rgyas pa lta bur ma dzis// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang // de la dam 
182a1(mdo 'grel): chos bstan pa mdzad// gang gis chos kyi rang bzhin spyan// mi dman snang ba rab tu skrun// sngon gyi bsod nams yongs smin pas// chags bral bag chags sad gyur te// shes rab 
182a2(mdo 'grel): dri ma med pa des// phyag 'tshal kun mkhyen la gsol pa// bcom ldan skyabs thob skyabs su 'os// nyon mongs ma lus nyams pa'i slad// srid pa 'phrog pa'i rab byung ni// bdag la rab tu grub par mdzo 
182a3(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams kyis tshe srog g.yo// lang tsho gzhon pa de bas kyang // glog ni 'byug pa bzhin du g.yo// de bas kyang ni 'byor pa 'di// zhes pa smra zhing chags bral la// de yi lus la brde gshegs 
182a4(mdo 'grel): kyis// rjes su bzung ba las skyes pa'i// rab byung rang nyid ltung bar gyur// chos gos dmar pos rab gsal ba'i// chags bral nyid ni de yis bzung // lhung bzed bzung bas slar yang ni// 'khor ba'i 
182a5(mdo 'grel): snod nyid rab tu btang // dge slong rnams kyis de yin// rmad byung grub ste mngon sum mthong // de yi sngon byung bcom ldan la// dris shing des kyang rab gsungs pa// rgyal po kri ki zhes pa sngon// ba ra NA sir de 
182a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan 'od srungs zhes bya ba// yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur tshe// de yi gdung ni rab sbyangs nas// mchod rten rin chen rang bzhin dag/ mtho ris lkog nus bsod nams ni// gzugs 
182a7(mdo 'grel): can bzhin du mtho ba byas// de la mchod pa yongs 'dzin cing // bya ru 'dzugs par byed pa'i tshe// bzo bo kan ta la zhes pas// gzugs rnyan gnyis ni rnam par bkod// dang ba'i sems ni dag pa yi// 
182a8(mdo 'grel): bsod nams shin tu che ba des// da lta gser gyi lag pa ni// 'dod par bya ba chen po thog/ 'jig rten du ni rab grags dkar po bdud rtsi'i spun drung du// gtong ba'i yon tan drag po dang ldan 'byor pa rab 
182b1(mdo 'grel): tu rgyas gyur pa// chung ngu gang zhig yongs bsngo'i gnas la bsod nams chung ngu nyid min gyur// de nyid kho na dri med yid kyi dad pa dag pa kun spyod yin// bsod napas mthu ldan gser gyi lag pa yis// / 
182b2(mdo 'grel): mthu ni de ltar rgyal bas bshad pa dag/ thos pa nyid na dge 'dun ste// dga' dadagus dang ya mtshan dab dang gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i dpag 
182b3(mdo 'grel): bsam gyi 'khri shing las// gser gyi lag pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog rgyal ba dran pa ni// skye bo ngan pa'i bzod dka' dug 
182b4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin dang // shin tu 'jigs rung zon par ltung gyur pa'o// skye bo rnams kyi rten sar gyur pa yin// grong khyer rgyal po'i khab ces par// sa 'dzin bya rgon phung ba yi// ngos la sngon tshe bcom ldan 'das/ 
182b5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par gyur// skabs der bu la byams pa yi// rgyal po gzugs can snying po nyid// de yi bu ni ma skyes dgra// gdug pa byed par gyur pa yis// grogs po sdig pa dang ldan 
182b6(mdo 'grel): pa// lhas byin gyi ni gros bzhin du// 'jigs rung mur can btson / khang ni// rgya ba med par rab tu bcug/ bkres pas nyen pa de la ni// btsun pos zas dag btson khang du// gsang nas rab tu 'jug par byas// 
182b7(mdo 'grel): de bsad 'dod des shes nas bzlog/ sa yi bdag de shin tu rig/ sngo zhing drim ldan par gyur// dus min sprin nag gis gzir ba'i// nag po'i phyogs kyi zla ba bzhin// phal cher mnyes gshin sems 
182b8(mdo 'grel): ldan pas// mchog tu rgud pa'i mdza' mo raM// gdung bcas sred ldan pa bzhin du// shin tu dam par 'khyud par byed// bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i phyogs su ni// mya ngan gyis gzer des phyogs te// 
183a1(mdo 'grel): thal mo sbyar te spyis btud nas// skad gdangs zhan par rab smras pa// dman pa 'don pa la brtson pa// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems// rin chen dgra bcom chen po nyid// 
183a2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal po sna tshogs skye ba yis// nyon mongs rab tu zhi ba'i rgyu// 'jigs rung 'khor ba rgya mtsho yi// zam stegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gzi brjid rnam 
183a3(mdo 'grel): par dag/ snying rje bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho ste// sems can kun gyi gnyen gcig po// rtag tu sad la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes pa bsod nams me tog las// 'khrungs shing gus pa'i bdud rtsis bran// bstod 
183a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i dog pa bde gshegs kyis// snyan du 'os pa de yis byas// de yis nyon mongs sdug bsngal gyi// rang bzhin skabs mkhyen kun mkhyen gyis// 'char ba'i khang pa'i bu ga yi// snang ba dag gis tshim 
183a5(mdo 'grel): par byas// de ltar gyur pa ma skyes dgras// shes nas dogs pas 'khrugs gyur pa'i// pha yi btson khang dag gis ni// bug pa shin tu chung ba'ang bkag/ de nas gdug pa'i btson srung gis// de yis bka' 
183a6(mdo 'grel): las spu gr-i yis// dam du bcings pa de yi ni// rkang pa rnam par bcad pa byas// drag po'i sdug bsngal nyon mongs kyis// mchog tu gzir ba'i sa bdag des// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal 
183a7(mdo 'grel): zhes// gdung ba'i tshe de ldan pas brjod// de nas bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen// mdun du mngon sum nyid gshegs te// brgya byin gyis bshams gdan la bzhugs// thugs rje nyid kyis der bka'
183a8(mdo 'grel): stsal// rgyal po ci bya mi bzad pa'i// las kyi lugs ni 'di 'dra yin// dge dang mi dges rab bskrun 'bras// spyad pa min par yod mi 'dzad// chags sngar dug gis dkrigs gyur cing // sna tshogs 
183b1(mdo 'grel): gdung ba bzod dka' ba// snying po med pa'i 'khor ba ra// sdug bsngal 'di lta snying po nyid// rgud pa nyams pas nyam thag cing // kun nas nyon mongs rdzogs dus su// 'khrug pa med pa'i chags bral lam// 
183b2(mdo 'grel): brtan pa kho na yangs skyo ba yin// 'khor ba 'jigs drang nags kyi nang na rab tu rgyas gyur pa// sdug bsngal me yi gdung ba 'gro ba rab rgyas dub bzhin// slar yang dag par gyur pa min pa legs byas ldan rnams 
183b3(mdo 'grel): kyis// mig ni mchi ma'i chu yi thigs kyis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po longs spyod re ba thong // sdug bsngal 'di la bstan pa brten// 'khor ba'i spyod tshul thams cad ni// yongs su 'gyur 
183b4(mdo 'grel): ba 'gal ba can// lus kyi mjug tu ngalnga nyid// khyod la dge ba nye bar gnas// zhes brjod de ni dbugs byung ste// bcom ldan rang gi gnas su gshegs// gzugs can snying po'ang lus kyi mthar// 
183b5(mdo 'grel): de dus nyid na mtho ris su// dpal ldan rnam thos sras kyi bu// rgyal ba 'khyu mchog ces par gyur// pha ni srog dang bral ba dag/ ma skyes dgra yis shes gyur nas// de yaM lus ni rab sbyangs te// 
183b6(mdo 'grel): rang gis nyes par byas pa smad// de sems drag po'i sdig pas gdungs// spyod tshul ngan pas sun phyung ste// phyi nas gdung ba'i me la der// dag pa'i bya ba byed pa bzhin// des bsams kye ma kun 
183b7(mdo 'grel): rmongs las/ dbang phyug gis rgyags sred ldan blo// tshul ngan bdag ni kha spabs tu// sdig pa'i g.yang la ltung bar gyur// thos pa shes rab kyis dbul zhing // rang nyid bde bar rmongs gyur pa// 
183b8(mdo 'grel): mi srun bsngags rdzas zhugs pa rnams// bsam pas lus ni gdung bar byed// rtenas med pa'i sdig pa yi// 'dam du ltung zhing nyams gyur pa// bdag med bdag la rgyal ba ni// yang dag dran pa/ 
184a1(mdo 'grel): skyabs su 'gyur// de ltar yun rings bsams nas de// bde bar gshegs pa'i drung song ste// ngan pa byas la rmod byed cing // mchog tu yang dag zhum par gyur// 
184a2(mdo 'grel): der ni bdag nyid mi gtsang bar// khas len khrel dang bcas pa des// sdig pa reg pas 'jigs pa bzhin// ring nas rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal// ngan byas lus la yang dag chags// gsal bar byed cing 
184a3(mdo 'grel): 'dar ldan pas// mig ni mchi ma dang bcas des// kun mkhyen la ni yongs skyob zhus// yongs gdung sdig pa byas pa bdag/ dmyal ba'i me ni bde bar gnas// thugs rje'i rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das// 
184a4(mdo 'grel): khyod nyid la ni skyabs su song // gru gnyis dmar ba khyod kyi spyan// pad+mo'i 'od ldan gam gA bzhin// dri ma 'khru bzod dag byed pa// 'di yis bdag la reg par mdzod// mi srun gros kyis rab zhugs shing 
184a5(mdo 'grel): bag med spyod tshul ngan pa can// sdig can 'byor pa la chags pa// bdag gis pa ni rnam par bsad// ces pa tshe re ldan de yi// tshig thos de bzhin gshegs pa yis// de yi sdig rdul dag bya'i slad// 
184a6(mdo 'grel): bsod nams dbyangs can rab tu spros// rang las kyis bzhin mi srun pa// rgyal po gnod pa ma bsams pa// khyod ni pha bsad la bskul te// nyam nga'i sdig par lhung bar gyur// sdug bsngal de des spyad/ 
184a7(mdo 'grel): bya zhing // khyod kyis kyang ni sdig pa thob// sa skyong de dang khyod kyi 'di// myong bar bya ba mtshungs pa nyid// rang gi las ni rab bkod pa// dpral ba'i ngos la gnas pa dag/ rdo yi dum bu'i ri mo bzhin// 
184a8(mdo 'grel): mi rnams kyi ni g.yo ma yin// khyod ni mi srin pas bskul nas// sdig pa'i las ni byas pa yis// dag legs bdud rtsi nye ba ni// rang gi lag pas 'phangs par gyur// gal te khyod la da/ yang 
184b1(mdo 'grel): sdig gzhom phun tshogs thob 'dod pa// yod na bsod nams blo gros mdzod// de yang zhi las bdag nyid la'o// mar me'i spyod tshul bde ba bskyed// 'tsho byed grags pa rab tu 'bar// bdud rtsi'i rab tu 
184b2(mdo 'grel): byed pa 'di// legs pa dang 'grogs dam pa'i spyod// rjes su 'gyod pa'i mes gdung dang // dam pa rnams dang 'grogs pa dang // yang dag bsgrags dang sbyin pa yis// lus can rnams ni sdig nyams byed// 
184b3(mdo 'grel): snod ni gtsang byed yon tan sdong bu nges par zad mi byed// mdza' ba'i snum ni mi 'phrog dri ma yang ni skyed mi byed// skyon mtshan mjug tu rab mdzes g.yo ba nyid ni 'dzin mi byed// dam pa dang 'grogs legs 
184b4(mdo 'grel): byas khang par mar ma tse yang yin// yon tan ldan pa'i tshogs la rgud pa 'doms mkhas mtshan mo'i skad cig mtshungs// skye bo'i 'dren byed rnams kyi bya ba mtha' dag rab tu 'gog par byed// shin tu mnyam 
184b5(mdo 'grel): dang mi mnyam gnas la gnas shing snang ba yongs zad las// rmongs pa chen po 'byung ba skyed byed mun pa dang ni mi sran 'grogs// rgyal po la bu dal bu yis// dus kyis sdig pa zad gyur nas// dben pas 
184b6(mdo 'grel): snang bar byas pa yis// rang sangs rgyas su khyod 'gyur ro// zhes pa bcom ldan rgyal ba yis// brtsebs de ni dbugs dbyung mdzad// lcang la lhag par dam pa rnams// snying rje byams pa'i spyan dang ldan// 
184b7(mdo 'grel): de nas bde gshegs la btud de// mi bdag rang gis gnas su song // sdig pa'i phung po chen po ni// yang ba nyid bzhin rnam par rig/ dge slong rnams kyis de song tshe// de yi las kyi dge mtshan 
184b8(mdo 'grel): las// sa skyong gi ni sngon byung mtha'// dris shing kun mkhyen gyis bka' stsal// ba ra NA sir tshong dpon gyi// bu bzhi dag ni thur gyur te// dpal ldan bsdams pa dag bral zhing // gdung med rtse dga' la 
185a1(mdo 'grel): brtson pa'o// nam zhig bde bas myos gyur cing // phan tshun kyal ka'i gtam gyis gnas// lar chos 'phyar ba de dag gis// rang sangs rgyas ni byon pa mthong // de mthong rnam par/ 
185a2(mdo 'grel): sdang ba skyes// zhi dul smod byed phra bo ni// sun dar ka zhes pa yis// 'dzum bcas spun zla rnams la smras// btung bas myos pas dge slong ni// chos gos lhung bzed rtags can 'di// srog dang bral ba 
185a3(mdo 'grel): bsgrub po zhes// 'di ni bdag gi yid la snyam// g.yo ba las des 'di brjod che// gnyis pa kun dar zhes pas// smras pa bdag ni dge slong 'di// chu la 'phangs te bsad par 'dod// de nas gsum pa 
185a4(mdo 'grel): sdig pa can// sun da ra ta zhes pas smras// dge slong 'di nyid mgyogs par ni// kha khyer dag las 'bang bar bya// bzhi pi gdug pa'i blo gros can// kan d+ha ra zhes bya bas smras// dge slong rkang pa rang gis 
185a5(mdo 'grel): ni// spu gris lag pa med par bya// zhes pa smra zhing de dag rnams// sdig pa yid la 'dod par gyur// gang gis rang 'dod mtshungs pa'i 'bras// de dag skye ba gzhan la thob// chags pas long bas nor 
185a6(mdo 'grel): mthong ste// khro bas long bas dgra nyid do// 'dod pas long bas 'dod ldan ma// dregs pas long bas ci yang min// nor gyis rab bskyed rnam 'gyur can// bdag nyid mi sdom rtog spyod dman// 
185a7(mdo 'grel): rgyags pa rnams kyi kun dga' ni// nyon mongs rtsa ba nyid du 'gyur// rgyu med khro bar byed cing rgyu med rab tu 'phar bar byed// rgyu med mdza' bar byed cing rgyu med kun tu khas len byed// nges par rmongs pas bcom pa 
185a8(mdo 'grel): phan dang mi phan dpyod med cing // mchog tu tshim pas mo yi byugs rnams rgyags dang bcas par gyur// sdig las tshong dpon bu thu bo// de nyid skye ba gzhan la ni// shAkya shwa ri rgya zhes pa// chang 'thungs nas// 
185b1(mdo 'grel): ni nyams par gyur// gnyis pa yang ni shAkya dag/ ming chen chu la shi bar gyur// gsum pa rgyal po gsal rgyal yang // bu yi bskrad nas bsad par gyur// bzhi pa gzugs can snying po 'di// bu yis 
185b2(mdo 'grel): brtson du bcings nas bsad// skye dang ldan pa'i nor bzhin du// las ni rab ldan spyod par byed// de ltar rmongs pas bcom pa'i dam pa dam min rnams kyis 'dir// bde ba med pa'i las ni 'phral nyid rnam 
185b3(mdo 'grel): par bsgrubs pa dka/ tshul min nye bar gnas pa de ni mtshe ma'i chu dag gis// mig rdzogs mya ngan mi chung dbang dang bral bas spyod par byed// gzugs can snying po'i skye ba snga mar rab zhugs byung ba'i 
185b4(mdo 'grel): tshul// mi bzad dug gi rnam smin 'di dag bde gshegs kyis gsungs pa// 'dun sar dge slong rnam mar dag gis gsal bar thos gyur nas// gdung ba brgya yi sa mtshan min sun byung sems nyid 
185b5(mdo 'grel): yin par sems// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang po byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// ma skyes dgras pa bsad pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste/ 
185b6(mdo 'grel): bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / mi srun mun pas 'bral la lor bar byas gyur cing // dpal 'byor rnam par gnas dang bral bar rab bskrun kyang // nyam da'i gnas skabs mtshan mo 'das nas 
185b7(mdo 'grel): pad+ma bzhin// slar yang yon tan ldan pas rang rig phun tshogs 'thob// bde gshegs mnyan yod rgyal byed kyi// skyed mos tshal na bzhugs pa'i tshe// lha sa byin yongs su snang ba yi// rtsod pas 
185b8(mdo 'grel): khyab pas rnam bsams pa// shAkya'i rigs las skyes pa'i mi// bdag ni spun dang mtshungs shing mnyam// bsod nams mthu yis 'gro gsum gyis// mchod bya nyid ni rgyal bas tho ba// de slad 
186a1(mdo 'grel): de yi 'tsho ba ni// rab tu gzhom la bdag 'bad bya// gang phyir nyi ma ma nub che// gzhan gyi gzi byin gsal ba med// yid ni nga rgyal gyis mtho ba// rnam shes dag dang mthu dang ni// rigs 
186a2(mdo 'grel): dang dka' thub dpal dag gis// pha rol khyad 'phags bzod ma yin// dug ni rang gi sen rtse la// gzung nas de la phyag 'tshal te// brtan par rkang pa la mnan pas// nges par phu ga la gtang bar bya// de ltar 
186a3(mdo 'grel): sdig pa bsams byas nas// sdang ba'i dbar gyur mi srun pa// de yis skar rgyal la sogs pa'i// gnyen rnams la ni 'di skad smras// di ring bde gshegs gzu bo yi/ zhabs la rab tu dang ba'i slad// 
186a4(mdo 'grel): gdug pa gnod pa byed pa'o// sdig pa ci ldan bdag gnyug go/ zhes smra gdug pa'i blo can de// rjes mthun ster byed de dag rnams// kun dang lhan cig rgyal ba ni// rgyal byed tshal bzhugs lta ru song // der 
186a5(mdo 'grel): nibacom ldan mthong gyur nas// ji snyed nye bar des byin pa// de sri pa dag ni bsregs so zhes// rkang pa sprug cing sgra cher smras// 'tshe ba'i rnam rtog sdig pa ni// rdo rje lta bus yang dag bcom/ 
186a6(mdo 'grel): skad cig de la dmyal ba'i med// lus dang bcas pa lhung bar gyur// 'jigs rung dmyal bar ltung ba de// 'phral la kun mkhyen gyis gzigs nas// de spyod thos pa sa ya mtshan pa'i// phun tshogs 
186a7(mdo 'grel): dge slong la gsungs pa// sdig pa dag gi skyon gyis 'di// nyon mongs nyam ngar lhung bar gyur// gang phyir dri ma ldan pa'i yid// kun tu rab ri ba drag po bskyed// grong khyer dge ba'i dbyangs su ni// sa yaM 
186a8(mdo 'grel): bdag po yid bzang la// byas shes dang ni byas mi shes// bu gnyis sngon tshe byung bar gyur// byas shes brtse bas slong rnams la// rtag tu dpag bsam shing bzhin du// rang gi rin chen rgyan gyis tshogs 
186a9(mdo 'grel): mams ma mamasang mamasam mam ma sa mas mthang la mamamamam thams sa ma sa ma mang pa yang sa ma pa ga mang mam sa pa nga ma 'a mas sa nga ma ma ma mamamamam tha ma ma mam ma mas mam sa 
186b1(mdo 'grel): rnam par bkrol nas rab tu ster// bgos pa min pa pa yi rdzas// thams cad 'acag thun mong yin// zhes spras byas mi shes kyis kyang // de yis byin pa de dag phrogs// de nas mi bdag blo gros dbyangs// 
186b2(mdo 'grel): zhes pas byas shes bsngags 'os la// skye bo dga' ma zhes pa yi// bu mo'i tshig gis byin par gyur// rang nyid kyis bsgrubs byin pa yis// yid la re ba de la skyes// de nas chu gter chen por ni// byas shes/ 
186b3(mdo 'grel): gzings la zhon par gyur// sngar zhing 'gran pas gus 'phel ba// ngan pa byas mi shes pa yang // rin chen sgrub brtson de nyid kyi// rjes su chags las song bar gyur// de nas tshor pa'i don mthun gyis// 
186b4(mdo 'grel): yongs gang gzings ni dal bu yis// rjes su mthun pa'i rlung dag gis// 'dod pa'i gling du phyin par gyur// tshar ba rnams kyis kun rtog bzhin// drin chen tshogs kyis kun tu khengs// de nas deni slar log/ 
186b5(mdo 'grel): nas// rang gi phyogs su 'gro brtson che// sa gzhi re ba'i rin po che// lnga brgya lnga ni byas shis kyis// blangs nas gos kyis yal 'dab la// ras ma yis ni mdud pa bcings// de nas gzings chen rin chen 
186b6(mdo 'grel): gyi// khur gyis yongs su ngal ba de// rlung chen dag gis zhig gyur te// tshul ngan rnams kyi dbang phyug bzhin// de nas shing du ma bzung ba yi// byas shes kyis ni 'tsho ba thob// rgyab kyis byas mi shes 
186b7(mdo 'grel): dag ni// bying bar gyur pa yang dag bsgral// 'jigs rung chu srin 'byung gnas las// brtse bas bsgral ba'i spun zla des// de yi thu ba dag la ni// rin chen yid 'ong bsags pa mthong // de yi rin chen 
186b8(mdo 'grel): la chags dang // sdang ba'i dbang du gyur pa des// rgya mtsho'i 'gram du ngal ba yis// spun la 'khu ba bsems par gyur// de ni gnyid du song ba la// mig dag mtshon gyis rab phyung nas// rin po che yi 
187a1(mdo 'grel): tshogs bzung ste// byas mi gzo de mgyogs par song // sgra gcan gyis ni nyin phyed bzhin// gdug pas long bar byas pa des// 'jig rten phan pa bral ba las// sdug bsngal ldan pa des kyang 
187a2(mdo 'grel): bsams// de ni slong la sbyin don du// yid la re ba don med gyur// long ba bdag gi 'tsho ba ni// 'bras med dag gis dgos pa ci// gal te dus la ma bab pas// srog ni 'jig par mi 'gyur na// de la grogs med/ 
187a3(mdo 'grel): dka' thub kyi// sbyor ba nyon mongs zhi 'jig bzod// nor zad skye bo sngang gyur cing // khengs pa dang bral 'khrugs pa'i tshe// skyes bu rnams kyi na tshod 'jug/ zhi bas zad pa mchod par 'os// de ltar bsams/ 
187a4(mdo 'grel): shing ngal bus des// 'gro ba don mthun dag gis bsgral// sa bdag blo gros dbyangs kyi ni// grong khyer dag dang nye bar phyin// ba lang skyong ba'i khang pa der// chung zad dus ni de yis bsdad// rgyal po'i bu mos skyed/ 
187a5(mdo 'grel): mos tshal// rnam par lta zhing 'gro ba yis// long yang rgyal po'i mtshan rnams kyis// gsal bar mtshan ma des mthong nas// skye ba snga ba'i mdza' bas bcings// de la mngon par dga' bar gyur// 
187a6(mdo 'grel): de las yab kyi bka' las ni// rang nyid mchog bdam de yis byas// rgyal po rnams kyis nang nas ni// mig dang bral ba bos te gdams// sa skyong rnams ni yongs btang nas// sdig ma khyod kyis long/ 
187a7(mdo 'grel): ba gdams// zhes brjod pa ni khros pa yis// dge ma de ni phyi rol bsgral// mdza' brdugs nyer bsags gus pa can// de yi sa long ba skyed tshal du// bzhag nas 'bad pas kha zas dag/ blangs nas/ 
187a8(mdo 'grel): ster zhing rtag tu gnas// nam zhig zas kyi skabs 'das tshe// yun rong lon nas 'ongs de la// bkres pas bzhin ni yongs nyams pa'i// rgyal po'i bu yis rab smras pa// khyod ni kun tu ma rtags par// 
187b1(mdo 'grel): byed mas g.yo ba 'ba' zhig las// mi bdag yangs pa spyan ldan rnams// yongs btang ba dag ni long ba 'dams// khyod ni phyi nas 'gyod pa yis// bdag la gus pa dman gyur te// da ni mdza' ba zhan pa 
187b2(mdo 'grel): nyid// ston par brtson pa ma yin nam// long blta bas yi byung ste// gzugs bzang lta la mngon par phyogs// de ring zas kyi dus 'das te// ring mo zhig nas khyod 'ongs so// de yis rtsub mo 'di smras te// 
187b3(mdo 'grel): 'dar ba dang ldan 'khri shing ni// sgra sgrogs bung ba'i phreng ldan bzhin// snyan par smra byed des smras pa// mgon po khro bas bdag la ni// log pa'i dogs pa bgyir mi 'os// mdza' bas mnyes gshin sems kyis// 
187b4(mdo 'grel): ni// tshig gi mda' lhung mi bzod do// khyod ni lha nyid du shes la// gal te bdag gi yid dag na// bden pa de yis khyod kyi mig/ cig ni snang ba ldan gyur cig/ ces pas snying stobs ldan ma des// brjod 
187b5(mdo 'grel): myur bar de yis spyan// rab rgyas pad+ma'i rnam pa can// gcig ni dri med nyid du gyur// de yi bden pa'i mthu yis ni// ya mtshan chen po yang dag skyes// bden pa'i yid ches spro ldan pas// byas shes kyis// 
187b6(mdo 'grel): ni de la smras// spun zla byas mi shes de yis// mig gnyis dag ni phyung gyur pa'i// gnod pa de la bdag la ni// khon nam rnam 'gyur ma skyes na// bden pa de yis gnyis pa yis// mig kyang rnal du gnas gyur// 
187b7(mdo 'grel): cig/ ces brjod de yis skad cig la// de ni gsal ba'i mig gis mtshan// de nas byung ba'i mtha' bshad pa'i// byas shes bdag por 'os pa ni// skye bo dge ma rab mgubs// song nas pa la nges par/ 
187b8(mdo 'grel): bshad// de nas de ni gyos po yis// rin chen glang po rta yis mchod// dpal dang bzhin du mdzes ma dang // lhan cig yab kyi grong khyer song // zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te// rab tu mgu ba'i pha yis 
188a1(mdo 'grel): der// skal bzang skye bo rdzas chags pa// rgyal tsha ba dag gi gnas la bkod// ngo tsha med pa byas mi shes// de la rab tu dang ba'i g.yos// zhabs la gtugs te de la ni// 'khu ba'i bsam 
188a2(mdo 'grel): pas yang dag 'ongs// sgyu yis de ni bsad 'dod pa'i// gya gyu'i bsam pa ldan pa de// kyi hud ba dag bsregs bdag bsregs zhes// brjod pa kho nas dmyal bar ltung // de nyid lhas byin 'di yin te// byas shes// / 
188a3(mdo 'grel): de yang nga nyid do// skye ba gzhan du rjes 'brel bas// 'di yi sdang ba yong mi zlog/ de ltar kun mkhyen gyis gsungs lhas byin gyi ni spyod pa de// yongs su gdung ba byed pa rab mang dang ldan zhing // skye ba gzhan du 
188a4(mdo 'grel): nyebar bsags pa'i sdig pa rjes 'brel ba// dge slong tshogs kyis thos nas yid ni byung ba bzhin du gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri 
188a5(mdo 'grel): shing las// byas shes kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // stong stobs che ba sten yid ni sbyin la gcig tu nges rnams kyi// spro dang mchod dang yon tan longs spyod 'byor pa
188a6(mdo 'grel): skyed byed pa// sngon gyi bsod nams bsags pa las byung dge ba mngon brjod pa'i// dpag bsam shing ni nges par dus su ma tshang med 'bras skyed// bcom ldan rgyal ba mnyan yod na// sa bdag ko sa la 
188a7(mdo 'grel): dbang gi/ skyed tshal mchog na dge slong gi/ tshegs dang thabs cig sngon bzhugs tshe// thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba// srid pa zil gnon mchog gi chos// 'jig rten gsum po dge ba la// sbyor ba de yis 
188a8(mdo 'grel): rab tu bstan// skabs der klu yi rgyal po'i bu// rgya mtsho dag tu gnas pa bzhi// stobs dang shin tu stobs dang ni// dbugs dang dbugs chen zhes bya ba// sring mo mngon dga' zhes pa yis// bskul 
188b1(mdo 'grel): nas de dag mnyam du ni// bde gshegs kyis gsungs dam pa'i chos// mchog gi bdud rtsi nyan du 'ongs// sngon gyi dus na bcom ldan 'das// blo bzang 'khor ba 'jig dang ni// gser thub ces ni bya ba dang // de bzhin 
188b2(mdo 'grel): dgra bcom 'od srung la// nyan du sring mos bskul gyur kyang // dpal gyi bder chags 'ongs ma gyur// de dag bsod nams yongs smin nas// shAkya thub pa'i mngon du 'ongs// de dag mi yi lus bsgrubs te// 
188b3(mdo 'grel): ston pa la ni phyag 'tshal nas// zhabs la mgo yis gtugs byas te// 'khor der nye bar 'dug pa'i tshe// gsal rgyal ko sa la yi dbang // dpal 'byor rgyags 'dzum mdzes pa yis// gdugs dang rnga yab
188b4(mdo 'grel): bzlog nas ni// dam chos nyan du yang dag 'ongs// ston pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal slad// tshogs su zhugs pa de la ni// mi yi bdag la gus pa las// kun gyi btud cing go skabs phye// rigs gnas bla ma 
188b5(mdo 'grel): mi rnams kyis// mngon par dga' bar byas de la// klu yi rgyal po'i bu rnams kyis// go skabs bkur stir byas ma gyur// de dag dregs pas khengs pa dang // rgyal ba la ni gus pas kyang // khengs ldan mi
188b6(mdo 'grel): bdag khro ba ni// nang du rab tu bsgribs par gyur// de yis rang gi 'khor la ni// 'gro tshe sngon du de dag rnams// tshar bcad brda yis bsgos byas nas// rnam par med pa bzhin du gyur// bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen 
188b7(mdo 'grel): pas kyang // de yi nges pa mkhyen gyur nas// 'jug tu 'dzum mdzad rab gsungs pa// yid kyi me long dri ma can// snang ba'i rdul gyis gang ba la// chos ni nye bar bstan pa yis// gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa mdzes 
188b8(mdo 'grel): ma yin// mnyam pa nyid dang bral zhing khro dang rmongs pas bcom rnams la// nyer bstan gyis ni dge ba'i cha shas chung ngu'ang yong mi byed// gang phyir blo gros blun po rnams kyi rab mang skyon ldan lus// dag pas dman// 
189a1(mdo 'grel): pa dag la sman ni sman nyid mi 'gyur ro// zhes pa bcom ldan rigs pa yis// phan pa gsung ba thos gyur kyang // klu rnams la ni sdang ba'i yis// sa yi bdag pos btang ma gyur// 
189a2(mdo 'grel): de nas bcom ldan la btud nas// me bdag rang gi gnas sor tshe// de yi dpur gis la me bkag pas// klu rnams mkha' yilam nas song // khyim du de dag gis bsams te// sa bdag gzhom pa'i dus byas nas 
189a3(mdo 'grel): 'jigs rung sba spogs sprin gyis tshogs// sna ba 'joms pas yang dag 'ongs// de dag rtsol ba kun mkhyen gyis// mkhyen nas sa yi bdag po yis// phyogs su lhur zhing bsrung bzod pa// mod+gal gyi bul 
189a4(mdo 'grel): bskos// de nas klu yi tshogs rnams kyis// rdo rje'i char chen rab spros pa// de yi mthu yis sa bdag la// me tog char pa nyid du gyur// da nas de dag gis mtshon dang // rdo yi char drag bzod dka' phab/ 
189a5(mdo 'grel): mornal gyi bu yis brtags pa las// rgyal po la 'os zas nyid gyur// de yi mthu la sa gdengs can rnams// spro ba nyams nas song ba'i tshe// 'tshe ba dang bral me yi bdag/ song nas bde gshegs la phyag 
189a6(mdo 'grel): 'tshal// rgyal ba'i bka' las mau ng+gal bu// de yi longs spyod phun tshogs kyis// gus pas legs sbyar skal ba bzang // rigs pa nyid du mchod par byas// de nas mthor sil 'os pa'i// sa bdag 'byor 
189a7(mdo 'grel): mthong dge slong gis// thal mo sbyar nas kun mkhyen la// dge mtshan 'bebs las rab tu zhus// bcom ldan bsod nams ci zhig gi/ mthu yis rgyal po gsal rgyal ni// longs spyod kun gyis rnam mdzes// 
189a8(mdo 'grel): ba'i// rab kyis rgyal srid chen po thob// 'di la rtag tu sa la yaM// sdong po bung shing sdong bur gyur// lha yi bza' btung phun sum tshogs// de dag las ni gang gi 'bras// dge slong gus pas dris pa 'di// bcom 
189b1(mdo 'grel): ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa// rgyal po'i longs spyod phun tshogs kyis// rgyu ni rab tu mnyan par gyis// ko sa la yi ljongs 'di ru// bur shing zhing pa dum bu zhes// bya bas rang sangs rgyas la sngon// bur
189b2(mdo 'grel): chu dang ni zas dag byin// de yi bsod nams rnams dang ni// bur chu zan dag gsol ba des// rlung nad kyis nyen rang sangs rgyas// rab dang dri med nyid du gyur// bur shir zhing pa bsod nams can// de ni rgyal po 
189b3(mdo 'grel): gsal rgyal 'di// bsod nams de yi mthu yis ni// longs spyod skal ldan rnam par mdzes// byas shes rnams la phan pa dang // gdug sems can la gnod pa dang // dam pa rnams la legs byas ni// 
189b4(mdo 'grel): chung yang chung ngu nyid min 'gyur// sa bdag sngon gyi bsod nam sa 'di// kun mkhyen gyis ni gsungs pa'i tshe// legs byas mchog tu gyur pa las// dge slong ngo mtshar g.yo med gyur// de nas bcom/ 
189b5(mdo 'grel): ldan la gus pas// rgyal pos lhag par gnas byas nas// longs spyod phun tshegs lha la 'os// de de rang gis nye bar bkod// mchog tu mdzes pa'i rim gro yis// mchod degasar gyi khrel ni// bder 
189b6(mdo 'grel): bzhugs de bzhin gshegs pa la// mi yi mgon pos rab smras pa// bcom ldan khyod la gus pa yis// legs byas dpal ni rnam rgyas pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yis// bdag ni grol 
189b7(mdo 'grel): g+hur srid lags sam// bsod nams rdzogs pa'i rgyal ba can// sa yi bdag po gus pas 'di// dris la bde bar gshegs pa yis// 'dzum dkar snang ba spro zhing gsungs// rgyal po 'khor ba
189b8(mdo 'grel): ngag gi lam// thog mtha' med par 'jug pa 'di// nyon mongs kun zad ma thob par// skyes bus bde bar ji ltar 'god// yun rings yongs 'dres 'khor lo skor bzhin rgyun tu 'od dang 'gro ba yis/ 
190a1(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin gyis zab 'khor ba 'di la bde blag 'god par mi nus te// sbyor ba goms pa med cing las rnams nges par zad pa min par ni// rgyu che 'bras bu gsal ba'i chos kyang 'di ni 'ching 
190a2(mdo 'grel): banyid dugyur// sbyin la goms pa chen po yis// kun las rnam par log gyur pa// bdag kyang sa la skye ba bzung // chos kyis 'khor ba nyid du gyur// nor can zhes bya nor dang ldan// ba rat+na ser sngon byung gyur/ 
190a3(mdo 'grel): gdung ba'i phrog cing 'bras bu rgyas// slong ba rnams kyi grib shing bzhin// mu ges 'jig rten brlag gyur cing // mi bzad nyon mongs kyis 'khrugs tshe// rang sangs rgyas ni lnga brgya yis// de la 'tsho ba bsangs 
190a4(mdo 'grel): bar gyur// mi chung dpal des ba ba yi// 'ang bdag la bgros de dag la// mchog tu longs spyod 'os pa'i zas// mu ge dag gi mthar thug sbyar// de yi khyim du gsol ba la// brgya phrag lnga ni tshogs 
190a5(mdo 'grel): gyur te// de nas rim gyis rang sangs rgyas// stong phrag gnyis ni byung bar gyur// skyes tshe 'bras bu'i dpal thob pa// bsod nams btab pa de yis ni// mu ge'i sbyin pas de yi mdzod// zad kyi nyen mongs 
190a6(mdo 'grel): zad ma gyur// bde ba rgyud pa bsod nams kyis// spyad nas nor can de nyid ni// nga yin zhi ba mchog gis 'dir// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsten// 'khor ba'i las dang 'bras bu 'jug pa 'di// 
190a7(mdo 'grel): 'ching byed thag pa dkar dang dkar min ni// bsod nams sdig pa dag gis rnam par bcings// de zad pa la thar pa'i gnas zhes brjod// de ltar rmongs pa zad pas thar par ni// rgyal bas gsungs pas 
190a8(mdo 'grel): dbang gis thos nas// nyon mongs mdza' bos zhi ba kho nar nges// bsod nams mngon pa'i dargyal lhod par byas// zhes padag pa'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa 
190b1(mdo 'grel): dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ sa li sdong bu'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// / rang don la 'jug chags pa dang bral zhing // gzhan la phan par rtag tu brtson rnams kyi// 
190b2(mdo 'grel): grub pa nyon mongs rnams la mi 'jigs shing // gdung dang bgegs bral gzir byed min par gyur// mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal du sngon// bzhugs pa bcom ldan rgyal ba yis// chos 'chad pa yi zhar la ni// 
190b3(mdo 'grel): dge slong tshogs la bka' stsal pa// sa bdag sa rnams kun gyi bdag/ don grub ces pa legs byas ldan// sa sbyor kun gyi mgo bo la// bka' ni rnam par rtse bar gyur// chu yaM gter la gnas gyur pa// 
190b4(mdo 'grel): rgya mtsho zhes pa klu yi bu// don kun grub pas bdag ni// de yi bu nyid dag tu gyur// snying stobs rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od// skal bzar byang chub sems dpa' de// skyes pa tsam gyi sa gzhi ni// rang gi 'od kyis
190b5(mdo 'grel): rgyas par byas// de ni che bar skyes gyur pa'i// grags pa lha rnams kyis mchod pa// srid pa mtha' dag khyab pa ni// chos kyi bzhin du yang dag rgyas// skyed tshal mchog tu dar ma de// mdun du lha rnams kyis 
190b6(mdo 'grel): sprul pa'i// skyes bu rgan po mthong bar gyur// rga bas 'khogs pa de mthong nas// chags bral gyi ni bag chags sad// 'khor ba bzhin du lus dag ni// snying po med par de yis bsams// bskyed tshal// 
190b7(mdo 'grel): lta ba'i chags bral te// dal gyis log nas 'ong ba de// lam du dbul ba rjid gyis ni// mdzes bral phongs par gyur pa mthong // snying rjes drangs pa'i yid can des// bde med nyon mongs de mthong nas// bsams// / 
190b8(mdo 'grel): pa sa la dbul po rnams// kye ma sdug bsngal bzod par byed// rin chen gyis gar sa gzhin// gzhan las blangs pas nyer 'tsho zhing // phongs gyur 'di dag sdug bsngal ni// sbyin pa min las skyes par 
191a1(mdo 'grel): smra// skyes bu bkren pa 'di dag rnams// skyes bu gzhan la slong ba gang // 'di nyid kho ni mi bslu bar// sdig pa'i las rnams dag gis rtags// gnas dang gnas su rmad gyur cing // 
191a2(mdo 'grel): 'di dge slong bas yid byung la// bslangs par gyur kyang bkres pa na// kye ma 'di dag nyes byas nyid// de ltar yun rings bsams byas nas// kun gyi nyon mongs gzhom brtson pas// 'gro ba dbul min bya 
191a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i slad// rin chen don gnyer rgya mtshor song // pa yis ci zhig ltar bsten nyid// rjes gnang nges pa brtan pa de// gzings la yang dag zhon byas nas// rin chen gling du phyin par gyur// der ni tshong dpon 
191a4(mdo 'grel): gzings dag la// zhon nas lhan cig 'ongs rnams la// de yis smras pa khyed cag rnams// rin chen 'dod pa bsdu bar mdzod// thun mong rin chen 'di dag gis// bdag la dgos pa yod ma yin// 
191a5(mdo 'grel): bdag cag mdzod na rin chen mchog/ 'dod dang ldan pa mang po yod// 'on kyang yid bzhin nor thob slad// bdag gi rtsom pa chen po 'di// de yis ni dbul ba nyid// nyams pa dag tu bya bar 'dod// 
191a6(mdo 'grel): rgya mtsho zhes bya klu yi rgyal// chu gter che la rab tu gnas// bsams pa'i don ster nor bu ni// de khyim na yod bdag gis thos// mi bzad lam ni 'grod pa ste// bdag ni de nyid len du 'gro// brtan pa'i grogs 
191a7(mdo 'grel): ldan 'bad rtsol dang // ldan pa rnams la 'grod dka' med// bdag gis legs byas rtsom pa 'di// gal te 'thob na bden nyid du// bdag dang bral bas khyed cag rnams// ci yang gdung bar mi 'gyur ro// 
191a8(mdo 'grel): zhes brjod de dag la bzlas nas// snying stobs ldan pa rgyal po'i bu// chen po'i bstan pa la brten nas// nges pa brtan pas rab tu zhugs// de yis chu yi lam dag nas// long bu tsam la nyin bdun phyin// 
191b1(mdo 'grel): pus nub tsam la nyin bdun dang // skyes bu tsam la nyin bdun te// de nas zhag ni bdun pa bzhi// glang mo'i tshad kyi chu dag la// phyin nas mdun du so dug can// 'jigs rung mthong ba dug can mthong // de nas 
191b2(mdo 'grel): byams ldan yid kyis ni// de dag dug med byas nas des// khro bas 'khrugs pa'i gnod sbyin gyis// gang ba'i gnod sbyin gling du phyin// der ni byams ldan yid dag gis// de dag khro dang bral bar 
191b3(mdo 'grel): bsgrubs// spro ba yangs pa sa ye mtshan pa// de dag gis bshad thos gyur te// gzhon nu'i snying stobs rgyas pa dang // brtson 'gus spro ba 'di yis ni// klu yi rgyal po'i khang pa ru// khyod nyid 
191b4(mdo 'grel): bzhed pa 'thob par 'gyur// dus kyis khyod ni thams cad mkhyen// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gyur// bdag cag rnams kyang khyod nyid kyi// rjes 'brang nyan thos dag tu gyur// de dag dang bas 'di 
191b5(mdo 'grel): brjod de// mngon par dga' ba'i mi bdag bu// srin po rnams kyis khengs gyur pa// nyam nga srin po'i gling du phyin// rnam 'gyur gdug bral de dag gis// de bzhin nyid du mchod nas de// dpung pas blangs te// 
191b6(mdo 'grel): skad cig gis// klu yi dbang po'i khang par 'phangs// lha yi dga' ba de la 'os pa'o// snang ba 'byor ldan der ni des// sdug bsngal chen pos gzir byas pa'i// tshe de'i sgra ni thos par gyur// de yis de 
191b7(mdo 'grel): thos chags bral can// rang bzhin brtse bas brlan pa'i blos// mdun du klu yis bu mo dag/ mthong nas 'di dag ci zhes dris// yang yang mya ngan la chags pa'i// dro ba gsal byed shugs rings 
191b8(mdo 'grel): kyis// bim pa'i mchu 'dam mdzes pa dag/ dri mar byed des de la smras// yon tan ldan pa pad+mo'i spyan// klu yi rgyal po dag gi bu// thu bo don kun grub ces pa// gces pa lnga pa nyid du gyur// 
192a1(mdo 'grel): de yi sdug bsngal dag gis ni// kun dga' dang bral ba de dga' spangs// khang pa 'dir ni tshe dag/ stug po nyid kyis gnas par byas// shes pa de yi tshig thos nas// rang yul 
192a2(mdo 'grel): mthong bas dga' ba des// nang du yongs 'dris 'dzin byed cing // klu yi rgyal po'i drung du phyin// rgyal po'i drung phyin dga' ma dang // bcas pas de 'os yongs shes nas// bu cig tshur shog tshur shog 
192a3(mdo 'grel): ces// brjod cing kun dga' 'khrugs par gyur// mi yi skye bo'i gtam dang ni// rang nyid 'ong ba'i rgyu dag kyang // de yis bshad pa thos gyur nas// klu yis yongs 'khyud de la smras// bu gcig yid
192a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin nor bu 'di// bdag gi mgo bo nyid kyis rgyan// long zhig khyod kyi brtag pa ni// 'bras med byed par mi spro'o// 'gro ba'i bya ba byas nas 'di// khyod kyis bdag la slar sbyin bya// zhes brjod gtsug
192a5(mdo 'grel): gi rin chen mchog/ de yis bkrol nas de la byin// yid bzhin nor bu nyi ma'i 'od// yang dag blangs nas gzhon nu ni// dga' bas klu dbang la btud de// gzings dang nye ba dag tu song // de yi gtam thos 
192a6(mdo 'grel): rgya mtsho yis// lha yi sa der ni de mthong nas// dge ba khyod kyis thob pa yis// yid bzhin nor bu ci 'dra smos// de yis gsal bar 'di brjod tshe// zol med bsam pa drang po des// lag pa'i pad+ma 
192a7(mdo 'grel): rab gdengs nas// yid bzhin gyi ni nor bu bstan// rin chen mchog de des mthong nas// phrag dog dri ma'i bsam pa yis// de yis lag la lag pa yis// thal mo sa bsnun nas chu ga ter dor// 
192a8(mdo 'grel): shin tu dga' bas bsgrubs pa yis// rin chen rgya mtshor lhung mthong nas// rtsom pa brtan pa 'bras med pa'i// mya ngan g.yo med des smras pa// yon tan la 'os rnam pa can// mdza' bas 'jam 
192b1(mdo 'grel): par smra byed pa// kye ma sdang bas sdig pa'i las// byas pas khyod ni mdzes ma yin// gang zhig pha rol khyad 'phags la// 'gran dang mya ngan nyon mongs gyur// de la phyogs ni 'di dag rnams// 
192b2(mdo 'grel): bsil yang 'ab bas dkrigs par gyur// gang zhig gzhan gyi spo bas mgu// snying stobs chu gter chen po de// grags pa ga pur ltar dkar ba// 'jig rten gsum gyi thig le 'dzin/ 
192b3(mdo 'grel): lha dag bdag gi rin chen stsol// sdig pa 'di dang bral bar mdzod// dam pa rnams kyi las dag ni// smad pa dang ni mtshungs mi 'gyur// chags sam bag med sdang ba la// gal te rin chen mi 
192b4(mdo 'grel): stsal na// de lta na ni khyed kyi gnas// chu gter 'di ni bdag gis bskam// zhes pa lan mang des smras kyang // gang tshe rin chen des mabyin// de tshe rang gi mthu yis de// chu gter bskam phyir rab tu
