192b5(mdo 'grel): zhugs// mig stong ldan pa'i tshig gis ni// bai shra karma sa sprul ba'i snod // bsams pa tsam gyis de yi ni// lag tu 'phral la byung bar gyur// bskam par brtson des ri byi yi// chu gter 
192b6(mdo 'grel): dag las chu blangs nas// bar snang la ni rab tu gtor// shin tu rmad byung byed pa des// chu gter sum cha lhag byas te// lha rnams kyis ni smras pa yis// 'jigs nas lha yis nor bu byin// 
192b7(mdo 'grel): rin chen rnams bzhin bdag nyid che// sngags rnams dang ni dka' thub kyang // zol med gzi byin che rnams kyis// mthu yis de nyid su yi rig/ rin chen 'byung gnas rab rgyas pha rol med 
192b8(mdo 'grel): pa de srid chu yis dkrigs gyur cing // byed po'i bde blag stobs las dpa' rlabs phreng bas mkha' la 'gong pa nyid du thos// dam pa rnams kyi mthu ni chen po'i bdag nyid gzhal med ci yang zab pa ste/ 
193a1(mdo 'grel): ya mtshan gnas gang bsam pa'i cho ga dag la blo ni mtha' ru rgyal bar byed// de nas yid bzhin nor thob ste// rang gi don mthun dang 'grogs nas// re ba rdzogs pa rgyal po'i bu// 
193a2(mdo 'grel): rlung gis grong khyer dag tu phyin// rab tu mgu ba'i pha yis der// mchod cing bya ba byas pa des// rgyal mtshan rtsel rin chen btags// skye bo'i mdun sar rab smras pa// gal te 'gar yang 
193a3(mdo 'grel): bdag 'bad 'di// gzhan don kho na bdag don min// bden pa de yis 'jig rten 'di// thams cad dbul med nyid gyur cig/ dman la brtse ldan snying stobs kyis// gter des de skad brjod pa/ 
193a4(mdo 'grel): na// rin chen char ba mtha' med ni// sa gzhi dag la bab par gyur// phyogs rnams kun tu rin chen tshogs// 'od dang ldan pa de yis ni// skye bo dbul ba'i rang bzhin gyi// mun pa lhag med 
193a5(mdo 'grel): nyid du gyur// re ba'i zhabs ldan stobs kyis dpal ldan rnams kyi khang mdun phyi rol dag tu 'jug/ sgo bas bsdigs ldan yang yang rnam par g.yo zhing sgo yi khongs su nyen gyur la// shugs 
193a6(mdo 'grel): rings dang ldan mya ngan dag gis 'gyel zhing lus ni 'jig par 'dod gyur pa// bkren pa rnams la nor bu'i phung po 'od zer drang po'i dpal tshogs ci yang byung // 'jig rten phongs dang bral ba'i nyin dang / 
193a7(mdo 'grel): bral zhing yid bzhin nor bu yang // de yi bka' las lto 'phye'i 'dren pa nyid du gyur pa'i tshe// kun tu sbyin pa la zhe na skye bo dag gi sems rnams ni// slong ba'i don mthun kun dang bral bas 'khrugs pa// 
193a8(mdo 'grel): nyid du gyur// don kun grub pas sa skyor sras por ni// gang gyur de nyi dang yin lus gzhan 'dir// zhes pa'i sngon byung rgyal bas gsungs thos nas// dge slong de dag de nyid sems par gyur// ces pa/ 
193b1(mdo 'grel): dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// don kun grub pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// @// nu ma 
193b2(mdo 'grel): mngon dga' glang chen myos bum mtho// ga pur do shal rab tu rtse dga' dgod// daral bab pa'i na chung 'byor pa yang // bsod nams byas pa rnams la dga' ster yin// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 
193b3(mdo 'grel): 'das// mnyan yod nags na rgyu ba'i tshe// dpal ldan khyim gyi bdag po sngon// legs par rab sad ces pa byung // shin tu sdug pa de yi bu// glang po can zhes bya bar gyur// sngon pa sbubs bsod nams 
193b4(mdo 'grel): dag gi tshogs// rnam pa dag dang bcas pa bzhin// de ni skyes pa'i zhen par la// rab mchog glang po chen po ni// gser gyi rang bzhin skyes gyur te// ngo mtshar tshogs ni gcig gyur bzhin// glang dbang de dang 
193b5(mdo 'grel): gzhon nu dang // de yi pa yi re ba dang // 'jig rten ltad mo mdzod rnams kyang // mtshungs pa nyid du gang bar gyur// ri bong can bzhin byis pade// dus la sgyu rtsal chags gnas gyur// 'jig rten kun gyi mig gi 
193b6(mdo 'grel): gnyen// 'od zer ldan zhing rab tu mdzes// dal gyis de ni kho lag rdzogs// dpur pa'i ka bas rnam par brgyan// yid las byung ba rtsom pa'i gnas// lar tsho gsar pa thob par gyur// de nas nam zhig de yis// 
193b7(mdo 'grel): ni// sa yi bdag po gsal rgyal gyi// bu mo'i lus kyi chos gos kyi// rtags dang lhan ces rnam mdzes ma// tshes gos bu mo zhes bya ba// mdzes shing yid 'ong bzhin ras can// mig yangs gzhon nu ma 
193b8(mdo 'grel): dag ni// skyed tshal lta ru 'ong ba mthong // nyams pa med pa'i gzugs ldan zhing // mdzes ma mi dman de mthong nas// de ni 'phral la ya mtshan dang // 'dod pa'i dbang du ya mtshan gyur// de bsams kye ma lus// 
194a1(mdo 'grel): 'di ni// shin tu rmad byung mdzes pa ste// skyon thal dri med ri bong can// gang du bzhin gyi zol gyis mdzes// gzugs can mchu ni ban+d+ha ka gnyen yid 'od rang bzhin can/ 
194a2(mdo 'grel): 'di ni do zla med pa'i mdzes sdug rnam par 'dzin byed cing // rlan ldan b+hu ru'i yal 'dab dag la 'khu bar brtson pa dang // bim pa'i 'od kyi rnam 'phrul dag ni 'phral la'i bras med byed// ri bong 'dzin pa'i rgyags 
194a3(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin gyis mi bzod mdzes pas bdud rtsi dman byed cing // ut+pal rab tu rgyas pa'i nags tshal 'od ni mig gis rab tu nyams par byed// yid srubs 'grogs 'os lus can 'di yi 'jo sgeg 'gran zla dag/ 
194a4(mdo 'grel): la 'jigs ster ba// dga' mo'i rol rtsod dpa' rlabs dag ni 'phral la nyid du sems par byed dam snum// kye ma gang gi 'o ma 'dzin bzung ni rab kyis su mkhregs dben pa nyams// skyon gyi rang bzhin yin yang 
194a5(mdo 'grel): yon tan ldan pa'i do shal dag gis gnas par byas// bzhin 'di la yang bung ba'i phreng rnams chu skyes tho yis nye ba bsten pa dang // g.yo ldan mig gi 'dren byed thub pa'i yid kyang ci yang chags shing nyams 
194a6(mdo 'grel): par byed// de ltar sems pa de yi lus// me tog mda' can lta bu dag/ mthong nas sa bdag bu mo na// ngo mtshar g.yo ba med par gyur// dran pa 'dzum par byed pa yis// de yi ngo tsha'i gos phrogs te// 
194a7(mdo 'grel): gsar du spru la dgyes pa yis// lus ni gsal bar mthong ma gyur// mngon 'dod gsar pas bkag gyur kyang // steHsa pa yi saM ni phyir bzlog ste// yid ni de nyid la bzhag nas// de ni stong bzhin 
194a8(mdo 'grel): dal gyis song // rgyal po'i pho brang phyin gyur nas// ngo tsha ya mtshan yid srubs kyis// zum pa bzhin dang zhum pa bzhin// bcom pa bzhin du degyur to// gzhon nu yang ni rang khyim du// yid las 
194b1(mdo 'grel): byung ba yang dag rgyas// mdun du zla bzhin ma de nyid// kun tu rtogs pas yang yang bris// de yis yid kyi nor mchog de// 'dod pa'i rig pa bzhin dran zhing // 'khor los sgyur ba'i bu mo bzhin// rnyed/ 
194b2(mdo 'grel): par dka' bar shes nas bsam sa// skye ba gzhan la gang gi lus// yun ring dka' thub yongs 'dris pa// skal ldan de yi legs byas kyis// shing gi 'khri shing de 'thob 'gyur// dga' ba rab sbyin 
194b3(mdo 'grel): bsod nams kyis// de mthong ba ni thob gyur te// gang zhig de 'grogs 'bras ldan pa'i// bsod nams de dag yod mi shes// de yi bzhin ras bsil ba'i zer ldan dran pas dga' ba dang // de yang rnyed dka' 
194b4(mdo 'grel): nyid kyis 'bral ba'i gdung ba dag gi bdag/ brtan pa 'di ci rmongs 'di ci zhig 'tshel bar ni ci// srog dang ldan cig rnam par 'bral lam ci yin yongs mi shes// de gdong chu skyes dag gis 'phral la bcom 
194b5(mdo 'grel): pas mtshan mo'i yid 'ang nyams pa bsten// de yis smin ma'i rnam 'phrul dag la ngo tsha yid srubs gzhu ni gugs par gyur// yid 'ong yal ga mdangs 'brogs de yi mchu sgros dmar ba dag gis gzig 
194b6(mdo 'grel): gyur te// chags bral nyid thob bim pa dag ni nags kyi sa la yang dag bsten nam snyam// de ltar zla nya'i bzhin ras can// bzhin la bsam gtan g.yo med kyis// gnyid kyis phrag dog can gyis bzhin/ 
194b7(mdo 'grel): btang ba de yis mtshan mo 'das// mdzes ma mthong bar gyur pa'i mtha'// de na de yis bshad bdag/ pa yis thos nas de yi sa ni// bsam pa 'a bos shing yongs 'dres gyur// de la de smras 
194b8(mdo 'grel): bdag cag bu// rgyal po'i grong khyer gnas pa'ang min// 'khor los sgyur de bu men// khyod la ji ltar ster bar 'gyur// mkhas pa bkur ba 'dod pa rnams// maM nus pa nyid byed ma yin// rnyed par dka' ba 
195a1(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa yin// mi bden pa ni smra ma yin// 'khri shing tsuta tsam pa ka/ rang dbang rnams la mi gus par// yongs 'du'i 'khri shing sems pa na// rkang drug pa nyid skam 
195a2(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur// gal te khyod dang de gnyis kyang // skye ba snga mar 'brel ba sgrubs na// de yi 'bras bu 'bad med du// nges pa kho nar rgyas par 'gyur// re ba'i zhags pas ma bkug cing // rtog 
195a3(mdo 'grel): dpyod dag gis ma gzir la// 'bad pa'i khur gyis ma ngal bar// nges par myong bya 'grub par 'gyur// zhes pa pha yi tshig thos nas// de de bzhin zhes rnam bsams te// sems ni mdzes// 
195a4(mdo 'grel): mas gzung ba dag/ slar yang bzlog par des ma nus// de song gser gyi glang po la// rgyal la gsar du phrad pa yis// dga' bar 'os phrad skyes su naM// gser gyi mche ba zung dag blangs// 
195a5(mdo 'grel): de nas lag ldan bsod nams kyis// mdza' bas byin pa'i mche bzung // gser gyi rang bzhin khyer nas de// sa yi bdag po lta ru sor// de yis rin chen gyis mdzes pa'i// sa yi 
195a6(mdo 'grel): bdag po'i khang par phyin// nang zhugs rab btung mdza' ba'i slad// gser gyi sa mche ba gnyis po byin// rgyal po rab tu dang ba yis// yon tan gyis grags dga' bar byas// mchog ni 
195a7(mdo 'grel): long zhes brjod gyur kyang // de yis ci yang blangs ma gyur// mdzes pa dman min de la ni// rgyal po sa lhag par bkur ba byas// rigs shing mdzes pa'i dpyod pa can// chags pa med la su 
195a8(mdo 'grel): mi dga'// rtag tu rgyal la phrad tshe des// gsar dus ldan la skyes pa// gser gyi rang bzhin mche ba rnams// dga' ba'i slad du rab tu phyin// yid rab dang ba'i pho nyan// bzhin ras mdzes 
195b1(mdo 'grel): pa 'dzin byed cing // bsten pa'i mdza' btsugs kyis bsdams pa'i// sa sbyong gis ni de la spras// rab mngag ser tshogs gling pa yis// bsten 'di bdag gis yong mi bzod// gang phyir 
195b2(mdo 'grel): grong khyer pa yi tshogs// sa bdag rnams kyis rgyas bya nyid// skye bos bgos skal phul ba yi// gser gyi dga' ba bdag la ci// rin chen yon tan khyod kyi ni// gzugs 'di nyid la bdag dag // 
195b3(mdo 'grel): gser dang rin chen rdo ba'i tshogs// mdzod rnams na gnas rgyal po ni// rgyar du 'os pa'i skyes bu dag/ rin chen rnams la chags na mdzes// khyod la 'dod pa'i mchog dag ni// bdag gis ci sbyin 
195b4(mdo 'grel): smra bar mdzod// ma lus mdzod ni byin gyur kyang // nges par bdag ni 'gyod mi 'gyur// rgyal po'i spyan zur lhung tsam gyis// gal te dpal 'byor ma thob na// don gnyer don med nyid gyur pas// sa 
195b5(mdo 'grel): bdag bsten pa'i don ni ci// de skadas sbyong gis smras tshe// gzhon nus thal mo sbyar byas nas// de la smras pas sbyor ba dag/ ster bar 'os pa gzhan pa su// mkhas pa rnams la rin chen ni// 
195b6(mdo 'grel): don du ma gnyer stsol mdzad pa// khyod kyi rgya mtsho'i grags pa ni// rab rgyas de dag rgya yi sa btab// rab tu sbyin pa chen pos kyang // re ba chen po khengs ma yin// chung ngu rnams kyis dbang phyug/ 
195b7(mdo 'grel): gang // de ni chen po'i dbul po nyid// 'on kyang gang gis nor slong ba// khyod kyi dpung pas bsrungs gyur cing // chos kyi lam gyi 'tsho ba yi// skye bo rnams la dbul po med// bdag kyang nor/ 
195b8(mdo 'grel): don gnyer ba min// sten par byed pa po yang min// nor ldan rnams la nor nyid nor// khengs ldan rnams la bkur ba nyid// dam pa'i dbang phyug bsten pas yon tan dag ni zum gyur pas// 
196a1(mdo 'grel): dam pa'i me tog rnams ni 'phral la rnying ba nyid gyur cing // slar yang bkren pa'i tshong gi ma du dman pas lhung gyur la// dam pa'i skye bo rnams ni reg pa tsam yang mi bzod do// dman 
196a2(mdo 'grel): zhing smad pa'i bdag nyid lus 'dzin rnams kyi slong ba nyid pas shi ba mchog/ slong ba mchog tu bkur sti 'os pa skye bo kun gyis smad pa dag gis gnas// ji srid don gnyer nyid thob rmongs pa'i mun par dbang
196a3(mdo 'grel): med 'jug cing 'bab byed pa// de srid yon ldan bum pa khron par 'jug las mchog tu thur du 'gro// phun tshogs thun mong nor ni zhing las tshong la rtag tu blo ldan rnams kyis 'thob// gal te chog shes med/ 
196a4(mdo 'grel): nagazhan pa ci zhig sa la gter rnams rgyas pa dang // phul blang rab dang gser dang dngul gyi bya ba de dag yod pa nyid// dga' dang 'grogs pa'i slad du lus ni g.yog gi rang bzhin du 'tshong su zhig 'dod 
196a5(mdo 'grel): ces pa blo gros ldan gzhan des// cho ga thos nas ni sa yi bdag/ gus dang bcas pas gzhan pa ni// cung zad blang bar mdzod ces smras// rigs shing brjod pa mkhas pa yi// rtsub mo la yang mi// / 
196a6(mdo 'grel): rnams dga'// bkren pa rnams kyi ngo stod ni// 'jam yang rna ba na ba'i rgyu// rgya cher yongs su tshim pa yi// rgyal pos mchog tu gsol btab des// de la smras pa gal te khyod// sim na bu mo 
196a7(mdo 'grel): bdag la stsol// des de brjod che mi bdag ni// bsam pa the tsham 'phyang mor gyur// nang par bdag smra zhes smras nas// skad cig sa gzhi dag la bltas// de nas gzhon nu btang nas des// blon po'i 
196a8(mdo 'grel): gtso bo la smras pa// rab dang gzu lums bdag gis ni// bya rog bzhin du g.yo ba byas// 'khor lo sbyor ba'i rigs 'khrungs pa'i// bu mo bsod nams zong la 'os// grang pa thun mong pa la ni// 
196b1(mdo 'grel): yon tan tsam gyis ji ltar sbyin// sbyin no zhes ni rab bsgrags nas// rjes su 'gyod pas gzir gyur pa'i// bden nor ldan par gyur pa bdag/ slong ba 'bras med ji ltar gyur// nang par mdun du de 'ongs// 
196b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i// bzhin ni bdag gis ji ltar blta// bdag la rnyed dka' des bslangs nas// mdza' yang mdza' min nyid du 'gyur// rang bzhin nyid kyis lus can rnams// nges par yon tan yongs rdzogs
196b3(mdo 'grel): kyang // ji srid bslar zhes ma brjod pa// de srid snyi du sdug pa yin// zhes pas sa bdag khyogs la ni// nges par brten pa'i tshig thos nas// blon po chen pos gnas skabs su// 'os pa bsams 
196b4(mdo 'grel): nas de la smras// rje bo dag gi blo gros rnams// bgros pa min par mthar thug cing // gsar du chags ldan gus pa dang // rang bzhin gzu lums ldan pa yin// sred ldan mi nus don gnyer bas// yon 
196b5(mdo 'grel): tan 'byung gnas bzhin du ni// rgyal po'i g.yog la rab zhugs des// gser gyi glang cher rnam par bcom// bu mo slong ba slar 'ongs tshe// khyod kyi dal bus 'di brjod bya// gser glang zhon te 'ongs 
196b6(mdo 'grel): pa na// bdag gi bu mo thob par 'gyur// de yis rang lag gis bsad nas// de la glang po ga la yod// de dang bral ba'i ngo tsha yis// slar 'ong bar ni mi 'gyur ro// zhes pa blon po'i tshig gis ni// 
196b7(mdo 'grel): nyin gzhan gzhon nu 'ongs pa la// lugs la brten pa'i mi bdag gis// mngon du phyogs te de nyid spras// gzhon nu yang ni khyim song nas// bag ma len 'ongs bkra shis kyis// gser gyi so gnyi 
196b8(mdo 'grel): la zhon te// rang gi me dang lhan cig 'ongs// gser gyi glang chen la zhon nas// 'ong ba de ni sa bdag gis// mthong nas ngo mtshar 'byor pa can// bsod nams ldan pa'i mchog tu shes// de nas rgyal 
197a1(mdo 'grel): pos dge mtshan las// glang po gser lus can de las// spro ba chen pos lhun po la// rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhin du zhon// sa skyong gis ni zhon pa'i tshe// glang po de ni mi g.yo zhing // sngon ni 
197a2(mdo 'grel): gzhon nus brgyan pa'i tshe// slar yang rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur// mi bdag gis de ltar shes shing // de yi mthu yis ya mtshan pas// bdag gi skal bzang zhes brjod cing // bu mo 'dod dpal de la ni// rin chen// 
197a3(mdo 'grel): bu mos skyes bu mchog/ ma nor mchod nas mi yi bdag/ spro dga' yang dag rgyas gyur pa// bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho bzhin du mdzes// de nas gzhon nus mdzes ma ni// blangs nas rang gi khyim song ste// lus med/ 
197a4(mdo 'grel): gzhu ni drangs pa yi// ngal ba 'bras bu yod par 'gyur// lang tshe gsar pa dang 'grogs te// 'byor pa rgya ches rtag tu de// gsar ba gsar ba dga' bar 'gyur// de nas nam zhig sa spyong ni// bya ba byas pa 
197a5(mdo 'grel): gsal rgyal gyis// bsod nams mthu ldan mag pa dag/ yid la gcags shing rab bsams pa// kye ma lha yi mthu 'di ni// gzhon nu dag la rab tu mthong // gang phyir thun mong bsod nams rnams// de 
197a6(mdo 'grel): ltar smin par 'gyur ba yin// rigs ni dpal 'byor khang bzang gzugs kyi dba' rlabs zla ba'i dregs pa 'phrog/ lang tsho longs spyod 'os dang yongs su 'dris pa'i yon tan rgyan gyi tshogs// grags pa bsod/ 
197a7(mdo 'grel): nams skyed tshal rab 'khrungs me tog rab tu bkram pa'i grogs// 'byor pa 'di ni yongs smin ci yi 'bras bu yin par yongs mi shes// dge mtshan yang dag skyes pa des// de ltar yun rings bsams 
197a8(mdo 'grel): nas ni// sangs rgyas lta ba la btags pa'i// yid kyi shing rta dag la 'dzegs// mag pa bu mo bos nas ni// blon po dag dang lhan cig tu// yid ni sngon du 'gro ba yis// bcom ldan 'das la lta ru so/ 
197b1(mdo 'grel): rgyal byed tshal ni mig lam du// gyur tshe bzhon pa yang dag btang // rkang pas nyer btud mi bdag gis// bcom ldan 'das la rnam par bltas// der btud de yi zhabs pad kyis// gtsug gi nor bus g.yo 
197b2(mdo 'grel): bdes// bu mo mag pa btud pa dag/ de la ming gis rnam par bshad// thams cad 'khod cing phyag 'tshal te// kun nas mgo bo dud pa'i tshe// bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pa la// thal mo sbyar nas rgyal 
197b3(mdo 'grel): pos dris// bcom ldan las ni ci zhig gis// gzhon nu blo ldan rnams kyi mchog/ yon tan tshogs ni rgyas pa 'di// gser gyi glang pos 'gro ba lags// 'di ni bag gsar bdag gi ni// bu mo gos// 
197b4(mdo 'grel): kyis mdzes ma 'di// bsod nams gang gi rnam smin gyis// srog las lhag par snying du sdug/ sa yi bdag pos 'di dris tshe// kun rig bcom ldan rgyal ba yis// der gsungs skyes bu'i 'byor pa 
197b5(mdo 'grel): rnams// sa bdag bsod nams dag las 'byung // 'jig rten na ni 'dod bya gang // mdzes paM gang dang rmad byung gang // de de bsod nams nyid las 'byung // bcom ldan pade gshegs rnam par gzigs/ 
197b6(mdo 'grel): dge slong dag dang lhan cig sngon// rgyal po gnyen ldan grong khyer du// 'jig rten la ni rtsebs rgyu// gnas skabs der ni khye'u zhig/ gzhon nu ma dang 'grogs nas ni// shing gi rang bzhin glang po byas// lam 
197b7(mdo 'grel): gyi mdun der rnam par rtse// bcomadzam bu na da'i 'od// pade 'dab rgyas pa'i rnam pa can// yid 'ong snying rje'i spyan ldan pa// bcom ldan byon pa de dag gis// mthong nas de la gus pargyus// rjes su 
197b8(mdo 'grel): chags pas mngon phyogs te// de la rtse cha glang po ni// phul nas mdun du btud de gnas// bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas kyang // de dag bsam pa mkhyen gyur nas// brtsibs shing gi glang po la// 
198a1(mdo 'grel): zhabs pa dag gis reg par mdzad// de nas de dag bcom ldan gyis// yang dag dang ba'i thugs kyis gzigs// phan tshun khye'u bu mo dag/ khyo shug tu ni smon lam byas// 
198a2(mdo 'grel): gser gyi glang po'i bzhon pa dag/ rigs dang mthu dang 'byor pa yis// bdag gis skye ba 'os gyur cig/ ces par gzhan nu'i blo gros gyur// bu mos bcom ldan chos gos ni// mdzes pa dang ldan 
198a3(mdo 'grel): mthong gyur nas// bdag gi skye bar chos gos dang // ldan par gyur cig ces pa bsams// de ni smon lam de dag gis// glang po can 'di nyid du skyes// chos gos bu mo 'di yang ni// lus ni chos gos/ 
198a4(mdo 'grel): kyis mtshan no// bde gshegs kyis gsungs byung tshul de// de ltangs bdag gis thos nas// cod pan de yi zhabs padal// reganas ring gi khang bar song // rgyal po ya mtshan can song tshe// 
198a5(mdo 'grel): gzhon nu chung mar bcas pa yis// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi// chos ni dag pa'i blo yis thos// de nas de dag chags bral skyes// 'khor ba'i bag chags nyams gyur cing // rab tu 
198a6(mdo 'grel): byung bas nyon mongs btul// dag pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// rgya che legs byas goms pa'i sbyor bas bsod nams bsten pa yi// skyes bu rnams ni chos 'dod don yang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ 
198a7(mdo 'grel): denas de 'bras mngon 'dod spyad nas gus bcas de dag rnams// sprin bral mkha' ltar mdzes pa'o zhi ba 'jug tu ston par byed// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa 
198a8(mdo 'grel): brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// glang po can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // gang zhig bde blag tu baspun mthu yi dba' rlabs rmad du byung ba'i phreng ba skye// 
198b1(mdo 'grel): snying stobs spro ba'i sa dang rang bzhin dri med ye shes gsal ba'i bsam pa can// de dag gis kyang sgrub byed rgyal po'i bka' yi spring yig las kyi phreng chags pa// bkra ba dag ni 'god par mi 'gyur dogs 
198b2(mdo 'grel): 'gram gya gyu chu bo'i gter gyis bzhin// de bzhin mnyan yod du ni 'phyar rnams kyi// rab tu bskul bar gyur pa'i bud med dag/ ston pa'i grags pa gzhon par brtson gyur pa// lus dang bcas pa dmyal 
198b3(mdo 'grel): bar lhung bar gyur// de nas dag byed rlung gi tshogs// yongs su 'phen byed dri med chu// rdzing bu gdung med ces bya ba// rin chen tshogs kyi them skas can// gser gyi pad tshogs ge sar gyis// 
198b4(mdo 'grel): rkang drug ser bar byed pa yis// be ng+ge'i khrir gnas bcom ldan 'das// dge slong rnams kyis yongs bskor ba// thams cad mkhyen pa las kyis rgyud// 'gom bya min par ston mdzad cing / 
198b5(mdo 'grel): rang las spyod pa rnam par bkra// gsung bar yang dag brtson par gyur// las ni chad pa'i gnas skabs der// bcom ldan gus la mnyan gshin pas// shA ri'i bu ni 'bod pa dag/ mod+gal bu la 
198b6(mdo 'grel): rab tu bsgos// bya rgod phung po'i ri gnas la// khab dang skud pas sbyar ma ni// bkra shis rdzogs par byed pa yi// shA ri'i bu yis de can byin// sor mo rings byas 'grub pa yi// las kyi mthu 
198b7(mdo 'grel): nyid ma yin pa// bya ba 'god pas 'jigs pa yis// myur dang bcas par de la smras// tshur shog tur shog mgyogs par ro// bcom ldan kun mkhyen rdzing bu ni// gdung ba med par dge slong la/ 
198b8(mdo 'grel): las ni nye bar ston par brtson// las la chags nas myur min zhing // thogs par gal te khyod sgrub na// rdzu 'phrul chen pos khyod blang bya// bdag gi stobs yangs blta bar byos// zhes pa 
199a1(mdo 'grel): de yi tshig thos nas// shA ri'i bu yis de la smras// re zhig bdag gi thu ba longs// de nas khyod stobs bdag gi shes// zhes spas bya rgod phung po yi// ri yi rtse la de yi btag/ 
199a2(mdo 'grel): mo rnal bu yis blangs pa yis// tshe na ri ni 'gul bar gyur// shA ri'i bu yis lhun po la// ri ni ltung bar 'jigs nas btags// de nas de yi blangs pa'i tshe// lha yi gnas kyang rnam par g.yos// 
199a3(mdo 'grel): de nas ston pa'i gdan gser gyi// bad tu nor bu'i rang bzhin la// shA ri'i bu yis de bzhin btags// pha rol nus med nyid du gyur// rdzu 'phrul rim pas maud+gal bu// shA ri'i bu yis pham byas pa// 
199a4(mdo 'grel): shin tu snga bar nges byin tshe// bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song // de dag rdzu 'phrul ches bskyod pas// klu ni dga' bo nyer dga' dag/ sa 'og nas ni rab 'thon te// 'jigs nas bcom ldan la phyag 
199a5(mdo 'grel): 'tshal// shA ri'i bu ni rgyal ba'i mthu// de nas dge slong rnams kyis dris// ye shes spyan ldan bcom ldan gyis// sngon byung dag ni rab gsungs pa// bA ra NA sir sngon byung ba// drang srong dung dang 
199a6(mdo 'grel): bris pa'o// de dag char dang char med ni// 'gal brjod phan tshun 'gran par gyur// de nas nam zhig dung khros pa'i// rkang pas ral pa la reg pa// bres pas der smras nyi shar tshe// khyod kyi mgo bo 
199a7(mdo 'grel): 'byed gyur gcig/ dung gis smras pa bdag tshig gis// nyin byed 'phyar bar ma gyur cig/ des 'di brjod che mdzes pa yi// 'gro ba mun pa dang bcas gyur// bris pas de la brtse ba yis// sa yi rang bzhin 
199a8(mdo 'grel): mgo bo byas// nyi ma shar tshe 'phral la ni// nor 'dzin dum du brgyar gyur to// skye ba gzhan la dung de ni// maud+gal gyi bu nyid gyur// bres pa shA ri'i bu 'di ste// de las de tshe'ang rgyal bar gyur// de dag gi ni 
199b1(mdo 'grel): sngon byung mtha'// 'di ni kun mkhyen gyis gsungs tshe// las kyi rgyud ni bkra ba de// slar yang thub pa rnams kyis dris// bcom ldan las ni gang dag gis// 'bras bu rmad byung 'byung ba 'di// ye shes 
199b2(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin khyod kyi yang // lus la gang gis reg par gyur// rdo ba'i zer mas khyod zhabs kyi// mthe bong snad pa ci yi snang// ser ldeng thur mas zhabs phug nas// rma dang bcas pa 'di ni ci// bsod snyoms/ 
199b3(mdo 'grel): ma thob lhung bzed ni// stong par der khyod byon pa ci// mdzes ma rab byung de yis ni// rdzun gyis khyod la smad pa ci// mi bden smad dang bcas gyur pas// khyod la slu bar byed pa ci// bai ran tu ru khyod kyis sngon// 
199b4(mdo 'grel): ko Tar yi nas gsol ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis lo drug ni// dka' ba spyad par gyur pa ci// khyod kyi lus la rab gnon gyi// nad kyis ci yi slad du reg/ shAkya'i rigs ni 'jig pa'i tshe// khyod 
199b5(mdo 'grel): dbu ni bsnyung gyur ci// ci slad khyod kyis lus mchog la// rlung gis skra rgyab bsnyung bar gyur// de dag rnams kyis 'di dris tshe// bcom ldan 'dzum bcas der gsungs pa// nyon cig rgyun chad med par/ 
199b6(mdo 'grel): ni// rnam par bkra ba las kyi rgyun// lus can las kyis 'ching ba ni// chas zhugs g.yog po dam pa bzhin// 'gro na phyi nas 'gro bar byed// sdod na sngon du sdod par byed// nags rnams phyogs 
199b7(mdo 'grel): su 'jug cing phyogs su rnam par rgyu la chu gter 'gong bar byed// raM yi dbang phyug la 'dzeg brgya byin gnas ni kun tu mnan nas mngon par 'jug/ sa 'og snang ba min pa'i yul du rab 'jug las rnams 
199b8(mdo 'grel): dus kyi dba' rlabs bzhin// 'di dag rtag tu skye bo'i rjes su 'jug pa'i lam ni gang na'ang 'gog pa med// las kyi 'khri shing ring po gsar pa nyid la rtag tu 'bras bu rnyid pas khyab// ngo mtshar dang bcas lus// / 
200a1(mdo 'grel): can lhan cig spyod cing de la'ang nges par g.yo ba med// gang zhig dge ba rnams kyis bkug dang yongs su dkris dang rnam pa ragasal ba dang // rab bcad gcus dang nges par brdar 
200a2(mdo 'grel): dang phye mar byas kyi zad pa nyid mi 'gyur// gang zhig zla ba mdzes pa'i lus la skyon ni thig le nag po dang // gang zhig ma rungs rnam pa'i sbal nag nor bu 'od zer ral can 'dzin// sna tshogs kyis bkra'i spyod 
200a3(mdo 'grel): pa lus can rnams la ston byed pa// 'di ni bkra ba'i rim pas yongs smin las kyis sprul pa'i ri mo yin// gzhal du med pa'i nor bskyed cing // bu mang chung ma dang ldan pa'i// khyim bdag kha ba Ta zhes 
200a4(mdo 'grel): pa// kar pa Tar ni sngon bur gyur// de yis mdza' bas bskyangs pa yis// byis pa muM ga d+ha zhes bya ba// nor ma bgos pa'i spun zla ni// ma migacig pa de khyim gnas// nam zhig khyim bdag de la 
200a5(mdo 'grel): ni// khyim bsam gtan gyi bar skabs su// chung ma nag mo zhes bya ba// gya gyu can gyis dal bus smas// rje yi sras po rmongs pa las// bag med drang pos khyod kyis ni// khyim du ma mi gcig 
200a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i spyan// dug gi ljon pa rnam par bskyed// 'god bral gcig po 'di yis kyang // 'god ldan bu mang khyod kyis ni// bgos pa min pa'i nor dag las// phyed ni tshul gyis len par 'gyur// 
200a7(mdo 'grel): nad bzhin 'phel ba 'di la ni// gsad pa kha na smad kyi mchog/ gnyen ni gcod pa dag las kyang // mi rnams nor gcod zod par dka'// zab mo 'du 'god rtsom pa yi// 'khor bar skye ba 'os 
200a8(mdo 'grel): gyur pa// chen po rgud par ltung gyur na// gnyis 'thung dbang po 'gyel ba bzhin// zhes pa de yi gdug pa'i tshig/ thos nas bsam pa rab 'dar zhing // mdza' ba'i zhags pas dbang byas des// 
200b1(mdo 'grel): de la gzugs pas rab smras pa// re zhig khyod kyis phan pa brjod// 'on kyang 'di ni shin tu sdig/ phyi rol yan lag nor thob slad// lhan skyes yan lag su zhig gcod// nor la chags rnams nor don du/ 
200b2(mdo 'grel): sdig pa bsam pa rigs ma yin// nor rnams bsrungs par gyur mod kyang // skad cig gis ni brlag par 'gyur// yang yang las rlabs rtsom pa yis// rab bskyed 'khrugs pa'i rnam 'phrul can/ 
200b3(mdo 'grel): dpal rnams ri gzar chu bo bzhin// bgrod pa dag ni su yis zlog/ de smad smin legs bdag gi yid// spun zla gsod la yod mi 'jug/ nor rnams bdag ni 'tsho ba yod// spyod tshul nyams na 
200b4(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba gang // nas smra bdag po de yi yid// sna tshogs rigs pa nyer bstan nas// dal gyi sdig pa dag la ni// de yis mngon par phyogs par byas// mdza' snum mang pos bskyed pa yi// lhan 
200b5(mdo 'grel): skyes spyi bor skyes pa bzhin// bu med spu gri'i so rnon gyis// 'phral la bcad nas 'dor bar byed// rmongs pas bcom pa'i bro dang bud med ni// 'khyog cing gzhan la rab gdug bya min la// 
200b6(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa'i slad du brtan pa mngon sbyor cing // sdig par nges par ltung bar byed pa nyid// gnyen dang grogs la chags bral zhing // sems ni rab bdes myos gyur pa// dpal ldan rnams la dud pa bzhin// 
200b7(mdo 'grel): bud med rgyal la blo gros gang // de nas de yi spun zla ni// me tog btu slang kha drangs nas// me med nags su rdo ba yis// cho de thos pa med par bsad// de nyid nga yin sdig pa de// skye ba snga mar rnam 
200b8(mdo 'grel): spyad nas// mthe bong snad pa'i mtshan nyid can// da lta 'ang lhag ma'i cha shas 'dzin// ded dpon don byin zhes bya ba// gzings ni gang bar gyur pa sngon// rjes su mthun pa'i rlung dag gis// rin chen gling 
201a1(mdo 'grel): nas yang dag 'ongs// de nas ded dpon gnyis pa ni// don nyams de la brten gyur pa// sdang bas gzings la sbas pa yis// bug pa bya bar rab tu brtsams// ci ste don 
201a2(mdo 'grel): byin gyis mthong nas// yang dang yang du bzlog gyur kyang // sdang bas long de sdig pa yi// 'bad las skad cig log ma gyur// de nas don mthun pa dag khros nas// khro ldan rnam par rmongs pa de// 
201a3(mdo 'grel): mi bzad shag ti rab bsnun nas// srog dang bral ba nyid du byas// de nyi dang yin de bsad las// sdig 'bras skye ba gzhan spyad nas// lhag ma'i cha shas da lta yang // rkang par seng ldeng rma 'dzin no// 
201a4(mdo 'grel): la ga nas lhung bzed brtse ba yis// brlan pa'i blo ldan rang sangs rgyas// u pa riSh+Ta zhes pa sngon// ka shi'i grong du bslang slong zhugs// de yis lhung bzed yongs khengs pa// mthong nas sdang bas sun 
201a5(mdo 'grel): byung ba// 'bras med g.yo ldan zhes pa yis// lag pa yis ni sa la po// dengs zas bcad las 'khrungs pa'i// sdig de skye ba mang por ni// spyad kyang 'bras bu lhag ma yis// lhung bzed stong pa nyid// 
201a6(mdo 'grel): du gyur// ba shiSh+Na zhes bya ba sngon// dgra bcom nyid thob sems rab dang // rab zhi'i dga' tshal grong pa yis// byas pa'i gtsug lag khang na gnas// de yi spun zla rab byung ni// b+hA ra d+h+wa dza skye bo yis// 
201a7(mdo 'grel): bkur sti rtag rgyas de mthong nas// sdang ba'i me yis gdungs par gyur// yon tan can rnams bkur mthong nas// de nyams slad du skye bo rnams// rab tu 'bad byed bdag nyid ni// yon tan gzung phyir 
201a8(mdo 'grel): brtson ma yin// chen po la 'os gos zung zhig/ skye bo gus pas phul ba ni// drang po'i sems can ba shiSh+Na// mdza' bas spun zlo de la byin// des blangs yon tan la sdang de// kho na dang bral ba nyid ma 
201b1(mdo 'grel): gyur// phan pa rnams dang mdza' bas kyang // ngan pa rang gir mi 'gyur ro// de yis gtsug lag khang skyong ma// dben par yang dag pos nas ni// gos ni zung dag de la byin// bkur sti byas nas rab smras pa// 
201b2(mdo 'grel): gos zung 'di ni rked bzang ma// khyod kyis gyon la skye bo dag/ 'di na ba shaSh+Ti yis ni// byin zhes dal gyis smra bar bya// de skad des brjod de yis kyang // khas blangs de yis bstan pa byas// gang gi ba 
201b3(mdo 'grel): shaSh+Ti la ni// skye bo slong bar dogs par gyur// tshul khrims ma tshang brjod pas des// de nas grong pas ma mchod de// ring du sor gyur chen po rnams// bkur sti nyams pas 'jigs pa nyid// b+ha ra d+ha// 
201b4(mdo 'grel): dzad bdag ste// 'phags la smad pas skye gzhan la// bsod nams min spyad de lhag las// mdzes mas ding yang rdzun gyis smad// bdag sngon bram ze'i phrag dog gis// ba ra NA ser thub pa ni// 
201b5(mdo 'grel): ldan mngon shes lnga pa yi// grags pa phrag dog dag gis bcom// me tog gzhu can grags pa yi// ba dan ltar mdzes smad 'tshong ma// bzang mo zhes bya bud med mchog/ ba re NA sir sngon byung gyur// 
201b6(mdo 'grel): g.yo ldan gya gyu'i bsam pa can// pad rtsa zhes pas nam zhig de// mthong nas mtshan mo spyad pa'i slad// gos dang rgyan dag de la byin// de nas g.yo ba'i chags pa can// mtshams la 'grogs par// 
201b7(mdo 'grel): mngon phyogs pa'i// nyin mor byed pa nam mkha' yi// khyams kyi mthar ni babs pa'i tshe// bzang mo rang gi khyim song nas// me tog gos dang rgyan rnams kyis// mdzes pa nyid kyi rgyan la ni// slar// 
201b8(mdo 'grel): yang zlos pa'i rgyan dag byas// smug rtsi rkang pa'i mthil la rab chags shing // do shal mchog gis mgrin par sbyangs nas kyang // bya ba don gnyer me long la phyogs te// smad 'tshong spyod pa'i don 
202a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin de yis byas// mgrin pa la gzhan bzhin gzhan mchu la gzhan// de bzhin gzugs can ma des snying la gzhan// rnam bkra rang gi bya ba gzugs can bzhin// skyes bu chags// / 
202a2(mdo 'grel): byed nid kyi rgyan rnams gzung // yid skyed rgyal ba'i grags pa zla ba'i gzugs ni dang po bzhin// lan bu thig le'i ri mo 'jo sgeg ldan par rab spras shing // rab 'phro gdug pa'i du bas rab rib thun mtshams 
202a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin bkra ba// chags pa dang byas yan lag dang bcas chags pa de rab mdzes// de nas g.yog mo chu srin ma// zhes pa myur bar rab zhugs te// der smas skad cig 'grogs 'dod pa'i// gzhon nu gsad 
202a4(mdo 'grel): pababyin sdod// kaR+Sha pa ni brgya phrag lnga// rtsa bzhin du ni ster bar byed// 'di ni khyod kyi ster bzhin 'ongs// nang zhugs nyid ni phyi rol mthong // rab mang nor ldan gtor phod can// brel bas yun ring mi sdod pa// 
202a5(mdo 'grel): 'dod sgribs 'dod ldan bzod pa can// skal ba bzang mo ga la thob// ces pa de yi tshig thos nas// yon dang chags pa'i rab tu ni// skad cig phyang mo yug pa bzhin// bzang mos 'dzum bcas rab 
202a6(mdo 'grel): smras pa// gzhan las gla ni blangs pa dag/ lam srang dag gi bud med bzhin// de dus don gnyer gzhan la ni// lag bzed nyid du ji ltar 'gyur// skye dgu rnams bzhin thams cad kyi// dbang du gyur// 
202a7(mdo 'grel): kyang skad cig ni// gang gis sngon nyid 'thams pa de// smad 'tshong bud med rnams kyi bdag/ mtshan mo gcig po 'di ni de ni// pad rtsas nyos la ci zhig brjod// gzhan gyi snga dro 'ong du chug/ bdag cag/ 
202a8(mdo 'grel): rtag tu gsar pa rtsom// bzang mos 'di brjod chung ngu des// mchog tu sbrang rtsil chags bzhin// gsar pa gsar pa'i ror chags shing // khros pas de la rab smras pa// gal te 'ongs pa btang gyur na// / 
202b1(mdo 'grel): song ba nang bar 'od mi 'gyur// smad 'tshong rnams dang tshor pa la// skal bas nyo ba mang bar 'gyur// 'di nas cung zad 'di nas dang // cung zad nyin mtshan du sogs pa// smad 'tshong rnams kyi skyes bu yis// rnyed/ 
202b2(mdo 'grel): pa me tog thu ba bzhin// smad 'tshong ma la rtag tu mdza'// slong ba rnams kyi rig pa bzhin// chos kyi slad min 'dod slad min// nor nyid slad du rgyas par byed// mang dang 'grogs pas smad 'tshong ma// mi gtsa 
202b3(mdo 'grel): banyid mi 'gyur zhing // 'di yi brtul zhugs mi nyams te// slar la don du gnyer byar 'gyur// gzhan dag phyir 'thon gzhan nang 'jug/ gzhan dag phyi nas rab lta ba'i// smad 'tshong gang de mdzes pa ste// sa 
202b4(mdo 'grel): yi bdag po'i mdun sa bzhin// tshong pa dbul po'i srang bzhin du// stong par khyim na gang 'dug pa// smad 'tshong rnams la 'di las ni// lhag pa skal ngan gzhan pa ci// skal ngan gyis ni 'dzin byed med// / 
202b5(mdo 'grel): 'phyon ma stong par nyal ba ni// snga dro 'dod ldan rnams kyi sgra// rdzun gyis 'khrugs par sgrub par byed// 'phral la nyo ba yongs btang nas// ring na gnas la sgugs pa na// zong 'grems sa ru smad 'tshong 
202b6(mdo 'grel): ma// phreng ba bzhin du myur du skam// 'di ni dge mtshan tsam don gnyer// bya bas brel zhing mang du ster// nang zhugs nyid na phyi rol 'gro// ci nyams nor ni blangs par mdzod// phan pa 'di thos bzang mo des// 
202b7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin zhes te kha yis blangs// smad 'tsher rang bzhin chags pa ste// rigs pa skye bo chags byed nyid// skad cig nyid ni der bzod mdzod// bdag gi chas dang rgyan ma tshar// zhes pa'i phyin ni skyel 
202b8(mdo 'grel): ba la// pad rtsal ni g.yog mo btang // 'dod ldan mdzes pa zhes bya ba// mang po sbyin pas skad cig ni// glang pos pad+ma can bzhin de// spyad pas 'khrugs pa nyid gyur to// de nas de ni song ba'i tshe// 
203a1(mdo 'grel): mchu ni sos bcad lhag ma dang // de yis brtse med 'byung ba yis// skad cig gis ni rnying nyid thob// slar yang rgyan ni rab bzung nas// pad+mo'i rtse la bur bar ni// byon zhes sdang ba sbas 
203a2(mdo 'grel): ba yi// grogs po des ni rnam par springs// de yis smras pa'i bra ma las// de yi spyod tshul pad rdzas shes// 'di nyid du ni bzang mo dag/ shog ces khro ba sbas par smras// de nas phyin thos dri bzang gis// 
203a3(mdo 'grel): rkang drug pa ni 'gugs ma de// pad rtsas bsten pa'i skyed mos tshal// rkang 'thung me tog rgyas par song // de ni 'ong ba mthong gyur nas// chags sdang dug ni mi bzad pa// 'khor ba rnam pa dang bcas bzhin// 
203a4(mdo 'grel): de ni rnam 'gyur ldan par gyur// de yis bsams pa g.yo ba yis// kha don gnyer bar btags pa yi// rgyan rnams chags las gzhan dang ni// nye bar spyad pas nyams par byas// kye ma dang spyod gya gyu'i cho ga
203a5(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin du nu ma'i ngos dag la// sen mo 'khyog bor rab btab rnams kyis ri mo gsar pa 'dzin byed cing // mchu 'dab mdzes pa g.yon can lhag mas nyams shing bzhin ni zad gyur pa// lag 'gro ma 'dis 
203a6(mdo 'grel): bdag gi yan lag kun la mi bzad dug rnams spro// skad cig de bsams che bar rab khros pa'i// mi yis rab bskyed du pa'i rnam 'phrul ni// smin ma'i rnam 'gyur dus kyi bzhin ldan des// skrag brgyas 
203a7(mdo 'grel): ba de la rab smras pa// mang dang skad cig la 'grogs smad 'tsheng gang // de ni dang po gzhan nor ci la 'dzin// bdag don nyid du byas pa'i chas 'di dag/ khyod kyi rdul gyi thigs pas lhag mar byas// zhes smras 
203a8(mdo 'grel): gzugs bzang ma yi 'og pa ga ni// g.yo zhing bskyod pa'i gsal ba'i sgra dag gis// drin mdzod bu ma gauzhon nu bsad pa'i 'os// srungs zhes dben pas slong bar byed pa bzhin// bung ba'i phreng bsku 
203b1(mdo 'grel): sgrogs gtibs pa yi// 'khri shing rnams kyang bzhin ni rab btud pas// lag pa'i yal 'dab kun tu g.yo ba byed cing // brtse bas ring nas zlog par byed pa bzhin// 'jigs rung bstan pa'i stag bzhin 
203b2(mdo 'grel): brtse med des// yan lag 'khri shing skrag nyams ri dgas ni// g.yo yangs mig can bsad nas mgyogs pa yi sa// gtum mo mtshon cha khrag spags rab tu song // gang zhig khro bo'i long bas mig 
203b3(mdo 'grel): bkag pa// de dag rnams la bya min ci zhig yod// rtag tu yid ni brtse bas dbul ba yi// spyod tshul brtse med 'jigs rung rnams la yang // dben par bzang mo sdig tun gyis bsad ces// de nas der ni 
203b4(mdo 'grel): 'bangs mos sgra bsgrags shing // skye bo 'dus tshe nyi tshe sangs rgyas kyi// nags mthar de ni rang dga' dag tu zhugs// de mdun khrag gis spags pa'i mtshon bzhag nas// skye bo'i tshogs kyi nang du de// 
203b5(mdo 'grel): bros che// rtags 'dzin grong pas sdig pa med mod kyang // rang sangs rgyas ni 'phral la bzung bar 'gyur// ma rungs gnod byed la'i sa gsod pa'i sar// de nas rgyal po'i bka' yis de khyer tshe// pad+ma'i rtsa/ 
203b6(mdo 'grel): lag 'phral la 'gyod pa skyes// sdig pa 'di ni bdag gi byas zhes smras// de nas de yi tshig gis rang sangs rgyas// dpyad nas rgyal pos phyag 'tshal btang ba'i tshe// ngan byed la 'os bzod pa dga' ba'i bkag/ 
203b7(mdo 'grel): nyams myong nyid ni pad+mo'i rtsabs thob// deng drag po'i sdig des skye ba mang // 'bum gyis dmyal ba'i nang du longs spyad nas// de yi las 'bras lhag mad lta yang // mu stegs bu mo'i rdzun gyis mngon par sbyar// / 
203b8(mdo 'grel): grong khyer gnyen ldan dag na sngon// bcom ldan rgyal ba rnam par gzigs// grong pa'i longs spyod kyis mchod cing // dge slong tshogs kyis bskor te gnas// bram ze mthar zhes pas// mchod dang ldan pa de mthong 
204a1(mdo 'grel): nas// grong pa la smras dge slong ni// mgo reg longs spyod 'os pa min// ko Ta ra yi nas rdul gyis// 'di dag gi ni kha zas skabs// mgo reg 'gyur bag ldan pa'i kha// mchog gi kha 
204a2(mdo 'grel): zas 'os pa min// bram ze de bdag tshig de las// skye ba mang por de yi sdig/ spyad cing da lta las lhag gis// ko Tar yi nas kyis zas// gang tshe bdag sngon bram ze yi// khye'u u Tar zhes gyur// de tshe bdag 
204a3(mdo 'grel): gi rigs mchog la// smad pa yis ni mi dge thog/ las des da lta lo drug tu// dka' ba spyad pas bdag gis bsgrubs// de las lhag pa byang chub kyis// bsrungs pa yis ni thob ma gyur// khyim bdag nor 
204a4(mdo 'grel): ldan zhes bya ba// kar pa Ta ra ni sngon byung ste// dpal ldan zhes bya de yi bu// lus ni rnal gnas min par gyur// de ni sman pa kha ba'i bzhin// zhes pa nor mang re ba yis// rnal gnas byas kyang de yi bas// 
204a5(mdo 'grel): de la ci yang byin ma gyur// dus kyis gzing ba nyid gyur te// yang yang de yis bos par byas// de yi pha la cung zad kyang // khas blangs smras pa thob ma gyur// sman pa khro ba'i rims kyis gdungs// sred pas
204a6(mdo 'grel): g.yo ba'i shugs ring can// nad pa yis kyang 'gongs pa des// sdug bsngal las ni rab bsams pa// kye ma bsam pa drang po bdag/ g.yo dang ldan pa dag gi bslus// bdag gi lag nas nad pa yi// 
204a7(mdo 'grel): gter 'das nga ni ci zhig bya// tsha ba'i sman bzhin sman pa ni// nad pa rnams kyis sngon du bkur// gdung ba sos par gyur pa'i phyir// dran yang kha ni rmugs 'byin byed// don grub la ni nor ldan dang // sgrol 
204a8(mdo 'grel): zin dag la gru pa bzhin// ma lus nad las grol gyur pa// sa la sman pa nye bar mkho// mchod dang zhabs la gtugs byas pas// nad pas sman pa rab bsten te// phyi nas min ni bsgrags pa na// sos pa/ 
204b1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis thud kyis 'debs// sngon pa rgyal po sman pa yi// 'chir las ri dgas chom rkun dang // nad sos song ba bsod nams kyis// phyi nas spyod yul dag tu ltung // de ltar rab tu sems byed cing // 
204b2(mdo 'grel): de ni rtag tu yongs su gdungs// sman pa bzhin du khro ldan nad// slar yang de yis thob par gyur// de nas khro bas bsgribs pa yis// sman pas 'gol ba'i sbyor ba las// rgyu ma 'chad par byed pa'i sman// 
204b3(mdo 'grel): 'phral la nyams byed de la byin// des byin gnod pa 'thungs pa las// de yi rgyu ma dum bur gyur// sdig pa'i g.yang la ltung ba yis// chags pas long rnams ci mi byed// sman par nyid de yi sdig/ skye ba khri 
204b4(mdo 'grel): phrag brgyar spyad nas// las kyi lhag ma da lta yang // rab gnon nad kyi cha shes bsten// nya yis 'tsho ba rnams kyis sngon// nya ni lus chen gnyis dag bzung // lus ni gcod pa mthong gyur nas// nya pa'i bu// 
204b5(mdo 'grel): yis dga' bar byas// de bdag de la yongs tshim thob// sdig pa skye ba gzhan spyad nas// shAkya nyams pa de yi tshe// skad cig mgo la nad kyi reg/ sngon tshe ljongs kyi gyad gyur te// mdza' ba stobs zhes bya ba'i/ 
204b6(mdo 'grel): byung// g.yul gyi zil gyis gshegs byas te// de yi rgyab ni rnam gnas byas// dang de yi sdig chen ni// skye ba mang por spyad byas nas// rlung gi nad kyis da ltar yang // rgyab tu skad cig gnad par byas/ 
204b7(mdo 'grel): de ltar byang chub rdzogs sangs rgyas// des bstan bdag gi lus la yang // nyon mongs thigs pa las 'dam gyi// lhag ma'i cha shas nges par ltung // skye bar spro dang 'chi ba'i tshe yang skyes bu rnams 
204b8(mdo 'grel): lus la// bkra ba'i las kyi lam ni phreng ba bzhin du rnam gtags pa// rab tu chags pa 'di ni bde dang sdug bsngal mtshams dag la// spyad cing btang bar gyur kyang lhag ma'i lhag ma rnam par 'dzin// de skad bcom 
205a1(mdo 'grel): ldan gyis bshad pa// dge slong kun gyis thos gyur nas// las kyi 'ching ba rnam dag ni// 'da' bar bya min nyid du nges// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs// 
205a2(mdo 'grel): pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// las bcu spyad pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu pa'o// // gdung skyob blo yis brtse bas mnyes gshin rnams kyis srog ni 'gro bar spro ba'i 
205a3(mdo 'grel): tshe// spu lo rgyan gyi rol pa bsten cing shin tu rno ba'i mtshon gyis bcad pa ni// gang gi lus la g.yo ba'i mig can rna ba'i ut+pal gyis bsnun mtshungs pa thob// de dag spyod pa rgya che brjod byar 'os pa'i tshig ni gang/ 
205a4(mdo 'grel): gis brjod par bya// sngon ni gsang ba'i kaM bar ta// dar da btul bcom ldan 'das// yul de nas na mi snang bar// dka' thub nags tshal gzhan du gshegs// de yi g.yog la 'ongs pa'i lha// bde sos/ 
205a5(mdo 'grel): bdag po dag gis der// bzhin la 'dzum pa'i zla ba dag/ shar ba mthong nas rgyu mtshan dris// de la bka' stsa la nags kyi mtha'// 'dir ni bdag gis sngon byung dran// dran pa nyams su myong ba las// 
205a6(mdo 'grel): bdag 'dzum 'di ste rgyu med min// zhes pa brjod nas bcom ldan gyis// sngon byung gsung bar rtsol ba mdzad// grong khyer ut+pal ldan par ni// grong khyer gtso bo'i bud med dag/ sbyin dang tshul khrims brtse 
205a7(mdo 'grel): ba can// gser ldan ma zhes grags pa byung // nam zhig de yis dbul ba yi// bud med bcas shing ltogs pas gzir// srin mo bzhin du bu tsha dag/ za bar 'dod pa mthong bar 'gyur// de mthong 
205a8(mdo 'grel): snying rtsa rgyas byung ba// de yis sad cig yang dag bsams// kye ma dang lus la chags pas// blon sdig la rab tu 'dug/ 'di yi zas ni len du bdag/ gal te rang gi khyim song na// bkres pas yongs 
205b1(mdo 'grel): su zhen pa 'dis// bu ni nges par za bar 'gyur// yang na bdag gis bu khyer nas// gal te khyim du phyin pa na// 'di ni bkres pa nyid gyur te// 'phral la 'tsho ba gtong bar 'gyur// de ltar gnyis ka the tshom dang // ldan 
205b2(mdo 'grel): pa de la brtse bas bsams// 'gro ba bsgral ba'i slad nyid du// de yis smon lam btab byas te// de yis gtad pa'i mtshon rnon gyis// g.yo ba med par bcad nas ni// de la rang gi nu ma zung // 'tsho ba yi// / 
205b3(mdo 'grel): ni zungs la byin// de nas de grags ngo mtshar can// 'jig rten gsum reg grags pa'i tshe// brgya byin bram ze'i gzugs kyis ni// mngon du phyogs te de la dris// khyod kyi nu ma byin pa yis// yid la rnam 
205b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ma byung ngam// zhes dris de la dag pa dang // bden smra ldan pa des smras pa// nu ma byin la rnam 'gyur cha// gal te bdag la 'ga' ma gyur// bden pa de yis re zhig 'phral// bud med nyid ni ldog gyur/ 
205b5(mdo 'grel): cig/ de brjod tsam la bden ldan ma// de yis bud med gzugs btang nas// mtshan nyid thams cad phun tshogs pa'i// skyes pa nyid du yang dag gyur// grong khyer ut+pal ldan par ni// mi bdag
205b6(mdo 'grel): ut+pal zhes bya ba// gnas skabs der ni tshe rdzogs shing // nad kyi sbyor bas lhung bar gyur// de nas rab mchog rgan dang blon// mtshan nyid shos rnams mngon phyogs te// 'phral la skyes pa nyid thob pa// 
205b7(mdo 'grel): gser ldan de ni mngon dbang bskur// chos ldan mdzes pa'i dpal de yis// rgyal srid dag ni yun ring byas// dus kyis lus ni btang gyur te// lus can dag ni brtan pa med// de nyid du de tshong dpon bu// 
205b8(mdo 'grel): snying stobs mchog ces bya bar gyur// zol med bsgrubs pa'i sbyin pa ni// skye bar goms la gus bcas pa'o// 'byung po kun gzir bsam pa la// rtag tu de yis yid bkod de// bzod dka' 'dab 
206a1(mdo 'grel): chags rnams nyid kyi// bkres pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag bsams// nas dur khrod nags su de// song nas spa gris lus bkas te// gan rkyal nyal nas sha za ba'i// 'dab 
206a2(mdo 'grel): chags rnams la rab tu byin// rim gyis de yi mig g.yas ni// mthon por 'gro ba'i mkhar bgrod kyis// mchu yis phyung zhing rab phyung nas// yang dang yang du rab tu btang // brtan zhing yan lag kun 
206a3(mdo 'grel): mi g.yo// de yi sa ya mtshan bya mthong nas// smras pa dogs med nyid du zo// nga yis khyod ni yod mi 'dzin// ro bral snying po med pa'i lus// gnod bcas skad cig 'jig pa 'di// gzhan la 
206a4(mdo 'grel): phan pa'i cha shas kyis// 'khor ba'i snying po nyid du gyur// mi rnams lus ni mi gtsang zag cing so so'i gnas su sAr gyur dri ma can// gnod pa'i gnas su gyur cing dbugs dus g.yo la log par chag 
206a5(mdo 'grel): pa 'di ni ci// gang zhig bsod nams rnams kyis 'ga' zhig dag tu 'ga' la 'ga' tshe 'ga' mthong nas// gdung ba zhi byed skyo ba la zhugs gyur 'di nyid gcig pu 'di yi dga' bya nyid// ces pa smra ba de yi lus// 
206a6(mdo 'grel): bkres pas nyen pa'i bya rnams kyis// za zhing 'phangs pas skad cig la// rus pa'i lhag ma nyid du gyur// dus kyis de ni bram ze dag/ sa la chen po'i bur skyes te// bden pa'i brtul zhugs zhes bya ba// 
206a7(mdo 'grel): skye bo dag gis bkur bar gyur// rig pa ma lus thob gyur cing // snying rje dag la chags pa'i sems// zhi bar dga' ba de yi yid// khyim thab las ni phyir phyogs gyur// rigs su skyes shing yon 
206a8(mdo 'grel): tan thob// blo gros dben pas rab brgyan cing // 'byung po kun la brtse zhing byams// bsod nams las kyi mtshan nyid yin// gzhon nu de nyid chags bral gyis// dga' zhing dka' thub nags song ste/ 
206b1(mdo 'grel): drang srong gnyis kyis brtul zhugs byin// bsti gnas su ni ngal bso bsten// de nas dus kyi ye shes spyan// dri med shin tu rno ba yis// stag mo btsa' la nye ba dag/ mthong nas de yis yang dag bsams// bkres 
206b2(mdo 'grel): pa yis ni gzir ba 'di// zhag bdun dag na btsa' bar gyur// rang gi bu ni za ba la// skom pa drag po 'ang 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes bsams de yi sdug bsngal ni// thub pa dag la bshad nas des// snying rjes de 
206b3(mdo 'grel): ni phyir bcos pa'i// yid la re bo byas par gyur// de nas zhag bdun 'das pa'i tshe// stag mo mngal gyi khur gyis dub// zas chag mang pos gdungs gyur pa// dka' las chen pos bu tsha btsas// rang gi/ 
206b4(mdo 'grel): khrag ga dri yis ni// sred pa drag po rab bskyed pa// de mthong bden pa'i brtul zhugs ni// snying rjes brlan pas yang dag bsams// sdug ma 'di ni bkres pa yis// sdug bsngal dag las bu bzar brtson// 
206b5(mdo 'grel): kye ma 'di ni rang don gyis// bul chags pa'ang brjed par gyur// rang sdug bsngal bas thams cad gdung // gzhan gyi yongs su gdung bas bsil// skye bo 'ga' zhig gzhan gdung la// khyad par du ni gdung ba skye// 
206b6(mdo 'grel): bu dang bcas pa'i stag mo 'di// lus byin nas ni bdag gis bsrung // srog la the tshom yongs rdzogs pa// 'di bdag sdug bsngal yongs mi bzod// gzhan srog bskyab la lus ni rtsa bzhin brtags pas/ 
206b7(mdo 'grel): gtong ba rnam dag gi/ rgya che bsod nams rgyas pa'i rang bzhin grags pa'i lus ni brtan par 'gyur// gnod pa rab chags srog gi thigs pa 'di ni rab g.yo rlung dag gis// g.yo ba'i pad ldan 'dab ma'i 
206b8(mdo 'grel): khongs gnas g.yo ba'i chu thigs dag gi grogs// 'di bsams snying rje'i gter de yis// 'byed pa'i thur mas mgrin pa la// khrag zag rma ni btod byas nas// stag mo'i mdun du 'gyel bar 'gyur/ 
207a1(mdo 'grel): nges par bdag nyid che rnams kyis// yid ni snying rje mnyen pa dag/ nye bar bskya ba la chags byas pas// gzhan gyis yongs gdung bzod ma yin// de nas g.yo med de yi snying kha rab 
207a2(mdo 'grel): tu rgyas pa la// stag mo khrag la mngon par 'dod pa rnon pos rab tu mchongs// dga' dang 'dzum skyes sen mo'i 'od zer dag gis 'gro ba la// 'phags pa'i spyod pa'i ngo mtshar rab tu 'bri bar byed pa bzhin// byams 
207a3(mdo 'grel): pas 'khrul bzhin bzod pas nyes byas bzhin dang shes rab kyis ni bsam tshogs bzhin// sdug bsngal bzod dka'i bslad pa bstan pa sa bzhin dang nyon mongs dka' thub dpal gyis bzhin// brtse ba de yis 
207a4(mdo 'grel): lus ni snying stobs sa gzhi g.yo ba med pa de nyid kyis// stag gi chung mas btab cing mi bzad drag por mngon 'joms gsal ba'i khur dag bzod// stag gi sder mo phreng ba'i rol pas rnam par bcom gyur pa/ 
207a5(mdo 'grel): de yi snying kha'i gzhi ni rnam par nyams pa skad cig mtshon// lus ni spu long gis byugs bsil zer can ltar dkar ba yi// snying stobs rab gsal 'od zer myu gus khengs par gyur pa bzhin// sha dag za zhing 
207a6(mdo 'grel): khrag 'thung myos par gyur pa'i stag mo ni// dga' dang bcas pa mthong nas 'gro ba de yi rang gi srog/ 'tsho ba dag ni ring du 'gro ba'i dus su 'brel gyur pas// yud tsam zhig ni mgrin pa nyid la brten te brtan par 
207a7(mdo 'grel): byas// sred pa'i rjes mthun rtse dga'i 'od dang 'gro ba dag gis ni// ngo tsha'i dbang las bzhin ni mchog tu rnam par sdud pa bzhin// khyim thab las ni phyir phyogs gyur kyang de yi lag pa dag/ de yis bzung nas
207a8(mdo 'grel): mdza' zhing gcugs ltar snying ni dga' bar byas// byams pas dag cing rnam 'gyur med pa rgya che'i snying stobs dang // lugs bzang bsod nams chu bo 'jig rten rnams su grags pa dang // 'byung por phan pa'i// 
207b1(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin dman la snying rjes brgyan pa'i sems// rang dbang nyid du gyur pa legs ldan bdag nyid rnams kyis yin// stag mo'i sder mo'i rtse mos bshig pa de yi snying stobs dag/ mtshungs pa med pa de mthong 'phral 
207b2(mdo 'grel): la nor 'dzin bu mo ni// dba' rlabs rol pa dang ldan chu gter bzhi yi ska rags can// srog ni zhig pa'i dus na 'jig pa bzhin du ring zhig 'dar// bden pa'i brtul zhugs snying rjer rab dga' de ni nga nyid de// da 
207b3(mdo 'grel): lta 'dir ni rang gi spyod tshul dran nas bzhad gad skyes// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa 'di ni thos gyur nas// ya mtshan yid ldan brgya byin de ni bzhin ras g.yo med gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos/ 
207b4(mdo 'grel): byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// gser ldan gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // gang zhig nags sor shing shun 
207b5(mdo 'grel): ldan gyur kyang // slong rnams rgyun du don byas nyid du byed// spyod tshul mdzes ldan de dang tsan dan gyi// ngo mtshar dag ni su yis bsam mi bya// de bzhin dka' thub nags gzhan na// bcom ldan bzhugs 
207b6(mdo 'grel): shing 'dzum ldan la// brgya byin ya mtshan ldan pa yis// 'dzum pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan dris// de yis gus pas dris pa'i tshe// de la kun mkhyen gyis gsungs pa// mig stong ldan pa gnas 'dir ni// sngon/ 
207b7(mdo 'grel): byung ba dag bdag gis dran// ma d+hu da ka zhes pa yi// grong khyer lha grong lta bur sngon// bsod nams mi dman zhes bya ba'i// sa bdag sa yi rgyan du gyur// snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms dang // byams 
207b8(mdo 'grel): pa sems la yang dag chags// phrag dog can bzhin gang gi dpal// slong ba'i skye bo'i khang bar gnas// nam zhig de yi spyod pa ni// 'grol grags pa thos gyur nas// sa yi bdag po tshangs pas byin/ 
208a1(mdo 'grel): rgyal bar 'dod pa de can 'od // de nas glang po'i tsho gas gtams pas// phyogs mtshams dag ni mun par byas// de ni rjes su bcing ba'i slad// de yis grong khyer bcing bar byas// 
208a2(mdo 'grel): snying stobs brtse ldan mi yi bdag/ drag ni rlag par mi bzhed do// zhes bsams de yi blon po ni// ma brjod g.yul la phyi rol 'thon// glang po rta dang shing rta rnams// drag byed g.yul ni rgyas pa der// bsod nams 
208a3(mdo 'grel): mi dman snying rje yis// sdug bsngal gyur pas yang dag bsams// mi bzad rgyal rig chos 'di ni// chos min brgya phrag dag dang ldan// ma rungs srog chags bsod pa ni// gang du chos shes mngon par 
208a4(mdo 'grel): brjod// khrag gis bsgos shing dri ma can// rgyal rigs rnams kyi chos 'di smad// gang gi ched du rab 'bad pa'i// 'tsho ba de yang rtag pa min// bde cung khro yis bzod bya 'di ni skyes bu rnams kyi nyon 
208a5(mdo 'grel): mongs smin// gnod pa dang bcas gdung ba'i lam du rtag tu nyams pa nyid gyur cing // phyi nas dran pas sdug bsngal shugs rings dag gis brtan pa 'joms byed pa// longs spyod don du kyi hud kyi hud 
208a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan srog 'tshe la rab tu 'bad// de slad 'tshe dang sdig pa'i gnas// chos min mang ba'i rgyal srid 'di// yongs su btang la bdag nyid ni// dka' thub nags su 'gro bar bya// rgyal po mi shes rmongs 
208a7(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi// bsod dang 'ching ba brgyas bsgrubs pa'i// sdig pa mi bzad dpal 'byor ni// dus kyis kham du byed pa nyid// 'khor bar dus min dag tu bsam yas dus ni stabs dang ldan pa 'dis// 
208a8(mdo 'grel): skyes bu so so dag la skal pa'i mtha' ni so sor ster byed cing // shin tu che ba'i rmongs pas blo bcom re ba'i 'ching ba brtan po yis// yul gyi bde ba'i tshogs la sems byed skyes bu rnams kyi rtse dga' 
208b1(mdo 'grel): 'joms// zhes pa bsams nas mi bdag ni// 'tshe ba'i nyon phongs las phyir phyogs// dbyug pa shing shun bzung nas ni// mtshan mo dka' thub nags su song // de nas blon po g.yul zhugs pas/ 
208b2(mdo 'grel): de ni song ba thos gyur nas// 'jig rten la bsgribs dgra bo ni// sgra thogs rgyags pas 'phyar la smras// nags su glang chen myos pa dag/ drag po'i sgra ni ma sgrogs shig/ 'dir ni seng+ge sprin gyi sgra/ 
208b3(mdo 'grel): bzod pa min pa rnam par gnas// zhes smra brtan pa de dag gis// rje yi bya dga' stug po dang // go chas lus ni rab g.yogs te// g.yul du g.yul ni rab tu sprad// skabs der ko sa la dag+ha tu// tham/ 
208b4(mdo 'grel): ze ser s+ya zhes bya ba// rgyal po dbyig gi go cha yi// nor gyi chad pas gzir bar gyur// ma lus nor byin dbul ba la// mang po sbyin par mi bzod pa// bu dang gnyen rnams mtha' dag ni// btson khang nang du/ 
208b5(mdo 'grel): rnam par bkod// gnyen tshan bcings pas sdug bsngal bas// bcos pa'i thabs ni rab bsams de// grogs po rgyal zin pa yi// ri drags bzhin du g.yo ba med// bdag gi pha ma sring mo dang // 
208b6(mdo 'grel): spun zla bu mo bu dag kyang // btson dag tu bcings gyur pa// nor med na ni grol mi 'gyur// sa bdag chos la sdang ba yis// gang na chags pa rab tu 'jug/ nyon mongs dag gis brlan pa yi// yul de rab 
208b7(mdo 'grel): tu btang bas 'tsho// yang na gnyen gyi 'ching thag gis// skye bo rtag tu bcings rnams kyis// sdug par gyur kyang yul dag ni// rab tu btang bar ji ltar nus// de slad nyon mongs nad 'di la// nor ni nye bar 
208b8(mdo 'grel): bsgrubs pa phan// nor ni thar min gdung ba gang // de ni 'jig rten dag na med// nor ni phun tshogs gya gyu ni// smad 'tshong ma bzhin rnam 'gyur can// don du gnyer na 'bros par byed// don du ma gnyer rang nyid// / 
209a1(mdo 'grel): 'ong // ro bral 'khri shing rnying pa bzhin// ring skabs rjes su 'ching ldan pa'i// 'gar ni 'ga' tshe tshegs chen gyis// g.yog la 'bras bu med pa nyid// slong ba dam pa'i skye bos spangs/ 
209a2(mdo 'grel): ngo tsha'i rdul gyis yongs su rgyas// dman pa brgya yi lhag min// 'bras bur bcas kyang 'bras med nyid// dang po'i dus su nye bar 'ongs pa'i rol sngon du bsnyen bkur cha// de nas nor gyis cha bslangs yongs 
209a3(mdo 'grel): su 'dris las bkur ba rnam par nyams// sred pas blo gros g.yo ldan slong ba'i tshogs rnams nang du rnam bsams shing // skad cig las ni re ba'i 'ching ba yangs par byed cing dogs par byed// chags pa'i rang 
209a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin 'jig rten 'dir// nor gyis yon tan su zhig 'dzin// de slad thabs kun dman gyur pa// bdag ni 'gro ba med pa nyid// grib ma don gnyer lam bzang bzhin// rten med yid la de ba yis// ngal bas 
209a5(mdo 'grel): thob par ma gyur to// skye bo'i nags tshal mchog tu shin tu stug por gyur pa 'dir// gang zhig rgyun tu skye bo slong la 'bras bu kun ster yang // nam yang 'dar bar mi 'gyur dud pa nyid kyang mi gtong ba// rgyud 
209a6(mdo 'grel): la dam pa'i ljon shing de ni gang yang rnyed ma gyur// bsod nams mi dmanas yi dbang // spong ba kun gyi dpag bsam shing // phongs pa'i gdung ba mchog tu 'phrog/ snying stobs 'o ma'i rgya mtsho thos// 
209a7(mdo 'grel): de ltar yang dge bsams nas des// rib bcas pas brtan pa yi// lam nas dga' bas sna drangs te// mi bdag lta bar 'dod pas chus// de nas de yid la bu yis// grong mtha'i dka' thub nags 
209a8(mdo 'grel): su phyin// mi bdag shing los yongs bkris pa// lam gyi yongs su dub pas mthong // bkres skomangal bas gzir ba de// mi bdag gis kyang mthong gyur nas// snying rje'i rgya mtshos ring po nas/ 
209b1(mdo 'grel): 'ong ba yi ni rgyu mtshan dris// de la de yis rang gi spyod// shugs rings tsha bas gsal byas pa// bshad nas gnyen rnams bcings pa yi// sdug bsngal gyis gzir slar yang bshad// gnyen ni bcings pa
209b2(mdo 'grel): dgrol ba'i slad// mi bdag slong ba'i lha yi shing // bsod nams mi dman lta ba la// gser don gnyer ba bdag 'ongs so// thugs ni snying rjes rdzogs gyur pa// dpal ldan 'jig rten mgon po de// mthong ba 
209b3(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi 'phral la ni// bdag gi brnag pa rdzogs par gyur// nyon mongs gdung ba nyams mi byed// smad pa yis ni sun mi 'byin// dus ni rnyengs pa ma yin par// skye bo chen po 'bras bu skye// skye dgu rnams kyi dbul
209b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i rab rib mi bzad 'phrog byed cing // grags pa rab tu gsal ba'i 'byor pas phyogs rnams yongs su 'gengs// dri med yid ni mngon par rings byed dga' ba dag gi gnyen// lha yi bdud rtsi'i zer des bdag/ 
209b5(mdo 'grel): gi gdung ba 'phrog par 'gyur// zhes pa de yis bshad thos nas// sa yi bdag po gzir bar gyur// bcos thabs med pa'i gdung ba dag/ 'phos pa yis ni yang dag bsams// kyi ma bdag gi rgyal 
209b6(mdo 'grel): srid btang // dus min 'dir ni gnyis skyes kyis// bsams te bkres pas nyen pa yis// lam gyi shing ni skam po bzhin// slong ba rnams la lam ring gi/ ngal ba 'bral med gdung ba ste// ri dgas sred 
209b7(mdo 'grel): skyes chu lta bu// rmongs pa skyed byed bdag smad do// kha la rdo bsnun mtshungs pa yis// brgyal bar gyur bzhin don gnyer rnams// re ba nyams pas lam du ni// yongs ngal lci ba nyid du 'gyur// rgyal po 
209b8(mdo 'grel): de ni bdag yin te// rgyal srid btang nas nags tshal bsten// ces pa thos nas bram ze 'di// 'phral la srog ni gtong bar 'gyur// 'di nas rgyal po'i gnas phyin te// bsams paM dag ni ma thob nas// 
210a1(mdo 'grel): yid la re ba nyams pa 'di// gdang bas ci zhig byed par 'gyur// slong rnams phyir bzlog bzhin log tsha ba'i shugs rings dag gis gdung byed cing // kun tu rtog pas lus dman
210a2(mdo 'grel): chung ngur byas shing gang las mi 'gro ba// nyon mongs dus su mi rnams sems la 'phral la rab tu gsal ba gang // dge ldan yongs su skyob gnyen bsngags 'os gcig pu de nyid 'tsho ba yin// rang nyid rab 
210a3(mdo 'grel): bsrungs gdung ba'i nyams myong shes shing ri byi'i lto ba'i phug du thags byas te// smin byed me yi rab tu gdung ba'i byed pas khyab cing 'tshed pa'i bya ba yongs su 'dris gyur kyang // slong ba'i tshogs kyi sred pa
210a4(mdo 'grel): drag pos bskyed pa'i mi bzad gdung ba 'phrog pa min pa gang // skye bo 'gron po'i gdung bshugs rings che bsaM ba gol zhing 'phel bar 'gyur byed rgya mtsho'i skye ba smad// de ltar skad cig bsams byas nas// 
210a5(mdo 'grel): chu dang 'bras bus mgron byas te// mi stan smra bas 'jigs 'jigs bzhin// mi yi bdag pos de la smras// bsod nams mi dman rgyal po // bram ze dgra bsod sbyor ba'i tshe// tshe las chags 
210a6(mdo 'grel): bral rgyal srid ni// yongs su btang nas dben pa bsten// sa skyong longs spyod 'tshe ba'i 'bras// smin 'byog lta bur mi brtan par// gsar pa'i khrag gis spags pa ni// srin po bzhin du longs spyod byed// 
210a7(mdo 'grel): gnas min 'dugs ci zhig gyur// khyod ni dus min nye bar 'ongs// cung zad bdag gis nus pa gang // de ni bsdams pa med par brjod// ces pa rgyal po'i tshig thos nas// rdo rjes yang dge bcom pa 
210a8(mdo 'grel): bzhin// gnyen thar re bzal ba las// de ni sa la 'gyel bar gyur// brgyal zhing sa la 'gyel ba de// mthong nas mig ni mchi mar bcas// snyan pa'i tshig gis dbugs byung nas// rgyal pos slar yang rab 
210b1(mdo 'grel): bsams pa// kye ma bdag ni bsod nams dman// mya ngan lam dang mtshungs pa 'dir// spong ba'i re ba'i 'khri shing gis// myu gu 'phral la skams par gyur// nor don gnyer ba thun po'i 'dod pas dang por 
210b2(mdo 'grel): gnas min slong ba 'bras bcas bsams// re ba'i myu gus 'dod pa'i bde ba ma lus yal ga stong gi mngon par bris// de nas a mra thob par ma gyur seng ldeng skam pos bzhin du skad cig la// shin tu 
210b3(mdo 'grel): che ba'i rtsom pa nyams shing re thag chad pas 'phral la brgyal bar 'gyur// bsrangs nas rnyed pa chung ngu zhig/ gal te 'di la bdag gis byin// bsod snyoms bsrangs kyang ltogs gyur pa// 'di la des 
210b4(mdo 'grel): kyang ci zhig byed// gal te rna chag rnying pa dag gis thog pub khyim ni de nyid du gnas shing // gang yang bud med bye la'i phru gu thab tu nyal la rtse ldan de dag gis// gal te rkang pa nyid kyis 'gro zhing slar yang de ni bstan 
210b5(mdo 'grel): bya de lta na// da ni nges par sa bdag skad cig mthong dang mgu ba la yang yon tan ci// blo gros rtse ba'i nor 'dzin gyis// de ltar bsams nas 'dzin pa dbang // de 'dod bslab par chas gyur pas// rab 
210b6(mdo 'grel): sad byas te de la spras// longs shig bram ze khyod kyi ni// 'dod pa grub slad mi thogs par// 'bras bu 'thob pa'i thabs kyi mchog/ bdag gis yang dag rnyed par gyur// re zhig bdag gi mgo bcad nas/ 
210b7(mdo 'grel): sod ste sa bdag tshangs byin la// byin na de ni dga' ba yis// khyod la nor dag ster bar 'gyur// slong ba'i tsan dan ljon pa de'i// tshig de thos nas gnyis skyes ni// rna bar rab zhugs gdung ba yis// khab 
210b8(mdo 'grel): kyis phug bzhin rab smras pa// srid gsum snying po skye ba ni// 'gro ba'i bsod nams kyis thob pa// khyod kyi mgrin pa 'di la mtshon// brlang po sdig can su zhig bsnun// chags pas blo gros nyams pa ru// 
211a1(mdo 'grel): khyod la mi phan sems par byed// sa ha kA ra sol ba yi// nA ru ma rungs su zhig byed// ces smra bram ze de la ni// mi yi bdag pos lan smras pa// 'tsho yang bdag ni bcings pa yis// 
211a2(mdo 'grel): dgra bo de yi drung du khyer// rgyal pos 'bad pas don gter bas// sa bdag dgra yi dogs pa can// tshangs byin dag gis drung du ni// de yis de ni bcings nas khyer// de yis khyer nas 'ongs pa yi// sa dbang // 
211a3(mdo 'grel): de blangs tshangs pas byin// 'dod pa bas kyang mngon lhag byin// bsod nams mi dman mi bdag gis ni snying stobs ngo mtshar bram zes bshad thos nas// khon gyi rnam 'gyur shin tu bzod dka' ma rungs 
211a4(mdo 'grel): nyid du mngon brjod dug btang ste// rang gnas shin tu mtho bar de ni mgo bzhin bzhag nas tshangs byin rang nyid kyis// de yi zhabs kyi chu skyes dag la gtsug gtor phreng bas skad cig mdza' bar byas// de ni dul 
211a5(mdo 'grel): b.rab thob rang gyi grong khyer song ba'i tshe// yongs btang rgyal srid yang dag thob nas bsod nams mi dman pas// grags pa ltar dkar dbu ba'i phreng ba g.yo ldan chu gter gyis// du gu la yis rnam mdzes 
211a6(mdo 'grel): sa gzhi chos kyis bsnyungs par 'gyur// khyab bdag bsod nams mi dman du gyur gang deng nyid de// gang du dus kyis dge 'dun mang po'i zhabs kyis mngon dga'i sa// mi rnams dag gi srid pa grol 
211a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i rgyu ni 'byung 'gyur ba// 'dir ding de yi spyod tshul srid pa'i snying po dag gis dran// sngon gyi rtogs pa brjod pa gsung mdzad bcom ldan 'das kyi ni// spyod tshul sems dpa' rab 'bar thos nas 
211a8(mdo 'grel): ya mtshan rgyas pa yis// dga' bas reg par gyur pa mtho ris bdag po'i lus la ni// spu long 'dab ma mdzes pas spras pa ci yang byung bar gyur// ces po dag pa'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub 
211b1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// mi dman pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / legs bshad mgrin par rnam gnas bla ma la 
211b2(mdo 'grel): 'dud mgo dang rna bar thos pa dang // zhal ni rtag tu skyon med bden pa dang ldan mkhas pa rnams ni dga' ba'i rgyan// rin chen yid 'ong rab gsal do shal bkod pa bkra ba'i khyad par dang bcas pa// chas ldan bud med 
211b3(mdo 'grel): chas kyi skye bo lhag ma rnams ni mchog tu tshim pa skye// gzhan du bcom ldan 'dzum ldan la// brgya byin bsam pa shes pa yis// 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni dris pa can// thams cad mkhyen pas yang gsungs pa// 
211b4(mdo 'grel): ba ra NA sir mi yi bdag/ legs bshad tshol ba zhes pa byung // gang gis grags pa dri med rigs// dpal gyi phreng ba bzhin du mdzes// yon tan skud ldan legs spyod zlum// dben ldan rnams kyi 
211b5(mdo 'grel): snying le chags// mu tig gi min legs bshad kyi// rgyan nyid gang zhig don gnyer gyur// gang gis mdzod dpal slong rnams la// rtag tu btang yang g.yo ba med// grags pa yon tan la brtags
211b6(mdo 'grel): kyang // ring las shin tu ring bar 'gro// rgyal po'i dang pa snyan dngags mkhan// nyams ldan mchog gis rtag bskor te// mkhas pa'i mdun sa pad ldan la// longs spyod skal bzang ldan par gyur// 
211b7(mdo 'grel): nye bar bstan la rab zhugs pa// de yi legs bshad yon tan can// mar me'i rtse mo lta bu yis// skye bo rmongs pa'i rab rib phrogs// nam zhig mdun sar blo bzang de// 'dug pas legs bshad/ 
211b8(mdo 'grel): gtam gyi ni// mjug tu tho bzang zhes pa yi// blon po'i gtsol rab smras pa// legs pa'i sgra dang tshig la zhon// yon tan rgyan dang yang dag ldan// khyed rnams dag gi legs bshad kyis// 
212a1(mdo 'grel): mdun sa dag gi bkad bzhin mdzes// legs par smin cing ro dang ldan// legs par bshad pa gsar pa ni// me tog lta bu 'ga' zhig ni// khyed kyis rnyed par gyur tam ci// 
212a2(mdo 'grel): legs bshad rnams dang mthu rnams dang // dog pa rnams kyang rgyas pa ni// gsar pa kho na yid 'phrog ste// bud med rnams kyi lang tsho bzhin// ro dang ldan yang rnam par yangs pa'i me tog don mthun yongs 
212a3(mdo 'grel): btang nas// yongs 'dris yongs su 'dor zhing ring nas ring du rjes su rgyu byed pa// gsar pa gsar pa'i sbrang rtsil chags rkang drug pa ni nags rnams su// rtag tu nyams su myong gyur rin chen man+da ra las 'khyam 
212a4(mdo 'grel): par byed// mdun sa 'dir ni cung zad gang // legs bshad rin chen rnam dpyad de// yongs su rtag pas thar pa de// kun tu rin thang med par 'gyur// mkhas pa nyid ni medan tho gros rnam nyams mi rnam 
212a5(mdo 'grel): 'tsho ba don yod min// mtshungs med rgyas pa'i snyan dngags med na mkhas pa nyid ni ne tse'i klog dang mtshungs// snying ldan rnams kyis nang gi de nyid spyod pa med na rab mdzes snyan dngags ni// stong pa nyid
212a6(mdo 'grel): de dben sa'i khron pa'i mar me bzhin du nang du bsten par gyur// de yi slad du gnas skabs 'dir// khu byug sgra yis bye zla bzhin// legs bshad go skabs grogs po yis// gsar pa cung zad brjod 
212a7(mdo 'grel): par mdzod// gal te skad cig de nyid shes pas mchog tu yid rton sgrub byed na// tshig rnams kyi ni dza ti'i dri bzang ngo mtshar ba dag skyed par byed// ji srid skye bo legs bzhin brjod la go skabs med pa ma 
212a8(mdo 'grel): thob min// de lta na yang mchog gi tshogs la lhag par bltar byas 'bras bral ba// de gad mi mgon gyis brjod pa// blo ldan snying la reg pa'i chog/ thos nas blon po chen po yis// sa yi bdag la 
212b1(mdo 'grel): lan gsol pa// rgyal po khyod kyi tshigs bcad nyid// mngon par gsar ba srid gsum na// grogs na mkhas pa'i dbang phyug dag/ legs bshad rgyas pa gzhan gyis ci// gus ldan gtong phod mchod gyur khyod// 
212b2(mdo 'grel): rig pa dag la 'gyes pa 'dir// sa yi mthil 'di thams cad ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i grong khyer gyur// khyod ni yon tan ldan pa'i grogs// sna rtsal pad+mo ldan pas mdzes// shar tshe skye bo mtha' dag ni// snang 
212b3(mdo 'grel): bcas legs pa'i lam nas 'gro// gang dang gang la rgyal po rjes su chags pas skad cig ni// gus pa'i cha shas byas pa'i sgyu rtsal dag ni de dang de// rtse dga'i chas kyi bye brag de de yon tan de de dang // skye bo spyad 
212b4(mdo 'grel): tshul de de 'jig rten dga' ba nyid du 'gyur// sa myong mkhas na rig pa'i rtse dga' sprol mchog tu reg par 'gyur// dpa' na g.yul gyi rol pa dang 'grogs brtul zhugs brtul zhugs 'dzin par 'gyur// blun 
212b5(mdo 'grel): na rmongs shing g.yo na rnam par g.yol gdug na ma rung spyod// gang gangs bdag byed pa de de mtha' dag skye bo byed par 'gyur// me tog 'byung gnas legs pa yis// me tog rgyas byed nyams dang ldan// sa 
212b6(mdo 'grel): bdag rang nyid mkhas pa dang // skye dgu'i bsod nams nyid kyi 'byung // skye bo legs spyod blo ldan blon po dang // mi bdag mkhas shing bden par smra byed pa// 'di dag rnams ni dge ba dar ba'i dus// mngon 
212b7(mdo 'grel): sum du mtshon mtshan nyid bzang po yin// gang zhig gnas dang gnas su dgos don nyid la blo ldan blo na gar byed cing // gang zhig 'byor tshe legs ldan bdag nyid bdag nyid rnams kyi legs bshad rna ba'i rgyan 
212b8(mdo 'grel): dugyur// gang 'di mi bdag bdag nyid che rgyas rgya yis dbul ba'i dbyangs can dag gi ster// 'di ni rang nyid dam pa'i cho ga dag la rig pa'i khyim thab spro dga' yin// rgyal po'i bkur ba chen po yis/ 
213a1(mdo 'grel): mdun sa dag gi bkad bzhin mdzes// legs par smin cing ro dang ldan// legs par bshad pa gsar pa ni// me tog lta bu 'ga' zhig ni// khyed kyis rnyed par gyur tam ci// 
213a2(mdo 'grel): legs bshad rnams dang mthu rnams dang // dog pa rnams kyang rgyas pa ni// gsar pa kho na yid 'phrog ste// bud med rnams kyi lang tsho bzhin// ro dang ldan yang rnam par yangs pa'i me tog don mthun yongs 
213a3(mdo 'grel): btang nas// yongs 'dris yongs su 'dor zhing ring nas ring du rjes su rgyu byed pa// gsar pa gsar pa'i sbrang rtsal chags rkang drug pa ni nags rnams su// rtag tu nyams su myong gyur rin chen man+da ra las 'khyam 
213a4(mdo 'grel): par byed// mdun sa 'dir ni cung zad gang // legs bshad rin chen rnam dpyad de// yongs su rtag pas thar pa de// kun tu rin thang med par 'gyur// mkhas pa nyid ni med na blo gros rnam nyams mi rnam 
213a5(mdo 'grel): 'tsho ba don yod min// mtshungs med rgyas pa'i stan dngags med na mkhas pa nyid ni ne tso'i klog dang mtshungs// snying ldan rnams kyis nang gi de nyid spyod pa med na rab mdzes snyan dngags ni// stong pa nyid 
213a6(mdo 'grel): de dben sa'i khron pa'i mar me bzhin du nang du bsten par gyur// de yi slad du gnas skabs 'dir// khu byug sgra yis bye zla bzhin// legs bshad go skabs grogs po yis// gsar pa cung zad brjod 
213a7(mdo 'grel): par mdzod// gal te skad cig de nyid shes pas mchog tu yid rton sgrub byed na// tshig rnams kyi ni dza ti'i dri bzang ngo mtshar ba dag skyed par byed// ji srid skye bo legs bzhin brjod la go skabs med pa ma 
213a8(mdo 'grel): thob min// de lta na yang mchog gi tshogs la lhag par bltar byas 'bras bral ba// de skad mi mgon gyis brjod pa// blo ldan stong la reg pa'i tshig/ thos nas blon po chen po yis// sa yi bdag la 
213b1(mdo 'grel): bla mas phyag 'tshal bla ma bzhin// mchu mdzes dmar ba phya ba'i so yi 'od// yal 'dab lta bu 'dzin cing rab smras pa// khyod ni rtag tu legs pa'i legs bshad rnams// bsdu la rab tu 'bad pa bdag gis 
213b2(mdo 'grel): thos// skye bo'i lam bstan slad du lags bshad kyi// rin chen sgron ma gsar pa cung zad stsol// rang gzugs rol pas zla ba'i dregs 'joms shing // dpal gyi 'jo sgeg 'dzum pa'i rtse dga' ba skyed// 
213b3(mdo 'grel): mun pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms pa'i do shal 'di// khyod kyi de yi dong po'i rang bzhin yin// zhes brjod do shal 'od kyis phyogs khengs pa// sa yi 'byer 'jig dag gis de la bstan// rmi lam re bo rnams
213b4(mdo 'grel): la rnyed dka' de// rngon pas mthong nas dal gyis rab bsams pa// klog cing bdag la sbyin bya byin nas kyang // phyi nas 'di ni nges par gdung bar 'gyur// 'di ni 'jig rten pha rol sar 'das na// do shal rnga 
213b5(mdo 'grel): ltar bdag rang nyid du 'gyur// skad cig 'di bsams de la des smras pa// dge ba dam tshig gis ni legs bshad bzhin// gal te ri 'di'i rtse las rang gis lus// legs bshad thob pa'i 'phral la
213b6(mdo 'grel): mchod na'o// gdug pa'i sems ldan rngon pa'i tshig de dag/ thos nas sa yi bdag pos rab bsams pa// kye ma nges par 'du byed ldan pa 'di// dgag pa'i bya spyod dag la mngon par sbyor// ring du yon tan
213b7(mdo 'grel): bskrun par grags gyur cing // mngon du ngan pa'i spyod pa mtshon gyur pa// bsam pa g+ha g+hu rnams kyi grags pa gzhan// de bzhin spyod tshul gzhan de mtshungs pa min// ngan pa 'di ci nags mthar gnas pa 
213b8(mdo 'grel): ci// sems can 'tshe ci yon tan mngon sbyor ci// legs bshad brjod ci brtse ba med nyid kyi// kye ma 'di yi spyod tshul rmongs pas bcom// rgyun du mdun nas snyan pa'i glu len cing // nags kyi brtul zhugs// / 
214a1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis zhi bzhin mdzes// srid ldan rngon pa'i yon tan bsdu ba 'di// srog ni 'brog byed ci zhig brjod pa 'am// rig pa'i khyad par dag la 'bad byas kyang // mi srun nges par brlang 
214a2(mdo 'grel): po'i rang bzhin nyid// gdengs ka'i rin chen mdzes 'dzin sbrul rnams ni// gdug pa'i mun pa khro ba'i rang bzhin 'dzin// bstan bcos man ngag rnams kyis dag byas kyang // nges par spong na rab dang nyid mi 'gyur// 
214a3(mdo 'grel): ga pur tshogs kyis yongs su bsgos gyur kyang // mi bzad sgog pa rang gi dri mi gtong // yun ring 'di spyod yon tan don gnyer des// gsar pa'i nyer bstan nyan par mngon 'dod las// legs bshad stsol cig 
214a4(mdo 'grel): sa 'dzin dos rtse las// phyi nas lus ni dor bar bya zhes smras// bden pa'i nor ldan de yi tshig thos nas// do shal 'od kyis gtsug pag khang blangs te// bzung bar mdzod ces brjod nas phra mor ni// rigs 
214a5(mdo 'grel): pa min la chags pas brjod par brtsams// rang bde'i lam gyi drag tu gdung byed sdig dang nyon mongs reg mi bya// tshul khrims kyis kyang dge ba'i gnas kyi bsod nams tshogs la mchog tu bsten// g.yo ba'i 
214a6(mdo 'grel): yul gyi nyams myong dag la lhag par chags pa'i sems 'di ni// chags dang bral zhing mngon 'dod mtha' yas chog shes dag gis tshim par bya// 'di ni bde gshegs bstan pa dag dang rab zhi rgyal srid sa ng+ge 
214a7(mdo 'grel): khri// mi rnams dag gi gdung ba skyob byed dge ba'i chos ni thun mong shing// yid 'byung rnam par sel byed srid pa'i rnam 'gyur dag ni kun tu 'joms// yid kyi ma long dag byed legs byas tshogs ni nye bar bsgrub 
214a8(mdo 'grel): ba yin// legs bshad 'di ni mi bdag de nyid rjes su 'brang bas ri dgas dgra las rnyed// legs bshad don ni dri med bdag nyid dge byed de yang steng la rnam bkod nas// shin tu mtho ba'i ri yi rtse mor 'dzags 
214b1(mdo 'grel): nas lus ni rab tu btang bang gyur// bsod nams yid ldan rnams ni shin tu bden pa 'dod kyi g.yo ba'i lus 'di min// 'gro rnams yang dag bsgral slad smon lam dag ni nang nyid du// bzung nas de ni ri 
214b2(mdo 'grel): yi rtse las ji srid ltung gyur pa// de srid ri yi gnas bstan rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i// gnod sbyin gyis bsrungs lus ni sa la rab tu phyin par gyur// de yi brtson 'grus ya mtshan dbang gis bzhin du 
214b3(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gsum// 'dar bar gyur cing bar snang las kyang me tog char bab che// gnas skabs gsum pa'i tshogs kyi spyod tshul yang dag mchod gyur pa'i// rgyal po dal gyis rang gi rgyal po'i pho brang dag 
214b4(mdo 'grel): tu song // de nas der ni phan par rab zhugs sa yi dbang po yis// nye bar bstan pa'i yul can legs par bshad pa de yis ni// rtag tu skye bo ma lus srid pa zil gyis gnon byed pa// chos kyi bde ba rtag 
214b5(mdo 'grel): pa dam pa'i las la 'god pa bsgrubs// gnas skabs 'dir ni tsheng dus dag gis lam du rngon pa 'di// do shal btsong ba'i blo yis yongs su rgyu bar byed pa na// 'di ni chom rkun pa zhes mtshungs med bab tshol
214b6(mdo 'grel): 'dar ldan pa// sa bdag mdun sar grong khyer srung ba'i skye bos khyer bar 'gyur// ring po nyid nas do shal 'od zer rab gsal rnam 'phro chags gyur pa// srog ni 'joms pas dam tshig bsgrubs pa de ni rgyal 
214b7(mdo 'grel): pos shes gyur nas// 'di ni bdag gi slob dpon zhi ba'i yon tan gsal ba'i legs bshad ston// mchod 'od 'di zhes btud byas mchod pa byas nas de ni btang bar gyur// de ltar mi bdag legs
214b8(mdo 'grel): bshad ces bya bden pa'i brtul zhugs snying stobs ldan par gyur// de nyid dus kyis slar yang rdzogs pa'i byang chub gter thob bdag nyid pa yin no// rang gi spyod tshul bcom ldan gyis bshad de dag thos nas 
215a1(mdo 'grel): lha rnams bdag po ni// dga' bas sbyin gyi nags tshal rnam par rgyas pa pad+mo'i 'byung gnas dpal bsten gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs 
215a2(mdo 'grel): pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// legs bshad tshol ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// / rgya che grags pa bsten pa'i bsngags 'os ri bong can ltar 
215a3(mdo 'grel): mdzes// gtsug gi nor bu gzhan gyi don la skyob med pa'i dung // gang zhig srog ni song bar gyur kyang legs pa'i sgra yi gnas// bkra shis gter gyis 'jig rten dag gi dge ba rgyas par byed// me tog can ma 
215a4(mdo 'grel): zhes pa yis// mtshan rgyu btul nas bcom ldan 'das// ri drags 'phrog byed brtul zhugs ni// ngogs med ldan pa'i tshal na bzhugs// der ni rjes song brgya byin gyis// slar yang 'dzum ldan dag la dris// 
215a5(mdo 'grel): de yi sngon spyod dran gyur nas// 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rab tu gsungs// lo ni stong phrag bdun nu gnyis// skye bo tshe ring gyur tshe sngon// grong khyer dbang chen ldan zhes pa// mtho ris dga' ba thul bar gyur// der ni nor 
215a6(mdo 'grel): gyi blo gros bdag/ dbang chen sde zhes bya ba byung // gang gi grags pa ga pur gyi// sdong bus phyogs ni mun bral byas// gang zhig sman padam pa bzhin// dgra yi dregs pa'i rims bcom zhing // skabs ngan 
215a7(mdo 'grel): bsten pa'i nad phrogs te// skye dgu sred bral rnal gnas bslabs// bsod nams tshogs ni rnam bcas nyid// gyur pa bzhin du de yi bu// sems can kun la phan brtson pa// sems can sman zhes bya bar 
215a8(mdo 'grel): gyur// de ni bskal pa bzang po pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpas brgyan// snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms dang // byams pa rnams kyi grogs su gyur// grong dang grong khyer nags mtha' dang // 
215b1(mdo 'grel): phyogs dang gling rnams thams cad nas// nad pa 'ongs rnams rtag tu ni// de yis reg pas bsos par gyur// skye bo'i nags 'dir dam pa de// tsan dan bzhin du ci yang spyod// gang gis lus kyi gzhan
215b2(mdo 'grel): phan ni// mi chung rab tu rgyas par byed// chen po'i nad kyis gdung ba rnams// de yis 'phral la bde bar bsgrubs// ngan pa'i nyon mongs gdung ba rnams// dam pa dag dang 'grogs pa bzhin// don gnyer rnams kyi 
215b3(mdo 'grel): lus kyi nad// reg pa dang ni sems kyi yang // nor gyi phrogs pas phyogs rnams su// nad pa med cing slong med gyur// de nas dus kyi rtse dga' ni// ngo mtshar thams cad 'phrog byed pa// skye bo'i bsod
215b4(mdo 'grel): nams yongs zad las// dpal ldan de ni mtho ris so// bdud rtsi'i zer ni nyin 'ga' mig rnams dag gi myang bya'i bdag nyid 'gyur// yon tan dri bzang spro ba'i me tog rnams ni skad cig gnas pa'i tshogs// 
215b5(mdo 'grel): dus min dus ni 'dod pas mchog tu dga' ba shin tu gcod la mkhas// ci yang 'di ni su yi yid la zug rngu lta bur sgrub ma yin// gang zhig yid 'ong bsod nams yangs pa'i zong gis rnyed gyur pa// gdung ba 
215b6(mdo 'grel): kun gyi sman dang 'bad med bde ba skad cig gis// nges par dus kyi cha yis 'joms pa de de mthong gyur nas// blon po rnams ni dben pa'i cha la nam yang mi reg go/ de nas de grags lhag ma'i tshe// dang po de 
215b7(mdo 'grel): bral las skyes pa'i// sdug bsngal btang nas nad rang bzhin// skye bo rang gi sdug bsngal bsten// de nas gzhon nu dag gis lus// mtshan nyid shes pa'i blon po yis// nags kyi mtha' ru rab bsrungs te// 
215b8(mdo 'grel): skye bo rnams la phan slad bkod// me tog 'khri shing gis rgyas pa// rdzing bu dge' ba'i gnas der ni// bsod nams bzhin du de yi lus// rnyings pa med pa nyid du gnas// rebs phyogs mtha' las 'ongs pa/
