236b4(mdo 'grel): skyes bu la// ster zhes 'di ni rmongs pa'i gtam// 'dab ma tsam yang dus min du// de nyid rang la sbyin nus med// gal te de ni byin rlob lhas// mchod pa la chags byed pa na// bdag nyid rang gis mchod pa ni// 
236b5(mdo 'grel): yo byad rdzogs pa cis mi spo// srin bu'i rjes ni yi ge bzhin// gang yang thob bya thob pa na// bya rog ta la ltar brjod pas// skye bo de yis byin par sems// gang zhig thob bya de ni las rnams 'bras bu yongs su gyur tshe/ 
236b6(mdo 'grel): 'thob// sna tshogs 'bad cing gus pas bsgrubs kyang thob bya min pa 'thob ma yin// gang zhig gang gis rang nyid kyis bsags longs spyod skal ldan de la ni// 'di dag 'di yis byas shes rmongs pa'i blo can 'bras 
236b7(mdo 'grel): med de dag sems// zhes pa sma de mdza' gzugs dang // ldan pa'i gnyen gyis rab 'bad de// bskul nas gcig pu gsang ba yis// rkang 'thung gi ni drung du sang // swa re bzung nas de yis ni// n+ya gro d+ha yi shing la spras/ 
236b8(mdo 'grel): mchod pa'am rtsa ba gcod pa la// nga ni chas nas khyod can 'ong // bu dag sbyin na khyod la bdag/ gzhan gyis ma byas mchod pa byed// rnam pa gzhan du khyed bdag gis// bcad bsogs btags la chu bor 'phang / 
237a1(mdo 'grel): zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas// lha ni shing la gnas pa dag/ 'phral la 'jigs pas 'khrugs gyur te// 'dar bar byed cing rab bsams pa// 'dod pa'i bu'am nor dag ni// bdag gis// 
237a2(mdo 'grel): sula'ang byin pa med// rang gi las kyis thob pa la// skye ba bdag gis byin par sems// gang 'di skabs kyis bu spang zhing // las kyis sbyar bas mthob na// lha nyid gcod du 'ongs byur ba// 'di ni sngon 
237a3(mdo 'grel): tshad med pa 'ongs// 'bras don gnyer bas mchod bya ni// mchod pa gang 'di lugs tsam te// las kyis bcings pa'i 'bras thob pa// su yis byin zhing gang du lha// skyes bu rang gis las kyi nad/ 
237a4(mdo 'grel): bsos pa grub pa min pa la// hUMs mkhan 'dzin pa nyid ma yin// sman pa ma yin bsngags pa'ang min// bya min byed pa 'di la ni// shing ni bcad par rnam rtag yod// tshul min dag la mngon zhen 
237a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i// bag med rnams la bya min ci// shing ni bcad na gzhan du bdag/ gnas par mi nus bde ba med// 'grogs pas goms can dga' ba ni// thub pa rnams la'ang sdug bsngal bskyed/ 
237a6(mdo 'grel): de dag bsams nas brgya byin gyi// khang par myur bar desang nas// don da de la brjod nas ni// yongs su grag pas slar smras pa// rtag tu bdag ni ljon pa der// skye bo rnams kyis mchod gyur kyang // sna tshogs/ 
237a7(mdo 'grel): den srong nyer gnas pas// bdag ni shin tu gzir bar gyur// 'ga' yis legs byas dag las thob// 'ga' zhig la ni 'ogazugs gyur// gam rmongs mi sran brtul zhugs kyis// gzhan ni de nyid na rab 
237a8(mdo 'grel): chags// sang ba'i rjes su 'grond kyis// skye bgrags pa la nyon rnams// gdung ba thams cad gzham pa'i slad// rmongs pas bdag can nyid du byug/ skya ba thagras mi bzebs// mi bzad gces par gyu 
237b1(mdo 'grel): bsam pa la yan nal// rmugs pas shA gta ma nus// d+hi ma chags pa'i zung ba da sus 'chi ba'i rnamangs ldan par 'jug// bdan dbyang nga shid ni 'dam kyi 'jigs pa ma / 
237b2(mdo 'grel): byung bas gzeng ba'i sku bdubs 'thugs pa'i man yang me da// gang la gang ni gan ma thad men yis b+ha ni dam par bzud// dasrid shing bral gdung bams// thab bdag dag ni bsgrub bdangs// ga 
237b3(mdo 'grel): kyi lus can rnams kyi gnas// gdang ba krus ni gtong ba'i mtshungs// zhes pad yas 'bad pa yis// gsal gtab po la mAdapa' bas// thim bdag gis ni bu 'thab pa'i// las byed pa ni yang dag 
237b4(mdo 'grel): bsapas// sabs deng smra man dgrab mas// sa gsum pa ye lA ya ba// tha bzang zhes bltung ba yis// dus labab pa mthang byung // me sun la brgyad grags parnams pa bzhin zeng badrim nA da 
237b5(mdo 'grel): cing // dam gyur spong ba bzhin du mdzes pa mud pa dag dang yongs 'dres byung bar gyur// bsod nams yongs su rbad las gnad pas bzhin du rdul gyis kyang ni gnas dag byas// zhe sdang sun bcas zla bzhin de 
237b6(mdo 'grel): ni ltung ba gsal byed dga' ba min par gyur// legs par rab sad yon tan can// sal dpal ldan grags pa yis// zla bzang bu nyid du song nas// de la lha yis bdag pas spras// des spras ston pa 
237b7(mdo 'grel): shAkya thub// bla med rgya che chos kyis ni// 'khor lo rab bskor mdzad pa'i// mdun du dus der gal te bdag/ rab tu byung ba 'dzin pa la// khyod kyis yang dag rtogs byed na// sa la legs par rab sad kyi/ 
237b8(mdo 'grel): bu nyid du ni bdag gis 'gro// lha yi bu yis 'di brjod las// brgya zin de bzhin zhes spras tshe// rjes gnang deni de nas 'phos// de yi chung ma'i dku ru zhugs// lhan rang gi gnas sa ste// legs par 
238a1(mdo 'grel): rab sad la rab smras// rab tu blang la mngon dga'i bu// dge ba khyod la 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes pa thos nas khyim bdag ni// rab tu mgu nas khyim song ste// bu ni rab tu 'byung ba/ 
238a2(mdo 'grel): dag/ bdag gis bzlog par bya zhes pa sems// de nas dus kyis de yi ni// chung ma rol pa ma zhes la// yan lag thams cad mtshan nyid ldan// byis pa gser 'od can de btsas// de skyes nyid na rin chen// 
238a3(mdo 'grel): ni// kun gyis rang bzhin gdugs 'khrungs te// legs byas dpal ni bla med dang // ngo mtshar gzugs dang ldan pa bzhin// mchog tu pha yi grags 'phel bas// rigs pa sna rtsal 'byor pa rnams// 
238a4(mdo 'grel): tshogs pa'i khang pa lta bu de// grags sbyin zhes ni bya bar gyur// lha yi tshig ni dran gyur nas// de ni rab tu byung dogs te// grong dang khang pa grong khyer gyis// sgo rnams pha yis srung ba byas// de nas brgya byin// 
238a5(mdo 'grel): mngon phyogs te// sngon gyi 'gro ba dran par byas// zhi bas dran pa rab byung la// mngon par phyogs shing gus par gyur// nam zhig rang gis skyed tshal du// dal gyis shing rta zhon 'gro des// bcom ldan rgyal 
238a6(mdo 'grel): ba ji zhig ltar// byon pa dag ni mthong bar gyur// snying la bde bas yang dag reg/ rab zhi bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa// de mthong nyid na 'phral la ni// shing rta dag las de yis babs// de la bskor ba gsum 
238a7(mdo 'grel): byas te// de yi zhabs par zung dag la// dang ba sa brlan pa de yi ni// spyan gyis gzigs pa des phyag 'tshal// de nas rab dang bcom ldan la// rabab tu dade yi rjes gnang gis// de nyid rnam par sems/ 
238a8(mdo 'grel): zhing de// rang gi skyed mos tshal du song // de nas bcom ldan 'dzum ldan pas// dge slong rta thul la gsungs pa// bdag gi drung du gzhon nu 'di// mtshan mo rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs bde// / 
238b1(mdo 'grel): gshegs rang gnas su// dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gshegs// brgya byin gyis sprul bud med lus// gzhon nu yis ni mthong gyur te// rnags shing rdul la mi gtsang ba// srin bu'i tshogs kyis 'khrugs shing / 
238b2(mdo 'grel): gnas// skyed mos tshal gyi ro mthong nas// chags bral ldan pa des bsams pa// dar bab gzugs ni mdzes pa dang // sdug pa rnam par 'gyur ba nyid// pags pa sha tshegs mi rnams kyi// rang bzhin de ni 
238b3(mdo 'grel): 'di nyid do// mig dag g.yo zhing nam zur ni rab rgyas ri bong can gyi 'od kyi mdzod// lus de lang tsho gsar pa dang bab mdzes sdug 'phro bar bgrang ba 'di dag ni// rul pa'i brlan gyis nges bran 'khrugs shing 
238b4(mdo 'grel): dman pa'i srin bu rnams kyis dkrigs// ngan cing rab mang bshar bas bsgos shing mtha' dag rgya cher 'khrul 'khor ma de nyid gyur// yan lag thams cad 'grogs par spro ba 'di la chags shing rmongs pas/ 
238b5(mdo 'grel): mig phrogs shing // nu ma'i dkyil 'khor la chags blo gros nyams pas mchog tu bde ba thob gyur pa// gang las wa skyes 'di ni chags bral bza' ba dag las phyir phyogs bzhin 'khyogs cing // mi gtsang dri 
238b6(mdo 'grel): bdag gis yid byung blo gros smras phyin ring du 'gro bar 'gyur// zhes bsams chags bral bag chags ni// sbas pa yang dag rgyas gyur te// de ni skyed tshal las phyor phyogs// rang gi khang par dal gyis 
238b7(mdo 'grel): song // skabs der nyin byed 'jig rten gyis// spyod tshul ro bral mthong bas bzhin// skyod zhing rab zhir mngon phyogs te// nyin par dag ni nyams par 'gyur// ngal dub ma lus yongs gtong bar/ 
238b8(mdo 'grel): 'os pa rab zhir 'gro 'dod cing // thun mtshams mkha' yi gos dmar bsten// nyin mo rab tu byung bzhin gyur// nyi ma srid pa'i mig dag ni// 'jig rten pha rol gnas sor tshe// 'jig rten yongs// 
239a1(mdo 'grel): btang nyin mo yang // de yi rjes 'brang nyid dgyur// de nas 'gro bsten gsar pa yis// rab rib mya ngan sbyor ba dag/ sgron ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba yis// brtsenas bzhin du rag/ 
239a2(mdo 'grel): tu bzlog/ skabs der ston pa rang nyid ni// grags sbyin dag la brtse ba yis// grong khyer klung 'gram pha rol tu// de thob slad du yang dag gshegs// grags sbyin gyis kyang nyin par gyis// nyon mongs mtshung// 
239a3(mdo 'grel): pa yang yang du// 'khor ba snying po med pa nyid// sems shing nyal ba'i khang par zhugs// gling bu rgyud mang rdza rnga sogs// rtse dgas ngal zhing gnyid log pa// mig zum rgyags pas 'khrugs pa yi// 
239a4(mdo 'grel): bud med rnams der de yis mthong // kha ni rgyud mangs la bkod cing // lag pa'i 'khri shing rdza rnga gtad// bde ba skad cig pa nyid kyi// sdug bsngal bsam gtan la zhugs bzhin// gos ral shi ba 
239a5(mdo 'grel): bzhin du na// g.yo med de dag mthong gyur nas// lhag par chags bral yang dag skyes// yun ring de yis yang dag bsams// kye ma yul ni 'di dag rnams// mjug tu mchog tu ro dang bral// 
239a6(mdo 'grel): bud med ces pa 'di lta la// rmongs pa rnams ni mchog tu gus// mchog min bde ba'i sprin rgyas la// thog gi rtse dga' 'di dag rnams// gnyid log shi bdag la yang // rnam 'phrul gang na 'dzum 
239a7(mdo 'grel): gang na// 'ga' zhig 'og tu kha bltas nyal zhing de yi rgyab ni gzhan du bzlog ste lhung // gzhan yang gan rkyal yan lag kun brkyang kha yi bu ga rnam par bye bar gyur// gzhan dag skra ni grol zhing dral bas phrag 
239a8(mdo 'grel): pal chags pa rog babs pa bzhin// bdag gi khyim ni mi gzum bud med tshogs rnams rnam 'dzin dur khrod lta bur spyod// de nyid rab byung don gnyer bdag/ grong khyer nang nas phyir 'thon te// rmongs pa bzlog slad 
239b1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das// nges par lta ru 'gro bar bya// zhes bsams ri thang che ba yis// rin chen mthil lham bzung nas de// grong srung rnams kyis ma shes par// brgya byin gyis ni mthu yis song // grong khyer/ 
239b2(mdo 'grel): skolas mngon par ni// b+hung ste chu klung mchog thab nas// 'khor ba'i myang ngan 'bras pa yaM// gdung ba gting bar brtson pa bzhin// bcom ldan 'byung po dgongs pa yis// de ni 'ong ba gzigs kyu 
239b3(mdo 'grel): nas// dgyes pas de ni bskal ba la// bzhed dang ldan pa bzhin du gyur// de yis rjes mthun gser gyi mdog/ phyag ni g.yas pa brkyang mdzad nas// sku yi gzi brjid snang ba yis// phyogs kyi 
239b4(mdo 'grel): mun pa yongs phyogs shing // tshur shog chur shog gnod med la// nad med gnas ni khyod kyis thob// ces pa 'brug dbyangs ltar sdug sbas// ring po nas ni de la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung thos 
239b5(mdo 'grel): nas// bdud rtsi yis ni gang ba bzhin// yongs gdung btang nas grags sbyin ni// 'phral la bsil ba nyid du gyur// rin chen rin chen mthil lham ni// klung gi ngogs su de yis dor// rgal zhing de yi 
239b6(mdo 'grel): pha rol gyis// 'gram du thur pa nyid thob gyur// bcom ldan drung du des phyin te// gdung ba can gyis tsan dan shing // dang bas brlan la zur phud ni// zhabs la btugs pas rab tu btud// de nas de la ston 
239b7(mdo 'grel): pa yis// gang gis 'di ni chags bral nyid// 'thob pa mtshungs med mchog gyur pa// legs pa'i chos ni bstan pa mdzad// brtul zhugs bzang de bcom ldan gyis// legs par gsungs pa'i chos 
239b8(mdo 'grel): 'dul la// tshangs par spyad slad rab tu bkod// 'dod pa rdzogs pa nyid du gyur// de nas bu ni song ba dag/ legs par rab sad sad pas thos// de bral me yis gdungs pa yis// de ni tshol du phyi rol song// 
240a1(mdo 'grel): mdza' dang rmongs pa chen po yis// gzing zhing mya ngan ldan pa des// chu bo'i ngogs kyi 'gram du phyin// rin chen mthil lham dag kyang mthong // de yis chu bo yang dag brgal// bcon ldan/ 
240a2(mdo 'grel): 'das ni mthong gyur te// de yi mthu yi rab bsgribs pas// mdun gnas pa'i bum mthong // de nas slar yang bcom ldan gyi// rab tu btud byas de yi yang // rmongs pas chos gtam rigs pa yis// 'od kyi 
240a3(mdo 'grel): mun pa bzhin du phrogs// de nas rmongs bral de yi bu// dri med 'od ldan mthor gyur nas// rjes su 'dod cing dgus pa yis// ston pa lhag par gnas pa byas// de yi khyim du bcom ldan gyis// mchod pa 
240a4(mdo 'grel): rab tu blang mdzad nas// de yi chung mar bcas pa la// dam pa'i brlab gnas rab 'bar mdzad// de nas grags sbyin grogs po ni// dpal dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog/ dri med gang po lag bzang dang / 
240a5(mdo 'grel): ba lang bdag ces bya ba bzhis// bcom ldan mdun na grags chen ni// tshangs spyod brtul zhugs la chags pa'i// grags pa phyogs su rab gsal ba// thos nas gnas der 'ongs par gyur// dge 
240a6(mdo 'grel): ba smin pas thob gyur pa// de dag rnams la bcom ldan 'das// dag pa'i bka' yis slar yang ni// 'dul ba'i chos la bstan pa bsgrubs// bzhi po de dang grags sbyin dang // dge slong gzhan pa lnga dag/ 
240a7(mdo 'grel): dang // bcu yi bcom ldan drung du ni// dgra bcom gnas dag thob par 'gyur// grags sbyin spyod tshul thos gyur nas// de yi grogs po sal ldan gzhan// lnga bcu ston pa'i drung du ni// byin nas de mtshungs 
240a8(mdo 'grel): ded dag thob// tshul des gus pa bskyed gyung pa// gzhan ni brgya phrag lnga yis kyang // de dang mtshungs par 'dul ba'i chos// bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du thob// de nas nam zhig dge mtshan las// dge slong kun 
240b1(mdo 'grel): gyis bcom ldan la// grags sbyin gyi ni bsod nams dris// de la thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs// sngon tshe yang dag rdzogs pa yi// sangs rgyas bcom ldan gtsug tor can// grong khyer las ni bsod 
240b2(mdo 'grel): snyoms thob// pha rol ngogs 'gram skad cig bzhugs// sa yi bdag po tshangs pas byin// lam de nas ni 'gro ba yis// rjes 'brang 'od bzang zhes pa yis// de ni bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur// nyid ma'i 
240b3(mdo 'grel): 'od zer drag po yis// gdung ba rdul dang bcas gyur pa// de mthong nas ni de la des// gdags dag bzung nas grib bsil byas// de yi drung du tshangs spyod la// de yi bstan pa bzung nas ni// sems ni/

240b7(mdo 'grel): bu// gsum bgrags ldan dga' ba yis// nor bu'i mchod rten de la ni// gus pas rin chen gdugs dag bkod// de dang bsod nams snga ma yis// skye ba 'di la grags sbyin na/ 
240b8(mdo 'grel): grags chen rin chen 'bar ba yi// gdugs kyis brgyan bdag tu skyes// de ltar skye ba gzhan la legs byas rgyas pas rtsub bcings// zla bltar dkar grags pa'i 'od zer rgyas pa'i me tog can/ 
241a1(mdo 'grel): dge ba de yi chos kyi ljon pa rab rgyas 'bras smin 'di// de skad thos nas dge slong tshogs des ya mtshan thob par gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 
241a2(mdo 'grel): rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// grags sbyin gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab de drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// brgya byin rlung dang chu sogs lha rnams dang // thub mchog rnams 
241a3(mdo 'grel): kyang gang srad rnam 'gyur du// 'gyur ba'i dran pade rtsa ltar spyod pa'i gnas// ya mtshan can de gang su rung ba min// ma ga rda grong thang chen du// sAl chen po'i rigs 'khrungs pa// n+ya gro rda yi rtog ces pa// gnyis skyes 
241a4(mdo 'grel): grags pa'i dpal ldan byung // de yi chung ma gzugs bzang ma// zhes pa khang pa'i skyed tshal na// rol pa'i ljon shing pi la'i// 'og tu bu ni nyi 'od bsran// gser gyi 'od zer rab 'bar ba'i// bu de skyes pa

241a7(mdo 'grel): des// de la smras pa khyim thab kyi// 'ching ba la ni bdag mi sred// yab cig 'dod pa bdag mi 'dod// bdag gi blo gros tshangs spyod la'o// rang 'dod zhi ba dor nas ni// srid pa'i 'ching ba su zhig 'dod// 
241a8(mdo 'grel): dang por sbyin sreg du bas mchi ma rtag tu 'bab pa rab tu 'jug/ mtshungs par lag pa gtad pas gdung ba'i lam bden par 'dud pa byed// phreng ba'i zag pas 'khor ba'i bka' yi dam tshig dag la g.yo ba 
241b1(mdo 'grel): 'ching // khyim thab yid ni rmongs pa gnas pas nyer bcom rnams kyi dga' ba'i rgyu// na chung gzhon nu'i 'khri shing gar gyi rlung gis bskyod pa'i rtse dga' rjes 'brang ba'i// rgud mangs gling bu'i sgra ni khyim thab dus su//

241b7(mdo 'grel): por skyes pas bstan byas nas// gser gyi gzugs brnyan bzung nas ni// blo ldan phyogs rnams rtag tu song // phrer bgos dang bcas pas brgyan// lha yi mtshan ma'i zol gyis ni// bzung nas phyog/

242a1(mdo 'grel): bu mo gser gyi bu mo bas/ 'od lhag bzang mo zhes pa ni/ yangs paHna du nam zhig mthong // mdzes ma khyi mtha ba las b+hir phyogs// char bral dben pa dang ldan zhing // gser rin ma de ser skyal/ 
242a2(mdo 'grel): rjes 'gro bshad pa de yis bslangs// bu mo 'pha yis des smras pa// 'od srungs rigs skyes 'jig rten na// n+ya gro d+ha yi rtog pa yi// rigs mchog rigs ni rnam par grags// 'on kyang mdzes ma// 
242a3(mdo 'grel): 'bad pa yis// nor ni rtags nas sbyin par bya// dbul ba'i shugs rings ldan ma des// pha yi yid ni gdung bar byed// chung ma 'thab mo la chags dang // bu mo nor med la byin dang // bu ni gdud pas//

242a6(mdo 'grel): yon tan nor gyi dbang // zhes pa bu mo'i pa dang de'i// bu rnams kyis kyang brjod thos nas// de bzhin zhes smras gnyis skyes ni// gzhon nu'i pha yi gan du song // gser gyi mdzes ma las lhag pa'i//

242b1(mdo 'grel): ses bram ze bdag/ gang gi chad du bram ze des// khyod ni 'bad pas bsrangs pa'o// khyim thab las ni phyir phyogs bdag/ pa yis shin tu don du gnyer// bzang mo khyod kyang 'di lta bu// mtshungs par dga' bar yang

242b3(mdo 'grel): khyim du song nas ni// pha yi tshig dag pa yis blangs// mtha' yas der ni rgyas pa do// rnam par brtags nas ser skyas kyang // rin chen mchog gi rgyan pa yis// bu mo des rab tu sbyin// 'byor pa rin thang che/ 
242b4(mdo 'grel): ba yis// de dag kyi ma tho ba spro bar zhugs// tshangs par spyod pa mnyams shing // rnam 'gyur med par 'grogs par 'gyur// dul ba'i ngang tshul de dag gis// gzugs dang lang tshe rgyas pa'i tshe// yid las// 
242b5(mdo 'grel): byung ba'i bka' bcag pas// 'byor pa dman pa nyid du gyur// de gnyis reg pa bsrung ba'i srad// res kyi gcig ni gnyir log cing // gcig ni langs nas mel tshe byed// ces pa nyal ba'i rnam bzhag byas// 
242b6(mdo 'grel): de nas nam zhig mal stan mthar// de yi mig ni gnyid kyis rgyas// thabs che bo spal byas kyis// spa la ni nag po mthong bar 'gyur// de nas de lag 'khri shing ni// logs su 'chang ba brtse ldan des// 
242b7(mdo 'grel): rnga yab mtha' dang gos dag gis// bsdus nas 'jigs pa de las gsungs// 'phral la lag pa bskyed pa yis// sreg pa'i ri dwags mig can ma// nu ma 'dar zhing de shol ni// g.yo ldan ma des 
242b8(mdo 'grel): khyol smras// rje yi sras po ji ltar ni// nges par dam tshig brjed gyur cing // bden par smra ba khyod kyi thugs// gang 'dir rnam par bslad pa skyes// khyod kyi rnam 'gyur de tsha'i rgyun// shin tu che ldan/ 
243a1(mdo 'grel): 'di ni ci// sa 'dzin dag kyang bstan pa'i lugs// gtong gi dam pa yod ma yin// zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas// 'dzum ldan de yi de la smras// rmi lam na yang bdag gi yid// bzang 
243a2(mdo 'grel): mo nges par bslad par med// 'on kyang 'dir ni sbal nag 'di// 'jigs su rung ba yongs su rgyu// khyod kyi lag pa la bstan las// 'chang ba 'jigs nas bdag gis bsrungs// khyo yi tshig 'di thos gyur nas// 
243a3(mdo 'grel): dogs btang dga' ba thob gyur nas// dogs btang dga' ba des smras pa// bden pa'i ngang chu la khyod kyis blo// 'dod pas dri mar byas pa med// gdug pa'i sbrul ni legs pa des// chags pa'i lto 'phyes mchog 
243a4(mdo 'grel): tu 'jigs// sbrul gyi mus gcig 'joms pa ste// 'dod pas lus ni brgya mthar byed// de slar rnam 'gyur 'di dag srungs// zhes smras de ni chags dang bral// de yi shin tu dul ba yang // paM sbal skyes dag/ 
243a5(mdo 'grel): gis bsngags// dus kyi n+ya gra d+ha yi rtog/ chung mar bcas pa mtho ris song // rab mar khyim gyi tshogs dag gis// bsam pa'i khur ni de yis blangs// nam zhig til mar btung ba'i slad// khyu mchog rnams/ 
243a6(mdo 'grel): kyi til 'tshar la// bzang mos yongs sra bstan pa yis// 'khor rnams dag ni yongs su bskor// til ni 'chir ba de dag gis// til mar bum pa srog chags tshogs// ltung ba nyams pa mthong gyur nas// 
243a7(mdo 'grel): snying rje btsas pas phan tshun smras// srog chags mang po yongs brlag pas// kye ma bdag kyang sdig pa can// yang na gang gi tshig gis b+h+yas// sdig pa 'di kun bzang mo la'o// bzang mo khyim na 'khod pa yis 
243a8(mdo 'grel): de thos chags bral nyid du gyur// de dus nyid na bdag po ni// nang zhugs dben par de la smras// zhing las nyon mongs kyis bzi bas// khyu mchog srog chags 'tshe ba ston// bzang mo bdag gi khyim gyi khur// 
243b1(mdo 'grel): rtag tu yongs 'dzin yod mi bzod// bde ba'i phun tshogs 'di dag rnams// mjug tu ro bral snying po med// myangs na 'dam bu'i 'dab ma bzhin// gdung ba dag ni skyed par byed// khyim pa rnams ni sdig pa'i 'dam// 
243b2(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs na lcibs dra ba can// khyim nyid du ni nyams 'gyur te// rlabs su glang ni rgan po bzhin// de srad kyim gyi brtsom pa 'di// yu cag gis ni btang bar 'oso// zhes spras chung mas khas blangs pas// zhi ba/ 
243b3(mdo 'grel): la ni nges par byas// khyim dang yo byad bcas pa yis// nor rnams slong la des byin nas// re ba'i zhabs pa 'chang ba kun// rnam par grol te nges par byung // de nas 'od srungs rigs nyid phyir// 'od srungs chen// 
243b4(mdo 'grel): po nyid gyur te// de dus yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od srungs drung du de song gyur// mchod rten bu mar zhes pa yi// rtsa bar gnas pa de can byin// 'dul ba'i chos ni des byin pas// dag pa'i byang nub 
243b5(mdo 'grel): thob par gyur// bzang mo yis kyang chags bral gyi// bstan pa'i lam gyi 'dul ba thob// sngon gyi bsod rnams yongs smin pas// dge ba dri ma med pa brten// 'od srungs chen po lnga rnams kyi// 
243b6(mdo 'grel): phyag 'os nyid thob mthong nas ni// bsod nams dge slong rnams kyis dris// de bzhin gshegs pas der bka' stsal// zas dang 'bru rnams ma lus rab tu nyung ba'i dus// bsod snyoms rnam par log 
243b7(mdo 'grel): cing shin tu mi bzad tshe// nor chung skyes bu yis ni ka shi'i grong khyer da// tA gar shi khi rang gi zas kyis legs par mchod// grong khyer bdag po kra kis byas pa'i mchod rten ni// rin chen gyis spras mchog 
243b8(mdo 'grel): tu mdzes pa de yis bu// bsod nams dang tshul gyis kyang bde ba chen po'i srad// nor bu gser gyi rnam par bkra ba'i gdugs dag bkod// skye ba gnyis su nye bar bsags pa'i bsod nams cher rgyas 
244a1(mdo 'grel): pas// nye ba'i gnas kyis 'od srungs chen po nyid ni 'di yis thob// gser gyi tal bzhin du mtho ba'i mthu ni thob gyur nas// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bras bu dgra bcom gnas ni rnam par 'dzin// 
244a2(mdo 'grel): ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// 'od srungs chen po'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o// 
244a3(mdo 'grel): yal 'dab mngon par gsar pa lta bur gnyen gyur kyang // sra zhing brtan pa dag ni rdo rje ltar gyur pa// chen po rnams kyi yid kyi nor bu dri ma dag/ med pa la yang chags pa dag ni 'pho ba min// kun la rjes su brtse ldan 
244a4(mdo 'grel): yab kyi shAkya yi// gnas rnams blta ba nyid la mchog tu gsol btab pa// kun dga' bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis zla ba ston pa ni// gang dag chen rang gi rgyal sar zhugs gyur pa// de de'i tshe na ba gam du song ri drags 
244a5(mdo 'grel): mig/ rna ba'i rgyad gyi mig ni rab tu mdzes byas nas// grags 'dzin mas ni mdzes pa dag gis phyogs rnams su// ya mtshan rab tu 'dri ba'i bdag po de mthong nas// de dang 'grogs dang 'khyud pa dag/ 
244a6(mdo 'grel): gi re bral ba'i// dag gi brgyal ba bzhin du ma lus phyogs 'khor zhing // grogs po bzlog par byed pa'i brtan pa ni// dor nas khang bzang dag las lus ni rab tu 'phangs// dag pa yal 'dab ltar mnyen 
244a7(mdo 'grel): lus dang ldan pa des// gang gang tshe na lus ni rab tu 'phangs gyur pa// de de tshe na yid srubs kyis ni rmongs ma de// brtsebs brlan pa'i spyan ldan bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// de nas nam zhig nags kyis/ 
244a8(mdo 'grel): mthar ni bcom ldan la// de yi dag mtshan dag las dge slong tshigs kyis dris// tshems kyi 'od zer zla ba'i 'od rnams dag gis ni// mchu yi dmar ba 'bebs par mdzad pa bzhin du gsungs// bdag/ 
244b1(mdo 'grel): dang bral bas rtag tu gzir bar gyur pa yi// grags 'dzin ma ni gang zhig gzu lums 'di dag byed// brtan pa 'phrog cing rmongs pa rnam par ster ba 'di// chags pa'i rnam 'phrul ldan pa rnams kyi rang bzhin nyid// sngon// 
244b2(mdo 'grel): kyi skya ba gzhan la dadang bral ba ya~M// 'dod pas rnam par tshangs par byas te bdag gis kyang // nan du yongs su gdung bdag gis nA dgyur pa// rab mar bdung ba'i nyon mongs dag ni nyams su myong// grong mchog ta stan 
244b3(mdo 'grel): yi grong // 'chi med grong khyer thul bar sngon// yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i gter// rgyal po nor zhes bya ba byung // lag pa yi ni sa la 'khyud// dbyangs can dag ni mgrin par byas// gang gi dpal ni rab tu bskur// 
244b4(mdo 'grel): grags pa kho na rab tu bskrad// de yi btsun mo badze sa ma la// bu ni nor bzang zhes bya ba// gter brgya dang ni grags pa dang // lhan cig skyes pa byung bar gyur// rig gnas kun gyi ku mud can// rtag tu rnam rgyas byed la/ 
244b5(mdo 'grel): chags// dri med mdzes pa sgyu rtsal can// gang zhig zla ba lta bur mdzes// sa bdag de dang sa gzhin// bar med sa bdag byung gyur pa// khengs ldan dbang chen sde zhes pa// rgya chen rnam par gnon par grags// 
244b6(mdo 'grel): dus min dus su brtag bya zhing // kun gyi bdog kun 'phrog byed pa// bzod dka'i dpya dang ldan pa des// gzir ba'i skye dgus mya ngan byas// chos min la ni zhugs pa de'i// grong ni legs byas spo ba dag 
244b7(mdo 'grel): log cing gdung ba drag po yis// gdung bar sprin gyi char ma phab// sa skyong rjes su mi mthun pa// der ni mu ge'i nyer 'tsho byung // sdug bsngal can rnams 'o na la// sdug bsngal rgyas par gyur pa yin// de nas nyon 
244b8(mdo 'grel): mongs kyis khyad gzir// bdag ngan gyis gdungs yi dbyung zhing // grong na gnas pa thams cad ni// gcig tu tshogs nas rnam par bsams// rgyal thun mtshan mor byed pa 'di// gsar pa'i dpya zer 'bebs pa 
245a1(mdo 'grel): yis// mchog tu skye bo'i tshogs pa 'di// bad+ma'i stan bzhir zlum par gyur// nag tu ngan pa zhen pa 'dis// bden med blon po 'gros dag gis// bdag cag bcing nas g.yo can dang // bran da// 
245a2(mdo 'grel): glu mkhan rnams dag gso// de la 'angs bdag sdig pa yi// dmod pas tshar med sdug bsngal ba// skye ba yang dag brlag pa'i dbang // mu ge skyed par byed pa skyes// sa skyong shin tu rno zhing 'khor gyi skye bo rtsub 
245a3(mdo 'grel): cing mtshar rmongs// blon po rnams kyang gdug cing grags pa g.yo lan gyi g+ha dag la mkhas// zhabs drang gnas dang yaMg mkhan mi bzang pa skyon rab tu thos gyur pa// dman pa 'joms byed ma rungs tshigs pa/ 
245a4(mdo 'grel): 'di dag rnams na ji ltar bzod// dpal ldan sa yaM bdag po na// nor gyi yul 'khor rgyas pa zas// bdag cag de grong song ba na// mnyes gshin de yi skyong bar 'gyur// sa bdag gang gi yul 'khor la// 
245a5(mdo 'grel): bu bzhin rtag tu lta byed pa// de yi yul du ba yi ni// khyim du bzhin du 'tsho bar bya// de ltar nges bsgrubs de dag rnams// ha sti na yi grong khyer seng // lus kyang gnod bcas gtad byan// yul dang 
245a6(mdo 'grel): gnas ni smos ci dgos// mi bdag dbang chen sde yis kyang // ring grong skye bo med shes nas// 'gyod pa drag po khri ldan pas// blon po chen po la spras pa// rgyal po nar gyi grong khyer du// bdag 
245a7(mdo 'grel): gzeng nas skye bo rnams// rab tu song zhes nyan na ni// gsang gnas rgya ba dag gis spras// gal te bdag gi dgra grong du// de dag mu ges nyen 'gron// gnam gyi nyer 'tshe thams cadad// ri mos kyis ni 
245a8(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba nyid// yang na rgyal po'i skyon gyis ni// bde ba 'dod pas de dag sor// rgyal po su yi grong khyer gyi// skye bo las chad dbya las grol// phal cher yongs su 'dris la sdang // rtag tugs ra pags/ 
245b1(mdo 'grel): patshol// ring na gnas pa thams cad ni// kun gyi yid du 'ongs pa yin// gang gis gzhan gyi skye dgu ni// rmongs pa chung ma bzhin du 'brog/ sa bdag de la yon tan ni// bdag las lhag pa ci zhig yod// ro nig/ 
245b2(mdo 'grel): de yi dregs pa ni// rab gzhi la thabs dag bsam par mdzod// gang yang phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu// de dag gzhom pa sgrub par mdzad// ces pa rgyal po'i tshig thos nas// khron po chen pos rab smras// 
245b3(mdo 'grel): pa// lhan cig gang gis rgyal po 'di// nor dang skye bo dang maton// sa bdag de yi dar ba ni// gzugs can bsod nams kyis btags bzhin// yul na klu yi rgyal po ni// chu mar tsi tra zhes pa yod/ 
245b4(mdo 'grel): de yi mtha yis dus min du// 'bru ni phun sum tshogs par gyur// sa bdag phun sum tshogs kun gyi// rtsa bzhing ni phun tshogs yin// de sad rig pa'i stobs dag gis// klu de gal te 'phrog nus na// 
245b5(mdo 'grel): tshe de yi skye dgu rnams// rang nyid khyod la brten par 'gyur// de slad sngags stobs 'bar ba yi// sgrub pa po 'ga' btsal nas ni// klu yi rgyal po 'phrog pa la// brtson pa dag ni myur bar mdzad/ 
245b6(mdo 'grel): ces pa blon po'i tshig thos nas// sa bdag gis ni bden zhes smras// rang nyid yon tan nor nyams pa'i// mi srun pha rol skyon la sbyor// de nas gser ni mang po dag/ rngan pa rab tu sbyar ba'i sgra// 
245b7(mdo 'grel): bsregs nas gros pa rnams kyis ni// klu dag 'ching ba'i sngags pa thob// gser sbyin dam bcas de dag gi gsol btab rig 'dzin ces bya ba// de ni tsi tra blang ba'i slad// ha sti na yi grong khyer song / 
245b8(mdo 'grel): dang na nags tshal dag gis mtha'// snum lnga rkar 'brur ldan pa na// gdengs can bdag po'i khang pa ni// nam mkha'i 'od can de yis mthong // ba ku la yi phrer g.yo zhing// til ka yaM dpal rgyas 
246a1(mdo 'grel): pa// nags kyi dpal mo'i rgyan dag gi/ nor bu'i me long nye ba bzhin// dri med chu de mthong gyur nas// chags pas nyams pa'i yid can gyi// sngags kyi bsam gtan chas zhugs te/ 
246a2(mdo 'grel): bsrab slad phyogs ni bcing ba byas// brtul zhugs rab drag gzi ldan des// phyogs ni bcing ba bslabs pa na// klu ba dag gdengs ka'i nor bu ni// gdung zhing mgo bo gzir bar gyur// de nas ma mthong yang // 
246a3(mdo 'grel): dag langs// sngags ni sgrub pa de mthong nas// 'dar zhing gdengs can bdag po ni// brjing bas sreg par ba bsams pa// khro bo sma ra smen ma ser// lte byed ser skya grog lta bu// dus min dus dang mchu ngas// / 
246a4(mdo 'grel): pa yi// gdug pa 'di ni ga las 'ongs// da ni gdug pa'i bdag nyid 'dis// nags kyi phyogs ni bcing bar byas// ji srid 'dis bdag ma bcings pa// de srid rigs pa'i rim pa bzod// drang srong 
246a5(mdo 'grel): chen po shing shur can// 'jug ngogs nye ba'i mtha' 'dir gnas// bdag yongs bskyab pa dam pa ni// des kyang nus pa min par shes// gang 'di de yi ba sti gnas na// rtag tu rim gro yongs bslab 
246a6(mdo 'grel): pa// rngon pa pad+ma can zhes pa// de yi bdag ni bsrung bar bzod// ces pa yid kyi ngos byas nas// rngon pa ga la ba der song // rang gi spyod tshul bshad nas ni// de la 'ching ba srung bar zhus// 
246a7(mdo 'grel): kwa yi rgyal pos sgrub pa po// bsad pa'i srad du gsol btab che// gzhu dang ldan pas gnas der phyin// sngags pa dpa' bo mthong bar gyur// gnas skabs der ni sgrub pa po// sngags pa yis/ 
246a8(mdo 'grel): kyang sbyin sreg mes// bcing bar 'dod pa klu yi ni// rgyal po rab tu dgug par byas// gdengs can bdag po sngags kyi ni// drangs tshe de yi gnas kyi chu// chu yi chu bur rab dkrigs pas// mya ngan byed/ 
246b1(mdo 'grel): par brtson pa bzhin// lag 'gro'i chung ma kun tu skrag pas 'brags pa'i mya ngad gyi// shugs rings shugs kyis rab bslabs rab 'bar dbu ba'i phreng ba can// rab tu 'dar zhing g.yo ba'i chu ni dpa' rlabs/ 
246b2(mdo 'grel): lag pa yis// thal mo sbyar byas bsrung ba den dganyer bar byed pa bzhin// mtha' lding gzi brjid ldan pa des// reg pa'i stobs kyi klu bzung ste// 'khums shing gya gu ldan pa'i lus// chu yi snod du btsal bar// 
246b3(mdo 'grel): rngon pa yis ni gzhu bkang ste// dug gos blags pa'i mda' dag gis// grag pas mig ni rnams gyur cing // gsar la chags pa de la bsnad// 'jig pas lag 'gro btang gyur cing // mda' zung de la mngon 
246b4(mdo 'grel): phyogs te// de yis 'jigs rung ral gri yis// mgo bo dag dang bral bar byas// rmongs pa de yi rigs pa ni// g.yeb ma chags las gzhan dag dang // nye bar sbyor dgrub mod kyang // rang nyid brlag/ 
246b5(mdo 'grel): dod 'ba' zhig gyur// blun po'i rig pa 'byor ba stobs// pha rol nye bar gang ba'i slad// skor pa rnams ni 'phral la nyid// srog dang lhan cig nyams par gyur// de nas rab dga' yongs rdzogs pa/ 
246b6(mdo 'grel): byas shes gdangs can 'dren pa yis// rang gi khang par rngor pa de// badz+ra sa gzugs blo dang ldan pas pas// ror bu'i khang pa gzhal yas khang // rin chen 'khri shing skyed tshal der// tsi tra yi na 
246b7(mdo 'grel): mchod byed cing // de yi dus ni 'ga' zhig gnas// de nas ya mtshan ldan pa des// na ba zhig klog phreng lta bu yi// zhags pa doran yod ces bya ba// klu yi mchod par byed pa mthong // de mthong 
246b8(mdo 'grel): yis nus mthu dag/ klu yi bshad pa thos gyur nas// rngon pa chags pa'i yid ldan pas// de na 'bad pas rab tu blangs// g.yul gyi sbyor ba mi par zhir// lha rnams kyang ni 'chir byed pa/ 
247a1(mdo 'grel): sog las lhag pa dade la// gdangs can dbang po dga' bas byin// de nas nags pa de blangs nas// tsi tral zhus rngon pa ni// klu yi khang pa las thon te// don thob rang gi gnas 
247a2(mdo 'grel): sra song // klu yi mtha yis thob pa yi// sun tshogs yun ring de spun nas// ut+pal can zhes bya ba yi// bul zhags pa byin nas 'das// rngon pa gzhan na de yis kyang // pa yi spyod pa spyor byed cing // 
247a3(mdo 'grel): rigs kyi lugs kyi thub pa de'i// rim gro byed pa nyid du gyur// de nas nam zhig thub pa ni// bzhugs pa'i mdun na gnas pa des// shin tu phra zhing snyan pa'i glu// rna ba'i bcud len rgyas pa thob/ 
247a4(mdo 'grel): zab pa mi bkod pa bzhin// mthong nas ya mtshan des dris pa// pad+ma 'khongs su byung ba ni// yang dag bsdams pa'i sgra mtshungs shing // khwa byug dbyangs ltar snyan pa yi// dgra 'di dag ni gang las/ 
247a5(mdo 'grel): thos// zhes pa rngon pa'i bu yis dris// de la thub pas rab smras pa// mi 'am ci yi bu mo rnams// snyan par brjod pa 'di dag len// mi 'am ci bdag ljon pa yi// bu mo yid 'phrog ma 'di ni// 
247a6(mdo 'grel): bu mo lnga brgyas yongs bskor nas// glu yi khang pa dag na rtse// de thos dge mtshan gyis non nas// de yi slar yang thob la smras// mi 'am ci yi bu mo dag/ skyes bus 'thob par nus samachi// thub pa/ 
247a7(mdo 'grel): des smras gang gi ni// lag rnar don yod ces bya ba'i// zhags pa sang des 'dod ldan ma// mi 'am ci mo blang bar nas// de nas de thos spro ldan pa'i// rngon pa de la phyag 'tshal nas// zhags pa/ 
247a8(mdo 'grel): bzung ste gdengs can gyi// dbang po'i khang pa dag tu song // der des mi'am ci mo'i tshogs// rtse dga' rol pas mtshan pa ni// gser gyi 'khri shing nags kyi dpal// rlung gis bskyod pa 'dzin pa mthong / 
247b1(mdo 'grel): de dag dbus su yid 'phrog ma// khrus byas langs pa mthong gyur te// dran pa'i rig gsum me dag ni// zha byed chu yi lha mo bzhin// lus med rnam 'phral rtsom pa yi// dpa' rlabs tshogs ldan lang tsho ni// gzhon 
247b2(mdo 'grel): na ma 'di 'byeng ba yi// rnaMnas dgan byed pa yin// yid 'ang lta yogs pags shing // gags dag ni legs par bcangs// rga de pa pas dbub ya// phreng ba rab gsal chags pa bzhin// mdzes 
247b3(mdo 'grel): sdug rab tu dkrigs gyur pa// de shal gsal ba'i rgyun dag ni// shin tu che ba mtshan mo'i dpal// zla ba'i dkar ba phrogs pa bzhin// rna rgyan rin chen 'od zer gyi// tshogs kyi 'grom pa dag la ni// rol pa'i 
247b4(mdo 'grel): parba 'khri shing slar// chu yi dag pa 'bri ba bzhin// dpral ba'i rgyad du grogs mo yis// gra r+Ni'i me mo 'bri byed pa// bsil zer dri ma ldan pa yi// skyengs bzhi bar byed pa bzhin// de mthong ya mtshan 
247b5(mdo 'grel): 'bebs pa yi// zhags pas yid ni drangs gyur pa// rngon pas 'phral la zhags pa ni// don yod ces pa legs pa bstar// de nas lag na zhags pa de// mthong nas 'phral la rab skrag cing // g.yo/ 
247b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i ri dwags mig can ma// mi 'am ci rnams mtho ris song // de yi myur bar lag pa yis// zhags pa 'phangs pas yid 'phrog ma// sreg pa'i mig dang ldan pa bzung // ri drags mo ni rngon pas bzhin// 
247b7(mdo 'grel): de yi dbang med zhags pas drangs// skad cig brgyal bas mi gzum zhing // sdug bsngal gnas skabs brten pa der// 'di ci zhes pa shes ma gyur// khyu nyams ri drags mo bzhid// rang gi skye bo lta 
247b8(mdo 'grel): bsam pas// phyogs su rnam par lta byed cing // kun rmongs pa des de la smras// thong zhig zong zhig brtan par bcings// bdag la ma reg yongs su bsrungs// nges par mya ngan gyis gzir la// gdug 
248a1(mdo 'grel): pa rnams kyang rtse ldan yin// chags las lha yi bu mo ni// mchog min gnas la sbyar ba na// 'phral la sgrub pa po nyid sreg/ rab tu 'bar ba'i rig pa bzhin// blo ldan blo yis rnam dpyad nas/ 
248a2(mdo 'grel): 'os padag la bdag sprul na// khyod la nges par chos dang ni// nor gyi tshogs chen 'byung bar 'gyur// zhags pas bsdams pa'i gdung ba 'di// bdag gi mi bzod bcings pa thong // gang du khyod 'gro mngon 'dod 
248a3(mdo 'grel): pa// der ni bdag rang nyid kyis 'gro// bcings pa btang bar gyur kyang bdag/ mkha' la 'phur nas yong mi 'gro// gang gi dbang gis mkha' la ba dag/ 'gro ba'i gtsug gi rin chen bzung // zhes des mchi ma dang 
248a4(mdo 'grel): bcas smra// snying rjes brlan pa nyid gyur te// gtsug gi nor bu yang dag blangs// zhags pa bkrol nas de la smras// dge ma dbugs ni dbyung bar mdzod// mya ngan bya bar yor mi 'os// nges par 'os pa 
248a5(mdo 'grel): min la byed// rang gi 'dod pas stsol mi bgyi// gang gi grags pa bdud rtsi yi// dpa' rlabs kyis ni phyogs kun khengs// yon tan rin chen chu gter che// dpal ldan rgyal po'i sras po yod// de ni rig pa 
248a6(mdo 'grel): zhal la chags// glu rtul rtsed 'dzes rnam par brgyan// rang gi rigs kyi khyad par can// legs spyod nor bzang zhes pa'o// bde dga' dag gi dpal bzhin du// gtong dang longs spyod skal pa bzang // rnam 'grub 
248a7(mdo 'grel): sa yi gya gyur te// smin legs khyod la yang dag 'os// gang zhig sa yi mtshan mo'i bdag/ lha dang dri za mi 'am ci// rig 'dzin rnam par rten rnams kyi// khengs pa dag ni thur ngur byed// ces pas de yi/ 
248a8(mdo 'grel): dbugs phyung zhing // gnyen tshogs bral ba'i yid 'phrog mas// ku ra ri bzhin shin tu ni// snying rdo rje skad tsho bton// skabs der 'bigs byed ngos la ni// sngon gyi rtsed ma'i dge mtshan la// 'phong mkhas nos 
248b1(mdo 'grel): bzang song gyur pa// rim gyi gnas der 'ongs par gyur// de yi shing rta'i mu khrud sgras// rma bya'i tshogs kyis gar byas nas// du gu la nyid g.yo zhing sngo// nags kyi dpal mos skad cig thob// de ni rdul gyi chu thigs 
248b2(mdo 'grel): dag/ 'gram par chags pas rab mdzes pa// rna rgyan mtha' na rab mdzes pa'i// mu tig 'bras bu 'phos pa bzhin// mdun du so yi 'od zer gyis// shing rta'i rta rmig gis bslang ba'i// rdul gyi tshogs rnams 
248b3(mdo 'grel): 'phrog pa bzhin// kha lo pa la des smras pa// kye ma yid kyi shing rta bzhin// shing rta rlung lngar mgyogs pa yis// rang sde ring du btang nas ni// ji snyed sa gzhi 'das par gyur// byang chub shing gi yal 'dab ni// 
248b4(mdo 'grel): rlung gzhon gyis bskyod g.yo ldan pa// sa 'dis rgyan ni ljang khu yi// ldang ba'i mdzes pa nyid dag 'phrog/ 'khri shing gsar ba b+hu ru'i mchu// me tog phun bu'i nu ma rgyas// snye ma rlung gi dkrugs 'di dag/ sred ldan/ 
248b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin du glal bar byed// mang ka ta ltar ldang ba'i// rtswa sngon tshogs kyi stod kor can// me tog dngul gyis spras pa yi// nags phreng 'di dag rab tu mdzes// skrag nas bros pa'i ri dwags mo// 'di dag mgrin pa 
248b6(mdo 'grel): 'khyog po yis// g.yo zhing lta bas ut+pal ni// sngon po'i nags tshal spro ba bzhin// son mtshan mo byed pa'i myu gu ltar mdzes shing // bum pa ri khrod ma bdag mdza' mo'i nu me dag dang mtshungs// rtsibs kyi 
248b7(mdo 'grel): sbas bcom rnam par g.yo ba'i rna grags so ldan gyi// phru gu 'di dag kun nas bdag gi shing rta dag la blta// sha ba ri yi rked skabs las 'phro rma bya'i 'dab phreng rol pas bskyod pa yi// brtsed 'jo'i nam 'phrul 
248b8(mdo 'grel): cha yi 'ching ba rnams la chas par gyur pa 'big byed rlung // dri med chu rlung nar ma dA ngogs 'khri shing g.yo zhing rnam par rgyas pa yi// me tog sbrang rtsi'i dga' ston rgyas pas rab bsgos 'di dag myos pa bzhin du 'byam 
249a1(mdo 'grel): zhes pa smra ba'i mi bdag bu// nags kyi dpal la spyod pa yi// skye bo med par mi 'am ci'i// snying rje'i sgra yi gang ba thos// thos nas dge mtshan gyis drangs te// de dang nye bar 
249a2(mdo 'grel): brje ba'i gter// yon tan dam pa'i me long de// song ba sa ri drags mig de mthong // mig chung bcas pas rngon pa la// yongs su skyob pa zhu byed cing // nags rgyu zad pa'i sdug bsngal dang / 
249a3(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i nags tshal lha mo bzhin// ri dgas mtshan ma'i dpal mo ni// rab brtags ri drags rngon pa yi// drangs pa tshal du 'ongs gyur pa// nags su 'khyam zhing skyo ba bzhin// de mthong phul du 
249a4(mdo 'grel): byung ba'i gzugs// ngo mtshar bcas pa ya mtshan de// mngon par 'dod pa'i ras la ni// myur du ri mo bkod bzhin gyur// de bsams kye ma 'di yi bzhin// legs par 'brel mdzes pa ni// 
249a5(mdo 'grel): rnam par sprul byed goms byas pa'i// byed po ri mo yongs su smin// gdengs can gnas na rnyed pa dka'// me yi yul na gtam nyid ni// mdzes sdug rgya 'di mtho ris su'ang // gsar du 
249a6(mdo 'grel): mngon par 'khrungs sam snyam// gzhon nu ma nyid dar la babs pas lus med dang bcas sgeg ldan zhing // lus phrag nyen lcug gsar du ltar byas yan lag kun 'grogs grogs can gang gis ni// 
249a7(mdo 'grel): 'bad med pha rol gnon pa shin tu rgya cher rtsom pa'i mngon sbyor dang bral bar// 'gro ba'i rgyal srid tsha la rtse dga'i mtshon dang ldan pa'i lha ni rnam par rgyal// de ltar ya mtshan snying po can// mngon par 
249a8(mdo 'grel): 'dod ldan mig gis ni// de 'thung mtshungs la mngon phyogs te// phyag 'tshal rngon pas rab spras pa// me'am ci rgyal rigs kyi na// dpag bsam ldan pa ljon pa yi// bu ma yid du 'ang ma'o// 
249b1(mdo 'grel): lha cig bdag gis zhags pas drangs// khyod slad blangs pa'i gzhon nu ma// mchog 'di rab tu bzung bar mdzod// yon tan rgya che khyod nyid ni// sa gzhi 'di yi bdag tu 'os// 'di yi gtsug gi nor bu 'di/ 
249b2(mdo 'grel): rang 'dod 'gro ster bdag gi ni// bzung ste de dang bral bas 'di// nam mkha' dag la 'gro ba med// nor bu 'di ni bsung bya ste// 'di byin 'di dang phrad pa med// bu mo rin chen rin chen yang // de brjod dal/ 
249b3(mdo 'grel): rngon pas byin// sa yi ri drags mtshan ma de// rgyal po'i bu yi thangs pa na// bdud rtsis zan bzhin dang yul dang // bral ba'i ma ni btang bar gyur// 'dod ldan mig gi g.yo ba yi// ri drags gnan nu/ 
249b4(mdo 'grel): ma 'dra ste// rngon pas btang nas yid kyis ni// chags pa'i rgya yis bcings par gyur// mi 'am ci mo shing rtar bkod// rngon pa rin chen rnams kyis bkang// dga' ba rgyas pa'i sa bdag sras// rang gi grong khyer 
249b5(mdo 'grel): dag tu song // ha sti na yi grong phyin des// rang gi gtam ni pa la bshad// dga' bas ya mtshan gyur pa des// bag ma yi ni dga' ston bsgrubs// gzugs can ri bong can gyi dpal// dge bas spyad byar 
249b6(mdo 'grel): gyung pa bzhin// mi 'am ci yi bu mo ni// pho brang 'khor du gnas par byas// mchu yi sbrang rtsir chags ldan pa// sbrang rtsi 'thung bas bzhin du des// reg pas bzhin gyi chu skyes ni// dud cing pad+mo can de 'dar// 
249b7(mdo 'grel): smra ba bcad kyang sred pa 'char// g.yo ba med kyang yang yang 'dar// skyengs par gyur kyang dpal mdangs gsal// de yi dga' ba de yi bsgrubs// dal gyi mchu yi ro myangs shing // so yi 'jigs pa 
249b8(mdo 'grel): byin nas ni// chu skyes rgyas pa'i mig tan des// spra bcad rgyan de yi bral// gos mdung 'grol dang dgag pa la// rgya shugs lag pa'i pad+mo dag/ rab tu 'dir ldan gad bu'i sba// rtsod par byed par 
250a1(mdo 'grel): gyur pa bzhin// rtse dga' 'dzum gyi me tog rgyas// mdzes pa'i nums 'bras bus mtshan// chags byas yal 'dab ldan pa de'i// longs spyod rkang 'thung spyad byar gyur// gnas// 
250a2(mdo 'grel): skabs der ni lho phyogs pa// bram ze ser skya bu skar gnyis// rgyal po nor gyi mdun sar ni// 'tsho ba 'dod pas 'ongs par gyur// rig pa phul byung sngags 'os pa// de dag bdun na 'don nyid thob// ser skya 
250a3(mdo 'grel): dag ni sa skyong gi/ rgyal po'i bu yi gzhan pa'o// de dag reg pas bcings pa yis// rtag tu rnam par rtsod byed cing // rdzas gcig mngon par 'dod pa yis// rnam par snang bas yang dag skyes// 
250a4(mdo 'grel): glang po la 'os snun byed pa// de dag gdong gi rig pa ni// chang gi ri mo lta bu dag/ zhe sdang skyon gyis nyams par bsgrubs// gang gi rig pa mar me'i rtse mo dngos po rnams phyed yon tan dag gi grags/ 
250a5(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten rab tu gsal la mngon phyogs mdun du zhe sdang mun pa mi bzad byed// rmongs pas nyer bcom rtog dpyod dang bral gzhung bzang chung ma'i dgra bo de dag rnams// tsan dan zla ba chu shel pad+mo zhi ba las 'khrungs/ 
250a6(mdo 'grel): me yis sreg par byed// thos dang dran pa rtsed rnams la// gnas dang gnas su pu skar gyis// nges par tshar bcad ser skya yis// khro ba'i gdung bas yongs su bsams// rno zhing brtan par goms gyur// 
250a7(mdo 'grel): pa// mi bzad rgyags shing 'phyar ba 'dis// rtag tu goms pa zhan pa dag/ mdun sa dag tu skyengs par byed// shes rab bslu byed tshul dang ni// thos sa dregs pa'i rims dag dang // nor ni chos dag 
250a8(mdo 'grel): 'gog pa'i slad// ma rabs sems ldan rnams la 'gyur// dregs ldan 'di yi sa rgyal sras la// brten nas bdag gis yongs su 'joms// de slad 'di yi rten nyid kyi// dpal gyi rtsa ba bdag 
250b1(mdo 'grel): gis gzhom// rig pa'i thabs ni 'ga' zhig gis// rgyal po'i sras ni dgum pa la// bdag ni 'bad pa bya bar 'os// khengs pa nyams pa ji ltar bzod// de ltar drag po'i sdig brtag pa// de la sdang bas ya/ 
250b2(mdo 'grel): dag sbyar// phrag dog gis gang mi byed pa'i// sdig de 'jig rten na yod min// gang gis mi bzad khro ba yi// dug gi mig sman sman du btab// rtag tu bsams pa 'khrugs pa des// legs pa'i lam ni// 
250b3(mdo 'grel): ji ltar mthong // 'dod chags mchog tu sdig cing de las kyang ni lhag par dregs pa sdig/ khro las sdig gzhan 'gro ba na med bzod dka'i sdig pa 'chags pa'o// gdung ba dang ldan 'gro na sdig pa'i tshogs ni ji snyed
250b4(mdo 'grel): bgrangs gyur pa// des kyang rnam par sdar bas bskrun pa'i sdig pa'i cha la mtshungs reg min// de na nam zhig sprin zhes pa'i// gdug cing kar pa Tar gnas pa// gnod par byed pa'i rgyal phran gyis// dpung 
250b5(mdo 'grel): rnams springs pa bsad pa dag/ thos nas mi bdag khros pa yis// thabs ni bzhi par nges byas te// blon po rnams kyi 'dod pa yis// gzhon nu la ni 'di dag smras// gzhon nu stobs kyi dgra dag ni// 
250b6(mdo 'grel): myur du gcod du 'gro bar gyis// khyod kyi rim 'ongs rgyal srid che// 'di ni zug rngu med par 'gyur// g.yul gyi brtsom pa khyod kyis ni// dpung pa mthu yis brgyan pa ni// 'gro bar rgyal ba'i glang po dag
250b7(mdo 'grel): 'dogs pa'i ka ba nyid du 'gyur// sa 'dzin rigs ni gnod pa'i sprin// sdug cing lhag par rgyas pa dag/ bcom na khyod kyi gzi byin ni// phyogs su sgribs pa'i bgegs med 'gyur// stobs med mtha' na/ 
250b8(mdo 'grel): gnas pa yis// rgyal phran gzhan ni bsad pas ci// dregs ldan de nyid gzhom par bya// de bsad nas ni thams cad 'grub// gang zhig cha yis rang zas nyid du rnam par bsgrubs pa yi// glang chen tshogs 
251a1(mdo 'grel): ni 'phrog byed kyis bcom dge mtshan na zhig yod// gal te sngar mo'i gang rgyangs ldan pa'i gdong lnga bzhi ba com na// de ni yaM skyes bu rtul pod dgatam gyi lam du 'gyur// zhes pa sa yis bstan pa ni// g.yul 
251a2(mdo 'grel): bye dga' sngon 'dod pa dang // ma'amachi 'badag ya bas des// sad cig kyad pa'i byung bzhin kyang // yun da 'ag ba min brjod pas// 'bad pas chung ma dgrags nas// de yis pa la ma thugs 
251a3(mdo 'grel): phyag byas dal gyis rab smras pa// mi 'am ci dbang brgya byin du// brtag bya'i bu mkhangs ldan ma// khyod kyis bdag la byams pa'i thos// 'bral ba'i mya ngan gyis gnar skyongs// 'di yi gdug sa 
251a4(mdo 'grel): dben// nga 'dod 'gro ba ster 'di ga/ sog la tha tsham ma gtags pa// mams kun tu sbyin maH// zhes brjod ma yil ga ta ni// mdzes ma mdzes ma'i gnag gan // gtad nas dpung gas 
251a5(mdo 'grel): thugs kyi// sde bcid ngan myung dus pa// da yis rna chags kyis bas ga/ rdus du pa l+r-in snar nus pa yis// dang pa'i rgyal ba phrag pa dang // tsan mongs nyid dag tu 'thur// nga 
251a6(mdo 'grel): mang gan// 'bral ba yis ni yid 'phrog ma// pad+ma gzhan nu 'dab ma yis// mal stan la ni brten par byung // srid lan nyan par bgrang ba'i btsan pa dag la mngon skyo shing // sangs kyi 
251a7(mdo 'grel): lam ni sal 'ad shing g.ya bas 'bri byud pa// dayo lag pa pa banyid kyis skal nag bu ltung ba la// mtsho mo'i rgyun gyi mu tog gdub ba kang dag na myung du gnas par \u0f7f// mataga' ba can la 
251a8(mdo 'grel): bdel gyi daphyogs lus la'ang chags pa nyid ma yin// bdag po'i bsam gtan skyong zhing nyin mtshan du ni de yi meng gi gsang sngags zlos// mal ston sa gzhir byas te de ltan yang gzugs ba 
251b1(mdo 'grel): gdung banyams ma gyur// 'dod chags g.yo med chags pa'i yid rnams brtul zhugs drag pos grol ba min nam ci// shel gyis khri stan la 'dug cing // ha ri tsan dan gyis skyab// gzugs can ma de 
251b2(mdo 'grel): zla 'od kyis// dbus son zla res bzhin du mdzes// de nas nam zhig sa skyong ni// rmi lam mthong nas dogs gyur pas// mdun na 'don ni ser skya dag/ yang dag bos nas dben par dris// grong khyer 
251b3(mdo 'grel): dgra rnams kyis bkag cing // bdag gi lto brtol rgyu ma ni// drangs nas yongs su dkris pa yis// rmi lam de ring bdag gis mthong // blo gros chen po rmi lam 'di'i// rnam smin 'bras bur 
251b4(mdo 'grel): 'os pa gsungs// dge bar yongs bsgyur 'os pa yis// phyir bcos dag kyang bsam par mdzod// ces pas yi dbang pos dris// mdun na 'don gyis skad cig ni// gus pa'i tshul mchod 
251b5(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan bzung // nang du mngon par 'dod pa bsams// pu ska ra yis rten bcad slad// rgyal po'i bu ni nyams pa la// shin tu yun ring bsams pa'i thabs// 'di ni bdag gi dga' 
251b6(mdo 'grel): bas thob// de yi chung ma mi 'am ci// yid 'phrog ma mchog 'tsho bas nyid// de dngos med na nges par ni// sdug cing bskal pas de mi 'tsho// zhes pa bsams nas dal bu yi// rdzun gyi skyo 
251b7(mdo 'grel): dang chags bral can// mdun na 'don ni mi phan pa// tshol bas nor 'dzin dbang la smras// lha cig khyod ni rmi la mngon// mchog tu snying rje 'dar byed 'di// mthong ste 'di yi 'bras bu ni// bzod 
251b8(mdo 'grel): dka' gsal bar ji ltar brjod// rjel gus pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// gnas shing skyon bsgrub bdag nyid min// phan pa tshol rnams rna bar ni// mi snyan brjod pa dgag pa med// rmi lam 'di 'bras 
252a1(mdo 'grel): gsal bar ni// rgyal srid dam ni lus la nyams// 'di la dogs dang bral ba yis// 'byor pa'i slad du phyir bcom bya// mchod sbyin zhing du rdzing bu ni// phyugs kyi khrag gis 
252a2(mdo 'grel): yongs gang bar// khyod bkrus bram zes dag byas shing // gser dang rin chen rab mar byin// mi'am ci mo'i tshil gyis med// sbyin sreg byas pas khyod dge tho ba// khyod kyi mna' ma pho brang na// 
252a3(mdo 'grel): yod pas mi 'am ci mi dkon// zhes pa de tshig ma rungs pa// thos nas sdig pas rmAs phyin cing // gtum po'i spyod pas skrag gyur pa// sa yi bdag po de la smras// rang gi sog ni bsrung ba'i slad// 
252a4(mdo 'grel): bud med gsod la ji ltar spro// mi 'am ci mo dang bral na// nges par bdag gis bu mi 'tsho// zhes te sa la spyod pa sa de'o// 'dod pa phyid la bzlog pa na// mdun na 'don ni sdig pa la// mngon par zhen pas 
252a5(mdo 'grel): yang der smras// kye ma rgyal po blo gros dang // ldan yang skye bo'i lugs mi shes// sde gsum bsgrub byed rgyal srid dang // srog kyang btang bar bya ba min// nor bzhin nang mi grogs po chung ma bu rnams ni// 
252a6(mdo 'grel): nyams pa skyes bu gnas na slar yang 'byung bar 'gyur// dbugs tsam bral zhing srog ni song bar gyur pa la// de dus nye bar gnas kyang thams cad med pa nyid// 'tsho ba'i don du dang yul dang // gces 
252a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i bu yang gtong bar byed// rgyal po 'tshe ba'i 'jig rten na// srog las gzhan ni gces pa med// de ltar de yis sna tshogs kyis// dpe yis dal gyis zid pa na// rgyal po sog la chags pa yis// 
252a8(mdo 'grel): sdig la rigs par kha yis blangs// de nas phun tshogs brtsam pa yis// mchod sbyin las la 'jug byed cing // thugs kyi khrag gis gang ba yi// rdzing bu yang ni byas pa'i tshe// dben par rang gi 
252b1(mdo 'grel): btsun mo la// rgyal pos rang gi spyod tshul bshad// bu ni byes bgrod mya ngan gyis// gzir cing sdig pas skrag par bsams// kye ma mna' ma bsod pa yi// sgrub byed sdig pa rgya che 'dir// mdun na 'don ni gti 
252b2(mdo 'grel): mug gis// long bas rgyal po rab rmongs bskul// 'chi ba'i mtshams ni nges bcad pa// 'bad pas yongs 'phrog mi nus kyang // gzhan gyi sogs ni phrog pa yis// thun po rnams ni 'tsho bar 'dod// gal 
252b3(mdo 'grel): te srog la chags pa yis// bu mo bzhin bzang bdud rtsi 'dra// mna' ma yin yang rgyal po yis// bsad na bdag ni ci zhig smra// ma gcig khyod kyis mnyes gshin las// bdag gi yid 'phrog ma 'di/ 
252b4(mdo 'grel): skyongs// zhes brjod bu ni nor bzang dag/ bdag la chung ma gtad nas so bde slad bdag las gtsug gi nor// thob na de ni mkha' la 'gro// de ni 'tshon bdag po dang // slar yang 'phrad pa nyid du 'gyur// zhes 
252b5(mdo 'grel): bsams mna' ma ga la bar// mig chur bcas pa de song nas// rgyal po'i tshul ni de la bshad// rab 'a dang ldan pas slar smras pa// mnyes gshin gdug gi nor bu tshangs// nam mkha' dag la mgyogs/ 
252b6(mdo 'grel): par song // mi bdag 'di ni sdig dang ldan// dam pa'i spyod la mi lta'o// khyod ni mchod sbyin sar song nas// nam mkha'i lam nas 'gro bar bya// gzhan du khyod ni 'ba' zhig tu// bdag gi sras bkod 'di/ 
252b7(mdo 'grel): yis rig/ ces pa'i tshe ga zos yid 'phrog ma// khyo dang bral bas gdungs gyur pas// 'bad pas de dang phrad pa'i slad// rab tu bces par lus srung zhing // gtsug gi na dbu stug mo yis// byin pa blangs 
252b8(mdo 'grel): nas spyi bor bcings// mna' ma bros pa mchod sbyin gyis// zhing du song nas mkha' la 'gro// rgyal po bu ni gces kyang mna' ma bsad par bya ba gang 'di ni// khyod kyi 'os par ma yin khyod ni shis gyur bdag ni 
253a1(mdo 'grel): rang gnas song // bdag bral bstan pa rab tu nyams pa'i gzhon nu 'di yang srung bar gyis// der de brjod nas rab phra glog gi rnam 'phrul dag gis de song gyur// de song tshen mi bdag ni// 
253a2(mdo 'grel): mchod sbyin bgegs kyi dogs par gyur// mdun na 'don gyis de la smras// sa bdag the tshom yang ma byed// gdug pa zhes bya tshangs pa yis// srin po dag gis sngags kyi drangs// mi 'am ci mo dngas 
253a3(mdo 'grel): bsad// khyod kyis mchod sbyin bgegs med grub// ces pa de yi rdzun gyi tshig/ rgyal po yi ni bden par bsams// 'khrul 'khor gzugs bdun brtse dga' yis// rmongs rnams gya glus gar byed do// 
253a4(mdo 'grel): pa yi khang par mngon phyogs te// dga' ba ster byed yid 'brog mas// snying la gyon bzung byas te// rang gi spod pa'i mtha' rnams bshad// yab kyi bka' yi mi dang ni// 'grogs pa'i dri ma zhi ba'i slad/ 
253a5(mdo 'grel): gser gyi bum pa lnga brgya yis// nyi ma so sor khrus dag byas// bkrus pas mi yi dri ma ni// rab tu chung ba nyid du gyur// nor bzang la ni mdza' gzugs ldan// ri drags mig gi chags pa min// lha yi 
253a6(mdo 'grel): skyed tshal longs spyod la// de ni dga' bar yongs ma gyur// gzhan la chags par gyur pa yis// lus can gzhan lan dga' ba med// nam zhig mkha' la 'gro ma de// sdug pa dang bral nyon mongs shes 
253a7(mdo 'grel): klu yi khang pa'i nye 'khor de// nags mtha'i nor 'dzin dag tu song // drang srong chen po bsti gnas te// gnas pa shing shun can de la// rab tu btud cing phyag 'tshal te// 'dod cing mngon du phyogs pas 
253a8(mdo 'grel): spras// bdag ni 'chang brngon pa la// nye bar bstan pa khyad kyis ni// gal te rigs pa 'di byas na// bcom ldan khyod nyid bdag gi gsungs// shes pa de yi tshig thos nas// drung zadang chos bzhin btud de// 
253b1(mdo 'grel): thub pas der smras bzhin bzang ma// 'di ni khyod kyis myong bya nyid// de la zhags pa don yod ni// yod ces bdag gis ma shes bshad// g.yon can rngon pas de yis gtam// shes nas khyod ni bcings par gyur// 
253b2(mdo 'grel): bden par smra ba'i mu cor can// rang bzhin drang ba bdag cag gis// ma rungs bdag nyid gdug pa yi// sems kyi gya gyu yongs mi shes// shes pa thub pas brjod de la// gzugs can ma yis gus par
253b3(mdo 'grel): smras// bu mo'i tshig 'di g.yo ba 'di// bcom ldan gyis ni bzod par mdzod// khyod kyi mdun du bdag gis ni// gang 'di cung zad brjod gyur pa// dam pa'i spyod las 'gal ba 'di// bud med rnams kyi skal ba
253b4(mdo 'grel): bzang sdug bsngal 'don la chas gyur cing // yongs su gdung la brtse ldan rnams// 'os pa min pa rnams kyi yang // phal cher bya ba sgrub mdzad yin// tshe de dag dang ldan pa dag/ rngon pa'i zhags pas bcings/ 
253b5(mdo 'grel): las grol/ 'phrog byed mdza' ba'i zhags pa yis// rgyal po'i bu yis nges par bcings// nor bzang zhes pa skal pa bzang // bdag bral me yis gdungs pa de// gal te lam ni 'di nyid nas// khyod 
253b6(mdo 'grel): can nye bar 'ongs gyur na// snying rje las ni khyod nyid kyis// bdag gis phrin 'di smra bar byos// khyod bral gdung bas bde med cing // bdag ni yab kyi khyim na 'khod// mdun dang rjes su rtse ba 'am// byas 
253b7(mdo 'grel): shes lhan cig skyes pa 'am// rjes mthun mdun du bdar byas te// 'di nas myur du 'gyon par mdzod// mi 'am ci yi grong khyer lam// bgrod dka' nyon mongs brgya yis rten// brtson 'grus stobs gzi/ 
253b8(mdo 'grel): chung ba yi// mi rnams kyis ni sa min nyid// dka' thub nags mtha' 'dir 'bar ba// bdud rtsi zhes pa'i sman chen ni// mthong ste zhun mar la gtses pa// khyod dang nyid kyis btung bar bya// de mthus 
254a1(mdo 'grel): snying stobs grogs ldan khyod// nyon mongs rab tu sgrol 'gyur te// lam ni ka lA sa nod ltar// dkar bas bdag grong phyin par 'gyur// bdag gi rtags mtshan sor gdub ni// 'di yang 
254a2(mdo 'grel): de la sbyin par bya// zhes brjod de yi mi zad pa'i// lam ni rim pas bshad byas te// ngo mtshar rigs pa dag gis ni// bgegs rnams phyir bcos thabs bstan nas// de ba'i 'ching bas srog bzung ba// sor 
254a3(mdo 'grel): gdub byin nas song bar gyur// lam ring sgrol byed rmad byung dag/ de yis bshad pa thos gyur te// sor gdub dag ni blangs byas nas// thub pa de dag nyid la sems// skabs der sa yis bdag po sprin// bam 
254a4(mdo 'grel): par byas shing mdzod blangs nas// chung ma blta bar 'dod pa yis// rgyal po'i bu ni 'ongs par gyur// rgyal phran gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis// mkha' ni chu gtar lbu ba'i 'dzum// rgyas pa dag dang mtshungs 
254a5(mdo 'grel): byed cing // de ni rang gi grong khyer zhugs// de nas mna' ma'i nye gyod kyis// lo rgyus 'chad la nyon mongs shig/ 'dar ba'i bo brang 'khor song ste// de yis yab la rab tu btud// 'og tu bzhin phyogs skye ba 
254a6(mdo 'grel): kun// mya ngan zug rngus dga' ston bcom// yab kyi pho brang 'khor mthong nas// de ni dga' dang bral bar dogs// 'bral bas gzir ba'i yid 'phrog ma// gzugs bzang ma de 'tsho 'am ci// zhes smras/ 
254a7(mdo 'grel): del su yis kyang // gang tsha mi snyan ma brjod pa// de tshe ma yis rab smras pa// bu gcig khyod kyi dga' ma 'chi// 'on kyang srog la the tshom che// gtsug gi nor bu thob na sa song // zhes pa thos pa nyid na de// 
254a8(mdo 'grel): 'phral las yi gzhi la 'gyel// do shal 'bri shing bkram pas sa// 'tsho ma'i rgyud ldan byed pa bzhin// kha ba'i thig pa ltar dkar ba'i// ha ra tsan dan chu dag gis// dal gyis 'du shes rnyed pa des/ 
254b1(mdo 'grel): mamachims 'gar 'gar rnam par smras// mkha' mini ri bong can gyi dpal// bsrabs min bdud rtsi'i chung dang ldan// 'bad med me tog gzhu can gyis// rin chen gnas de gang na yod// bla ma'i bka' bcings 
254b2(mdo 'grel): ring du 'gro byed pa// bdag gis ri dwags mig can mchi ma yis// mig ni 'gags pa'i dga' ba ma bsgrubs pa// des na dran pa'i dmod 'di bdag la lhung // yid 'phrog ma ni gang du song // sprin legs 
254b3(mdo 'grel): tshig gis lan dag byin// bag med blun po bdag gis ni// ri dwags mig can khyod ma bsrungs// khyod dang 'grogs pa'i skal bzang ldan// lha yi mdun sar bsngags par 'os// khyod dang bral bas mi yi ni// 
254b4(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten bdag bzhin ci zhig mdzes// zhes pa smra zhing dal bu yi// mdzes ma'i longs spyod dbang gyur pa// skyed mos tshal du dga' ma mchog/ tshol du rang nyid song bar gyur// 'khor gyi skye bo bred byas te// 
254b5(mdo 'grel): mtshan mo dag ni mtshar bar// nags mthar song nas mnyam pa dang // mi mnyam rnams su rnam par 'byams// 'dod chags drag po'i sha za ni// chen pos rnam par rmongs pa des// smyon pa bzhin du sems 
254b6(mdo 'grel): ldan dang // sems med la yang rnam par dris// grogs po ni ci'i 'phru gu grogs kyi grogs mo ni// srog mtshungs zla rdzogs bzhin ldan de ni smra bar byos// de yi so yi sgrib byed dmar ba dag gi cha/ 
254b7(mdo 'grel): bim pa'i 'bras bu rtag tu khyod kyis longs spyod yin// kye lags dang po lus dkar dang 'grogs pad+mo can rol rna rgyan ltar mdzes pa// mu tig tshogs ni rnam par g.yo ba gang gi 'o ma 'dzin pa rgyas pa'i rtser// 
254b8(mdo 'grel): ba sA'i khri shing dang pa la ni nya lcibs 'khri shing lhung bzhin rnam mdzes pa// dri bzang khang pa pad+mo'i bzhin ldan mdzes pa'i dba' rlabs can de mthong ngam ci// de ltar sdug bsngal drag pos bcings pa la/ 
255a1(mdo 'grel): rab sme mnyam pa la yang 'gred de la// brtse bas lam ni rab bsal ste rab bzhin// dal gyi bsil zer can ni nam mkhar mdzes// mtshan ma'i bdag po yid srubs gnyen gyi 
255a2(mdo 'grel): ni// gzugs mdzes mkha' la sbyang ba de mthong nas// 'dzum ldan zla zhal ma yis nam mkha' yi// gzhal yas khang pa'i steng nas bzhin bstan sam// mi smra dri mas mtshan nyid skyon dag thob// rnam 'phrul med/ 
255a3(mdo 'grel): cing dkod dang rtse 'jos dman// zla ba'i bzhin du ring zhig lon nas nges// mi yi mgon po'i bus ni 'gro zhing dris// grogs po khyod kyi mkha' la mdzes sdug grogs// gang gi bzhin gyi nyer 'jal 'brel thob pas// 
255a4(mdo 'grel): 'gro la khyod kyi grags par rab rgyas pa// mtshan ma ri dwags mig mtshungs mthong ngam ci// mdzes ma'i gtam ni don gnyer dngos gyur pa// bdag la cung zad ji ltar 'di mi smra// gzhan don sgrub pa la ni bsil gyur pa/

255a7(mdo 'grel): drags khyod kyis yid srubs dag gi/ do ra'i rtse 'jom de mthong ngam ci// gang gis zur mig ut+pal cha dag gis// ri dregs rnams ni nags na mdzes sam snyam// rnam 'phrul skyes sa yal 'dab 
255a8(mdo 'grel): mdzes pa'i mchu// rol par rnam par g.yo ba'i bud med dag/ phung bu can de 'khri shing bzhin du ni// nags mthar nags bdag khyod kyi mthong ngam tsaM// de ni sprin dang mtshungs pa nags tshal gyi// klang 
255b1(mdo 'grel): po 'di yi zla ba'i cha bzhin du// gser gyi chu shing yongs 'khyud la chags nas// blangs nas khyer ram bsgribs pa ma yin nam// de ltar nags tshal skyibs rnams su// tha bcol rab brjod de yi ni// 
255b2(mdo 'grel): mya ngan gyi sa bzhin mtshan mo ni// zla ba'i bzhin ras mdog bral song // de yi klu yi gnas dang nye// ngogs 'gram dka' thub nags tshal du// dal gyis zhugs te drang srong che// shing shun can la rab tu 
255b3(mdo 'grel): dris// 'dir ni 'bral bas sems ngan shugs rings kyis spar ba// 'dod pa'i me yi du bas sngon chags lhas ma gcig pa can// ri bong can gyi mdzes sdug dregs rgyas zhi byed ri dwags mig/ mi 'am ci mo su

255b6(mdo 'grel): pas drangs pa bzhin// de ni khyod kyi bsam pas 'tsho// lag pa dag la bzhin gyi pad+ma nyal zhing yal 'dab mal stan la// gdung bas nyen cing g.yo ba'i tshig ldan ri mo kun tu nyal ba'i lus// re ba bcas/ 
255b7(mdo 'grel): la bstan pa blo gros khyod bral 'khrugs gyur pa// de yi yid ni 'gar yang ci yang ngal bsos nyid du 'gyur ma yin// ljon pa mi 'am ci yi bdag/ yab kyi khyim na bdag gnas so// khyod ni myur du shog cig 
255b8(mdo 'grel): ces// de yi khyod la yang dag bstan// brtson 'grus snying stobs stobs dang thabs// bstan dang spro ldan rnams kyis kyang // bskrod min mi 'am ci yi ni// grong khyim lam yang rim pas bshad// gang gi 
256a1(mdo 'grel): 'od 'jam reg pa yis// phyogs rnams ser po nyid 'gyur ba// rin chen sor gdub 'di yang ni// de yis khyod kyi ched du byin// zhes brjod kun dga'i bdud rtsi yis// bran zhing bstan pa dag gi// 
256a2(mdo 'grel): rten// sor gdub dag ni de la byin// lam yang thub pas rab tu bshad// de yis bstan pa'i lam dag ni// thabs dang bcas pas mi bdag bri// bstan pas nor 'dzin gnas pa yis// phyogs su 'gro bar/ 
256a3(mdo 'grel): rab tu brtsams// sman chen bdud rtsi legs grub pa// mar gyis smin pa 'thungs nas ni// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi bdag nyid thob// mtshon cha dang bcas dal gyis song // rdzu 'phrul gyis ni lam du de'i// nyer mkho// /

256a5(mdo 'grel): yi ril sleb// 'bras bu'i skyes kyis khas blang byas// der ni spre'u'i khyu yi bdag/ rlung shugs shes pa la zhon nas// ri bo de ni de yi dgongs// de nas lug gi lam shes pa'i// sa 'dzin dag ni rab tu rgal//

256a8(mdo 'grel): yis 'dzegs// srin mo sha ni tshil byed pa// bya rgod gzugs can yang dag mthong // sha ldan ri dgas pags pa ni// yongs su bsgyur bas kun tu g.yogs// ri bo de yi zhabs kyi rtser// de yi lus ni g.yo/

256b7(mdo 'grel): ni du ba can dag dang // de bzhin dgod pa can zhes pa// dgod pas sems la gnod byed dang // mi 'am ci mo rnams dag gi/ gang gi 'gram du gdung ster ba// thur dgrod gzhan yang bzlas byas te// de 'og spa ldan/

257a1(mdo 'grel): yi grong khyer ni// rab gsal shel gyi khang pa mthong // de yid la bus nang du zhugs// gser gyi pad ldan mdzes par phyin// de yi ngogs kyi shing la 'dzegs// rin chen 'khri shing gis

257a3(mdo 'grel): can des mngon phyogs// lag pas brten nas grogs byas te// dal bu yis ni de la dris// ma ma su yi ched du ni// chu 'di 'bad nas len par byed// gang la gus pa khyed rnams ni// yongs su ngal 'di rtsi
