281b5(mdo 'grel): tshogs rnam 'gyur rab mang ba// de dang de ni bdud kyis byas// nyan pa sems ni g.yeng ba rnams// gang gi rnam par 'khrul 'gyur ba// mdzes ba gser dang bcas pa yi// der ni mu tig char pa phab// de yi me 'phrogs/ 
281b6(mdo 'grel): gar mkhan ma// mdzes sdug 'jo sgeg gzugs byas nas// dri za lha mo'i tshogs rnams dang // lhan cig der ni gang dag byas// mdzes pa'i gar dang rol rtsed kyis// bde blag tu ni sems 'phrogs pa// gdul bya rnam 
281b7(mdo 'grel): kyi yid ni der// nges par 'dod pa'i rang bzhin du// de nas rnams par ma dul ba'i// bdud ni 'dul ba la brtson pa'i// nyer sras kyis ni rnam 'gyur la// 'os pa'i phyir bcos rab tu bsams// bdud la phyogs te des smras 
281b8(mdo 'grel): pa// khyod rnamakhas pa bdag tshim ste// kye mgang dang kyi mthu// mchog nyid khon ci zhig brjod// ces brjod phreng ba'i grol gyis ni// ron gsum dag de la brtags// mgo la sbrul gyir dang ni// mgrin par me dang khyis 
282a1(mdo 'grel): ro// bdud des ro ni gsum po de// rang gi dgrol bar ma nus nas// dbang po nyed dbang gdong bzhi dang // bcas pa'i lha la skyabs su song // des kyang dgrol bar ma nus tshe// pad+ma skyes kyis rab bsku// 
282a2(mdo 'grel): te// de nas dreg pa nyams pa'i bdud// de nyid la ni skyabs su song // shin tu dul bas nyer sbas kyi// rkang pa dag la des btugs te// rgyags pa btang nas rab dang bas// thal sbyar de la rab smras pa// gnod pa byas pa bdag la ni// 
282a3(mdo 'grel): yang dag 'os pa khyod kyis byas// da ni khyod la bdag brten pas// khro ba zong la bka' drin mdzod// bdag gis gnod pa byas med kyang // bde gshegs bdag nyid chen po yis// bu ni rnam par mthul ba// pha yi bzhin// / 
282a4(mdo 'grel): du rab tu bsrungs// byang chub snying por rdo rje'i gdan// bsten pa de la bdag gi sngon// gnod pa yi ni tshogs dag byas// de yis bdag la bzod pa nyid// byang chub ting 'dzin pa sgrub pa'i gnas der skyil krung dganas// 
282a5(mdo 'grel): bcas nas gnas pa'i tshe// rnam 'gyur rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa bdag la rab nyid ni 'dzin byed cing // khro ba bzod pas bkrus pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan dag pa nyid kyi bdag nyid can// bsam gtan mchog tu/ 
282a6(mdo 'grel): skyong bar byed pa de yi sa spyan yang cung zad phye ma yin// khyod kyi snying rje btang nas ding // bdag ni rab tu smad par byas// gnod byed la yang chen po yi// yid ni khro ba'i dri ldan min// bdag la ro dag btags pa mthong // 
282a7(mdo 'grel): khyod kyi bka' la bdag gnas so// dul bas de skad smra byed pa// de la nyer sbas kyis smras pa// gal te slar yang nyer 'tshe khyod// dge slong rnams la mi byed na// khyod la brtan par bcings pa yi// ro 'di dag ni bdag/ 
282a8(mdo 'grel): gis dgrol// gus ldan bdag la dga' ba ni// 'di yang khyod kyis rab tu bya// 'das pa'i bde gshegs rnam pa ni// khyod kyis yang dag bstan par 'os// kun gyi rjes mthun khyod kyis ni// zlos gar nus pa bdag 
282b1(mdo 'grel): gis mthong // bcom ldan 'das ni mthong ba dag/ bdag ni mchog tu 'dod par gyur// bde gshegs kyi ni chos kyi sku// thos pa'i bdag nyid bdag gis mthong // nges par mig gi bdud rtsi'i rgyun// gzugs kyi sku ni 
282b2(mdo 'grel): ma yin no// zhes brjod de ye ro dag ni// bkrol ba me tog mtshon can gyis// de la spras pa bde gshegs kyi// gzugs dang mtshungs par byed mi nus// de ltan yang khyod kyi bka'// 'dul ba la gnas bdag gis bas/ 
282b3(mdo 'grel): khyod kyi bdag ni bde gshegs dbyibs// phyag 'os la yang phyag mi bya// zhes brjod bde gshegs rnam pa ni// rnam pa kun tu bde ster zhing // gser gyi snang ba rab tu spro// mdzes pa dag ni de yis bstan// spyan 
282b4(mdo 'grel): nizung dag ring zhing bsam gtan la chags smin ma'i 'khri shing rnam 'gyur bral// shangs kyi rgyud ni mdzes par chags shing gser gyi gdugs dang mtshungs pa'i mtshan ma can// rgyan med snyan gyi zhags pa ring zhing 
282b5(mdo 'grel): mdzes la phyag gi ljon pa kun tu 'phyang// sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs dag mthong nas bsam pa med pa rnams kyang dga' bar gyur// bcom ldan sku ni mdzes pa de// mthong nas nyer sbas mchi ma dang // bcas shing// 
282b6(mdo 'grel): spu long rgyas pa yas// de yi zhabs la phyag dag byas// nges par bdag ni phyag 'os min// zhes pa yid srubs smra byed tshe// de la nyer sras kyis smras pa// rgyal ba'i rnam pa khyod phyag 'os// bcom ldan sa/ 
282b7(mdo 'grel): ni bcos ma yi// gzugs rnams la yang phyagaHsa 'os// mkhas pa rnams nis shing dang // khams la phyag de byed pa min// nyer sbas kyis ni 'di brjod pa// rab dang blo ldan bdud kyis zos// bde gshegs/ 
282b8(mdo 'grel): gzugs ni yongs btang ste// rang gi gzugs su rab tu bstan// de nas dul zhing phan pa tshol// de yi yang dag bos pa yi// grong khyer pa rnams dam pa'i chos// nyan du nyer sbas drung du 'ongs// de yi man ngag 
283a1(mdo 'grel): gtam gyis ni// bden pa mthong zhing dga' ba yi// grong khyer na gnas 'bum thag ni// bco brgyad dgra bcom nyid dag thob// de ltar 'jig rten mtha' dag dge bdag gis snang byed cing // rab rib 'phrog/ 
283a2(mdo 'grel): par byed pas chos kyi lam gyi man ngag bslabs// rgya che dge ba'i rtsabs bsod nams rgyas pa thob rnams kyi// rdzu 'phrul chen po gang de gzhan la phan pa'i don du 'gyur// zhes pa dge pa'i dbang pos byas pa'i 
283a3(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// nyer sbas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // nyams pa med pa'i dka' dang yangs pa'i dpal 
283a4(mdo 'grel): grags pa bsel zer byed pa brgya ltar dkar// ngo mtshar spyod pas mdzes pa'i mthathu dag ni// bde gshegs mchod pa'i 'bras pa'i cha shas yin// grong khyer pa TA li bu dzang// rgyal po dpal ldan mya ngan 
283a5(mdo 'grel): med// blang ste gang gi sbyin pa don// grangs kyi sgra yis dbul bar gyur// nam zhig mdun sar 'dod de la// tshong pa glid du 'gro ba bo// mdog kun nyams pa'i mya ngan gyis// gzir cing shugs rings ldan pas 
283a6(mdo 'grel): zhus// dpung pa'i grib ma ring ba la// srid pa la bso lta thod kyi// rgyal mid dgan 'ga' zhig kyang // rababasam pa sa gzeng ba mthong // bskal pa rnams chung 'ba' zhig las// namatshor gnas pa 
283a7(mdo 'grel): sku rnams kyis// bdag cag rnams kyi gzings bcug nas// rin chen snod rnams thogs par gyur// bdag cag rnams ni gzhan du 'tsho// khyab bdag dal btang snyoms ni// nam tshor 'thob chad 
283a8(mdo 'grel): pa las// khyod kyi mdzod 'ad skam par sgrub// ces pa de dag tshig thos nas// de dag gdung ba 'phos pa yi// rgyal pos rgya mtshor song ba'i grwa// rnam par bsams nas g.yo med gyur// yid ni thobs 
283b1(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs gyur cing // bcos thabs med pa de mthong nas// drung nas mngon shes drug pa yi// dge slong dbang po zhes pas smras// rin chen rkun po klu rnams la// khyod mthu me ni gos byed pa// zangs kyi glegs/ 
283b2(mdo 'grel): bul bkad pa'i// spring yigs bdag spring bar mdzad// ces pa dge slong tshig thos nas// rgyal po yi ni spring yig springs// chu gter dag tu 'phangs pa de// klu rnams kyi ni ngogs su 'phangs// ma bkarang/ 
283b3(mdo 'grel): ba des maM bdag ni// bzhin gyi chu skyes mdzes thal cing // bsam pas thon la dbugs 'byin cing // snal sor mo bkod de gnas// ma ning la ni bud med bzhin// de la gnyid ni phyir phyogs gyur// skam chags/ 
283b4(mdo 'grel): can gyi sred pa ni// ring zhing mtshan mo zad ma gyur// gzhan don sbyor ldan de la ni// nam mkha'i lha mos mngon phyogs smras// sa skyongs thabs ni yod pa la// bsam pa bya bar mi 'os so// gang zhig phyag 
283b5(mdo 'grel): 'tshal yongs su bsngo bas cher 'os bsod nams can// spyi bo thal mo sbyar bas mtshan pas rgyal la mchod byed pa// rnam par rgyal ldan de dag bka' yi phreng ba rnam bkra zhing // dngos po mchog gis mdzes pa lta 
283b6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis kyang spyi bor 'dzin// de zos nang par mi bdag ni// khrus bya brtul zhugs gtsang ldan pas// dag pa'i yid kyi sangs rgyas ni// bsams nas grub slad rab smras pa// snying stobs kyis 'dzum ro ldan snying rje 
283b7(mdo 'grel): zla ba'i 'od kyi re ba skong // mdzes shing mtha' dag mun pa zhe slad dkar po'i phyogs la rnam par gnas// rtag tu kun dga' rnam 'gyur med cing mchog gi bdud rtsi rnam par spro// gdung ba rabazhi'i grogs po sangs rgyas 
283b8(mdo 'grel): zlanya'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig rtag tu yul gyi spyan la phyi rol phyogs gyur cing // rab mang pha rol phyin la brten pa'i sems ni dbang gyur pa// gzhan phan dag la mchog tu mngon zhen rten cing kun rtog gi/ 
284a1(mdo 'grel): dpag bsam ldon pa de dag bdag la dge ba ster gyur cig/ ces pa sa yi bdag po yi// smon lam gus pa grub byed kyi// dgra bcom stong phrag drug cu ni// phyogs rnams dag las myur bar po// 
284a2(mdo 'grel): de nas dge slong dbang po yis// cig ni mi bdag mtshungs pa dang // gzhan pa klu yi rgyal po yi// rnam pa gser gyi rang bzhin byas// de nas dal bu dal bu yi// sa bdag gzugs ni dma' ba dang // glu yi dbang po'i 
284a3(mdo 'grel): gzugs dag ni// ye mtshan byed pa mthong bar gyur// ji lta ji ltar mi bdag gis// rtag tu dkon mchog gsum mchod byas// de lta de ltar klu yi gzugs// dma' zhing gzhan pa mthong bar gyur// de nas rgyal
284a4(mdo 'grel): pos spring yig slar// springs tshe klu yi gang zag rnams// ma lus tshong pa'i rin chen khur// phrag la bkod nas 'ongs par gyur// ma lus nor de mi bdag gis// tshor ba rnams la rab tu byin// klu rnams 
284a5(mdo 'grel): btang nas rgyal ba yi// bstan la gus dang bcas par gyur// mi bdag la 'os nyer spyad kyis// dgra bcom rnams la mchod pa bsgrubs// kun tu rtog pa mi chung bas// sangs rgyas lta bar 'dod par gyur// 
284a6(mdo 'grel): yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur pas// rgyal ba mthong ba rnyed dka'i tshe// yon tan gyis ni nyer sbas dang // bde gshegs mtshungs par de yis thos// gus dang ldan pa'i dbang gyur cing // mdza' la mnyes gshin 
284a7(mdo 'grel): 'go tshe na// gnas pa de ni mi bdag gis// gus pa sa po nyonya dag gis bos// dam chos dge ba rgyas pa ni// yongs rdzogs de yi mchod pa thob// rtag tu dkon mchog gsum po ni// rgyal po'i dpung gnyen// 
284a8(mdo 'grel): dag tu gyur// de ltar rgyal ba dran pas sa yi bdag po dag/ rab rgyas bsod nams che bar dar ba bun tshogs kyi// bka' ni me tog phreng bar gyur pa'i rtse dga' dag/ dug 'dzin rnams kyi mgo bo la yang thob par// 
284b1(mdo 'grel): gyu// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// klu la spring yig springs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa gsum/ 
284b2(mdo 'grel): pa'o// // gang zhig sbyin la brtson pas 'phral la dga' ba glang chen bzhin// yan lag rdzogs shing mdzes sdug rgyal ba rgya che dbus kyi phyogs// sa ni rang gi mnyes gshin dang bcas rab tu ster byed pa// de dag 
284b3(mdo 'grel): bsod nams rab smin lam du ji ltar 'gro ma yin// de nas sa bdag mya ngan med// sbyin la shin tu cher goms pas// slong ba phyogs nas 'ongs rnams kyis// dpag bsam shing nyid dag tu gyur// rtag tu rgyal po la/ 
284b4(mdo 'grel): 'os pa'i// zas dang gos dang rgyan rnams kyis// khyim du dge slong 'bum phrag gsum// gus shing gtsang bdag gis mchod// gser gyi bye ba brgya ster bar// gang gi lugs la nges par gyur// dge ba ldan pa'i 
284b5(mdo 'grel): snying stobs nyid// shin tu zad pa med pa'i mdzod// rgyal srid tshal 'byor mang des// snying stobs blo yis dge 'dun la// lon sum cu drug gi gser// bye ba dgu bcu rtsa drug pul// de nas dus kyi mi bdag ni// 
284b6(mdo 'grel): da kyi thibs pa nyid du gyur// lus can rnams kyi lags byas da// bstan pa yin gyi lus na min// lus na mtha' lan banyid// de nam sa yi bdag cha yis// thagag kun dang dgra sung la// no nI 'phrul 
284b7(mdo 'grel): brtson par gyur// de yi cha ba pun tshogs can// zhes pas phyag slad mdzod srungs la// bskos pas sbyin pa'i bsod nams la// zhugs pa de yi bka' dag bzlog/ tsha bos sbyin pa bkag pa'i tshe// dge 
284b8(mdo 'grel): 'dun la nis bdag gis// rang sa la nyid du gyur pa'i slad// b+hu ru ra'i phyed gabul// de nas blon po blo ldan ni// mgu byed sbas pa'i gros dag gis// dge 'dun la nis gzhi dag/ mi lus sa yi bdag pos phul 
285a1(mdo 'grel): gang+gA'i chu yi do shal mdzes ldan rgya mtsho bzhi yi ni// rba rlabs ska rags yangs shing ma la ya yi rna rgyan can// nor 'dzin ma nyid ma lus byin nas phan pa'i slad du ni// bsod nams tshad kyi dpag 
285a2(mdo 'grel): dang bral ba de yi yang dag thob// de nas gser gyi bye ba dgu bcu drug brin rab grags pa// mi yi bdag po mtho ris song tshe de yi che ba yis// sa de gser gyi lhag ma bye ba phrag ni bzhi rnams kyis// blon po'i tshig gi/ 
285a3(mdo 'grel): bsal bar rab tu nyos te blangs par gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// sa gzhi phul ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste/ 
285a4(mdo 'grel): bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // ma rig pa yi rtsa ba can// 'khor ba'i ldan pa rnam pas kun// shes dang brjod dang gzhom par ni// kun mkhyen ma rtogs su yis nus// mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal na sngon// bzhugs 
285a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i rgyal ba dge legs can// ma lus gzigs pa bcom ldan gyis// dge slong tshogs la bka' stsal pa// ye shes snang ba dri med kyi// yid can dge legs slad du nyon// rten cing 'brel 'byung ba dag gis ni// khyed la 
285a6(mdo 'grel): rim bzhin bshad par bya// ma rig pa yi bag chags 'di// 'khor ba dug gi ljon pa ni// sdug bsngal phung po chen po yi// rtsa ba 'ching ba sgrub par byed// de yi rkyen gyi 'du byed de// lus ngag yid kyi bdag nyid can// 
285a7(mdo 'grel): 'du byed kyis basman rnam shes yid// dbang po drug pa'i bdag nyid can// de yi rkyen gyi ming dang gzugs// ming dang mthong ba zhes brjod pa'i// 'di las drug pa yid dag kyang // dbang po la gnas skye mched drug 
285a8(mdo 'grel): skye mched drug gi yang dag sbyor// reg pa zhes ni mngon par brjod// reg pa drug ni nyams myong gang // dan tshor bar rab tu grags// yul ni kun nas nyon mongs las// de yi chags sad rab tu skyed// de las 
285b1(mdo 'grel): byung ba'i len pa na// 'dod pa sogs la 'jug par 'gyur// len pa las byung srid pa 'dod// gzugs dang gzugs med rang bzhin no// sid pa las byung sna tshogs kyi// skye gnas su 'jug skye ba'o// 
285b2(mdo 'grel): shimya ngan la sogs rgyud// skye ba la ni brten pa yin// ma reg la sogs 'gog pa yis// de dag rim bzhin zhi bar 'gyur// ma rig pas drangs lpags mang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gnas 'di ni// 
285b3(mdo 'grel): dben pa'i nags su gnas zhing zhi ba byed rnams dag gis bsam par bya// yang dag yongs su shes na dus kyi nges par phra ba nyid du 'gyur// phra ba nyid ni yang dag thob na bde blag nyid du zlog par 'gyur// zhes 
285b4(mdo 'grel): pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o// / 
285b5(mdo 'grel): 'dod ldan rab gdung yid can rnams la phrag dog dbang gi khro ba nye bar gnas// khro bas long zhing blo gros nyams rnams mi bzad rab rib g.yang sar rnam par ltung // der ni rab drag rnam mang dmyal ba nyon mongs 
285b6(mdo 'grel): sarmongs brten ci ga/ bskal pa ba dus rnam las du dgas sa la sa gnas pa ma rnams bcug/ ban+d+ha mA rkan rgyal pa mA n+ta ya ky-i/ chu blang thams marnams par// tsan pa 
285b7(mdo 'grel): sems can rnam 'gyur can// skye bo kun tu bskor ba gzigs// rma las byung ba'i srin bu yi// tshogs kyi lus chen za byed cing // gdung ba'i tshogs dmyal ba na// gnas pa'i sdug bsngal gsal byed pa/ 
285b8(mdo 'grel): de mthong thugs rje skyes pa yi// kun mkhyen chu klung ngogs su ni// grong khyer pa yi skye bo yis// yongs su bshams pa'i gdan la bzhugs// de yi rang bzhin ting 'dzin gyis// 'phral la skye ba dran mdzad 
286a1(mdo 'grel): nas// dmus long rnam 'gyur rnam pa can// ma he mtshungs la de gsungs pa// bi dur khyod mi bzad pa'i// las kyi 'bras bu longs spyod dam// tshul ngan skye bar byed pa yi// blo de khyod kyi dran nam/ 
286a2(mdo 'grel): ci// bde gshegs kyis gsungs de thos nas// me yi tshig gis des smras pa// bcom ldan mi bzad sdig pa yi// 'bras bu rgya che longs spyod do// zhes pa smra ba de yi ni// mchog tu skye ba dran pa las// skye bo mang// 
286a3(mdo 'grel): pos 'di ci zhes// dge slong dge 'dun dag la dris// de nas dge slong kun dga' bos// de yi las kyi dge mtshan las// ngo mtshar sngon byung dris de la// bcom ldan kun mkhyen gyis gsungs pa// sa bdag bi dur/ 
286a4(mdo 'grel): zhes pa// mya ngan med bzhin mig g.yoms// rkang pas bsnun pa'i dge mtshan can// 'phags rgyal dag tu sngon byung gyur// napa zhig spang rtsi 'thung ba'i mnyen// dpyid dus rlung gis g.yo ba yi// 'khri shing yid 'o// 
286a5(mdo 'grel): nags tshal du// de ni bud med tshogs dang rtse// sa skyong bud med de dag der// me tog thu ba brel gyur pa// rkang gdung sgra yis 'dab chags ni// rnam par bskyod cing rab tu 'khyam// der ni zhi ba la brten bzhin// dben/ 
286a6(mdo 'grel): par rnam par gnas pa yi// rang sangs rgyas ni dgra bcom gyis// yongs bskor mdzes ma rnams kyis mthong // skyil krung bcas nas gnas gyur cing // bsam gtan spyan ni g.yo med pa// de mthong 'phral 
286a7(mdo 'grel): la de dag rnams// yid ni rab tu dang bar gyur// bsam gtan mthar ni dag pa'i chos// bdud rtsi bzhin du ston de la// rkang par phyag byas de dag gis// yongs su bskor nas nye bar gnas// mi bdag yul der 
286a8(mdo 'grel): song ba yis// bud med rnams der mngon phyogs mthong // tshul khrims dag ldan de dag gi/ lus ni bcad pa rab tu bskos// sdig pa de yi yangs pa yi// dus su dmyal ba nyam nga bar// rnam 'gyur sems 
286b1(mdo 'grel): can gyis za zhing // ngan pa'i dbyibs can 'di dag smin// 'og nas rkang par du ma yi// rnam 'gyur rma las byung gyur pa'i// srin po'i rigs kyi khengs gyur pa// 'di yi lus ni rma sa la ltos// bskal pa'i mthar
286b2(mdo 'grel): ni dmyal ba dag/ dpyad nas gtum po nyid gyur te// rngon pa'i ngang tshul ldan pa 'das// rang sangs rgyas ni gsod par gyur// slar yang dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyis// lus chen rnam par nyams byed cing // grangs las
286b3(mdo 'grel): 'das pa'i dus kyis ni// me nyid rab tu thob par 'gyur// de nas sdig pa zad gyur te// nyon mongs me chen dag gis ni// yid byung ston pa ud tar// zhes pa'i bstan pa rab 'byung 'gyur// de nas kA shi'i rgyal po yi// 
286b4(mdo 'grel): skyed mos tshal du mdzes mas mchod// phrag dog khro bas lus dag ni// chad pa drag pos gcod par 'gyur// de rjes 'di yi sdug bsngal me// mi bzang rab tu nyams par 'gyur// zhes pa ston pa'i gsung thos nas// 
286b5(mdo 'grel): thams cad chags bral ldan par gyur// de nas der ni ston pa'i gsung gi rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i rgyun rdzogs pas// chags bral srid pa'i 'jigs pa'i nyon mongs bsam pas gzir ba de dag rnams// dga' ba 
286b6(mdo 'grel): dang ldan dge ba'i chu yis bsam pa rab tu rdzogs gyur cing // rab zhi me tog dga' tshal bsten pa rnams kyis gdung ba gshad song // zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod 
286b7(mdo 'grel): pa dpag bsam gyi 'bri shing las// bai du ra'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o// // mi sran rab tu rgyas pa yi// kun gyi yon tan nyams par byed// bdag nyid chen po'i mthu yis ni// 
286b8(mdo 'grel): mngon par dang ba nyid du 'gyur// A tra mA yA yi nags kyi mthar// 'byung po'i khang po'i phrag nang na// bcom ldan bde bar gshegs pa sngon// bsam gtan rab tu sbyong zhing gnas// der ni mi bzad lce 'bab pa// 
287a1(mdo 'grel): drag pos khyu mchog zhing pa bcom// de ni bsam gtan la chags pas// sprin gyi sgra yang gnas ma gyur// de nas dal bab ngogs su ni// bsam gtan mtha' ru ston pa'i gsung // 
287a2(mdo 'grel): nyan du rgyal po chen po ni// bzhi zhes brjod pa mngon du 'ongs// yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes pa// mig mi bzang dang nor bdag po// de yi zhabs la de dag gis// phyag 'tshal rin chen me tog gtor// de 
287a3(mdo 'grel): dag los ni 'phags pa'i rigs// yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po// gzhan gnyis gdug pa'i rigs can te// de dag lan dam chos dag/ bcom ldan 'byung po dgongs pa yis// rang la 'os pa'i skad kyis 
287a4(mdo 'grel): bstan// gang gis de dag bstan pa yi// chos la rab tu mkhas par gyur// dkon mchog gsum la rab brten cing // bslab pa'i gnas bzung de dag rnams// bcom ldan zhabs la btud nas ni// gzhal med khang / 
287a5(mdo 'grel): nas mtho sa song // de dag song tshe bcom ldan la// dge slong ya mtshan skyes rnams kyis// de dag sngon tshe bsod nams tshogs// dris pa thams cad reg pas gsungs// klu ni dbugs chung dbugs chen dag/ 
287a6(mdo 'grel): sngon byung de dag dgra bo ni// 'dab bzangs gtsug ldan de bzhin du// mi ne'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'o// klu yi ston pa 'od srungs kyis// bka' ni yang dag thob gyur nas// stobs ldan 'dab bzang dag gis ni// rdzi bar 
287a7(mdo 'grel): nus pa min par gyur// zhe sdang 'gran zhing mngon khengs pas// 'dab bzangs kyis kyang 'od srungs la// bstan pa rin chen bzung nas ni// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song // klu de dag ni 'phags pa'i// 
287a8(mdo 'grel): rigs// yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po// gdug pa'i 'dab bzang de dag ni// mig mi bzang dang nor bdag 'di// zhes pa gsung brgyal ba yi// bsod nams gsung rab bdud rtsin// nags tshal de na/ 
287b1(mdo 'grel): gnas pa yi// thub pa ke ne ya kas thos// de yi mthu yi ya mtshan te// de nyid la ni skyabs su song // phyir mi 'od ni thob gyur nas// dben pa mthong zhing dga' bar gyur// de yi tsha bo shi la yang // de bzhin 'dul 
287b2(mdo 'grel): bal brten nas// bden pa mthong zhing rgya che ba// phyir mi 'ong gi 'bras thob gyur// de dag 'khor bcas bcom ldan gyi// bstan pa'i chos la rab dang zhing // rab tu byung ba blangs nas ni// bsngags par 'os pa'i// 
287b3(mdo 'grel): dgra bcom thob// de nas de yi lhag rnams la// bde gshegs bka' yi ka bi na// shA ri'i bu dang mau rgal gyi// bu yis kyang ni bstan pa mdzad// kai ne ya ka shi la yi// yi da rab dang mthong de dag gi/ sngon gyi bsod 
287b4(mdo 'grel): nams dge slong gis// dris shing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// sngon gyi skye ba 'di dag ni// ba ra NA ser khyim bdag gnyis// ang+ga a gan zhes pa// grogs po tshes la dga' bar 'gyur// tha ma 'od srungs drung 
287b5(mdo 'grel): du ni// tshangs par spyod pa spyad de dag/ mthar thug smon lam dag gis ni// da ltar rab tu zhi nyid thob// de ltar thub mchog bsod nams smon lam las skyes pa// de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dag ni thos 
287b6(mdo 'grel): gyur nas// rab tu zhi ba'i rigs pas srid pa'i lag 'gro ni// zil gyi mnan slad dge slong dge 'dun rtse gcig gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtog pa brjod pa dpag bsam 
287b7(mdo 'grel): kyi 'khri shing las// kai ne ya ka'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa bdun pa'o// // gang gi skabs gsum la yang rtse ba dang ldan pa'i// mig ni zhi ba min pa zhi byed la dpa' ltung byed pa/ 
287b8(mdo 'grel): chen po de dag rnams kyi mthu ni cher 'os chen po nyid// dge mtshan gyis ni rtse mo shin tu mtho ba dag tu mdzes// brgya byin 'dun sar 'khod pa sngon// mtho ris nas lhung mtshan nyid kyis// reg cing se ng+ge'i gdan ste 
288a1(mdo 'grel): du// dga' ba rab tu thob ma gyur// de yi mgo la man+dA ra'i// phreng ba gser ldan mdzes pa ni// bsod nams min pas bsgribs pa yi// lang mtsho'i dpal bzhin nyams par gyur// de yi thig pa/ 
288a2(mdo 'grel): grags pa ltar// dkar la nyams par bya ba'i slad// dngul gyi chu thigs gsar pa yis// ngan spras bzhin du gnas dag byas// de yi sems ni bas pa la// chags shing ltung la nye gyur pa// de yi brtan pa phrag 
288a3(mdo 'grel): dog gis// khros bzhin rab tu ring bar song // mya ngan yongs 'dris de mthong nas// 'jigs pa'i bde sogs kyis smras pa// ltung ba dag la nye bar 'dir// rten ni rab tu bsam par mjed// 'jig 
288a4(mdo 'grel): rten rnams la rgud pa yis// bsgom bya min pa med ces des// gang zhig nyon mongs thigs pa 'di// 'gro ba'i bdag po khyod la yang // nges par rnam kun phyir phyogs pas// 'bad pa yi ni btsal btsal 
288a5(mdo 'grel): nas// ltung ba yon tan la sred cing // chen po rnams dang 'grogs par mdzod// khyod bdag rang nyid mdzam gling du// re zhig babasal khyod kyis ni// rgud pa srung bar bzod pa yi// dge slong 'ga' zhig btsal bar 
288a6(mdo 'grel): mdzod// gang dag dge bas 'gro byed cing // dge ba nyid kyis sbyor byed pa// dge slong mthu ni rgya che zhing // khyad par 'phags par grags pa thos// zhes pa dga' ma'i tshig thos nas// de bzhin zhes 
288a7(mdo 'grel): spras lha yi bdag/ sa la mngon phyogs nyon mongs ni// 'jil ba dge slong rnams la dris// brgya byin gyis ni dri tsam gyis// mthu yis mngon khengs de dag gis// thal mo sbyar byas de nyid la// phyag 'tshal 
288a8(mdo 'grel): bzhin ras btud par gyur// gang zhig bdag da la 'dud pa// de yi ji ltar srung byed gyur// ces bsam lha yi bdag po ni// re ba nyams pas rang gnas song // de nas de yi bde gshegs ni// mchog gi 
288b1(mdo 'grel): bdud rtsi thob shes nas// ltung la rab tu nye ba ni// yongs su skyob pa dag tu bsams// de nas de ni rjes 'brang bcas// dbang po'i phreng ba'i phug nang na// de bzhin gshegs pa me khams la// snyoms gnas zhugs pa 
288b2(mdo 'grel): lta ru song // de nas bde sogs bdag po des// 'phral la phug dang nye bar byiphyin// zur phud lnga pa zhes pa yi// dri za'i bu la gus pas smras// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// me yi khams la snyoms 
288b3(mdo 'grel): zhugs pa// khyod ni rang gi sgyu rtsal la// mkhas pas rtogs par bya bar los// gang zhig dus min nyer 'grod dang // ma brjod par mi nang 'jug dang // bsam pa shes pa min pa de// dam pa rnams kyis smad pa'i 
288b4(mdo 'grel): gnas// zhes brjod lha yi rgyal po yis// blo gros ldan pa dri za'i bu// biDUH'i dbyug pa can// rgyud mangs sgra snyun len du bcug/ rang bzhin gyis spyan yid du 'ong // bstod dbyangs dga' ba dang bcas pa 
288b5(mdo 'grel): de yi rgyal bsad byas te// 'phrog byed lta ba'i go skabs bye// de nas lha dang bcas pa yi// mchod sbyin brgya pa rabazhugs te// rab zhi bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa// dga' ba skyed byed bde gshegs lhas// 
288b6(mdo 'grel): phyag 'tshal rab tu btud pa de// mgo yi man+tar ba'i ros// ston pa'i zhabs kyi sen mo yi// me long dag ni rab tu phyis// de nas rab zhugs de la ni// gang gis bden pa mthong ba la// chos kyi mig ni 
288b7(mdo 'grel): 'byung 'gyur ba'i// bka' dran rgyal ba de yi mdzad// yongs ltung de yi 'phral la ni// rang gi stan nyid thob par gyur// bsod nams mthu ni de dag gis// ltung ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu zhi// ji srid 'tshe
288b8(mdo 'grel): bar bde bar gshegs// skya ba 'os de la skyabs su song // bdag ni rab thar ces brjod nas// de la zhus nas mtho ris sor // tum bu ru yi bu mo mdzes// zur pu de lnga pa la des byin// dam pa rnams ni phan 
289a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i cha// bu lon bzhin du sems par byed// dge ba thob pas brgya byin ni// gsar du 'khrungs pas ya mtshan pa// dge slong gis dris bcom ldan 'das// thams cad mkhyen pas der 
289a2(mdo 'grel): gsungs pa// grong khyer mdzes ldan dag tu sngon// sa yi bdag po bskal bzang gis// ston pa log par dad sel gyis// sku yi mchod rten rab tu byas// de yi bsod nams smon lam rdzogs ldan pas// 
289a3(mdo 'grel): rgyal pos de ni lha yi dbang nyid thob// 'byor pa chos kyi bcings zhes gsungs nas ni// bcom ldan gsung ni rab tu zhi bar gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod// 
289a4(mdo 'grel): pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// brgya byin ltung ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // bud med blo yi srin mo rnams kyi blo gros rmongs byas shing // bde ba 'dod pa nyid kyis 
289a5(mdo 'grel): yid na nor la zhugs gyur pa// skyes bu gang zhig rab zhi dang bral zhi bar mi bgrod pa// de de nges par 'phral la nyon mongs dag tu ltung bar 'gyur// gang zhig na tshod phyed dag ni// thos pa brjod cing tshangs spyod spyad// 
289a6(mdo 'grel): bram ze 'tsho ba bde zhes pa// mnyan yod du ni sngon byung gyur// mdza' bas gnyen gyis gsol btab pa'i// rgan po smar khra bo de// chos kyi lam gyi ngo dag tu// bud med rab tu bzung bar byas// longs spyod 
289a7(mdo 'grel): gsar pa la chags de'i// chung ma g.yo ldan ma zhes pa// dar la bab cing mig g.yo ma// shin tu yid 'ong nyid du gyur// de ni de la rim bzhin du// shin tu sred par min par gyur// bud med mi gus 
289a8(mdo 'grel): la chags shing // yang dag chags la chags bral zhing // de bsams kun tu mi 'phrogs pa'i// nabs skra dkar ldan pa'i khyo// bdag gi lang tsho'i dregs 'di la// bsod nams min pas nye 
289b1(mdo 'grel): bar gnas// rgan po gzhon nu ma spyod pa// lus ni nyams pa go byad dag/ rga bas spa nas bzung byas te// gnyen gshin gyis ni zlog pa bzhin// rgan po dal gyi cung zad ni// 'khums shing dgu bor rab gyur pa 
289b2(mdo 'grel): sa la lang tsho'i nor bu ni// stor ba tshol bar byed pa bzhin// rgan po blo ldan ma yin pa// 'jig rten pha rol don shes pas// gzhan gyi longs spyod la sbyar gang // de nyid bdag gis rab tu bya// 'di ni khyim na 
289b3(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'i tshe// rkun po'i 'dod ldan dang mdza' bas// rtse med longs spyod ma bsdams pa// bde ba bdag gis spyod mi nus// zhes bsams rigs bzang rjes mthun zhing // ngo tsha ldan pa bzhin du des 
289b4(mdo 'grel): dul ba yis ni mngon phyogs te// dal gyis bdag po la smras pa// bya med bde ba tshol byed pa// khyed ni khyim du chags pa yis// bzod pa dka' ba'i dbul po nyid// khyod kyis lag pas drangs nas blangs// gang 
289b5(mdo 'grel): zhig rtsom pa la sdang zhing // drag po'i snyoms las dag la dga'// rab mar 'god pa'i rgyud ldan pa'i// khyim na gnas pa des ci byed// gang du khyim bdag snyoms las las// khyim gyi zur ni mi gtong ba// 
289b6(mdo 'grel): der ni bud med rmongs pa rnams// nor sgrub slad du 'byung ngam ci// gang la skyes pa spro ldan pas// phyi yi tha snyad la dga' zhing // bud med khyim gyi bya bar chags// de na don kun phun sum tshogs// las dang 
289b7(mdo 'grel): bral ba rnams kyi khyim ni dga' ston longs spyod nyams gyur cing // rgyan med gos med bud med dag ni zur phug dri ma can na zhe na// khri dang mal stan rnam par nyams shing chu snod chags pa'i sgra dang ldan// 'bangs/ 
289b8(mdo 'grel): med yo byad med cing yun rings zho sub sman rdzogs par 'gyur// de yis de brjod bram zed// nor la mngon par phyogs te song // bud med kyis ni dbang byas rnams// yul gyi g.yangs dag tu ltung / 
290a1(mdo 'grel): de yi nor 'dzin rgyal mtsho'i mthar// 'khyams nas sbyin pa thob gyur te// gser dang gos ni rdzogs gyur pas// dus kyi rang gi grong khyer song // de nas khyi ma 'dod tshogs kyis de// song bgrod 
290a2(mdo 'grel): mtha'i nags tshal du// chom rkun pa yis bcom gyur nas// lus tsam lhag ma nyid du gyur// bde bdon gnyer nus pa yis// don mid nor ni nyer bsgrubs kyang // mya ngan chu ye thigs pa bzhin// byed po bzhed 
290a3(mdo 'grel): pa min pas byed// des bsams kye ma 'bad pa yis// bdag gi nor ni bskabs gyur kyang // bdag ni skal dang mi ldan pas// rmi lam mthong dang mtshungs par gyur// nor ni don gnyer chung ma yi// gan du lag 
290a4(mdo 'grel): stong bdag phyin na// smad pa drag po'i dug ldan pa'i// tshig rtsub brjod pas bdag mi 'tsho// de srad bdag ni 'di nyid du// 'phral la zhags pas bcings pa pan// dbul ba'i nyer 'tsho drag po yis// khyim du 
290a5(mdo 'grel): bud med mtshan mi bzod// ces bsam de yi 'khri shing gi/ zhags pa dag ni mgrin par bkod// nyon mongs drag pos nyen rnams kyis// gnyen dang phrad pa 'chi ba yin// skabs der bcom ldan brtse ba yi// 
290a6(mdo 'grel): rgya mtsho 'byung po la dgongs pa// thams cad mkhyen pas de yi ni// sdug bsngal shes nas nags su byon// de nas de yi gnyis skyes ni// brtse bas dbugs byung zhags pa btang // de yi sbyin pa'i gte 
290a7(mdo 'grel): blangs nas// de la phyag 'tshal khyim du song // de yi chung ma nor gyis kyang // rjes su 'thun pa nyid ma gyur// gzhan gyi rig pa la chags pa'i// bud med nor gyis tsham mi 'gyur// longs spyod rtsom pa che la 
290a8(mdo 'grel): yang // dus kyi yid ni chags bral des// bsam pa kye ma 'khor ba na// de nyid du na bde ba med// dbul dang mtshungs pa'i sdug bsngal ci zhig yod// de bas kyang ni nor sgrub rab sdug bsngal// nor gyi 
290b1(mdo 'grel): longs spyod bde ba'i chas bsgos pa// gnas dang gnas su sdug bsngal brgya phrag bskyed// de ltar chags bral rab bsams te// rgyal byed tshal du song nas des// srid pa bcad slad bcom ldan 'das/ 
290b2(mdo 'grel): ston pa la ni skyabs su song // de yi bsam pa bgal nyal// khams dang de bzhin 'gro mkhyen nas// chos kyi sman ni bcom ldan 'das// srid pa'i nad kyi sman pas byin// bden mthong de yis rab byung ni/ 
290b3(mdo 'grel): rab tu dang pa yang dag blangs// nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa'i slad// dgra bcom da ni thob par gyur// de la grub pa rmad dbyung de// mthong nas ya mtshan rgyas pa yis// dge slong gis dris bcom ldan 
290b4(mdo 'grel): gyis// de yi sngon byung rab gsungs pa// ba raN+Da sir mi yi dbang // dbang chen de ni sngon byung ste// sems can kun la gang gis ni// brtse ba mchog nyid yid 'ong gyur// bdag po ngan pas rab gdungs pa// 
290b5(mdo 'grel): yul gzhan nas 'ongs skye ba yi// lam gnas gang zhig grib bsil gyi// ljon pa bzhin du mngon phyogs bsten// nam zhig pha rol rgyal phran gyis// grong khyer dag ni bkag gyur kyang // khro med de ma 
290b6(mdo 'grel): g.yul dag ni// thams cad gsod la blo ma bsgrubs// de ni spro ba med shes nas// chags bral blon po thams cad kyis// sred pas nor ni blangs byas te// dgra bo dag la brten par gyur// de nas srog 
290b7(mdo 'grel): chags gsod pal// yaM dbyung rgyal srid rab gtang nas// sa yi bdag po bzod pa'i zhing // gcig pu mtshor nags su song // rjes la gus dang sems can la// ngo tsha rab btang ngan pa yi// thon 
290b8(mdo 'grel): po chags pas long rnams kyis// pha rol rgyal phran rgyal por byas// mi bdag gsar ba'i ngos na ni// gsar pa nyid du rnam par 'phel// rang gi rje bo btang rnams la// 'os pa min pa 'ba' zhig ldan// 
291a1(mdo 'grel): de dag sa bdag gsar pa yi// sgo srungs rnams kyis yun ring bkag/ skyo bas bdag nyid la mtshon te// shugs byung ngo tshas glu blangs pa// rje bo mnyes gshin rnyed sla ba// dbang chen sde ni rab/ 
291a2(mdo 'grel): btang nas// sdig can bdag cag gzhan sgon// dmod pa'i gdung ba bzod par byed// dpal ni skyed byed lnga dang lha min mi rnams rin chen tshogs kyis rgyas par byed// chu gter dri med shin tu rgya che de ni khobs pa 
291a3(mdo 'grel): stong pa khyod kyis btang // da lta ba dag ngan sgo la brten cing gyen du phyogs thob rmongs pa'i dung dag kye// kha la brlang pos phud byas tshe de drag po ci zhig la sgrogs mi smrar 'dug// de ltar rab gdung blon po rnams// 
291a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal srid gsar pa'i tshad gdung la// dbang chen sde yi zla ba ni// rab tu blta bar 'dod par gyur// skabs der rgyal po zhi ba yi// dga' tshal nags na gnas pa dang // nye bar bram ze slong ba po// kau shi ka/ 
291a5(mdo 'grel): zhes pa 'ongs// 'bras bu rtsabs sa bdag gis// mgron byas ngal bsos de la byin// de yi 'ong ba'i rgyu mtshan dag/ dul bas dris pas rab smras pa// slong ba'i tshogs kyis kun rtogs gi/ 'bras/ 
291a6(mdo 'grel): bu che ldan dpag bsam shing // mi bdag dbang chen sde la bdag/ dbul ba yi ni slong du 'gro// de thos mi bdag sdug bsngal dang // ldan pas de la rab smras pa// bram zeng nyid dbang chen sde// dpal dang / 
291a7(mdo 'grel): bral bas bdag smad do// slong ba khyod ni phyir phyogs las// gang la gdung ba ster du 'ongs// sgrub byed phyin ci log las ni// phyin ci log nyid bdag gis thob// gang gi re ba nyams pa yi// slong ba'i bzhin / 
291a8(mdo 'grel): log mthong gyur pa// shing skams lta bu bdag gi lus// 'bras bu med pa dag gi ci// zhes pa rgyal po'i tshig thos nas// rdobs bsnun bzhin gnyis skyes ni// re thag chad pas yun ring na// 'du shes 
291b1(mdo 'grel): thob nas rab smras pa// bdag la skal ba med pa yis// sa skyong khyod kyis 'byor pa spangs// btong ba khyed ltar rnyed bla ba// 'jig rten du ni ga la rnyed// cho ga shes rgyal ldan khyod mdzes pa// rgyal srid dag
291b2(mdo 'grel): las shin tu lhag/ gang zhig mdza' bo gzhan med pa'i// slong rnams bsod nams med pa nyid// dpal mo g.yo ba nyid kyis 'phral la nges par btang gyur pa'i// rin chen 'byung gnas dag ni bag kyang 
291b3(mdo 'grel): dman par gyur pa med// dpal ni khyi bzhin mi bsran brkam chags khyim na dman ldan zhing // da dung skyes bu dam pa la brten dga' bar yongs ma gyur// ces brjod mi bdag la gsol nas// bsam 
291b4(mdo 'grel): bral dug gi gzir ba de// 'bras bus 'tsho ba'i shing bcad pa'i// mya ngan las ni 'chi bar brtson// de yi mgrin par song ba yi// zhags pa sa bdag de yi bsal// snying rje'i rgya mtsho slong rnams kyi// 
291b5(mdo 'grel): mdza' bcug gnyen gyis de la smas// bdag chings sa yi bdag po ni// mi mthun phyogs kyi grong khyer khyer// khyod la bdag ni gsod 'dod des// mngon 'dod las lhag nor ster 'gyur// de sla sa 
291b6(mdo 'grel): yi bdag pos brjod// ngo mtshar gyur bzhin gnyis skyes kyis// slong ba'i gnyen de bcings nas ni// nor la sred pas rab tu khyer// sa bdag de yi khrid pa de// pha rol rgyal phran dag gis mngon// 
291b7(mdo 'grel): de yi byang tshul thos gyur nas// ya mtshan gyur pas de la bsngags// bram ze la ni nor byin nas// rang gi gnas su sa bdag de// zhabs la cod pan gyis btugs te// dang bar byas nas 'di yi bkod// 
291b8(mdo 'grel): mi yi bdag po dbang chen sngoni nga nyid de// gang 'dis slong ba kau shi ka'i nor bdag bsgrubs// slar yang de nyid kho na 'tsho ba bde ba'o// zhes pa'i spyod pa rgyal bas rangal dper brjod do// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang 
292a1(mdo 'grel): pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// dbang chen sde'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa dgu pa'o// // gdung bar gyur kyang 
292a2(mdo 'grel): yid 'byur mi 'gyur zhing // bslab pa bzung ba yis kyang phan pa brjod// gzhan la phan pa dag la cher zhugs pa// dam pas mchog tu bdag nyid gdung ba bzod// sngon chod dpal ldan 'byer 'jig ni// dga' bar/ 
292a3(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa dga' ba yi// grogs po dri za'i rgyal po ni// rab dga' dag gi khang par phyin// de yi der ni mchod pa dag/ shin tu che zhing mngabs mchod// mdza' bcugs gnyis gshin ldan pa'i lha// bstan la 'khod 
292a4(mdo 'grel): des de la smras// rab dga' tshur shogs la 'dong // sa yi bdag po bsod nams kyi// chu gter chen po zas gtsang zhes// bya ba'i sras su rab 'khrungs pa// de yis rab zhi bdud rtsi thob// dge ba'i slad du/ 
292a5(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba des// de ni yang dag 'god par mdzad// yu cag la yang mdzad par 'gyur// da lta ba dag gi rgyud mangs la// glu dbyangs rgyun ni rab tu sbyar// ji ltar bdag 'gro phyi nas ni// bdag la bya ba dka' bar 'gyur// 
292a6(mdo 'grel): zhes pa de brjod brgya byin ni// yid byung rang gis gnas su song // sems ni yul la chags rnams la// dge la mngon dga' gal yod// skabs der sdom brtson brtul zhugs can// rab bzang mi yi 
292a7(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi// ku sha'i grong khyer mtsho yi 'gram// u dum ba ra'i nags na gnas// de yi u dum ba ra'i shing // me tog gsar pas khyab pa mthong // mig ni ya mtshan gyis rgyas pas// shin tu yang dag 
292a8(mdo 'grel): yun ring bsams// u dum wa ra'i nags tshal 'di// rgyal ba 'khrungs na me tog dpal// 'byung bzhi 'khor los sgyur ba dag/ 'byung na yang ngo bzhin du min// yang na bdag gi bsod nams kyis// 
292b1(mdo 'grel): rmad byung 'di ni yang dag skyes// zhes pa bsams na rab bzang ni// kun dga' rab tu rgyas par gyur// de nas slar yang lha yi bdag/ song nas rab dga' dag la smras// dam pa rang gi bya ba bas// gzhan 
292b2(mdo 'grel): gyi bya bar brtson pa lhag/ sa gzhi'i zla ba bde gshegs kyis// bstan pa'i 'od ni thams cad ni// rab tu gsal ba'i sa gzhi la// rab dga' tshur shog ru cag 'dong // de la rab dgas smras pa lha// rgyud/ 
292b3(mdo 'grel): mangs la ni glu dbyangs rgyun// bdag gis rab tu sbyar ba 'di// phyi nas bya ba sra mi 'gyur// zhes thos 'chi med bdag po ni// yid la re ba nyams par gyur// 'bad med bdud rtsi nyer gnas pa// bsod nams 
292b4(mdo 'grel): dman rnams 'thung ba min// dus kyi u dum ba ra'i nags// me tog rab rgyas dri bzang gis// phyogs mtshams kun tu khengs par gyur// rab bzang gis kyang mthong bar gyur// de yi bsams pa me
292b5(mdo 'grel): tog gi/ tshal ni rnam par rgyas pa 'di// ston pa dam chos ston pa dang // 'khor los sgyur ba rgyal la 'gyur// yang na bdag gi bsod nams mthus// ma lus tshal ni me tog rgyas// zhes pa sems 
292b6(mdo 'grel): pa de la ni// dregs dang dga' ba rab tu skyes// de nas dge sbyong dgra bcom thob// sangs rgyas zhes bya mngon phyogs te// de ni rdzu 'phrul gyis brtul nas// rab zhi ring na rgyas par byas// de nas dus 
292b7(mdo 'grel): kyi bcom ldan 'das// rgyal bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas// yongs su myang 'das la rtog cing // tha ma'i gzims mal dag la gnas// re zhig gdul bya 'dul ba la// rnam par bkod ces rab tu 
292b8(mdo 'grel): bsams// rab bzang dang ni dri za dag/ rab dga' de yang bdag gis lhag/ rab bzang tshogs ni chung ngu yis// 'dul ba rab tu thob par 'gyur// dri za lang tshe 'byor pa yis// myos pa tshegs 
293a1(mdo 'grel): kyi 'dul bar 'gyur// zhes pa bsams nas de bzhin gshegs// dri za'i grong khyer dag tu byon// dri za'i rgyal po gzhan pa ni// mdzes pa lhag par mngon par sprul// bai DUr+ya'i dbyug pa 
293a2(mdo 'grel): can// rgyu dmangs rgyud stong sbeng byed cing // 'gran pa'i rab dga'i rgyags pa ni// nyams par byed la brtson par gyur// rim gyi rgyud ni bcad gyur kyang // de dag sgra dbyangs kun rdzogs pa// ston par byed pa mthu 
293a3(mdo 'grel): yis ni// khyad par med pa dag tu gyur// rgyud ni thams cad bcad gyur kyang // dri za'i 'dren pa dag gis ni// dbyangs kyi tshogs ni rab tu bstan// rab dga' yas ni nus ma gyur// de nas khengs dang dregs btang 
293a4(mdo 'grel): pa// de la bcom ldan rgyal ba yis// lus na mngon phyung dag pa yi// dam pa'i chos ni bstan par mdzad// 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo ni// ye shes rdo rjes rnam bcom te// de yi rgyun zhugs 'bras bu ni// rab 
293a5(mdo 'grel): tu zhi srad mngon du byas// dus kyi u dum pa ra yi// nags kyi rab dga' me tog tshogs// rgan po dag gi longs spyod bzhin// dal bus rab tu nyams par gyur// me tog nyams pa de mthong nas// rab bzang 
293a6(mdo 'grel): mya ngan brgya yi thabs// nges pa nyid du bdag nyid kyi// bsod nams min las skyes par bsams// bsam pa'i me yi gdungs dal// u dum+ba ra'i nags kyi dpal// lha mos mngon phyogs rab sbas 
293a7(mdo 'grel): pa// don med mya ngan yongs ma byed// mthu ldan khyod kyi bsod nams kyis// tshal 'di me tog rgyas pa min// khyod kyi bsod nams ma yin pas// nyams min 'di yi rgyu dag nyon// bde gshegs nid ni 
293a8(mdo 'grel): 'khrungs pa na// me tog 'di dag 'byung 'gyur te// tha med ye shes brnyes pa na// kun nas rab tu rnam par rgyas// mya ngan 'das la nye ba na// nyams pa dang ni ltung bar 'gyur// ku shi'i drung na de bzhin gshes 
293b1(mdo 'grel): yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar bzhed// nags kyi dpal mo'i tshig 'di dag/ rab bzang gis ni thos gyur nas// ring zhing dro ba'i shugs btang ste// shin tu yun ring yang dag bsams// ston pa'i chos ni 'dul ba la// 
293b2(mdo 'grel): bdag ni snod du 'gyur bar shog/ ces pa 'di ni bdag snying la// rtag tu re ba bcings par gyur// gang gis ston pa'i zhal gyi pad// mthong zhing chos kyi gsung rab la// dge ba'i dga' ston yongs rdzogs pa/ 
293b3(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs bral ba de dag bsngags// da ni mya ngan rab zhi'i grogs po mi bzad sred pas gzir ba'i gnyer// su yi bzhin ras ri bong can las rab 'khrungs rab tu rgyas pa'i gsung // ye shes snang bas 
293b4(mdo 'grel): dkrigs shing rab mdzes bsod nams bdud rtsi dag gi rgyun// srid pa'i mya ngan gdung bar 'jig rten nyan pa'i snod kyi 'thung bar 'gyur// gang na bcom ldan rgyal ba bzhugs// ku sha'i grong du bdag 'gro'o// 
293b5(mdo 'grel): tha mar de mthong bdag gis ni// gal te rnyed slar thob par 'gyur// zhes bsams spro ldan de yi ni// lus mi snang bar skad cig las// yid ltar mgyogs pas gyad kyi gnas// ku sha'i grong khyer 
293b6(mdo 'grel): dag tu phyin// me tog dga' tshal sa la zung // zhes pa'i tshal na rab gzims pa// rgyal ba'i sgor gnas dga' bo la// de yi nang du 'jug pa zhus// de nas dal gyi kun dga' bos// sor mo gdangs 
293b7(mdo 'grel): zhing g.yo ba yis// nang 'jug bsam pa zlog byed cing // chung chung sgra yi de la smras// khyod kyi dri dang lung ston pa// rab bzang da lta gnas skabs med// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i slad// su 
293b8(mdo 'grel): ni yongs su mnyel zhing bzhugs// skye bo 'di dag pha rol gyi// gdung ba mi shes dang don gnyer// kun tu ji lta de lta yang // gnas skabs dag ni mi sems so// gang zhig yul dus mi shes par// 
294a1(mdo 'grel): 'phral la slor ba nyid gyur pa// de dag bzhed don rab btang nas// ngo tsha blangs te 'gro ba nyid// rgyal ba'i sku ni zhi ba'i tshe na ljon pa 'di dag kyang // yal 'dab 'khri shing rab tu nyal zhing nges par mi/ 
294a2(mdo 'grel): g.yo la// chu klung dag ni rnam par dud cing mgyogs pa gtang nas bgrod// rlung yang de bzhin 'phral la rab tu g.yo zhing bgrod ma yin// de ltar kun dga' bo yi ni// 'bad pas yang dang yang du bzlog 
294a3(mdo 'grel): de ba nyams pas rab 'khrugs pa// rab bzang gis ni de la smras// gzir ba yis ni skabs mi shes// slong ba dang zhing brtse bar mdzod// rgyal ba rnyed sla rab tu ston// rtsub po 'di ltar yongs ma mdzad/ 
294a4(mdo 'grel): grib bsil dag la nye bar 'khod cing bsil bas rab dga'i dga' ston thob gyur pa// rtag tu gsar pa'i gsar pa'i lam 'gron 'dzegs shing 'bras bu 'dzin pas gzir ba'i shing // brten pa dag la 
294a5(mdo 'grel): gnyis gshin slong ba kun gyi gzhi ni rnyed slar gyur pa yi// lo ma dag ni bcom dang dkrugs dang rab tu grangs pa'i nyon mongs phreng ba su ye shes// de ltar 'bad pas rab bzang gi/ yang dang yang du zhus 
294a6(mdo 'grel): gyur kyang // dgag pa brgya yis kun dga' bos// de ni kun dga' med pas bsgrubs// bcom ldan kun mkhyen gzims mal du// lha yi gnas las mngon phyogs te// rab bzang nang du thong zhig ces// 
294a7(mdo 'grel): kun dga' bo la gsung cher gsungs// 'jug pa thob ste nor med kyis// gter bzhin bde gshegs mthor gyur nas// rab bzang gdong ni mchi ma dang // bcas pas phyag 'tshal der gsol pa// 
294a8(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan de ring 'jig rten ni// skal pas dbul ba nyid 'di ci// de ring khyod kyi btang gyur pa// snang med dag gi 'gro ba ni// gshes gnyen khyed dang bral ba na// sra yi ye shes snang ba yis// 'gro/ 
294b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i pad+ma rmongs pa yi// gnyid kyi rgya ldan rgyas byed 'gyur// mtha' dag 'gro la rgyu med du// pan pa dag ni rab mdzad nas// kun la rnyed pa sla ba khyod// bdag la rnyed dka' ji ltar gyur// ces pa de yi gus pas gsol// de la 
294b2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'dzum ldan zhing // bzhin gyi chu skyes gzengs bstod de// rab dang mdzes pas bka' stsal pa// gnyen gshin rtag tu mi rtag nyid// 'di khyod rigs pa min nam ci// 'du byed thams cad skad cig la// lus 
294b3(mdo 'grel): kyi gdod 'di su zhig 'dzin// gang dag rtag tu nyin byed 'khor bas rab bzlas pa'i// mtshan mos bkra ba'i nyin par ring du rab 'gro ba// mi yi 'tsho ba rnams kyi dge ba 'di dag ni// rgya che dus kyi 'khor lo ltung bas gcod pa nyid// 
294b4(mdo 'grel): ri 'di snyil 'gyur chu gter 'jigs ni mchog tu skam// rab kyis 'byung po dang bcas srid pa'i lam rab 'jigs// ri dgas skrag mig ltar g.yo snying po med 'khor ba// mang du yongs 'dris lus kyi tshogs 
294b5(mdo 'grel): 'di brtan gnas min// zhes pa gsungs nas bcom ldan gyis// rab tu zhi slad rab bzang la// bden pa'i lam ni gsal ba'i gtam// rab dang kun dga' ldan par mdzad// dbyig pa gsum dang ril pa'i 
294b6(mdo 'grel): tshogs// lam 'gron gyis ni zur bzhin btang // ston pa'i bka' la rab byung ni// de nas rab bzang dag gis blangs// de nas nyon mongs kun bcom pas// dgra bcom gnas ni thob gyur nas// bsams 
294b7(mdo 'grel): pa kye ma bdag gi ni// slob ma nyid 'di 'os pa min// bdag gi mdun du bcom ldan 'das// mya ngan 'da' ba ji ltar blta// de slad sngon du lus btang nas// bdag gi rang gi gnas dag brten// ces bsam byin// 
294b8(mdo 'grel): brlabs lnga dag ni// bsten pa de yi dal bu yi// gdengs can shun pa dor ba ltar// yongs su mya ngan 'das pa thob// de nas de yi lus sbyong la// dge slong rnams dang mu stegs dag/ su yi tshangs spyod dang ldan 
295a1(mdo 'grel): zhes// rnam par rtsod pa yang dag skyes// de nas mu stegs byed rnams kyis// de yis sgrub byed cho ga la// khyogs khyer ma nus song ba'i tshe// dge slong tshogs kun dag gi bsgrubs de nas de 
295a2(mdo 'grel): yis gdung tshig gis// mchod rten byas nas dge slong gi/ sngon la mya ngan 'das pa yi// rgyu mtshan bde bar gshegs la dris// de dag la de gsungs pa sngon// ba ra d+h+wa sir bram ze 'di// mya ngan med pa ston/ 
295a3(mdo 'grel): pa ni// 'od srungs srog mtshungs grogs su gyur// mtha' yi mal stan la gnas pa// de las de yi 'dul ba'i chos// lha yis 'thob par bya thob nas// bsngags par 'os pa'i dgra bcom thob// gus pa'i// 
295a4(mdo 'grel): dang tshul de mes zlas// rang gi tha ma'i mdun cagatang // de nas dang na m+b+ha ya dang // mthang nas smon lam rab tu btag/ ji ltar legs byas ldan pa yi// 'od spangs sngon du yongs 'das pa// de bzhin padag 
295a5(mdo 'grel): ma'i mthar// sngon du 'gro ba por gyur cig/ lha de rab bzang 'di nyid de// rnam par dag pa'i smon lam dang // dad pa de yis legs byas pa// bdag gi mdun du lus dag btang // ston pa log par dad sel gyi// 
295a6(mdo 'grel): mtha' yi gzims mal dag la sngon// lha de rang gi khrid gyur pa'i// thub pa brgya phrag lnga dag ni// dgra bcom gnas thob gus pa yis// sngon du lus gtang mthong gyur nas// rnam pa de lta'i smon lam gyis// de 
295a7(mdo 'grel): nyid rab bzang nyid du gyur// lus la rang bzhin gyis skyes pa// mthar thug nye ba'i gdung ba 'di// bzod par byed cig bdag gis deng // gdung ba med pa'i gnas su bkod// de ni mi bdag tshangs byin dang // bdag/ 
295a8(mdo 'grel): kyang ltar gyur the tshom la// bdag ni rgyu ma dral bas kyang // don dgra yis bcom pa bsgral// kA n+ya ku ba dzA'i nags su sngon// da ni ri dgas khru bdag gyur// rab bzang khru yi nang nas ni// bdag gis rjes 
295b1(mdo 'grel): 'brang ri dgas gyur// nags su sa bdag kA n+ya ni// don pa 'ongs pas bkag gyur te// chu klung ngogs su ri dgas rnams// skrag cing dga' ba med par gyur// de nas chu klung nang du ni// g.yo med bdag gis/ 
295b2(mdo 'grel): rab tu babs// bdag gis rgyab tu rkang bkod pas// ri dgas 'jigs pa de dgas bskal// de dag theg pa bkod pas bdag/ nyams shing 'tsho bar 'dod gyur tshe// ri dgas de nyid cig pa ni// de tshe 
295b3(mdo 'grel): rgyal zhing 'ongs par gyur// skrag pas nyes pa de dag gis// gdung bas bzod dka' nags byas te// myur bar snying rjes yang dag bsgral// 'jug ngogs der ni shi bar gyur// de nyid rab bzang de ring yang // 
295b4(mdo 'grel): gdung ba dang bcas bdag gis bsgral// zhes gsungs bcom ldan zhi ba la// mngon phyogs mi gsung nyid la brten// dge slong rnams kyis rab dga' yang // dge ba thob pa'i rgyu mtshan dris// gus pas/ 
295b5(mdo 'grel): mnyes gshin kun mkhyen gyis// dal bu yis ni rab gsungs pa// ston pa 'od srungs dag gi ni// dge bsnyen blo bzang zhes bya ba// de yi drin gyis bslab gnas ni// yongs rdzogs thob cing blo 
295b6(mdo 'grel): gnas gyur// de yis dri za'i tshogs kyi mchog/ glu dbyangs mkhas pa mthong gyur nas// dri za'i bdag po nyid kyis ni// ched du smon lam rab tu bsgrubs// de ni smon lam de nyid kyis// rab dga' nyid/ 
295b7(mdo 'grel): dud bar bsgrubs// bslab pa'i gnas ni yongs bzung bas// 'dul ba'i chos ni yang dag thob// rab bzangs rab dga' 'di dag ni// bdag gis dge ba ldan par byas// gzhan gyi mngon 'ad / 
295b8(mdo 'grel): byas pa la// kun tu bdag ni gdung ba med// grong byer mchod 'os ces bye ba// mtho rigs dag dang mtshungs par ni// mi bdag dpal ldan brgya byin bzhin// rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya byung // bas/ 
296a1(mdo 'grel): nams la ni rab zhugs de'i// chos lam rjes su 'brangs pa yis// grong pa mtho ris bgrod rnams kyis// lha yis sa gzhi khengs par gyur// rgyal po de yis bsod nams mthus// 
296a2(mdo 'grel): mi yi mtho ris kun gang ba// mthong nas lha yi dbang po yis// snying stobs shes 'dod sbyor ba byas// de nas brgya byin gyis sprul pa'i// sems can gdung bas sa yi bdag/ de ni lus ni bcad pa yi// shad 
296a3(mdo 'grel): khrag dag rab tu bslangs// mi bdag blo gros rnam 'gyur med// de yi mngon 'dod rus pa'i lhag/ de dag rnams la byin nas ni// bsam pa chen pos smon lam btab// lus kyi sbyin pa'i bsod nams 'dis/ 
296a4(mdo 'grel): lus can rnams ni bsgral ba'i slad// tha med yang dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub chen po thob par shog/ de nas brgya byin der phyogs smras// rgyal po rab gdung khyed kyi ni// lus ni rab tu byin pa la// rnam 'gyur/ 
296a5(mdo 'grel): byung ngam bden par smros// ces pa lha'i dbang pos dris// slong ba rdzogs pas rab bskyed pa// dga' bas mig ni rgyas pa yi// mi yi dbang pos de la smras// gal te bdag ni gdung ba na// rnam 'gyur med na/ 
296a6(mdo 'grel): bden pa des// bdag gi lus rma bsos shing // mdzes ldan rnal du gnas gyur cig/ ces pa rab tu brjod tsam gyis// de lus rab mdzes rnal gnas gyur// sprin dang rnam par bral ba yi// rgyu skar 
296a7(mdo 'grel): bdag po'i gzugs bzhin no// mi bdag rnam rgyal de nyid dang // gzhan gyi don la gdung ba med// ces pa brjod nas bcom ldan 'das// bsam gtan la chags spyan ldan gyur// 'phral la ri bo bskyod 
296a8(mdo 'grel): pas bsrabs pa'i nyon mongs zer ma de dang der// lha tshogs ched du bdud rtsi'i chu gtor bsam pa chen pos bzod par byed// dri med yid ldan lus ni gnod pa dang bcas tshe yang rnam 'gyur med// gzhan 
296b1(mdo 'grel): phan sgrub par chas pa rnams la gdung ba dag kyang bde bar spyod// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// rab bzang gi rtogs pa brjod// 
296b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu pa'o// // legs rmos zhing la rab nyung gang btab dang // byas shes dag la phan pa gang byas dang // yon tan dag gis mtho la gang byin pa// de ni lo mang stong phrag 'phel 
296b3(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur// legs ldan mnyan yod rgyal byed kyi// tshal du bcom ldan rgyal pas sngon// gtam gyi zhar la nyer 'das pa'i// dge slong tshogs la bka' stsal pa// gang zhig rang gis spyad 'os pa// 
296b4(mdo 'grel): de dag thams cad 'bras bu bral// 'jig rten du ni dgra bcom la// gang phul de nyid 'bras bur ldan// dam pa'i snod la yon nyid kyis// yon ni rab tu phul ba dag/ dam pa'i grogs bzhin mi bzad
296b5(mdo 'grel): pas// yon tan grangs med ldan par 'gyur// grong khyer pA Da li pu tra'i// tshong pa tsan dan don gnyer sngon// gzings chen dag la zhon nas ni// tsan dan gling du phyin par gyur// de nas tsan dan sa mchog 
296b6(mdo 'grel): tshogs// blangs nas dga' bas de dag rnams// de las phyir ni log gyur te// chu gter chen po'i dbus su phyin// rgya che dus min rlung chub kyis// bskyod pa'i dpa' rlabs stobs kyis der// dus kyi rtse 
296b7(mdo 'grel): dga' g.yo ba yis// gzings ni bsdams pa med par gyur// skye ba pa don gnyer tshor ba'i tshogs// lha la bstod pa byed pa'i tshe// don mthun yid la re ba dag/ lhan cig gzings ni zhig par gyur// 
296b8(mdo 'grel): mi bzad srog la the tshom der// don mthun 'dren pa bsod nams sde// zhes pa 'dar ba dang bcas pa'i// yongs su bskyab par rab tu bsams// bdag gi khyim dang nye ba na// dge bsnyen chos kyi byang chub 
297a1(mdo 'grel): yod// de ni nyon mongs dus dag tu// ston pa rgyu yi mchog nyid bstod// ces pa yid kyis rab bsams nas// de nyid la ni skyabs song ste// ded dpon mchi ma dang bcas pa// 'jigs zhing ngal bas
297a2(mdo 'grel): lngab ljib smras// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyu yi mchog/ dge ba yi ni dpag bsam shing // nyon mongs can kun bde ba na// dgra bcom che la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes pa de yi brjod pa'i tshe// 'phral la rgya mtsho'i 
297a3(mdo 'grel): lha 'ongs te// don mthun srog ni slar byung rnams// chu gter gyis ni ngogs su bsgral// 'jigs chen de las grol gyur pa// de dag rang gi yul du phyin// rgyu yi mchog la phyag byed la// dus kun tu ni chags 
297a4(mdo 'grel): par gyur// gnas skabs der ni ston pa dag/ rgyu yi mchog gi sku la ni// las kyi lhag ma 'ga' yi rims// drag pos gdung ba gnas par gyur// gang dag gzigs pa srid pa'i 'jigs pa chen po'i sman 
297a5(mdo 'grel): gyis ni// 'gro ba thams cad legs par bsos pa nyid ni sgrub mdzad pa// de dag gis kyang rang la 'khri shing khyad par rab chags pa'i// lhag ma lhag par gnas shing chags pa dag ni stong mi 'gyur// de yi drag
297a6(mdo 'grel): por gdung ba ni// zhi srad tsan danas mchog dag/ rgyal po zla ba snang zhes pas// thams cad du ni btsal bar brtsams// sa bdag gis ni 'bum phrag bzhis// ded dpon de la don du gnyer// tsan dan sa mchog 
297a7(mdo 'grel): sa la ni// rnyed dka' srang cig byin ma gyur// ded dpon nyid ni mngon phyogs te// dran pa tsam gyis phan mdzad pa// ston pa'i skul tsan dan gyis// gus pa yis ni byug pa byas// do shal dang ni kha ba'i tshogs// 
297a8(mdo 'grel): zla ba'i bsil ba dman byed pa// grags pa ltar dkar tsan dan des// rgyal ba rnal du gnas par gyur// de yi bsod nams mthu yis ni// dpal dang ldan pa bsod nams sde// zla ba'i 'od dang yan lag kun// 
297b1(mdo 'grel): rma byung dri bzangs ldan par gyur// de yi tsan dan rin chen sogs// rgya mtsho'i chu la gang lhung ba// de dag thams can rang khyim dang // nye bar khrom pa'i nang nas byung // tshong pa rnams la tsan dan sogs// rang rang dag la des
297b2(mdo 'grel): byin nas// zas dang rin chen gos rnams kyis// khyim du dge 'dun mchod// de nas ded dpon dag gis ni// mchog gi mthu yis brgyan pa'i dpal// mthong nas mngon du nyer gnas kyis// de yi legs byas rgyal la 
297b3(mdo 'grel): dris// de nas bcom ldan rgyu yi mchog/ 'dzum dang bcas pas de la gsungs// ded dpon gyis ni tsan dan gyis// ral byugs pas dpal 'byor thob// bsod nams sde ni legs byas kyi// ngang tshul dag gi las de 
297b4(mdo 'grel): byas// bdud rtsi nyid ni rab 'thob pa// gang gis 'di dag cha yi thigs// dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa na// skye ba tha ma dag la 'di// rab byung bla med yang dag par// rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// bsod 
297b5(mdo 'grel): nams dag gis tsan dan shing // yangs pa yi ni rtsa bar 'di// tsan dan dpal zhes grags pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// de skad bcom ldan rgyu yi mchog/ ye shes spyan dang ldan pas gsungs 
297b6(mdo 'grel): zhes pa shAkya thub pa yis// gsungs tshe dge slong ya mtshan gyur// legs byas can gyi dad pa'i sbyin pa'i cha yi myu gu lo 'dab brgya yis 'phel// dgra bcom zhing la yang dag btab pa yongs su smin ma 
297b7(mdo 'grel): chags thal phun tshogs 'bras// gang la skabs gsum bdag po dri med gdugs can dar zhing bsod nams dri yis rgyags// rab dga'i grogs pa phun tshogs 'di dag me tog gsar pa nyid du rab tu rgyas 
297b8(mdo 'grel): zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'bri shing las// chu'i mchog gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'o// 
298a1(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pha rol blo ldan don med bu la chags pa'i ci slad sgrub// bsod nams gang rigs de ni rang gi byas te gzhan gyi byas pa spyod ma yin// gang gis sdig las ma lus rigs ni rnam par 
298a2(mdo 'grel): lhung zhing bzhin dman nyams byed pa// de dag mtshungs med gdug pa'i bya ba la mkhas bu ni 'ga' yi rnam par bsgrubs// mnyan yod du sngon khyim gyi bdag/ thos pa'i go cha dag gi ni// chung ma rgyal ba'i sdel bu/ 
298a3(mdo 'grel): srid pa'i go cha zhes pa byung // dal bu dal bus byis pa de// khyo shug de dag gis bskyed de// rigs rgyud khyad 'phags khyad par gyi// re ba rnam par 'god pa byas// dus kyi pa ni dus dbang du// song tshe srid pa'i ga cha na/ 
298a4(mdo 'grel): mdza' zhing rmongs pas gzir ba yi// ma yi bskyed bsrings bskyangs par gyur// khyim tshes grogs po dag dang ni// lhan cig rtse zhing ma bsdams pa// lang tshe dag la gnas pa de// gnyis 'thung lcags kyu med 
298a5(mdo 'grel): bzhin 'khyam// lag 'gro brgya lam nas 'gro de// dpa' bo yi ni bud med dag/ mdzes ma zhes pa khang bzang gi/ rtse mo dag na gnas pas mthong // mngon par med dang ldan pa des// 'jo sgeg ldan pa rnam par bltas 
298a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin 'dzum mdes da yin// spyi bor ma tog byung ba 'phangs// khyim chis de yid dgas/ bsam pa rnam 'phrul dang bcas pa// mthong nas langs spyo go byed pa'o// bdarnams thams cad rig par byur / 
298a7(mdo 'grel): grogs la mdza' bas chags gyur cig/ gnod pa 'byung bar dogs pa yis// 'jigs pa de ni sor gyur nas// srid pa'i go cha'am la smras// khyod kyi bu dang dpa' bo yi// bud med gsal ba'i brda dag byas// 
298a8(mdo 'grel): mtshan mo rnam par ma dul ba// dman min rgyu zhing 'gro bar 'gyur// mi yi ri dgas 'khor ba sdug bsngal nags tshal 'dir ni rgyu byed cing // mchog tu longs spyod kyis 'khrugs ma lul bde ba'i rtsal chags gyur 
298b1(mdo 'grel): rnams// 'jigs pa'i bya ba dang ldan rngon pa zhags pa dag tu lhar gyur te// 'jug tu dug ldan rlom pa'i mtshon rnams dag gi brlag pa thob par gyur// g.yo ba'i bsam pa dang ldan zhing // re zhiganyin par bdag gis 
298b2(mdo 'grel): srungs// mtshan mo khyod kyis bsrung bar bya// zhes pa brjod nas grogs po song // de nas khyim nang du nyal bu// sgo ru nyal ba'i sa yis ni// mtshan mo rab tu sad bzhin du// kun tu bsrung ba la chags gyur// chu yi 
298b3(mdo 'grel): dag byed zol gyis ni// phyir 'byung zhu bar byed pa la// mdza' bas rmongs pa'i ma yini// phyi rol 'thon pa byed ma gyur// des bsams kye ma dga' ba yis// bud med rin chen dang 'grogs la// bgegs ni skyed 
298b4(mdo 'grel): par byed pa yi// bdag gi ma 'di ci yis sprul// re zhig skal pas pa ni bdag/ lang tshos ldan bzhin shi bar gyur// bsod nams min pas sgrub dag ni// 'jigs rung ma 'di khyim na gnas// gnyid dang 
298b5(mdo 'grel): bral ma 'di la na// gal te bdag gis 'gongs phyin na// 'di yi 'thab mo'i sgra brjod kyis// skye bo rnams kyang sad par 'gyur// mtshan mo phal cher yongs zad cing // mdzes ma ring la bdag ci byed// 
298b6(mdo 'grel): skal pa dman pa bdag la ni// skal bzang ma de ji ltar mod// khang bzang nang du son cing rnam par blta ba'i rol sa bzhin gyi chu skyes dud// rna ba'i ut+pal lhung bar gyur pas mig gi mdzes pa rna ba dag la ster// 
298b7(mdo 'grel): rna rgyan 'od zer dag gis 'gram pa zung la pa tra'i phreng ba rnam par 'dzin// mdzes ma de ni legs ldan dag gi skal pa rnams kyis spyad bya'i sa ru 'gyur// de ltar bsam pas gzir zhing sgo// yang dang yang // 
298b8(mdo 'grel): du slong byed pa// de la ma yi 'di nyid du// gtsang ba mdzod ces rab tu smras// de nas ral gris ma yi mgo/ bcad nas de ni mgyogs par song // chags pas nyer bstan sdig bdag nyid// ngan pa rnams la 
299a1(mdo 'grel): bya min ci// mtshan mo ngal dub martsis pas// mdzes ma'i khang par de song nas// mkhas shing longs spyod la chags ma// de ni dben par yang dag thob// de la rang gi byas pa'i sdig/ gus pa'i/ 
299a2(mdo 'grel): slad du de yi bshad// gang gis rmad pa nyid 'gyur ba// de nyid kyis ni rmongs pa bsngags// ma bsad sdig pa drag po ni// thos nas 'dar bar gyur pa de// gtum po la bzhin de la ni// reg pa shin tu phyir phyogs 
299a3(mdo 'grel): gyur// de yi gnas nas khang bzang la// 'dzeg pa'i zol gyis de song ste// sdig pa rnams kyis gus pa yis// sred ldan dag kyang chags bral 'gyur// sdig pa las ni phyir phyogs ma// de yi sa bgam 
299a4(mdo 'grel): mthon por 'dzegs// 'di ni chom rkun chom rkun zhes// 'jigs pa bzhin du sad cher bsgrags// 'khor gyi skye bos rgyugs pa'i tshe// 'jigs pas nyen pa der rab bros// ji srid rang gi khyim du song // 
299a5(mdo 'grel): khyi rnams kyis ni ca co byas// bdag gi ma ni chom rkun gyis// bsad ces skad cher rab smra zhing // snga dro de yis ma yi ni// lus la sogs pa sbyangs pa byas// rab bsgribs sdig pa'i gdung ba yi// 
299a6(mdo 'grel): sreg cing shin tu mi bzad pa'i// dmyal bar ltung ba de bsams te// 'byung po bzhin du se la 'khyams// sdig pa smra byed de yi ni// phyir bcos dris la gnyis skyes kyi// smra ba ma bsad drag po yi// sdig/ 
299a7(mdo 'grel): pa dag la bcos thabs med// de nas rgyal byed tshol song bas// der ni dge slong tshogs brjod pa// sdig pa thams cad nyams byed pa'i// chos kyi kha ton rab tu thos// der ni blo ldan rab byung ste// kha ton dag la 
299a8(mdo 'grel): mchog tu chags// de nas de ni sde gnod gsum// brjod cing chos kyi gtam can gyur// de nas kun mkhyen bcom ldan 'das// mngon phyogs dge slong tshogs la gsungs// sdig can 'di la rab byung ni// 
299b1(mdo 'grel): khyed kyi ci slad yang dag byin// ma bsad drag por gyur pa yi// sdig pa de yis bag med 'di// 'jug tu mnar med tsha bar ni// yun ring gnas la rab tu nye// de bzhin gshegs pas de gsungs tshe// de yang mkhan po nyid du 
299b2(mdo 'grel): gyur// dus kyis dus kyi 'jug tu ni// 'jigs su rung ba'i dmyal ba thob// der ni mnar med tshogs 'khrungs pa// mi bzad me lce brgya brag gi/ yun rings 'tshod par byed cing des// dmyal ba'i gnas ni skyo bar byas// dmyal bsrungs 
299b3(mdo 'grel): rab tu khros pa yi// thobs bsnun zhi dbye mar rtags// de yi ring nas sdig pa yi// me yis yongs smin lus zad thob// de nas de ni rab byung ba// mthu yi rgyal po chen po dag/ bzhi pa yi ni lha rnams su// lha yi rgyan gyi brgyan pa ste// 
299b4(mdo 'grel): denas dri med phreng bcod pan dpung rgyan do shal las// rab 'phros nor bu'i 'od kyi rma byung dpal ni 'bri byed cing // lA yi bsten bya rjes 'brang 'od kyi rab mdzes bla bltar// mdzes pa de ni bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal slad du 
299b5(mdo 'grel): song // de yi zhabs kyi pad+mo zung la gus pas phyag 'tshal te// kun dga' 'phel zhing mdzes pa'i bzhin gyi pad+mo rnam par rgyas// ston pa'i chos kyi man ngag gtam gyi de ni myur nyid du// bden pa mthong zhing yid ni rab tu phyis pa 
299b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin du gyur// sdig pa mtshan mo'i rab ri banye bar zhi ba'i dus su ni// yun ring nye bar spyad pas sdug bsngal nyams pa'i skye bo la// legs byas snga dro'i dus ni dri ma med cing yangs pa yi// dge ba phul byung snang ba de ltar kun tu 
299b7(mdo 'grel): rgyas par gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// dmyal ba sngon ldan gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// 
299b8(mdo 'grel): mngal du gnas dang skye dang de nas byis pa dag dang ni// dang bde nas dal gyi rgan po nyid la brten gyur pa// skye bo mtshangs med dus kyi glang pos phyung ba dag gi ni// las skud 'di ni pad skud tshul gyi nges par g.yo mi 'gyur// zas 
300a1(mdo 'grel): gtsang gis ni gus pas sngon// bcom ldan 'das ni mgror du gnyer// dge slong rnams dang bcas pa yis// de yi zas ni rab bzhes mdzad// de nas gsol rjes rab dang des// bzhugs tes yaM bdag pa 
300a2(mdo 'grel): la// rjes su bzung bas dag pa yi// chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad// der ni de dus mthong ba la// byis pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyis de// dge slong dbus su yongs shes nas// yab ni la du dag gis mchod// de yi dus na bcom ldan la// 
300a3(mdo 'grel): byis pa gus pa mthong gyur nas// rab tu dge slong thams cad ni// dpe mtshan dag dang ldan pas dris/ las kyi rnam smin ci zhig gis// khyod kyi gzugs brnyan lus ldan pa// byis pa 'di ni lo drug dag/ dku ru nges par bsdams te skyes// ci slad lnga 
300a4(mdo 'grel): mo thags 'dzin mas// nyin dang mtshan mor mngal gyis khur/ shin tu che bas yongs mnan cing // shin tu yun ring gdung ba bsten/ dge slong rnams kyis gus pas 'di/ bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen la dris// skad cig bsams nas de dag/ 
300a5(mdo 'grel): la// gsungs pa 'dir ni rgyu dag nyon// lus 'phags kyis ni maM thilar// sa bdag me tog lha la ni// nyi ma zla ba zhes pa yis// bsod nams ngang tshul bu gnyis byung // yab ni mtho ris song ba'i tshe// de dag dka' thub nags 'dod ldan// 
300a6(mdo 'grel): rgyal srid chen po'i khur 'dzin la// phan tshun zhu ba rab tu byas// rnam pa kun tu chags bral bas// nyi mas btang ba'i rgyal srid ni// phra bo'i bka' yis bsdams pa yis// zla bas ji zhig ltar ste bzung // rgyal po'i drang srong/ 
300a7(mdo 'grel): nyi mde// zhi dge dka' thub tshal song nas// mchog shes rgyal srid bde ba yis// shin tu yun rings dka' thub byas// nam zhig yongs su ngal gyur cig/ sgom pa drag pos gdungs pa des// thub yi ni bum pa'i chu// rmongs 
300a8(mdo 'grel): las ma brjod nyid du 'thungs// dran pa skyes nas mkhas pa de// ma byin len gyi sdig pa la// rtog cing bzhin ni log gyur pas// 'gyod pa'i las ni rab bsams pa// las kyi zhags pas yang dag drangs// dbang 
300b1(mdo 'grel): med lus can rnams kyis ni// mi 'dod bzhin du legs byas sam// las byas dag ni thob par 'gyur// skye bo legs spyad spyod cing dkar ba 'di yang nyes byas dag gi cha// 'dzin de gang gis bzhin ras dri ma can 'di/ 
300b2(mdo 'grel): mchog tu gdung bar byed// skad cig srid pa'i bde ba sdug bsngal tshogs la chags pas 'phangs rnams la// lo 'dab brgya ldan brgyas nang du zhugs te gdung ba ster bar byed// mi bdag sngon du bdag phyin la// sdig pa 
300b3(mdo 'grel): bdag gis brjod par bya// rgyal po'i bka' yis dag pa rnams// bu lon med pa'i chos kyi tshogs// nad kyi gzir rnams sman pas gso// chos la zhugs rnams bstan bcos kyis// sdig las can rnams
300b4(mdo 'grel): mi bdag ni// rigs gnas lugs can bla ma yis// zhes bsams yongs su gdung ba yis// sa bdag yun zla'i drung du ni// byin nas de yas myur bar na// ma byin blangs pa'i sdig pa spras// spun bla mthu ba 
300b5(mdo 'grel): mngon mchod de// de las bdag gis smras pa// skyes gnas dag pa'i dngos gyur pa// khyod la sdig pa yod ma yin// rigs min shin tu phra ba yang // ji zhig ltar stes gang byas pa// nang du rjes su gdung ba 
300b6(mdo 'grel): 'dzin// de nyid de yi rnam dag nyid// ces pas bdag tshig thos nas// nyams de la rab smras pa// dam pa'i chos ni dkar ba yi// gos la dri ma'i cha mi bzod// rgyal po chad pa bdag 'tshal lo// shin tu dpyad nas 
300b7(mdo 'grel): sgrub par mdzod// dag byed kyis bzhin rgyal po yis// chad pas sdig can gtsang bar 'gyur// zhes te 'bad pas lan mang du// rang gi chad pa don gnyer ba// de la na bo rgyal pos spras// nang bar bdag gi gang 
300b8(mdo 'grel): bzod bya// re zhig khyod ni skyed tshal gyis// nags 'di nyid du gnas par mdzod// ces brjod grong pa'i bya ba la// sa yi bdag po phyi rol song // de nas der ni thub pa dag/ nges par g.yo med gnas pa'i tshe/ 
301a1(mdo 'grel): rgyal po de yi bya ba brjod// nyi ma drug nas mngon par 'ongs// de nas rgyal pos bu bon// zas med rid pa'i rnam pa mthong // kun rmongs dag gi blo smod cing // de la rab tu dang bar byas/ 
301a2(mdo 'grel): de ni bram ze dang bcas pas// de yi sdig pa dag byas nas// nyin duganyon mongs byin pa yis// des chen rab tu gdungs/ nganyid rgyal po'i drang srong nyid/ byas pa 'di yang rgyal poH/ 
301a3(mdo 'grel): na drug thub bzhin mongs par// byas la la drug dag na smras// bzad mo zhes b+ha ba rdzi mo// nan ma thang byang la phyogs te// bu ma dgas mo dag dang // 'grogs nas dang pa' tshong du ma // da ma bu mang 
301a4(mdo 'grel): bab mas// rang gi bum pa rab lci ba// ma rgan dgal byin nas ni// de yi bum pa yang ba bzung // ma ni rgan zhing nyams chung de// bu mos dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis// btang bas grong khyer nye bar ni// shin tu 
301a5(mdo 'grel): yongs su ngal bar 'gyur// grags 'dzin ma ni brdzi yis// bu mo ma yi nyon mongs las// rgyang grags drug mtshungs lo dag ni// mngal gyi khur gyis gzir bar gyur// mtho ras sa dang gdengs 
301a6(mdo 'grel): can 'jig rten gyis dang lang tsho dang // rgan dang 'chi dus mngal gyi mal stan la brten dag la yang // lus dang ldan pa rnams kyi sngon gyi las ni lhan cig tu// 'gro ba 'dod pa rnam pa kun tu rlag par yong mi 
301a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur// de ltar sgra gcan 'dzin ni sngon gyi las ldan pa// ngo mtshar gtam ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dag/ nges par gzung nas dge slong tshogs dngas skyong dang // skye bo dang bcas ya mtshan 
301a8(mdo 'grel): rab tu rgyas par gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'chi shing las// sgra gcan 'dzin gyi sngon gyi rtags pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste/ 
301b1(mdo 'grel): sa ma mas ng+yas su ma sa na mas mas bag ga ma sa 'a sa sa patham mas sa mas mam pa' gag sam ma sapa mkha tha ga gas sa ma sa 
301b2(mdo 'grel): brgyad cu rtsa gsum pa'o// // gang gis legs pa'i yid can rnams kyis yid ni kun dga' mnyen ldan rig par byed// gang gis mthu yis gdug rnams kyi yang yongs su 'dris pa'i mun pa zhi bar byed// gang gis// 
301b3(mdo 'grel): bsod nams grangs med grangs kyi tshig gi tshad kyi yul du mi 'gyur ba// 'gro ba thub pa'i mgon po rab rgyas mthu ldan de nyid gcig pu 'byung ba yin// mnyan yod du sngon khyim na gnas// dpal ldan shin tu brtan pa yis// / 
301b4(mdo 'grel): chung ma mig bzang ma dag la// 'dod pa'i bu ni bcas par gyur// skyes pa tsam na rab 'khrungs pa// lha yi rin chen gyis brgyan pa'i// khri stan rang gi bsod nams kyis// mtshan la gang zhig nyer 'khod mdzes// 
301b5(mdo 'grel): de skyes tshen chu 'dzin ni// snyan zhing 'jam pa'i sgra dbyangs can// sbrang rtsi 'bebs pa'i me tog dang // bcas pa'i rin chen chang ba phab// rdzogs pa'i gzhon nu gus can gyis// gter ni brgya yis bskor ba de/ 
301b6(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi'i char pa bab pa las// sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs zhes bya bar gyur// rin chen char 'bebs de yis na// sa la dbul ba med nyid bsgrubs// gang du'ang bya reg dkar po bzhin// slong ba po ni mthong ma gyur// 
301b7(mdo 'grel): nam zhig dge slong kun dga' bo// rab zhi 'phags pa'i lam gnas pa// khyim du byon pa des mthong nas// mdun du pa la rab dris pa// yab cig dri med dge ba can// 'di yi brtus zhugs 'di ni ci// gang 
301b8(mdo 'grel): zhig yang dag mthong nyid na// 'bral la yid ni dang bar byed// ces bcu yi tshi ga zos nas// shin tu brtan pa sod la spras// bu cig snyed stobs rab gsal 'di// zhi ba'i brtul zhugs yongs su 'dzin// 
301b9(mdo 'grel): gang zhig 'jigs dung 'khor ba'i mtsho las mtha' dag 'gro ba'i za ma stegs drang po dang // khro ba'i nad kyis gso byed dag kyang zhi ba bdud rtsi'i snying pos sred 'phrog dang // skyon gyi tshogs kyi mun bzhi byed/ 
302a1(mdo 'grel): nyi ma sangs rgyas 'od zer rab rgyas pa// de yi nyan thos zhi ba'i yid can rnams kyi mchog gyur 'di ni kun dga' bo// bcom ldan 'das kyi mngon brjod dag/ thos pa nyid na sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs/ 
302a2(mdo 'grel): sngar skye dge ba rgyas pa las// ba spu rab tu langs par gyur// de nas kun dga' dang bcas des// gus pas mngon phyogs phyag 'tshal te// dge slong tshogs bcas kun dga' bo// longs spyod kun gyis rab// 
302a3(mdo 'grel): tu mchod// de nas 'dun pas de nyid dang // lhan cig rgyal byed tshal song nas// 'od zer phung po bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong gyur te// pad+ma 'dab ma rgyas pa'i spyan// mchog gi mtshan nyid dag gis 
302a4(mdo 'grel): mtshan// mdzes shing yid 'ong rnam pa can// gser gyi tal bzhin du mtho// bdud rtsis byugs pa lta bu ste// mthong nas dga' ba rab rgyas pa// de yi spyi bor phreng ba bzhin// de yi zhabs sen 'od zer blangs// 'bad 
302a5(mdo 'grel): pas gsol ba btab pa yis// gus pa mnyes gshin bcom ldan 'das// dge slang de yi khang par byon// mchod ston rab tu bzhes pa mdzad// bcom ldan 'das ni mngon mchod nas// rgyal byed tshal du gshegs 
302a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshe// skye bo'i tshogs ni rin chen gyis// sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyis yongs rdzogs byas// dbul po rnams kyis kyi mkhyim du// rang gi bsod nams ma yin pas// rin chen phung po de byin pa// skad cig nyid 
302a7(mdo 'grel): kyis sol phung gyur// de nas byung tshul de thos nas// sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs ni sdug bsngal zhing // de dag la smras khyed kyis sngon// legs byas dag ni yod ma byas// brtse bas sbyin pa ma byin zhing // dge 'dun 
302a8(mdo 'grel): mchod pa ma byas la// bcom ldan mngon par ma mchod pas// 'byor pa dag ni thob ma yin// de slad khyed kyis bde gshegs la// sogs pa'i dge 'dun mngon par mchod// khyed la longs spyod dag gi tshogs// 
302b1(mdo 'grel): thams cad bdag gis phun tshegs bgyi// zhes pa des bskul de dag gis// de yis nyer bsgrubs tshogs rnams kyis// bcom ldan dge 'dun dang bcas pa// sdig pa zhi ba'i slad du mchod// de nas de tshe dge ba
302b2(mdo 'grel): byas// sdig pa zad pa de dag gis// rang khyim rab 'bar rin chen gyi// phung pos kun tu gang ba mthong // de nas chags bral sad pa yi// blo dang ldan pa sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs// bcom ldan 'das kyi drung song nas// rab tu 
302b3(mdo 'grel): zhi slad rab byung blangs// ston pa'i bka' yis dul ba yis// brtul zhags can gyis mnyan yod btang // skye bo'i mtha' yi gtsug lag khang // ri brag dag la brten par song // der des bslab pa'i gnas/ 
302b4(mdo 'grel): byin pa// ri zag pa yi skye bo rnams// nyon mongs dug ni rab zhi'i slad// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song // gnas skabs dar ni chom rkun pa// nags kyi mtha' na gnas pa rnams// du ga'i ya stags 
302b5(mdo 'grel): khas blangs pa'i// mi ni tshol ba dag la zhugs// phra ma can gyis rab bstan pa'i// gtsug lag khang der de dag 'ongs// sbrang rtsi'i sgra la 'dus pa yi// dge slong dge 'dun tshogs rnams bcings// ya stags/ 
302b6(mdo 'grel): slad du dge slong ni// gcig nyid kho na bdag cag 'dod// chom rkun tshogs kyis 'di brjod che// dge slong rnams kyis rim pas smras// ye sngags don du bdag zung la// dge slong thams cad gtang bar mdzad// 
302b7(mdo 'grel): ces pa rgan rim gyis brjod tshe// sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyis rab smras pa// nga nyid kho na ya stegs don// dge 'dun thams cad rnam par thong // zhes pa thos nas de dag gis// rnam par mchog ldan de bzung // 
302b8(mdo 'grel): song // gsod par chas pa de dag gis// bcings khyer rnam 'gyur blo med des// du rga'i gnas ni nags nang du// shin tu 'jigs su rung ba mthong // de yang dus mtha'i sprin gyis bzhin// gtor ma la ni 
303a1(mdo 'grel): bstar byas pa'i// ma he sre bo rags pa yi// rtag tu ya stags dag gis gang // dpa' bos ban du dzi ba yi// rang bzhin me tog phreng spos bzhin// ru ru'i khrag gi zer ma brgya// zhabs kyi rdol 
303a2(mdo 'grel): chags pas khyab// gshin rjes me tog rgyas pa yis// sgo la mchod pa byas pa bzhin dril bu'i sngon du 'phyang ba yi// dpa' bo mgo yis yongs su bskor// ri khrod ma yi rkang bkod pas// sen rtsi rab tu 
303a3(mdo 'grel): chags pa bzhin// mi khrag gsar pas bsgos pa yi// skas dag gis ni dmar ba'i 'od// ya stags ma thob rngon pa yi// bud med rnams kyis gus pa yis// rang gi bu bcang snying gi ni// pad+mas 
303a4(mdo 'grel): khyams kyi kha khyer bkang // de mthong srog chags rnams kyi tshogs// sdug bsngal ngal du ba bzod dka' zhing // 'khor ba chags bral snying po can// sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyis rab tu bsams// de nas nyon mong 
303a5(mdo 'grel): thams cad ni// yongs zad dgra bcom mngon du byas// khams gsum pa las chags thal de// dga' dang mi dga' mtshungs par gyur// des bsams gang gi drin gyis ni// 'khor ba med pa bde ba'i 
303a6(mdo 'grel): kye ma bdag gis thob pa 'di// ston pa srid pa gcod pa'i mthu// rmongs pa'i lcags sgrog bstan pa gcod cing lta ba'i ri bo nyams par byed// mi bzad sred pa'i chu bo sgrol zhing skye ba'i ljon pa rab tu 'byin// 
303a7(mdo 'grel): gang du mya ngan mig la slar yang mchi ma dag ni mi 'dzin pa// ston pa'i drin gyis gdang ba zhi bar gyur pa'i gnas de rab tu thob// ces bsams snying stobs rgya mtsho des// ri bzhin g.yo ba med par gnas// 
303a8(mdo 'grel): khro bas mtshon blang chom rkun gyis// gsod rtags me tog phreng ba bcings// de lus gser gyi gzi ldan las// de dag rnams kyis gos dag bshus// gos ni gzhan dang gzhan byung ba// de dag mdun du 
303b1(mdo 'grel): phung por gyur// skabs der lha mo de yis ni// rab bskyed 'byung po lnga brgya yis// chom rkun dag ni lnga brgya po// rab tu g.yo ba med par byas// de dag mtshon gyi tshogs lhang tshe// sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyi spyi bor ni// 
303b2(mdo 'grel): mkha' las me tog dag gi char// rin chen rab tu mdzes pa bab// de nas mkha' la 'gro ba de// chom rkun rnams kyis mthong gyur nas// de yi mthu yis reg pa yis// de nyid la ni skabs su song // 
303b3(mdo 'grel): de nas babs te bzod pa'i slad// rkang pas mgo bkod de dag la// nyes byas thong la chos kyis ni// dga' bas mdzod ces de yis smas// de nas de dag chags bral skyes// sdig pa btang nas 
303b4(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba yi// 'ching bzhi slad rab byung ni// blangs nas dgra bcom gnas thob gyur// de nas dgra bcom de dag dang // ri zag na gnas de dag bcas// sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs ni rgyal byed kyi// tshal du 
303b5(mdo 'grel): ston pa lta ru song // lha yi skye bos 'ongs pa yi// longs spyod skabs gsum pas bsgrubs pa// bdud rtsi'i ro ldan 'du byed kyis// der ni de yis bcom ldan mchod// bcom ldan 'das kyis// 
303b6(mdo 'grel): de dag la// thar pa'i lam mchog gsal byed cing // dag pa'i dang bskyed byed pa'i// chos ni phan slad bstan pa mdzad// bu ni bdud rtsi'i gnod nyid thob// shes nas shin tu bstan pas kyang // legs/ 
303b7(mdo 'grel): byas las 'khrungs gzer gyi pad// bzung nas rgyal byed tshal du song // de yis bde gshegs mngon mchod cing // zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te// de yi spyan ni rab dang ba// rab tu phyis pa/ 
303b8(mdo 'grel): bzhin du gyur// de nas nye bar dge bdar// de la bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa// rkang pa bkod pas gser gyi ni// pad+mo 'khrungs par khyod 'gyur ro// pad+mo'i mchog ces grags pa yi// yang dag rdzogs 
304a1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas 'gyur te// sems can yang dag bsgral byas nas// yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// kun mkhyen bden pa gzigs pa yis// de skad brjod che shin tu bstan/ 
304a2(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba'i dge legs brtag pa yi// yid la reb bzung bar gyur// gus pas bsod nams phyag 'tshal dus su srid pa'i bigs byed bcom ldan ston pa yi// zhabs ni legs byas ldan pa gang gis 
304a3(mdo 'grel): mgol ba de legs byas par gzung byas la// de dag phyi nas skye bo ma yi pad du tshem sbyor nu ma'i 'o ma la// gan tshul du nyal mo yis stong pa'i bzhin na blun po'i 'dzum du byed mi 'gyur// zhes pa dge ba'i dang 
304a4(mdo 'grel): pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi'i khri shing las// sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyi rtog pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // gang gis mig la rjes 'brel 
304a5(mdo 'grel): chags pa'i nad// sdang ba'i zug rnga snying la rab chags dang // yan lag kun la khyab pa sdig pa'i mdze// 'phrog byed sman pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gtam mthar de bzhin gshegs// dka' thub 
304a6(mdo 'grel): nags mthar bzhugs pa yi// dri med thugs la dge slong rnams// dge mtshan dag gis bskul bas dris// bcom ldan ci slad 'jig rten ni// kun gyis mya ngan sel byed pa// srid pa'i nad kyi sman pa khyod//
