304a7(mdo 'grel): nad pa rnams la lhag par byams// de dag la des gsungs pa bden// lhag par nad pa la bdag mdza'o// skyes bu rnams la lus gzir dang // mtshungs pa'i mya ngan tshegs gzhan med// skye ba gzhan rnams 
304a8(mdo 'grel): dag la yang // rang bzhin gyis ni dman pa'i sa// nad pa rnams la rtag tu bdag/ shin tu phyogs su lhung bar b+hair// grong khyer shi ba'i dbyangs dag tu// spong ba rnams kyi gnyen mchog bzhin// bsam pa kun la/ 
304b1(mdo 'grel): rab zhugs pa// mi bdag shi pi zhes pa byung // kun tu nad pa thams cad ni// kun nas bdag gis gso bar bya// zhes pa bden pa'i snying stobs can// de yi nges par rtag tu gyur// nam zhig grong ba nad pa ni// yun ring nang// 
304b2(mdo 'grel): kyis gzir gyur pa// sman la mnyes gshin de la ni// mngon du phyogs te gas par zhus// de ni gso slad sa bdag gis// dris tshe sman pa thams cad kyis// rab rgyas nad kyis gzir ba la// yun ring dpyad nas// / 
304b3(mdo 'grel): rab smras pa// shin tu lci ba'i nad 'di yi// rgyal po sman ni rnyed pa dka'// skyes nas bzod ldan skyes bu yi// khrag gis 'di ni zhi bar 'gyur// de dag thos nas mi yi bdag/ yid ni snying rjes rgyas pa yis// 
304b4(mdo 'grel): yun ring nad pa gso ba'i slad// de yis bstan pa yang dag bsams// byis pa'i tshe yang bdag la ni// nam yang gar yang khro ma byung // bdag ni mngal na gnas tshe yang // ma ni tho ba spangs par gyur// 
304b5(mdo 'grel): de skad khro med 'jig rten na// bdag lta su yang yod ma yin// bdag gi khrag gi rgyun nyid kyis// 'di yin da ni zhi bar 'gyur// de ltar sbyor ba'i blo gros kyis// rjes 'brang kun gyis bzlog gyur kyang // rgyal 
304b6(mdo 'grel): pos mgo las byung ba yi// dang khrag nag tu/ de la dz+nyAn// de nas zla ba drug gis ni// khrag gis na pabasos par gyur// sa bdag ri dpa la zhus nas// bsam pa yongs su rdzogs te song // de nas nam 
304b7(mdo 'grel): zhigs sbyong bu// phan pa tshol la ral dub ni// bsnyen las nyams pa gosal byed pa// gzhog sems nad ni byung bar gyur// sngon gyi las kyi rnam smin las// rnam par log pa'i rang bzhin 'di// nad med 
304b8(mdo 'grel): rnams la kha zas med// dpal ldan rnams ni nad dang 'grogs// de nas sman pa mchog rnams kyis// sman pa stong gi legs bsgrubs pa// kun gyi snying po zhes pa'i mar// de ni bsos slad nya bar 
305a1(mdo 'grel): bstan// rdzas kun gyi ni snying po blangs// 'dab chags shang shang dag gi ni// khrus kyi chu yi thang dang ldan// 'bad pa chen pos zhun mar ni// bcu gnyis lo yis legs par grub// gzhon nu 'thung bar 
305a2(mdo 'grel): brtson pa nad// nad kyis gzir ba'i rang sangs rgyas// ci ste de la slong du 'ongs// kun gyis bzlog par gyur mod kyang // gzhun na snying stobs rgya mtsho yis// kun gyi snying po phan pa'i mar// thams cad de la 
305a3(mdo 'grel): gus pas byin// de nas rang sangs rgyas bsos te// rab dang smon lam ldan pa yis// gzhon nu dag ni bsos par bsdabs// dam pa bsten pa bdud rtsi yis// phan pa tshol ba rgyal po'i bu// der ni tshe// 
305a4(mdo 'grel): rangang nye gyur// rang bzhin gyis bdag nang ba yi// gdung ba zhi bar byed la dga'// zhes pa thos nas rgyal ba la// dge slong kun gyis sngar dris pa// de dag la ni ci zhig gis// mtshungs par na da dang 
305a5(mdo 'grel): bsos par gyur// ces des bcom ldan 'das la dris// thams cad mkhyen pas der gsungs pa// ba ra NA si dag tu sngon// sa yi bdag po tshangs byin byung // de yi bu gnyis dga' bo dang // nye dga' 
305a6(mdo 'grel): zhes pa dag tu gyur// thu ba grags pa'i byed par gnyer// de bzhin gzhan ni rgyal srid 'dod// de nasa'i dgas dben par ra~M// thogs po kha gsag can zhes pa// A tharba yaM mchod sbyin mkhas// mdun na 
305a7(mdo 'grel): 'don gyi bu la smras// bdag gi spun zla thu bo 'di// skye bo dga' ba de dag skyong // grags pa brjod pas skye bo las// rgyal srid dag ni thob par 'gyur// bdag ni skye bo kun gyis spangs// nyams shing skal 
305a8(mdo 'grel): pa med par 'gyur// dben par shi bo bsngags par 'os// smad par gyur pas 'tsha ba min// khyod kyi spun zla thu bo nyid// mdun na 'don du rim pas 'gyur// mu cag mtshungs pa'i sdug bsngal can// dgon/ 
305b1(mdo 'grel): pa dag tu 'gro bar 'os// zhes pa mya ngan smra ba po// rgyal po'i bu yi tshig thos nas// khyod la phan pa bya'o zhes// mdan na 'don gyi bu yis smras// gang gis pha yi mjug tu ni// nu po de yis rgyal srid 'thob// de yi/ 
305b2(mdo 'grel): rdzas sbyor dag gis de'i// thu bo yan lag ma tshang bsgrubs// dus kyis de yis rgyal srid thob// yan lag ma tshang spun zla ni// thu bo 'ag 'khar la brtan pa// mthong nas rjes su 'gyod par gyur// de nas mdun 
305b3(mdo 'grel): na 'don gyi bu// mdun na 'don du bkod pa la// sbas pa'i sdig pas 'jig pa des// shug rings tsha ba phyung nas smras// kye ma rgyal srid la brkam zhing // chos mi shes pa bdag gis ni// pha mtshungs spun zla thu bo ni// 
305b4(mdo 'grel): gnas skabs ngan pa 'di la bkod// skad cig 'jigs pa'i bde bas drangs// kye ma ma brtags byed rnams kyis// sdig pa byas nas bdag nyid ni// mi bzad sdug bsngal rnams su 'phen// zhes pa de yi 
305b5(mdo 'grel): tshig thos nas// mdun na 'don ni 'gyod skyes pas// de la smras pa bdag kyang 'dir// rgyal po 'gyod pa'i rims dang ldan// slar yang de yis rdzas sbyor gyis// mi bdag bu de bsos par byas// bsos pa de/ 
305b6(mdo 'grel): la rang gi ni// rgyal srid nu bo des kyang byin// de nas dus kyis nye dga' dang // mdun na 'don gyi bu des kyang // rang sangs rgyas la mchod byas nas// lus kyi mtha' ni rab tu thob// rgyal ba'i bu des bdag ni// 
305b7(mdo 'grel): shi ba'i bu nyid thobagyur te// mdun na 'don gyi bu de yang // rang sangs rgyas nyid rab tu thob// de dag sbas pa'i sdig pa des// mtshungs par nad kyis thabs gyur cing // yan lag nyams pa bso byas pas// de
305b8(mdo 'grel): dge bsos pa nyid du gyur// rgyal ba phongs pas gzir ba skyob gnyen gyis// rtag tu sems can la chags snying rje'i spyod// 'das pa'i skye bo dang 'brel de thos nas// mgu ba'i dge slong de dag bde ba thob// ces pa 
306a1(mdo 'grel): dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// phan pa tshol ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa lnga pa'o// 
306a2(mdo 'grel): tshes kyi bslab pa rig pa gang gis mchod bya rnams la dul bar rgan rim gyis// mchod bya'i tshogs la rab 'dud 'dul bas phyag byed de dag mtho ba thob par gyur// dregs pas 'phyar las blo gros rnam par ma
306a3(mdo 'grel): bsdams rmongs las 'og tu 'gro byed cing // rgan 'das rnams la 'jig rten 'di dang // pha rol de yang rtag tu mya ngan bcas// rgan po mchod pa'i zhar la slar// dge slong rnams kyis dris pa dag/ rgan po'i cho ga 
306a4(mdo 'grel): ji bzhin slar// bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs// ba rA NA si dag tu sngon// mi bdag tshangs byin zhes pa byung // 'gro ba gang gi bsod nams mthus// chos kyi kun dga' ra bar gyur// de dus grong 
306a5(mdo 'grel): mtha'i nags tshal du// sngon gyi bsod nams mtshan nyid las// mi yi smra brjod la zhugs pa// srog chags bzhi ni byung bar gyur// ba men dang ni ri bor dang // spre'u de bzhin glang po'i mchog/ de dag dam 
306a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i spyod tshul can// phan tshun mdza' bas bcings par gyur// nam zhig bde thob de dag gis// gtam gyi mjug tu phan tshun smras// yu skol rgan rim med pa la// mchod pa dag ni ji ltar bsgrub// dam 
306a7(mdo 'grel): pas ji ltar rgan rim gyis// bkur sti dag ni rab bsgrubs pa// nges par dge legs skyer byed cing // dge ba nyid dang ldan par 'gyur// rgan po'i zhe sas mchod bya gang // yu las re zhig rgan pa su// zhes pa 
306a8(mdo 'grel): smra ba de dag las// glang chen khru bdag gis spras pa// 'dab ma che thul n+ya gro d+ha// gang 'di rnying par mthong gyur pa// 'di yi yal 'dab gsar pa dang // rang gi lus 'di mtshungs par dran// spre'u yis kyang der smras 
306b1(mdo 'grel): pa// bdag ni nags na rtsub yis// n+ya gro d+ha 'di dang lus dang // mtshungs pa shin tu chung ba mthong // ri bong gis kyang spral pa sngon// n+ya grod+hA 'di sor lnga pa// 'dab ma gnyis kyis mtshan pa la// zil thigs kyis 
306b2(mdo 'grel): brlan bdag gis myangs// de dag rim pas de brjod tshe// gyi nas pa min gyis smras pa// bdag gi lci ba'i sa bon las// shing chen n+ya gro d+ha 'di skyes// de nas rgan rim shes gyur nas// de dag phan tshun mdza' ba yis// 
306b3(mdo 'grel): rjes zhugs dga' bas mchod pa ni// rtag tu zhe sa la 'os byas// de dag srog gcod rku ba dang // de bzhin bgrod min 'gro ba dang // me bden chang mtshangs 'bras bu ni// skur po za ba dag las kyang // chags bral rang 
306b4(mdo 'grel): gnas kun spyod kyi// bslab pas legs b+ha sa la chags pa'i// bsod nams mthu yis nags tshal na// gnas rnams spyod tshul mtshungs par byas// de nas de dag rnams kyi mthus// rtag tu ma tog 'bras 
306b5(mdo 'grel): ldan shing // sprin ni dus su char 'bebs shing // sa la 'bru rnams rgyas par gyur// sa yi legs byas mtshan nyid ni// ngo mtshang che ba de mthong nas// thams cad sa bdag tshangs byin gyis// rang gi bsod/ 
306b6(mdo 'grel): nams las skyes bsams// log par khengs pas tshem de la// thub pa mngon shes lnga pas smras// me tog 'bras bu rgyas pa 'di// mi bdag khyod kyi drin gyis min// nags na spre'u ri bong dang // gnyis 'thu
306b7(mdo 'grel): pa men lhan cig gnas// yon tan rgyas 'di dam chos kyi// ngang tshul de dag rnams kyi yin// de dag brtul zhugs lnga yis dag/ ji ltar rgan po mchod byed cing // ba men tshig gis thams cad ni// dam chos 
306b8(mdo 'grel): dam tshig dag la brten// zhes pa thub pa'i tshig thos nas// mchog tu gus skyes rgyal po ni// grong pa btsun mo blon bcas pas// brtul zhugs lnga po de dag bstan// ba men pa nyid ri bong ni// shA ri'i bu 'di 
307a1(mdo 'grel): nyid du gyur// spre'u mod+gal gyi bu// glang chen khru bdag kun dga' bo// de dag ji ltar rgan pa'i rim// mchod las chos ni dri med thob// de slad phyag dang mchod pa la// rgan pa'i rim pa rab brtag bya// ston// 
307a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'dul ba nyer bstan de thos nas// rgan po mchod pa'i dka' thub khyad par thos// ji ltar rgan bzhin dge slong de dag gis// zhe sar bcas pa'i mchod pa 'dun sar byas// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i// 
307a3(mdo 'grel): byang chub semasad pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'bri shing las// ba min gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa drug pa'o// // gang zhig g.yo dang yongs khyab dregs pa mi bzad gang 
307a4(mdo 'grel): yang gdug pa rnam par bcas// gang yang shin tu rab drag nag po brtsegs pa rtsom pa cher gnas bstan pa dang // gang dag gzhin yang bzod dka'i dug rnams gsal bar gcig tu byas pa de dag gis// tshig rtsub 
307a5(mdo 'grel): dug gi rnaM banyid la cha dang dper yang mtshungs par mi 'gyur ro// khyim bdag yid ces bya ba'i bu// yon tan ldan pa mnyan yod du// pad+ma'i snying po'i 'od mtshungs pa// pad+mo can zhes bya ba byung // tshul khrims can 
307a6(mdo 'grel): kyidul ba dang // blo ldan rnams kyi dben pa dang // dam pa'i yon tan lagus bzhin// de yi khyim du de rab bskyed// gzugs ni 'dod pa brgyad ldan zhing // lang tshegs pa rnom che de// longs spyod rtsom la chags// 
307a7(mdo 'grel): bral bas// chags bral nyid la mngon phyogs gyur// dge slong bzod pa'i sems ldan pa// zhe sde zhes ni bya ba yi// bstan pa rab zhi bsngags 'os pa// rab byung de yis yang dag blangs// 'khor ba'i phyogs/ 
307a8(mdo 'grel): lachags thal bas// chags pa dang bral zla ba bzhin// lag na lhung bzed chos gos dang // yang dag ldan de mchog tu mdzes// de nas nam zhig gcig punyid// ljongs ni rgyu zhing 'gro ba des// gtsug lag kha/ 
307b1(mdo 'grel): dang dga' tshal gyis// mdzes pa'i bcom brlag tu ni phyin// dor ni bsod snyoms don gnyer der// gsar bu nyid phyir ma shes nas// smad 'tshong zla ba'i ri mo yi// khang pa'i khyams kyi nang du zhugs// ut+pal mig 
307b2(mdo 'grel): can de yis ni// de la stan dang bkur sti byas// gzugs ni mthong ba sa ya mtshan zhing // gu sa dang ldan pas de la smras// lang tsho ga sar pa dang ldan pa// khyod kyi gzugs ni yid 'ong 'di// su yi mig la 
307b3(mdo 'grel): bdud rtsi yi// longs spyod ston par byed ma yin// na tshed 'di dang gzugs 'di la// 'dod pa 'gal bla su zhig gis// rgan pa la 'os chags bral gyi// sdug bsngal yang dag nye bar bstan// chags ldan bud/ 
307b4(mdo 'grel): med nu ma ni// rab rgyas rig pas bder 'os pa// longs spyod sdod gyung khyod kyi ni// lag par lhung bzed mdzes ma yin// da ni nu ma'i khur gyis non// khyed ni lang chos rnam par g.yo// yu cag gnyis ni mdza 
307b5(mdo 'grel): babar 'os// da ni brtul zhugs bzod par mdzod// g.yo smras zhi dang dul ba goms pa sa lengs spyod bdud rtsi dag la chags med cing // mig yangs mchu yi sa yal 'dab rab myong rab dga'i dga' ston
307b6(mdo 'grel): rab tu spangs pa bzhin// mdzes ma'i nu mgur gum gyis mtshan mdzes pas snying la chags pa mi 'dzin gang // skye bo'i nags su nyon mongs sman pa'i 'bras bu za ba'i dul ba de la 'dud// gal te mdza' 
307b7(mdo 'grel): la bskam chags can// bdag gi tshig 'di mi byed na// khyod kyi bzhin ras pad+ma 'di// stobs kyis mnan te bdag gis btung // de thos kun du skrag pa bzhin// rnab pa sgribs nas de la des// smras pa ma gcig bdag 
307b8(mdo 'grel): gis ni// bstan pa sun 'byin 'os pa min// bdag nyid kun gyis legs spyad spyan ldan skyes bu la// bde gshegs brtul zhugs cod pani nyid du rab gyur cing // snying stobs dpal ni gtsang bas thig le nyid gyur pa/ 
308a1(mdo 'grel): \u0f7f// tshul khrims mtshungs pa'i rgyun ni cung zad yod ma yin// zhes pa brjod nas dul ldan de// gnod pa'i zug rta mi bzad can// mchod pa rab btang phyung ba dang // bcas pas snod stong nyid du song // de nas sngags stobs 
308a2(mdo 'grel): zhes pa yi// smad 'tshong gtum mo 'dod ldan ma// dbang dgug sogs la 'khrul 'khor dang // sngags dang rgyud sogs de sbyong ma// bos nas de la rang nyid ni// chags pa'i zil gyis mnan pa bshad// nor gyis tshim 
308a3(mdo 'grel): byas chags pa yis// gzir mas dga' dang 'grogs bzhugs// de nas de yis 'phral la ni// sngags stobs kyis drangs pad+ma can// dbang med de la mngon phyogs te// bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smras// de la des// 
308a4(mdo 'grel): smas bsod nams kyis// nyer gnas mdzes ma zla bzhin ma// mdza' mo 'di ni rab tu bsten// yang na 'bar ba'i me la zhugs// pad+mo can gyis mdun du ni// me 'bar mthong nas gos bzhag ste// snying stobs dkar 
308a5(mdo 'grel): ba'i gos can gyis// mchod par chas nas rab smras pa// gtsang byed 'bar ba rabadag 'jug gi/ mi gtsang chags pa'i mer ma yin// chags pas bsregs pa'i skyes bu rnams// skye ba brgya yi rjes 'brang sreg 
308a6(mdo 'grel): ces pa de yi tshig thos nas// gtum mo rab nyams gyur cing // bya min byas pas yid byung ste// rjes su gdung bdag tu gyur// de yis bzod pa'i gnas de la// gus pa yis ni dang bar byas// chags bral zhi zhing bsil 
308a7(mdo 'grel): ba yi// blo ldan smad 'tshong ma dag kyang // chos kyis kun tu dag pa'i slad// de dag la ni chos bstan mdzad// gang gis nyon mongs kun zhi nas// de dag gis ni dgra btsam thob// dge legs ldan pa pad+mo can// rang nyid slob 
308a8(mdo 'grel): dpon nyid thob nas// mnyan yod grong du bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa lta du song // der ni rgyal byed tshal bzhugs pa'i// rgyal ba des mthong phyag 'tshal nas// bya ba byas pas rang nyid kyi// spyod mtha' 
308b1(mdo 'grel): dge slong mdun du bshad// bcom ldan 'das la dge slong gis// de yi bsod nams ya mtshan dris// smad 'tshang ma dang pad+ma can// gtum mo'i sngon byung rgyal bas gsungs// sngon tshe ston pa bcom ldan 'das// 'od srungs 
308b2(mdo 'grel): zhes pa'i bstan pa la// khyim bdag bshes gnyen zhes pa ni// rab tu byung ba nyid du gyur// de yi chung ma dga' mo dang // rab dga' mo yang rab byung ste// mthu ni bdag po dang mtshungs pas// gtsug lag khang du gnas par 
308b3(mdo 'grel): byas// der ni de dag rtsod pa yi// tshig rtsub chen pos dge slong ma'i// tshogs ni yod dag byung bar byas// rang bzhin nges par gtang bar dka'// gcig gis gtum mo'i tshig dang ni// gzhan gyis smad 'tshong mar brjod 
308b4(mdo 'grel): pas// dge slong ma rnams spad pas dag/ byas pa'i sdig pa thob par gyur// de nyid gtum mo dag skyon las// de bzhin gzhan spang 'tshong mar skyes// rab tu byung ba'i mthu yis ni// slar yang dge ba dag la brten// 
308b5(mdo 'grel): khyim bdag bshes gnyen de yang ni// brtul zhugs kyis bsdams pad ldan 'di// tshul khrims gcong bas rnam rgyan cing // dgra bcom gnas ni thob pas mdzes// pad can skye ba gzhan la yang // me tog sde zhes// 
308b6(mdo 'grel): me tog pa// me tog tshogs kyis slong ba yi// skye bo rtag tu khengs byed gyur// de yis rang rgyal longs spyod kyis// mchod nas gos kyis g.yogs byas te// pad+ma ut+pa la ka dang // me tog rnams kyis yang dag 
308b7(mdo 'grel): mchod/ bsod nams de yis pad+mo can// pad+ma snying po'i 'od mtshungs 'di// legs byas rgya che'i dri bza can// bdag gi bstan pa la 'os gyur// gzugs ni tshul khrims kyis brgyan grags pa gtsang zhing zla ba 
308b8(mdo 'grel): lta bur dka ba'i rigs sems ni dben pa yongs smin shin tu dri med 'khor ba'i g.yen phyogs zhi gyur pa// 'di dag mkhas pa rnams kyi bsad nams char dang mtshan nyid lta bar bzod pa yin// shin tu smad 'os 
309a1(mdo 'grel): rigs dang yid ni dri ma can yang mi rnams las ngan rtags// zhes pa kun mkhyen gyis bshad pa'i// rmad byung las smin lam dag gis// dge slong rnams ni dga' ba yis// reg cing ya mtshan rgyas par gyur// 
309a2(mdo 'grel): ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// pad+ma can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa bdun pa'o// // shin tu drag po'i dul ba 
309a3(mdo 'grel): mthong nas 'phrog cing zhi ba nges par bzod mi byed// myur bar yid dga' kha ba dang mtshungs mjug tu sreg par bzod pa'i las dag byed// bya min dag la 'jigs btang blo gros rab 'jug 'khor ba'i grogs mo bud med 
309a4(mdo 'grel): kyis// rmi lam dag dang mtshungs pa'i rnam 'phrul mi bzad 'di dag thams cad nges par 'dzin// mi bdag gzugs can snying po yi// grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu sngon// nag pa zhes pa glang sde'i bdag/ glang chen stan 
309a5(mdo 'grel): gyi bu ru gyur// rgyal po'i 'byor pa dang mtshungs khyim// yo byad bcas pa yongs btang nas// chags bral la ni mngon phyogs des// gzhon nu nyid la rab byung bzung // de yi chung ma gzugs mdzes pa// 'byor pa/ 
309a6(mdo 'grel): rgyas pa'i khyim du ni// bdag po'i longs spyod dang bral bas// yun ring bsam pa 'khrugs par gyur// de nas dus kyis yongs 'dris la// gus pas mtha' ni rgyu byed nag pa glang chen stan gyi bu// de ni rang gi khyim du song // 
309a7(mdo 'grel): de nas mngon du 'ongs de la// chung ma mdza' gcugs ldan mdes// rjes su 'brangs nas mchod pa ni// sngon du 'gro bas mgron gnyer byas// lam ring gis dub bde med de// mthong nas de yi sa rab bsams pa/ 
309a8(mdo 'grel): kye ma 'di yi mdzes sdug ni// lang tshe nyid kyis nges par gzung // na tshed longs spyod 'os 'di la// khyim gyi dpal 'di yongs btang nas// rnam par ma spyad 'di yis ni// rdzun gyis bdag nyid ce la gdung // gang 
309b1(mdo 'grel): zhig phyogs lhung bcas pa yi// mig gis khyim la lta byed pa// dka' thub can ni mdza' ba'i lha// da dung zhi ba min par nges// yang na dang por bstan pa nyid// yongs brtag bstan pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis// 'di yi 
309b2(mdo 'grel): chags bral g.yo ba'am// brtan pa bdag gis shes par bya// khyim du long la spyod tshogs kyis tshim// thams cad nags tshal mngon par 'dod// dben par bde ba nyams pa'i tshe// bdag nyid rjes su gdung ba/ 
309b3(mdo 'grel): med// ces bsams de yis de yi ni// mdun du zas kyi gnas skabs su// skra dang brtsam par zangs kyi snod// ba gam rtse las rang gis dor // sgra des kun tu skrag pa bzhin// skad cig phyogs su rnam par 
309b4(mdo 'grel): bltas// 'di ci zhes pa nag pa ni// 'khrul pas mngon phyogs de la dris// de nas dang bab bzhin 'dzum ldan// de yis zangs snod cung zad ni// lhung ba de la bshad byas nas// dga' bas slar yang rab 
309b5(mdo 'grel): bsams pa// re zhig rnam 'gyur med pa yi// gnas la gnas pa 'dis ma thob// 'di yi yid ni lhod pa dag/ rtse dgas myur du zhugs par 'gyur// gang zhig snod kyi sgra tsam gyis// kun tu skrag cing/ 
309b6(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs gyur pa// rnam dpyod bral ba de la ni// yul gyis ci dang ci mi byed// ngang pa thams cad chu 'dzin dag gi sgra tsam las// skrag cing bstan pa nyams pas bcings nas 'bros par byed// gang zhig sprin / 
309b7(mdo 'grel): tshogs lci bar sgrogs la g.yo med pa// pad stan ngang pa'i rgyal po de ni kha cig yin// zhes pa yid kyi sa nges byas nas// smin ma'i 'khri shing rol rtsed can// 'jam par smra byed de yis ni// de la mngon 
309b8(mdo 'grel): phyogs dal gyis smras// bdag ni rtsa bzhin rab spangs nas// khyod ni ring du song ba'i tshe// bdag gi khyim ni chung mas bzhin// rgud pas zil gyis mnan la ltos// rtsom chen 'byir pa 'di la yang // longs// 
310a1(mdo 'grel): spyod dag ni rab spangs pa// bde med bdag ni grogs kyis bzhin// khyod mthong re ba nyid kyis bzung // yang dag brjod par mi 'os pa// 'di ni sdug bsngal bdag gis brjod// mi smra 'dod kyang brjos 
310a2(mdo 'grel): pa 'di// lce yang rab tu ngo tshar shes// khyim bdag gis ni chung ma yi// tshul khrims bslad mthong de la ni// chags bral skyes pa ma yin nam// gzhan du dus min ji ltar 'gyur// zhes pa gzhan gyi yon tan// 
310a3(mdo 'grel): ni// nyabs pa bgrang ba la mkhas pa'i// bzhin 'dzum skye bo thams cad ni// phan tshun rnam par lta zhing smras// 'brel pos gdung ba bdag la ni// 'jig rten sems so zhes par 'dzin// dar pa nyon mongs 
310a4(mdo 'grel): dag la yang // ma nyams gzugs bdag ci zhig bya// khyim du g.yog 'khor 'di dag kyang // bdag la shin tu ma bsdams gyur// bud med bdag po med rnams kyi// mdun du khyi yang rab tu rgod// bdag gi/ 
310a5(mdo 'grel): lhag ma nyid kyis ni// rab tu bsos pa 'bangs phrug 'di// bka' bsgos khros pas bdag gis ni// skra nas 'dren pas 'dod la ltos// zhes pa brjod nas brda byas te// bdag po'i sems ni rnam 'gyur 
310a6(mdo 'grel): slad// rang gi 'bangs kyis zil gnon pa// de yis mngon sum nyid du bstan// ma nyams gzugs zhes chags pa dang // bde ba med ces 'khrug pa dang // rmad par gyur ces phrag dog dang // 'bangs kyis 
310a7(mdo 'grel): gzer ces khro ba yang // thob nas de la lta byed cing // brtul zhugs kyis bsnga pas btang ba de// mtshungs par 'khor ba'i skyon rnams ni// thams cad dag gi dbang du gyur// lhung bzed chos gos rab btang zhing/ 
310a8(mdo 'grel): 'jigs dung ral gri phyung nas ni// dga' ma'i gnod pa la khros pas// de yis 'bangs ni gsod par zhugs// 'bangs ni gsod pa'i sdig pa las// chung mas 'bad nas bzlog pa des// dgra las rgyal
310b1(mdo 'grel): 'dod khyim gyi ni// bde ba dman pas slar yang bsten// de ni longs spyod yongs su bzung bas bud med longs spyod skal bzangs gzhir gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs gnod pa'i gtam gyi rgyu las g.yog 'khor 
310b2(mdo 'grel): rnams la khro bas 'khrugs// 'dod pas dul ba nyams byed khro bas skad cig nyid kyis bzod pa rlag pa byed// rdzun gyi brtul zhugs dag gis gdung ba'i yid kyis chags bral nyid ni thob ma yin// de nas rgyal 
310b3(mdo 'grel): pos glang chen gyis// sna chen gnas ni slar yang byin// 'byor pa rgya che thob gyur nas// de nas lhag par rgyas par gyur// skabs der grong khyer nang dag las// dge slong rnams kyis bsod snyoms blangs// bcom ldan// 
310b4(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba nags tshal na// gnas pa dag la mngon phyogs te// chags bral bzhin gyis de la ni// phyag 'tshal glang chen stan gyi bu// nag pa dag gi brtul zhugs ni// 'os pa min pa rnam par bshad// de nas bcom ldan// 
310b5(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen// 'dzum dang ldan pas der gsungs pa// de yi dge ba ma smin pas// brtul zhugs dag ni blang bar byas// gang zhig dben pa smin cing rdzogs pa'i brtag pas yid kyi 'khri shing skams gyur pa// de 
310b6(mdo 'grel): dag phyi nas yul gyi nyams myong rnying par dran pa'i dbang du gyur pa yin// gang zhig don gyis bkag cing khengs pas lhod la rgyun du gus pa rab btang ba// de dag 'dod dang zhi ba'i bar mtshams dag la yid ni 'byang mo yus/ 
310b7(mdo 'grel): par byed// gang gis g.yeng sar lhung ba'i mkhas pa rnams kyang dul ba dag ni yongs gtong zhing // chags pa'i dug rgyas rnal 'byor can rnams mi bzad spags dums la 'jug par byed// skye bar goms pas chags// 
310b8(mdo 'grel): shing yul gyi reg pa mchog tu mngon par 'dod gyur pa// rnam 'gyur mda' yi char drag dkrigs pa'i tshe// 'dod pa 'di ni su la bzod par byed// ces pa brjod nas bcom ldan 'das pa nags sa'i khyim byon nas// 
311a1(mdo 'grel): sku yi 'od kyis phyi rol gyi// rab rib rnam par 'joms shing slar// rjes su gzung ba'i snang ba yis// de yi yid ni dri med mdzad// phyag dang bsnyen bkur byas pa de// rang nyid kyi ni gnas su khrid// der ni 
311a2(mdo 'grel): slar yang gus pa yis// zol med rab byung de yis bsnyen// grub slad rgyal bas dag pa yi// dam pa'i chos ni rab bstan mdzad// nyon mongs thams cad rab zad pas// de ni dgra bcom gnas thob tshe// de yi sngon byung 
311a3(mdo 'grel): dge slong gis// dris nas bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa// sngon gyi skye ba gzhan la des// rang sangs rgyas ni gus pa yis// rtag tu mchod cing de yi ni// mjug tu mchod rten chen po bsgrubs// de yi bsod nams smon 
311a4(mdo 'grel): lam gyis// skal ldan nag pa 'di yis ni// bdag gi bstan la rab byung dag/ blangs nas dgra bcom gnas la brten// 'di ni slar yang 'dod pa la// rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyu dag nyon// sngon gyi skye ba dag la yang // 'di ni chung 
311a5(mdo 'grel): mas rab tu bslus// ba ra t+na si dag tu ni// sa yi bdag po tshangs byin gyi// yon tan yongs rdzogs mdun na 'don// dpal ldan 'phrog byed kyis byin byung // de la reg dang 'dul ba dag/ rdzogs pa'i bu gnyis 
311a6(mdo 'grel): byung gyur te// gcig ni 'phrog byed bu zhes dang // de bzhin gzhan pa 'phrog byed rtse// de dag chags bral dben pa thob// srid pa'i langs spyod las phyir phyogs// dka' thub nags tshal yongs rgyu zhing // mngon shes 
311a7(mdo 'grel): lnga ni thob par gyur// rgyal dang skye bos mchod gyur cing // rab zhi ba sngags par 'os pa yi// mkha' la rgyu ba de dag ni// thub pa rnams kyi'ang mchod byar gyur// nam zhig sa bdag khang pa na// 'phrog byed rtse gnas 
311a8(mdo 'grel): mi bdag ni// phyogs las rgyal bar mngon phyogs pas// bu mo mdzes ldan zhes la spras// mnyes gshin khyod kyis gus pa ni// shin tu che bas thub pa dag/ mchod bya 'di la mchod pa byas// 'di ni bdag gi 
311b1(mdo 'grel): bkur sti'i 'os// zhes pa bu mo la bstan nas// sa yi bdag po rab song tshe// rgyal po'i bu mo gus ldan mas// thub pa rtag tu mchod par gyur// gser bcad 'od ltar yongs su shes pa'i mdzes pa lus la 'dzin 
311b2(mdo 'grel): byed cing // pad+ma'i spyan dang ldan pa de mthong de ni mngon par sred ldan gyur// lhan cig 'bod pas nges par mdzes pa'i yul la dmigs pa'i 'dod pa yis// 'grogs pa'i bsam pa snying la rtsa ba zug pa ci yang byed 
311b3(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur// rung gzhon dag gis bskyod pa'i 'khri shing bzhin// 'dod pa'i rnam 'phrul shugs 'byin lus dag ni// dud pas de yi yus kyi kun dga' dang bcas par grogs med thub la 'khyud pa byas// de yi na/ 
311b4(mdo 'grel): ma gsar pa'i rtser chags lus kyi tshon gyis ni// 'dod pa rgyal po'i bka' yig rgya ldan snying la 'dzin byed cing // de dus nyid na glo bur du ni dul ba'i gdags thag chad// thub pa 'dod pa'i rtse dga' gsar pa dag la 'phyar 
311b5(mdo 'grel): bar gyur khyu mchog nyams las 'khrig pa'i bya ba la// rab tu sbyor zhing sdig pas bzung ba bzhin// rgyal po seng+ge'i khyim du nyi mtshungs des gdung slad bu mo la ni 'gro 'dod gyur// 'khyud pa'i sgrub byed dag la lag 
311b6(mdo 'grel): 'gro ma rnams dug ni mi bzad pa// yang yang brgyal rmongs 'jig byed rang bzhin lus la nges par zhugs pa dag/ sngags kyis zhi ba ma yin 'od kyi rang bzhin bstan bcos nor bus min// sbyor men bsam 
311b7(mdo 'grel): gtan gyis min zhi ba'i khyad par sman gyi ro yis min// mdza' ba'i rang bzhin rkun po'i longs spyod chur// ri dgas mig can gyis 'phangs de lhung ste// dben pa med las skyes pa'i yid srubs tshogs// 
311b8(mdo 'grel): mkhas rnams kyis yang bstan pa mthar byed yin// 'grogs la phyir phyogs snying la chags dang bzlas pa'i gzhi ma mchu la'o dang ni// bsam gtan dag la dmigs pa'i spyan la mdza' gcugs mdzes 
312a1(mdo 'grel): sdug btung ba'i dga' ston dang // lhung bzed kyis gtsang lag par nu ma zung ste me tog mtshon ldan pa nyes pa las// dul min bslab pa dag gis de yi brtul zhugs thams cad gsar pa nyid du gyur// 
312a2(mdo 'grel): sa bdag bu mo'i lag pa yis// dra bar gnas pa de la ni// dka' thub grub 'bar 'phral nyid la// phrag dog can bzhin phyir phyogs 'gyur// de ni mthul che ba'i tshe// pho brang 'khor gyi skye bo yis// spyod tshul
312a3(mdo 'grel): shes kyang 'jigs gyur nas// sus kyang ci yang der ma smras// de nas sa bdag yun ding na// phyir log rgyal ba'i dga' ston can// 'byor pa smad du byung ba'i tshogs// rab tu mang ba rgyas par gyur// sngon du thub
312a4(mdo 'grel): pa 'phrog byed rtse// sa bdag gus shing dul ldan de// rang gis sa skyong la 'os pa'i// longs spyod kun gyis rab tu mchod// thub pa gsol ba'i mdun du ni// sa bdag gus pas 'khod pa'i tshe// mdzes ldan ma 
312a5(mdo 'grel): yis sngon du ni// rim gro dag ni legs par byas// de nas gser gyi chu snod kyis// lag gnyis 'brel ba de la ni// thub pa bstan pa brjod pa yis// lag brkyang tshur shog ces pa smras// de yi 'dod pa'i rnam 'gyur/ 
312a6(mdo 'grel): de// mthong nas mi bdag rab khros te// sdig pa'i phyir bcos sbyor ba la// chad pas bcad pa'i blo gros bsgrubs// drag pos khros pa pa yi bzhin// mthong nas mdzes ldan ma yis kyang // thub pa'i mgrin/ 
312a7(mdo 'grel): par zas chags zhes// brjod nas de la chu dag byin// bud mod phur bu'i blo gros can// skabs su nyer mkho'i tshig dang ni// phyir zlog sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis// sdig pa'i sgrib byed rnam par bkra// bu mo yi ni 
312a8(mdo 'grel): tshig de yis// 'phral la nyid du mi yi bdag/ ka ta ka yi phye ma yis// chu yi gnas bzhin dang bar gyur// skabs der thub pa rdzu 'phrul bri// de yi mkha' la 'gro nyams pa// spun zla thu bo nags na gnas// 
312b1(mdo 'grel): lha yi spyan ldan gyis shes nas// sdug bsngal rang nyid mngon phyogs te// de ni rang gi gnas khrid nas// slar yang bsam gtan bzhi pa sbyangs te// mngon shes lnga dang ldan par byas// thub pa chags pa'i chu gter du lhung mi
312b2(mdo 'grel): bzad yul gyi hU~M// nyon mongs 'khor lo dag las phyir phyung rab mang dka' thub kyi// gzi yis 'dod pa dran pa'i sdig bsregs shes nas kho ba'i tshogs// btang nas mi bdag blo ldan des kyang rab tu dang bar gyur// da 
312b3(mdo 'grel): tshe nang nyid ni// 'o brog byed bu yi ming can te// nag pa dag kyang 'phrog byed rtse// chung ma rgyal po'i bu mor gyur// de skad der ni mi bden ma yin rab grags pa'i// rang gi gtam 'di de bzhin gshegs pas bshad gyur te/ 
312b4(mdo 'grel): gang gis srid pa mtha' dag skyon gyi rang bzhin las// dge slong tshogs kyi blo gros ci yang zhugs pa gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing 
312b5(mdo 'grel): las// nag pa glang po'i stan gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // 'jigs rung stug po'i rlung gis rab bslang dba' rlabs rnam sprul pas// ma lus phyogs kun 'gengs pa drag 
312b6(mdo 'grel): po'i sgra dang rab tu ldan// chu srin 'byung gnas bzlog dka' chu yi rnam 'gyur can de yang // bde gshegs dran pa'i mi rnams dag la mtha' du gyur pa nyid// rgyal ba 'gro kun bde legs la// rtag tu sbyor zhing mnyan 
312b7(mdo 'grel): yod kyi// rgyal byed tshal gyi kun dga' ra// gtsug lag khang na mngon bzhugs tshe// yangs pa'i gling du 'gro ba la// spro ba yis ni dus byas pa// rin chen don gnyer tshong ba yi// don mthun chu gnyer chu 'gram 
312b8(mdo 'grel): phyin// de nas gzings la don mthun ni// rab tu zhon tshe lci ba'i khur// dpyad nas bying du dogs pa yis// rna ba 'dzin pas de la smras// khyed rnams rab tu sred pa yis// brgyud mar zhon pa 'di ni ci// chu gter/ 
313a1(mdo 'grel): dba' rlabs rtse mtho 'di// khyim gyi khyams ni yongs ma yin// re zhig khyod kyi gzings la ni// 'tsham pa'i khur dag rab tu mdzod// rin chen phung po su mi 'dod// 'on kyang chu gter 'tshe ba mang // su/ 
313a2(mdo 'grel): gter na ni gzhan na dba' rlabs rab 'khrug gzhan na drag po'i chu srin tshogs dkrigs shugs// gzhan na nang gi ri bo bstan pa'i rtse mo sdug por rab bsnun tshogs kyis rgyun bkag 'thor// gzhan na rlung ni mthar byed 
313a3(mdo 'grel): dag gi dbugs ltar drag pa langs pas kun tu bstun cing 'khor// gzhan na blo bur nyams byad rta gdong me ni rab brtan me lce'i dkyil 'khor gtum po yod// ces pa rna ba 'dzin pa yis// chu gter nga bzhin bshad thos 
313a4(mdo 'grel): nas// 'ga' zhig babs nas song bar gyur// bsam pa che ba 'ga' zhig 'khod// de nas rin chen gling phyin te// don mthun don byas nyid gyur cing // dal bu dal bus rjes mthun gyi// rlung gis rjes su leg pa'i 
313a5(mdo 'grel): tshe/ ri bo man d+ha rab skang bzhin// nam mkha' kun tu gar gyur cing // kha gdangs phug ltar gyur pa ni// tshor ba kun gyis mdun du mthong // ru swa la nya dang chu srin bcas// rgya mtsho'i chu ni ma lus pa// g.yang sar lhung 
313a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin de la ni// mngon phyogs mgyogs par song gyur cing // de nas gzengs ni mthar byed kyi// kha yi phug dang nye ba'i tshe// tshor ba bslad pas 'khrug rnams kyis// rna ba 'dzin pa dag la dris// sngon ma byung ba/ 
313a7(mdo 'grel): byung gyur pa// rmad byung 'byung ba 'don ci// gang gi spyi bor tsha zar can// zung zhig shar blta bur mthong // 'di la mngon phyogs chu 'di dag/ ci slad yongs su rgyug par byed// gang gi shugs kyis gzings 'di ni/ 
313a8(mdo 'grel): 'dren par byed cing rnam par g.yo// de ltar glo bur brlag rtsom pa'i// 'jigs pa'i rnam 'phrul gyis skrag pa'i// tshor ba rnams kyis the tshom dris// rna ba 'dzin pas rab smras pa// na med med par byed pa'i// 
313b1(mdo 'grel): sems can 'joms byed chen po 'di// rgya mtsho dag na rnam par gnas// 'khor ba na ni kun rmongs bzhin// ni ma bcu gnyis 'char rtsom che// nyi ma zung ni shar ba bzhin// dus mtha' 'jigs rung 'di yi ni// mig ni/ 
313b2(mdo 'grel): zung dag rab tu mthong // 'dri yi kha ga yang sa'i mthar// sprin dkar dag gis yongs bskor ba'i// ri rtsa chen po'i phreng ba bzhin// so yi phreng ba rab tu mtshon// 'di ya~M kha ru lhung ba yi// rgun gyis gzings ni 
313b3(mdo 'grel): grangs pa dag/ yul la mngon par phyogs pa yi// sems bzhin gzung bar nus ma yin// 'chi ba las kyis sprul gyur pa// 'di la phyir bcos yod ma yin// skye ba gzhan la dge ster ba'i// lha ni cung zad dran par
313b4(mdo 'grel): mdzod// ces pa rna 'dzin gyis brjod pa// tshong pa'i mchog kun gyis thos nas// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal zhes// tshe de'i sgra dang ldan pas smras// 'jigs pas gzing ba de dag sgra// bcom ldan rgyal brtul 
313b5(mdo 'grel): byed kyi// tshal bzhugs 'byung po la dgongs pas// lha yi rna ba dag gis thos// mun pa zhi byed sangs rgyas kyi// mtshan thos nyid na sems can gyi// nyer 'tshe zhe srad nya mid kha// dal bu yis ni zum par gyur// dal gyis 
313b6(mdo 'grel): de ni kha bsgribs tshe// mi mthun phyogs 'gro rgyun nyams pas// dus kyi kha las grol ba yi// gzings ni rang gi ngos su phyin// de nas mi bzad 'jig sa las thar// grags pa'i dpal ldan rin chen gyi// khengs shing 
313b7(mdo 'grel): dge ba ldan pa kun// mnyan yod du ni rnam par zhugs// gus ldan de dag sor gyur nas// gdung ba skyob par mdzad pa po// rgyal ba bcom ldan rgyal byed kyi// tshal na bzhugs la phyag dag 'tshal// de dag de mthong zhid na 
313b8(mdo 'grel): ni// 'khor ba'i 'ching ba chad gyur cing // 'phral la rab tu da ba thob// rab tu byung nas dgra bcom gyur// 'di dag sngon gyi skye ba la// ston pa 'od srungs zhes pa yi// bstan la zhugs par gyur to zhes// bcom ldan
314a1(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis rab tu gsung // rgya mtsho nya med med pa yang // sems can 'joms las chags bral te// bkres pa'i me rnon gyis nyen cing // skad cig gis ni srod zad thob// dring mi bzod yid 'byung dang // 
314a2(mdo 'grel): bcas pa'i klu ni stobs ldan gyis// de yi ro ni mi gtsang ba// chu ga ter dag gi ngogs su 'phangs// dus kyi rus pa skam po yi// rang bzhin lus te chus bkrus pa// ri bo brtsegs pa kha ba yi// phung pos bsgribs 
314a3(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin du mdzes// de nas mnyan yod bram ze ni// su man tu yi bu nyid gyur// ma la bkres pa'i sdug bsngal tshor// mi bzad mngal gnas de yis byas// skyes tshe bkres pa bud med ni// brgya yi 'o mas tshim ma 
314a4(mdo 'grel): gyung/ dal gyis bskyed bsrings tshan de// zas tshogs shin tu mngabs kyang // mchi ma mchog tu yid dbyung ba// de na dge slong tshogs song nas// rab tu byung ba nye bar blangs// bsad snyoms dag gis tshim mabyung // 
314a5(mdo 'grel): de nas cher bkres grags pa de// dad pas mgron gnyer dge 'dun gyi// rgya che mchod ston de dang des// gang du yang ni tshim ma gyur// skabs der khyim bdag dpal dang ldan// sbyin pa'i brtul zhugs zhes brjod pa// 
314a6(mdo 'grel): da pa yis ni dge slong rnams// mgron du gnyer slad nye bar 'ongs// dge 'dun gzhan du gsol ba la// gshegs tshe mang za de nyid ni// gcig pu de yis yang dag thob// de la zas ni rab tu phul// skyes bu rab 
314a7(mdo 'grel): tu mang ba'i zas// skad cig gis ni de zos tshe// mtha' dag dge 'dun mchod ston ni// khyim gyi bdag pos de la byin// ya mtshan byed po de yis ni// zan gyi phung po zos pa'i tshe// khyim gyi bdag po 'jigs pa 
314a8(mdo 'grel): yis// 'byung por brtags te yang dag bsams// kye ma rab gzhon chung ngu yi// zas can 'di ni bdag gis thob// gang zhig gcig pus dge 'dun gyi// mchod ston dag ni ma lus zos// ji srid gnod sbyin 'di// 
314b1(mdo 'grel): yis ni// zhar la bdag kyang ma zos pa// de srid 'di la yon byin nas// bdag ni mgyogs par 'gro bar b+ha// zhes bsams dogs dang bcas pa des// de la yon ni rab phul nas// phyi nas 'ong ba la skrag pas// phyir 
314b2(mdo 'grel): mig rnam par blta zhing song // phyi nas de yi spyod tshul kun// de yis bcom ldan la bshad de// 'di ni gnod sbyin srin po'am// ci zhes bde gshegs mngon du dris// bcom ldan gyis kyang der gsungs pa/ 
314b3(mdo 'grel): gnod sbyin 'di min srin po min// dge slong chos sred ces bya ba// 'di ni dgra bcom nyid du 'gyur// de nas ston pa rang nyid kyis// chos sred mkha' la khrid nas ni// de la 'jigs su rung ba yi// rang gi lus dag 
314b4(mdo 'grel): rab tu bstan// 'khor ba shin tu 'jigs rung ba// de yi mtha' ni mthong gung nas// chos sred skyonas rgyal ba la// 'di ci zhes pa rab tu dris// cung zad 'dzum dkar bzhi na ras can// thams cad mkhyen pas de 
314b5(mdo 'grel): gsungs pa// 'jigs su rung ba'i lus 'di ni// skam zhing rags pa rus pa'i gzeb// chos sred rab tu zhi ba bsten// dngos por yongs su 'dzin pa thong // rgyab kyi tshigs dus lcags sgrogs can// rags 
314b6(mdo 'grel): pa 'di ni khyod kyi'o// bde gshegs kyis gsungs de thos nas// rang gi lus la rtog byed cing // chos sred srid par 'khyam pa la// mchog tu skyo ba nyid du gyur// de bsams kye ma rmongs pa yi// lam la rab/ 
314b7(mdo 'grel): tu bgrod pa'i 'gron// mi rnams skad cig bsten pa yi// lus la rang gi nyid du chags// lus ni rab nyams srin bu'i tshogs kyis rkang ni bug par byas gyur cing // dbyibs bral rus pa'i dkar ba rab 
314b8(mdo 'grel): gsal so yi phreng ba 'jigs rung 'di// 'jig pa'i rang bzhin sbru ma la chags mi rnams dag gi sred 'phel zhing // chags bcas yul gyi nyams myongs gzhi gnod pa dang bcas de dag go/ de ltar rang gi lus 
315a1(mdo 'grel): mthong nas// chags bral yang dag skye ba de// rgyal bas blangs nas nam mkha' las// slar yang rgyal byed tshal du song // der ni de la bcom ldan gyis// brtse bas bstan mdzad gang gis ni/ 
315a2(mdo 'grel): rgyun dang lhan cig phyir mi 'ong // rim pas dgra bcom nyid thob gyur// nyon mongs kun las rnam grol des// de bzhin gshegs pa phyag 'tshal te// sngon gyi skye ba'i tshogs dran nas// bzhin ni 'dzum pa dang bcas so// 
315a3(mdo 'grel): de nas nam zhig bcom ldan 'das// kun mkhyen dgyes pas dge slong gi/ tshogs dang nye bar 'ongs pa yi// 'ching ba bcad pa de la gsungs// chos sred nyon mongs lam dag ni// yangs pa'i dus na yun ring gi/ 
315a4(mdo 'grel): shin tu ches kyang mun ring ba// yun ring las kyang yun ring ba// yun ring rgyubs bsags pa yi// pha rol med pa'i kun nyon mongs// bar med de yis chos sred khyod// mi ngam lam ci cung zhig smos// thams 
315a5(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pas dam pa yi// mdun du chos sred la 'di dris// sngon tshe dran pa ster ba yi// bcom ldan 'das la des gsol pa// bcom ldan re zhig nyon mongs lam// yangs pa'i dus la yun ring gi/ shin 
315a6(mdo 'grel): du ches kyang yun ring ba// yun ring las kyang yun ring bar// rnam pa sna tshogs rab lci'i khur bu padal gyi mal snyan dri mas mtshan// lus kyi sgur ma'i tshogs ni shin tu yun ring bzung nas ngal zhing 'khyams/ 
315a7(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal can rnams gdung la snying rje'i gnyen khyod rab tu thob gyur nas// sgrib pa kun dang bral ba'i ngal bsos 'di ni kye bdag gis thob// de ltar der ni chos sed dang // rgyal ba'i gtam gyis mjug tu ni/ 
315a8(mdo 'grel): mtshar nas tshul de dge slong gis// dris shing de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// sngon gyi bskal par grong khyer ni// dge ba can du sa yi bdag/ dge ba zhes la bcom ldan 'das// bde gshegs dge mdzad 
315b1(mdo 'grel): ces pa byung // de yi dus na khyim bdag ni// chos kyi ngang tshul zhes pa byung // rgya mtshor bgrod pa'i rin chen gyis// rnam thos sras dang mtshungs pa thob// de nas dus kyis de bzhin gshegs// gzi brjid dpag tu med/ 
315b2(mdo 'grel): pa de// 'gro ba kun gyi don mdzad nas// myang 'das dbyings su bzhugs pa na// de dang bral ba'i mes gdungs pa'i// khyim bdag chos kyi ngang tshul ni// gus pas bcom ldan 'das de yi// mchod rten byed pa la brtson gyu 
315b3(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid chen po de yi ni// nor bu gser tshogs mchod rten rtsom// rgyal ba'i bstan pa la sdang ba'i// bram ze yis ni rnam par bzlog/ bram ze chos kyi bgegs rnams kyi// spyod tshul de yis rgyal la bshad// de 
315b4(mdo 'grel): yis byin pa'i dpa' bo ni// 'gog byed zlog par byed pa thob// ming gis spyod thub ces bya ba// rgyal po'i dpa' bo mkhas pa des// bram ze rnams rna rab bsdigs nas// chad pas skrag pas phyir phyogs byas// de 
315b5(mdo 'grel): nas bgegs bral khyim bdag gis// gser gyi mchod rten nor bu dang // mu tig dag gis spras pa dag/ smon lam dag ni rab bsgrubs pa// bdag ni dge ba 'di dag gis// sems can yang dag sgrol la chags// 
315b6(mdo 'grel): bla med yang dag rdzogs byang chub// bdud rtsi bran pa thob gyur cing // des brjod de dag thos gyur nas// stong thub gus dang bcas pas bdag/ khyod kyi nyan thos nyid gyur cig/ ces pa smras te smon lam btab// chos kyi 
315b7(mdo 'grel): ngang tshul ye shes kyis// spyan ni thob pas de la smras// sdig pa rab tu mang ba khyod// tshogs chen dag gis nyan thos gyur// bskal pa mang po song ba'i tshe// yangs pa'i dus la sdig zad nas// sangs rgyas 
315b8(mdo 'grel): mtshan ni thos pa na// khyod kyis dge ba thob par 'gyur// khyim bdag chos kyi ngang tshul der// de yi tshe nang nyid gyur// gang zhig stong thub du gyur te// yun ring lon nas chos srid 'di// gnyis pa'i bskal par grong 
316a1(mdo 'grel): khyer ni// mar me can dus yi bdag/ mar me zhes la bcom ldan 'das// ston pa mar me mdzad ces gyur// nam zhig dka' thub nags dgyes de// rang gi grob khyer 'jug pa'i slad// sa bdag de yis/ 
316a2(mdo 'grel): gus pa yis// phyin nas rang gis rab tu zhus// mi bdag gus pa de la ni// mnyes gshin rab tu dang ba yis// bde bar gshegs pas khas blangs tshe// bkod pa'i tshogs ni rab tu bshams// ka sha'i grwa 
316a3(mdo 'grel): khyer dag tu ni// sa bdag nor lha'i bu zhes pa'i// grogs la bcom ldan ltos shig ces// rgyas de yis pho na springs// skabs der rgyal po nor lha'i bus// mchod sbyin lon bcu gnyis pa// cho ga bzhin du rdzo/ 
316a4(mdo 'grel): pan// yon lnga dag gis brtag pa byas// sa bdag de la ltas smras pa// khyed cag bram ze gnyis 'ong 'gyur// blo gros bzang dang blo gros so// de las dang po la sbyin 'os// de nas kha ton mthar phyin te// bla ma'i yon ni/ 
316a5(mdo 'grel): don gnyer ba'i// bram ze de dgas bdag gi/ mchod sbyin zhing du yang dag 'ongs// sa skyong nor lha'i bu yis kyang // de yi ming thob gus pa yis// blo gros bzang la mchos sbyin gyi// mjug tu yon lnga dga' bas phul 
316a6(mdo 'grel): wi stan rin chen bzhi rang bzhin// gser gyi dbyug pa ril ba dang // rin chen gser gyi snod dang ni// gser ni brgya phrag lnga dag go/ rang gi bu mo rgyan gyis brgyan// mi bdag ster bar brtson pa na// blo gros bzang gis tshan 
316a7(mdo 'grel): spyod ni// brjod cing bu mo yong ma blangs// mdzes ma zhes pa bu mo des// gser gyi 'od can de mthong nas// mngon 'dod ldan pas ngo tsha ni// rab tu btang nas zhu bar byas// de nas de yis phyir bzlog tshe// bu mo 
316a8(mdo 'grel): tshangs spyod ldan ma de// chags bral gnyen las phyir phyogs te// mar me can gyi grong khyer song // der ni rgyan gyi rin chen rnams// rim pa yis ni 'tshong byed cing // rin gyis nyos pa'i me tog gis// de yis rtag tu 
316b1(mdo 'grel): lha mchod byas// blo gros bzang gis yon thob pa// bzhed pa bla ma la phul nas// de yi chung mas bstan pa yi// gser gyi lhag ma rang gis bzung // de nyid kyi ni mtshan mo la// de yis rmi lam bcu mthong ste// bdud rtsi'i 
316b2(mdo 'grel): rgya mtsho 'thung ba dang // nam mkha' la ni 'gro ba dang // nyi zla mthong dang rgyal po dang // thub pa'i tshogs dang shing rta dang // glang chen dkar dang ngang pa dang // de bzhin seng+ge ri la 'dzeg/ de nas de ni rab sad de// thub chen mngon
316b3(mdo 'grel): shes lnga ldan pa// lo mo gsol ba'i tshal du ni// rmi lam 'bras bu nyan du song // de yis dris la des smras pa// khyod kyi rmi lam 'bras bu rgyas// mar me can gyi grong gnas pa// bcom ldan rgyal ba nyid kyis
316b4(mdo 'grel): mkhyen// de thos byur bar blo gros bzang // rmi lam lung bstan 'dod pa yis// mched ni blo gros dang 'grogs te// grong khyer mar me can du song // skabs der rgyal po mar me yis// bcom ldan nang du byon pa yi// 
316b5(mdo 'grel): dga' ston che la grong khyer de// rin chen dang ni gos kyis spras// de yi mchod pa'i me tog tshogs// der ni sa bdag gis bsgrubs tshe// nye tshong dag gis gnas su ni// nges par me tog mthong ma gyur// de nas bu 
316b6(mdo 'grel): mo mdzes ma des// me tog rnyed dka' gyur ba'i tshe// mchod pa 'chad pa'i sdug bsngal gyis// gzir bas phreng ba mkhan la zhus// de nas blo bzang bsod nams mthus// 'dam skyes med pa'i rdzing bu ni// 'ga'// 
316b7(mdo 'grel): zhig du yang de dus na// pad+mo dag ni 'khrungs par gyur// de dag rgyal po'i 'jigs pa yis// sbas nas sred ldan phreng mkhan gyis// de la byin zhing de yis kyang // bum chu'i nang bcug mgyogs par song // blo gros// 
316b8(mdo 'grel): bzang po rab mchod slad// me tog don gnyer yongs 'khyams pas// pad+mo rgyas pa'i bzhin ras can// mdzes ma dag ni lam du mthong // de nas de yi bsod nams mthus// sreg dang bcas pa dag gis bzhin// 
317a1(mdo 'grel): bum pa'i nang na rab bsgribs pa'i// pad+mo rnams kyis bzhin dag bstan// me tog don du gnyer ba des// gser gyis de la bslangs pa na// sred ldan ma yis yongs shes nas// 'dzum bcas de
317a2(mdo 'grel): la rab smras pa// khyod kyis bdag ni sngon btang nas// da lta me tog slong bar byed// dam pa tshangs spyod bu mo la// phebs par smra ba rigs ma yin// khyod la me tog rab byin pas// skye ba gzhan du chung mar bdag/ 
317a3(mdo 'grel): gyur cig ces pa'i smon lam gyis// 'di dag ster gyi gzhan du min// de ltar gyur ces des brjod tshe// pad+ma lnga ni de la byin// rang yang mchod phyir de yis ni// pad+mo gnyis dag rab tu bzung // de nas sa bdag mar 
317a4(mdo 'grel): ma dang // sa bdag nor lha'i bu dag kyang // bcom ldan legs par byon pa can// gus pas mngon du 'ongs par gyur// de nas mar me de yis gdugs// rin chen thur ma sa mtshan pa bzung // nor 'dzin bdag po nor 
317a5(mdo 'grel): lha'i bus// zla ba ltar dkar rnga yab bo// lha dang grub pa drang srong dang // dri zas mchod de grong khyer du// rab tu zhugs tshe sems can kun// kun tu bde ba'i dga' ston rgyas// skye bo'i tshogs ni stug po la// rgyal ba lta 
317a6(mdo 'grel): bar 'dod pa yi// blo gros bzang gi de mthu las// ji zhig ltar stes lam thob gyur// ston pa'i zhabs la pasma dag/ rab tu 'phangs nas thal sbyar te// kun dga' can des ral pa'i khur// sa la bkram nas der phyag 
317a7(mdo 'grel): 'tshal// de yi dus na yangs pa yi// legs byas bzhin du pad+mo rnams// de mdun zhal gyi zla ba'i mthar// mchod pa yang dag rgyu ba thob// bcom ldan mdun du dad pa yis// mdzes ma sa gus par rab gtor ba'i 
317a8(mdo 'grel): pad+ma rgyas pa zung dag ni// snyan gyi rgyan nyid dag tu gyur// blo bzang rab tu btud pa yi// ral pa'i tshogs ni bde gshegs kyis// zhabs kyis mnan pas lhung gyur cing // de bzhin gzhan ni rab tu 'khrungs// de ni bya ba/ 
317b1(mdo 'grel): byas gyur cing // mkha' la 'gro ba thob pa na// 'jig rten thams cad nyan pa la// bcom ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa// bla med yang dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub thob nas blo bzang khyod// 'jig rten du ni de bzhin gshegs// / 
317b2(mdo 'grel): shAkya thub ces bya bar 'gyur// zhes pa rgyal bas rab gsungs shing // mkha' la me tog char lhung tshe// mchod rten rab tu gnas pa'i slad// blon po kun gyis ral pa blangs// sa la mched kyi ral pa ni// bcom ldan zhabs
317b3(mdo 'grel): kyis mnan mthong nas// nyan pa nyid du mngon khengs pas// blo gros khro bas 'khrugs par gyur// de yi rnam 'gyur rmongs pa las// skyes pa blo gros bzang pos bzlog/ de nyid dang ni lhan cig tu// ston pa'i mdun du rab 
317b4(mdo 'grel): byung blangs// de nas dus kyis lus kyi mthar// blo thos bzang gis lha yi gnas// dga' ldan zhes pa thob gyur te// blo gros dag ni dmyal bar song // da lta blo bzang de ni dang // blo gros blo gros rnams bskrad pas// 
317b5(mdo 'grel): nyams par gyur pa chos sred 'di// mdzes ma de ni thags 'dzin ma'o// gsum pa'i bskal par bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig/ bla na med pa'i ye shes gter// 'dzu m+bu'i gling du mngon
317b6(mdo 'grel): byung gyur// de yi dus na 'phags rgyal du// tshong pa tsan dan byin zhes pa// nor chen nyo tshangs dag gis ni// rab tu grags pa byung bar gyur// de yi chung ma 'dod pa'i stobs// zhes la mo sa byed ltar mdzes bu// rtas 
317b7(mdo 'grel): byin zhes ni bya ba dag/ lus bzhin du ni dga' ba byung // khyi ma lugs chung ma la bkod nas// nor don gnyer de rgya mtshor song // lan tshwa yid bzhin nor can rnams// nor dag gis ni sred pa 'phel// de yi chung ma khyos/ 
317b8(mdo 'grel): tshe// lang chos myos shing rmongs pa yi// khyim gyi bsam pa yongs btang nas// 'dod pa'i bsam gtan la chags gyur// de yis nor gyi las la ni// gzhan nu rtas byin de bkod nas// rtag tu khang bzang bag ma du// gnas 
318a1(mdo 'grel): de rgyal po'i lam la bltas// g.yog 'khor mang po'i khyim du ni// rang dbang gnas skabs bral ba des// shugs rings phyung nas ma ma ni// rgan mo dag la mngon phyogs smras// khyim ni 'byor zhing
318a2(mdo 'grel): longs spyod mang // skye bo bka' la nyan pa 'dir// rang dbang spyod pas dman pa yis// ma ma bdag la dga' ba med// skyes pa'i longs spyod med pa na// bud med dga' ba bsten pa ni// dbang gis ma yin bkur/ 
318a3(mdo 'grel): stis min// rgyan gyis ma yin zas kyis min// de slad khyim ni yongs btang nang // bdag ni 'dun pas rgyu zhing 'gro// gzhon skyes bu ni 'di la yang // bdag ni chags pa'i dbang ma gyur// rigs kyi 'jug ngogs 
318a4(mdo 'grel): kyis bcings shing // gnyen gyi 'ching bas bsdams pa dag/ bud med dga' ba'i ngang tshul can// g.yo ldan dag gis bzod ma yin// zhes smras de la ma ma ni// shin tu mdza' bas 'khrugs pas smras/ 
318a5(mdo 'grel): gnyis gshin shin tu yangs pa'i dpal// btang nas 'gro ba rigs ma yin// bya ba mang po'i khyim 'dir ni// sbas pa'i spyod pa mi sbyar te// gsang ba'i spyod pa skad cig gis// rgyal po yi ni lam du rgyug/ 
318a6(mdo 'grel): lang tsho tsha bas rab gdungs pa// khyod kyis spyod pa ji ltar bsrung // khyim gyi gter yang rkang pa yis// rab spangs khyod kyis ji ltar 'gro// 'di nas 'dod pa'i dug 'bebs shing // 'di nas skad cig ga yang 
318a7(mdo 'grel): la lhung // gnyis ka the tshom 'di la ni// khyod kyis ci bya yod ma shes// g.yo zhing dge mtshan ldan pa rnams// ji srid gos ni ma nor bar// de srid srog gi zong gis kyang // gzhan gyi bud med don du gnyer// 
318a8(mdo 'grel): 'og pag gos nas drangs pa na// ma ma ma zhes 'dar byed cing // bdag 'gro thong zhig thong zhig ces// sgra sgrogs de nas su zhig 'dod// rnam pa kun tu bya ba byas// skye bos gos med mthong nas ni// lag/ 
318b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i gzeb kyis bsdams pa yis/ ne tso tshul bzhin 'bros par byed// mun par dga' ba'i chom rkun dang // skad cig phyed ni bde bar 'grogs// phyi nas snang ba rab spangs pa'i// 'jig rten pha rol dag tu 'grogs// bzhin 
318b2(mdo 'grel): smad ngo tsha'i sdug bsngal can// 'bras med nyams shing dman pa de// tshul khrims rin chen lam ngan du// stor bar gyur pa tshol ba bzhin// dri med tshul khrims de shAl 'dod pa'i ngal dub kyis chad cing // mu tig 'bras 
318b3(mdo 'grel): bu sa gzhi yongasu khengs par byed pa bzhin// mi dman chags bral du brtags mchi ma'i thigs pa rags pa yis// nyes spyod smad pa rab tu spros pa de ni ngu bar byed// byis pa'i 'dzum bu bsil zer can ltar mdzes pa la
318b4(mdo 'grel): yang rab tu sems byed cing // pad+ma'i stan ltar lus ni mchog tu zum zhing 'phral la rab tu nyams gyur te// khyim gyi nang du phan tshun gtam rnams phyir ni rang gi gtam du thos gyur pa// 'phyon ma rnams kyi yid ni rtsa yi 'dab 
318b5(mdo 'grel): ma bskyod pa la yang dogs par 'gyur// gzugs kyi dregs pas gzhon nu ma// khyo yi khyim las phyi rol 'thon// yongs rtog rnams kyis bsod nams kyi// gnas la yongs brtags phyi nas 'dor// de slad khyim na gnas pa
318b6(mdo 'grel): khyod// ji ltar skyes bu dang 'grogs shing // 'jig rten dag gis mi shes pa// de ltar rig pa dag gis brjod// khyod kyi gzhon nu rtas byin 'di// cung zad lang tsho dag la ni// skye bos dogs bya min pa'i slad// mchod tu bde ba 
318b7(mdo 'grel): longs spyod 'os// rnam pa 'di lta'i bzhin bzang dang // mdzes sdug can ni ga las rnyed// gal te re zhig rab bsgrubs na// 'di ni gnod med rnam pa yin// zhes pa ma ma'i tshig thos nas// de yis kyang ni rigs par bsam// 
318b8(mdo 'grel): chags pa drag po'i rnam pa yis// long bas sdig lhung mthong ma yin// de nas ma mas dal bu yis// bud med longs spyod bde bsngags pas// bsgrubs shing bsgrubs nas gzhon nu'i yid// yul la mngon par phyogs 
319a1(mdo 'grel): par byas// rtag tu 'dod pa rab spros nas// de la de yis rab smras pa/ bu khyod la 'os 'ga' zhig ni// bdag po yul gzhan song ba yod// khang stong sgron ma med par ni// mtshan mo mi smra la brten te// shin 
319a2(mdo 'grel): tu ngo tsha ldan ma de// khyo dang yang dag 'grogs par 'dod// ces pa de yi tshig thos nas// mngon par 'dod ldan tshong pa'i bus// rtag tu sbas pa'i khyim du ni// ma dang dga' mgur 'grogs pa bsten// rtag tu rab bsgribs/ 
319a3(mdo 'grel): khyim du ni// dga' mgur spyad pa sten byed pa// de la chags pa'i me dag ni// rab tu 'phel zhing zhi bar gyur// de yis bsams pa rtag tu ni// rab tu bsgribs pa'i sdug bsngal 'di// mi bzod gzugs kyi longs
319a4(mdo 'grel): spyod la// snang ba nyid ni 'tsho ba la// phan tshun bzhin gyi chu lces la// rnam par lta ba'i ro bral ba'i// ni yis dga' mgur spyod pa la// bde ba'i dga' ston dga' yod min// de bsgribs pa yi nyon mongs ni// rab tu 
319a5(mdo 'grel): 'bad pas rtsom byas te// 'phral la longs spyod gzhon nu ma// gsal bar bdag gis bstan par bya// zhes pa mtshan mo rab bsams te// rab bsal lus des gos dag ni// yongs su rje ba'i rigs pa yis// 
319a6(mdo 'grel): nang par de la rab gsal gyur// de yis rang gi ma mthong nas// rtsa ba bcad pa'i ljon pa bzhin// sdig pa'i dug ni 'bebs pa yis// dbang dang bral bar byas te lhung / de yis bsil ba'i chus bran te// dal 
319a7(mdo 'grel): gyis 'du shes thob pa des// rgya che ga yang sar 'khyams pa la// sdug bsngal gyur bzhin smre sngags phyung // dmyal bar lhung ba'i pho nya mo// 'dod pas rmongs ma de yos ni// smin ma'i 'khri shing gzengs bstod 
319a8(mdo 'grel): nas// lag pas yongs 'khyud de la smras/ khyod kyi mya ngan bzod dka' 'di// gnas min rdzun pa dag la ci// bud med chos kyis bsdams pa rnams// mi bden khyod kyis mi shes sam// khyod kyis sdug bsngal yod 
319b1(mdo 'grel): ma bskyed// su yi yang ni nor ma phrogs// thun mong bde ba'i longs spyod 'dir// khyod la sdig pa'i bag chags ci/ g.yo ldan bsdams pa med pa yi// chu klung bud med thun mong nyid// gang la pha yis khrus byas der// 
319b2(mdo 'grel): bu ni khrus byed min nam ci// lam gang nas ni pha song ba// de nyid nas ni bu yang 'gro/ bud med brgya la ma dag dang mtshungs// thun mong pa yi bgrod bya nyid// bud med gcig gi spyad bya nyid// gzhan dang gzhan gyi mi
319b3(mdo 'grel): 'os pa// 'di ni 'ga' zhig phrag dog dang // ldan pas dam tshig byas pa tsam// dam pa'i don du dga' mgu'i slad// bgrod par mi bya 'ga' yang med// pha dang bu yi snod gcig bzhin// bud med nye bar longs spyad bya// zhes 
319b4(mdo 'grel): te de yis 'bad pa yis// longs spyod la de mngon phyogs byas/ 'dod chags skyes pas rtag par yang // phyugs bzhin du ni ma nyid bsten// de nas dus kyi pha dag ni// chu gter che las slar yod pa// ma yis bskul ba der
319b5(mdo 'grel): gsang nas// dug gis srog dang bral bar byas// de nas chags pa 'phel ba yis// ma bsdams bde ba tshel ba des// mdza' bas rmongs pa'i gzhon nu la// mdza' bas dal gyis rab smras pa// ma bsdams bde ba thob 
319b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i srad// snying po'i nor dag blangs byas la// tsher ma spangs pa'i yul gzhan du// yu cag re zhig 'gro bar bya// zhes pa de tshig yun ring gi/ dus su 'dod pa thob gyur nas// nor gyi snying po blangs byas te// de ni de dang 'grogs 
319b7(mdo 'grel): nas song // yul gzhan dag tu gnas byas te// sdig pas rab bsgribs de dag ni// chung ma khyo bo nyid du grags// mchog tu bde ba thob par gyur// de nas nam zhig khyim der ni// rang gi yul par mngon shes pas// yongs 
319b8(mdo 'grel): dris dge slong mngon phyogs te// mnyes gshin las ni de la smras/ khyod kyi ma ni dge 'am ci// skyes btang la yang yang du// bsams pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems// 'gyod gdung med par gyur tam ci// zhes pa dge slong tshig 
320a1(mdo 'grel): zos nas// rdo ba yi ni bsnun pa bzhin// 'dri shes dag gis 'jigs pa des// rigs pa de de rab bsams pa// gros byed 'jig pas 'khrugs pa des/ ma dang lhan cig bgros byas nas// dge slong de ni mgron 
320a2(mdo 'grel): gnyer te// ma bsdams mtshon gyis khyim du bsad// dge slong dgra bcom bsad la yang // de yid dpag kyang 'dar ma yin// gtum po rnams ni sdig pa yis// rdo rje las lhag sra bar gyur// ngos med g.yang sar chos kyi ri rtse 
320a3(mdo 'grel): yi// steng nas kha ni thur bltas lhung gyur cing // 'khrul mang bya skyibs brgya yis bsnun pa rnams// nges par brgyud ma dag tu lhung bar 'gyur// bu dang rol par byed mod kyang // longs spyod dag la chags pa des// mdzes/ 
320a4(mdo 'grel): papazhes bya tshong pa'i chu// mthong nas de la chags ldan gyur// dga' mgur spyad pa yongs 'dres goms pas longs spyod dag ni mchog tu 'phel// nor ni rab 'phel dar bas chags pa stug po ci yang sten par byed// 
320a5(mdo 'grel): lan tshwa'i chu dag 'thungs pas shin tu mi bzad sred pa skye bar 'gyur// chu nir+g+ha che me lces myangs pas rta gdong me ni rab tu 'bar// 'dod ldan gsar pa de dang ni// chags ldan ma degs 'grogs pa// rtas byin gyis 
320a6(mdo 'grel): mthong khros pa yis// ral gri dag gis ma nyid bsad// mtshams med gsum gyi sdig khur gyis// de ni lci ba nyid du gyur// skye bo lha yis bskul rnams kyis// myur du grong khyer dag lus phyung // 'gyod pa drag po skyes pa 
320a7(mdo 'grel): des/ song nas dge slong tshegs mngal// sdug bsngal las ni rab byung zhus// gang tshe sdig can la ma byin// de tshe de ya zhe sdang gis// dge slong tshogs nyal mtshan mo bsregs// de la brtse bas brlan pa'i blo// dge slong 
320a8(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' che// gcig gis de tshe bslab pa'i gnas// spangs pa'i rab tu byung ba byin// rab tu 'bad cing nan tan gyis// bslab pa'i gnas ni zhu byed pa// de la dge slong gis smras khyod// bslab gnas 'dzin 
320b1(mdo 'grel): par yong mi 'os// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo// zhes pa 'di nyid rtag tu brjod// rgyal ba'i mtshan ni thos nyid kyis// dus kyi mthar ni khyod grol 'gyur// de nas rtas byin lus kyi mthar// 'jigs su rung ba'i/ 
320b2(mdo 'grel): dmyal bar zhugs// gang mdun rab tu nyam nga ba'i// grang ba 'jig pa'i me ldan pa// de nyid chos sred yun ring gi/ yun ring las zhes bdag gis dris// zhes pa brjod nas bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 
320b3(mdo 'grel): bzhugs/ dba' rlabs ltar g.yo ma yi rlung tshub dag la dogs pa med par rab tu 'khyud// dar ba thob nas pa ni gzi byin gter de snang ba min pa dag tu bkod// dgra bcom gnas ni rab tu gsal ba'i 'byor pa mi bzad 
320b4(mdo 'grel): rim pas bcom// du ba shin tu dri ma can gyis mchog tu zhes byas ci dang ci ma byas// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las chos sred kyi rtogs pa 
320b5(mdo 'grel): brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa'o// // yid ni dge ba'i sgrub byed can// sbyin pa shin tu chung ngu yis// snying stobs can la phun tshegs ni// brtag pas bgom pa bya mi 'gyur// bri dzi'i yangs pa can du 
320b6(mdo 'grel): sngon// spre'u'i rdzing zhes bya ba'i 'gram// khang pa brtsegs pa'i khyim gnas na// bcom ldan myal ba bzhugs pa'i tshe// yon tan mtha' dag ldan pa las// skyes bu mchog nyid du gyur pa// khyim bdag dpal gyis bskor ba ni/ nor can zhes pa byung 
320b7(mdo 'grel): bar gyur// de yi chung ma chos kyi grogs// ngang tshul can zhes bya bar gyur// bu ni gtor pod can zhes dang // de bzhin mna' ma bden ldan ma'o// yangs pa can pa'i bram ze rnams// tshogs nas der ni nges par byas// thams cad tshogs nas bcom 
320b8(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das// mgron du gnyer bya gzhan du min// nor gyi rgyags pas gcig gis ni// gal te rgyal ba mgron gnyer byed// gzhan gyi chos kyi bgegs byed pa// de ni kun gyis dbyung bar bya// de dag nges pa ma shes nas// nor can mchog gi phun tshogs 
321a1(mdo 'grel): ldan// bsod nams ldan pa rang nyid kyis// song nas rgyal ba gnyer byas// bcom ldan rang gi dge 'dun dang // lhan cig khyim du gshegs par ni// zhal gyis bzhes tshe gus ldan de// dga' bas rang gi khyim du song // der ni de yis lha la 'os// mchog 
321a2(mdo 'grel): gi 'byor pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// rin chen snyan dang yo byad dang // zas kyi sa gzhi bstar ba byas// skabs der gnyis skyes thams cad ni// 'dus nas yo byad tshogs bsgrubs pas// bcom ldan 'das kyi drung song nas// de nas de la bcom ldan 'das// rab dang dri 
321a3(mdo 'grel): med bsam pas gsungs// sngon du dge 'dun dang bcas nga// nor can gyis ni mgron du gnyer// de dag thos nas bcom ldan 'das// mchod pa sngon gyi nyin par la// rab tu rtog cing de dag rnams// rang gi khyim du song ba'i tshe// nor can khang par bcom ldan 'das// 
321a4(mdo 'grel): dge slong rnams dang bcas byon nas// lha yi rmad byung phun sum tshogs// mchod ston rab tu bzhes pa mdzad// de yi chung mas nyin gzhan yang // de mtshungs yangs pa'i dpal gyis ni// mchog gi longs spyod tshogs rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa 
321a5(mdo 'grel): byas// gsum pa'i nyin la de yi bus// bzhi par mna' mas rgyal ba ni// ngo mtshar 'byor pa'i longs spyod kyi// nyer spyad rnams kyis mgron du gnyer// yangs pa can pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// ston pa mchod pa'i skabs ma thob// nor can la ni rab khros te// 
321a6(mdo 'grel): gnas nas dbyung ba'i rtsom pa byas// de nas bde bar gshegs pa'i bkas// gnyis skyes de dag rnams la ni// bdag gis ma shes zhes brjod nas// nor can gyis ni dang bar byas// de nas nor can chung mar bcas// bu dang bcas shing mna' mar bcas// 
321a7(mdo 'grel): ston pas chos ni bstan pa yis// bden pa mthong ba thob par gyur// de dag sngon byung bsod nams ni// 'byor pa chen po rgya che bas// dge slong gis dris bcom ldan 'das// thams cad mkhyen pas der gsungs pa// ba ra NA sir sngon byung ba// pad+ma 
321a8(mdo 'grel): zhes bya byeng chud ma'an// mu ges zhen pa'i dus su ni// mchog tu dbul ba nyid du gyur// chung ma yal 'ad ba can zhes dang // pra ni mut+pa la zhes pa dang // mna'am batral zhes pa// 'di dag de yi tshogs par gyur// nam zhig de dag khyim dang nye// me 
321b1(mdo 'grel): dga' tshal rab mdzes shing // tshim pa dag tu nyin mo'i mthar// rang sangs rgyas ni bzhugs par gyur// de dag kun gyis mi bdag gi/ gnas su gos gcig ri mos kyis// me tog phul nas 'ongs pa yis// 'od kyi rang bzhin de mthong gyur// gzi brjid 
321b2(mdo 'grel): gter de mthong gyur nas// snga dro de la mchod 'dod pas// gshog pa bcad pa'i bya bzhin du// de dag nor med gdung ba thob// bdag cag gzhi la bdog pa kun// gos ni gcig nyid kho na yod// mchod 'os 'di yi lus kyi mchog/ de nyid kyis ni g.yog 
321b3(mdo 'grel): par bya// de ring gcer bur rgyal po yi// 'khor du mi 'gro ci 'byung 'gyur// zhes pa'i dam tshig de dag gis// byas nas god kyis de la mchod// de yi bsod nams smon lam gyis// phreng rgyud mkhan de nor can 'di// chung ma bu dang mna' mar ldan// 
321b4(mdo 'grel): lha mthu phun sum tshogs par gyur// ces pa tshogs su kun mkhyen gyis// bshad pa zos nas dge slong rnams// sems ni dri med rtsa ba dag/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'i dpal du sems/ de nas bram ze de dag rnams// kun tshogs gtsang ba'i zas dag 
321b5(mdo 'grel): gis// bcom ldan 'das ni yang dag mchod// dge ba rab tu 'bar bar gyur// dman byin rin chen nor ni rtswa yi rtse// dad pas byin pa rtswa yang rin thang med// mdzes pa du ma'i nyams myong nor min te// dge ba 'byung ba'i rgyu ni sems nyid do// 
321b6(mdo 'grel): zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ nor can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu pa'o// // snang ba med pa'i gnas rnams dag tu sgron ma 
321b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin// legs par bshad pa bden pa'i lam ni gsal bar byed// de nyid phyir na rtag tu nye bar 'kho ba las// bdag nyid che rnams dben pa spyod la yid du 'ong // gang tshe gyad kyi skye bo'i gnas// ku sha'i grong du bcom ldan 'das// 
321b8(mdo 'grel): dge ba tshol bas dge slong tshogs// dgra bcom gnas la bkod gyur pa// de tshe phan tshun snyan par chos// spra byed dge slong rnams dag gi/ legs bshad bde bar gshegs pa ni// dgyes pa dang ldan rang gis gsan// de yi legs bshad 
322a1(mdo 'grel): la gcugs pa// de mthong dge slong rnams kyis ni// de la gsol ba kun mkhyen nyid// nged kyi tshig la ji ltar dgyes// dge slong tshogs kyis de brjod tshe// bcom ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa// bdag ni skye ba gzhan du 
322a2(mdo 'grel): yang // legs bshad dag la mchog tu dga'// grong khyer ni ldan dag tu sngon// mi dbang shi bi zhes bya ba// 'byung po kun la brtse ba yi// yid 'ong gnyen du gyur pa byung // de yi bsod nams dkar gnas pa'i/ mi yis mtho ris 
322a3(mdo 'grel): kun gang ba// mthong nas de yi snying stobs ni// rtog tu mchod sbyin brgya pa 'ongs// de ni rin chen khang bzang rtser// 'dzegs pa'i mi bdag can song nas// 'jigs rung srin po'i gzugs bsgrub ste// de yi mdun du mngon phyogs 
322a4(mdo 'grel): sbrus// 'du byed ma rtag shin tugs pa'i thag pa mdzes padag dang mtshungs// rab tu byas shing 'jig pa'i yongs su 'byung ba dag la chags// nas pa'i legs pa shad byed brjod nas// phrin paden mi lta gyung / sa mi bdag 
322a5(mdo 'grel): pos thal sbyar nas// phyag 'tshal de la rab smras pa// dge ba legs par bshad pa'i byed/ yid bde lhag ma gsung bar mdzod// byang chub yan lag gyur skad de// slob mar gyur nas bdag nyan no// dul bas de smra/ mi bdag la// 
322a6(mdo 'grel): srin po yis ni rab smras pa// rgyal dbang slob ma 'bras bu med// khyod kyis bdag la ci zhig bya// skom pas bdag ni yongs nyen cing // dkris pas dku ni yongs su nyams// rgyal po bdag ni bla ma yi// zhes 'ba' zhig 'di mi 
322a7(mdo 'grel): 'dod// bkres skom dag gis gzir gyur pa// gang zhig cung zad bdag smra'o// lhag ma brjod par yong mi nus// bdag la sdug bsngal ma mdzad cig/ snyan pa'i gdangs ldan ro ni 'os pa can// legs par bshad pa rab tu rgyas 
322a8(mdo 'grel): gyur pa// tshim la bde ba ster byed 'di dag ni// nges par bkres dang skom pa za byed min// thos dang glu dang snyan dngags ngal bas yongs 'dris dge mtshan sgrub byed dang // nor bu shes dang 'byung po gdon nad dug dang smyo ba zhi byed dang // 
322b1(mdo 'grel): sa 'dzin bsnyen dang chu gter sgrol bar byed dang gser 'gyur dag rtsis// 'di dag ma las mthar thug 'bras bu mi rnams dag gi bza' ba yin// 'phral la bcad pa'i sha dang ni// khrag dag bdag ni tshim byed pa// 'tsho med sngon
322b2(mdo 'grel): pas bcings gyur pa// khyod las shin tu rnyed pa dka'// khyod dang nye bar bdag ci byed// 'ga' zhig la ni slong du 'gro/ zas dang gnas ni mtshungs pa yi// rtsed mo dang ni gtam dag mdzes// zhes des brjod tshe mi bdag ni// gus
322b3(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pas de la smras// rang gi lus ni rab bcad pa'i// khrag bcas sha ni khyod la sbyin// rgya che blo gros ldan pa khyod// rten cing 'brel 'byung dang po'i sgo// khyod kyi legs bshad myang 'das kyi// grong khyer gyi ni lam gyi mchog/ rgyal 
322b4(mdo 'grel): po zla bas 'di brjod tshe// mtshan mo rgyu bas de la spras// blo gros bzang po myur du nyon// dam bcas pa dag sbyin par mdzod// 'du byed mi rtag shin tu g.yo ba'i klog rab mdzes pa dag dang mtshungs// rab tu skyes shing 'jig pa'i 
322b5(mdo 'grel): yongs su 'gyur ba dag la chags// des bskyed 'khor zhing yongs su sbyang bas srog chags dag ni dbang bral zhing // nga la dub ldan pa rnams la zheng ni 'gog bas la gso ster bar byed// de dag thos nas mi bdag ni// dga' 
322b6(mdo 'grel): mgu mig dag rab rgyas pas// rang gi lus ni bcad pa'i sha/ khrag dang bcas pa de la byin// rang sha bcad cing bcad cing ni// ster bar byed pas bdag gi// snying stobs rnam 'gyur med pa yis// mtshan mo n+d+ra ba ya mtshan gyur// de yis 
322b7(mdo 'grel): lus ni thams cad las// sha za dgal sha byin nas// sems can thams cad grol ba la// smon lam mi yi bdag pos byas// de nas de la bcugs pa las// 'dzer 'jig srin po'i gzugs kyis spras// khyod kyis gnad ni/ 
322b8(mdo 'grel): bcad pa la// gdung bas mi dga' ba skyed dam ci// skabs gsum rgyal pos dris pa na// rgyal po'i rgyal pos der smras pa// lus kyis gzhan la phan pa dag/ byas la bdag ni mi dga' med// gal te gdung ba dag la bdag 
323a1(mdo 'grel): rnam 'gyur med na bden pa des// bdag gi lus 'di sngon gzugs bzhin// rma med bsos pa nyid gyur cig/ ces smras sa yi bdag po yi// bden pa'i tshogs ni brjod pa las// 'phral nyid lus ni sngon gyi 
323a2(mdo 'grel): gzugs// rma dang bral ba nyid du gyur// mkha' la rgyu bas me tog char// yangs pas de na g.yogs byas shing // lha yi dbang pos srin pos gzugs// yongs su btang nas rab tu bsngags// brgya byin snying stobs mthong 
323a3(mdo 'grel): ba yis// mi bdag la ni dang byas so// de yi legs bshad bdud rtsi yi// nyams myongs yi bdag bos bsams// nga nyid sngon gyi skye ba la// mi dbang shi bi der gyur te// de ltar srog gi zong gis bdag/ legs bshad 
323a4(mdo 'grel): la ni dga' bar gyur// rang gi skye ba gzhan gyi gtam// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dag/ thos nas ya mtshan ldan pa yi// dge slong kun gyis rab tu bsngags// mthong dang ma mthong ba de la lam ni legs bshad kyis 
323a5(mdo 'grel): gsal sgron ma lta bur spyod// legs bshad bdud rtsi'i ro ni nyams myong ldan pas mchog tu dga' ba'i char dag 'bebs// legs bshad don gnyer yul la gnyer bya kun mkhyen dag kyang don gnyer nyid du 'gyur// de slad 
323a6(mdo 'grel): dam pa rnams la legs bshad dang mtshungs dga' ba ci yang yod ma yin// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ shi pi'i legs bshad kyi rtogs 
323a7(mdo 'grel): pabarjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // bla ma rnams kyi mdun dag tu yang shin tu bla ma'i gnas su che// 'byung po rnams ni 'dzin byed mtha' dag ro yi snying po rab tu bskrun// lus ni mdza' gzugs 
323a8(mdo 'grel): bzhin du rgyas byed skabs gsum chu bo gtsang ma'i lus// ma de nyid ni rtag tu mkhas pas mchod bya yin gyi nor 'dzin min// mnyan yod dag gi rgyal byed tshal// dga' bar rgyal bas rgya che'i tshes// rab tu bstan nas mdor bsdus 
323b1(mdo 'grel): pa// slar yang dge slong tshogs la gsungs// pha ma mchog tu tshangs pa ste// g.yo ba'i bsod nams dag gi grogs// gang zhig de mchod chos ldan pa'i// rigs de bsngags par 'os pa yin// 'jig rten gsum na bde mtshun 
323b2(mdo 'grel): dka' thub med// 'tshe med mtshungs pa'i chos ni gang na'ang med// bla ma lci ba pa las gzhan yod min// lha'i mchog ni ma las gzhan pa min// gang zhig lhag par gus pa rab rgyas pas// bla ma'i zhabs kyi pad+ma zung mi sten// de dag mchog
323b3(mdo 'grel): tu chur sred 'ba' zhig gis// 'jug ngogs kun tu song yod 'bras bu med// bde bas bsten bya phyi rol mi phyogs rtag tu bzod pa 'dzin// drag po'i brtul zhugs la sogs nges par gdung ba ster mi byed// gus pa'i rim gro chung ngu la 
323b4(mdo 'grel): yang mi chung 'bras bu ster// pha dang ma dang mnyam pa'i bla ma gsum pa yod pa min// legs byas don ston byed pas slob dpon rtag tu su yis mngon par dga' mi bya// srog rnams skyed byed bla ma rnams kyi bla ma pa ni ji ltar mchod
323b5(mdo 'grel): mi bya// de bas kyang ni mchog tu skad cig mngal gyi khur bzung ma yi ngal dub la// bu lon dag pa sgrub byed bsod nams tshegs ni ci yis dag pa thob par 'gyur// dben pa ma smin sdig pa'i tshig gi yang dag thob gyur pa// gang 
323b6(mdo 'grel): gas ma la rjod pa'i ma ya nges par gyu zud pa// dag pa'i tul zhugs de sa ba la pa'i tshigs dag // ba' bar ma ma ba'i rnam chags padag tu 'gyur// rtsu bga'ang dum lan// rjod pa byed pa ba ga 
323b7(mdo 'grel): kyang // sdig dmod rang bzhin mi 'dod pa// yongs su rdzogs pa'i gdung ba thob// ba ra NA si dag tu sngon// khyim bdag mdza' bo zhes pa byung // de yi chung ma nor 'dzin ma// zhes pa shin tu yid 'ong gyur// de yi bu rnams skyes tsam 
323b8(mdo 'grel): la// lnga pa nyid ni thob pa'i tshe// na tshod mtha' ru bu dag ni// dpal dang ldan pa gcig btsas gyur// de yang 'chi bas 'jigs pa yi// pha yis bu mo zhes par btags// de yis mdza' bo'i bu mo zhes// byis pa de ni grags par gyur// 
324a1(mdo 'grel): de yi ba ni rgya mtshe ru// song zhing shi bar gyur pa'i tshe// bu gcig pa nyid ma yis ni// gter dang mtshungs pa dag tu bsrungs// rigs kyi rim pas 'ongs pa yi// gling du 'gro ba bzlog nas des// de la 'tshe thabs dang 
324a2(mdo 'grel): yul du// 'os pa chung ngu 'tsho ba bstan// dang por tshong las skyes pa ni// kaR+Sha pa Na bzhi dag dang // de nas nyi ma gzhan la ni// de las nyis 'gyur bzhi 'gyur dang // de nas brgyad 'gyur dag kyang rnyed// thams cad de yis ma la 
324a3(mdo 'grel): phul// de nas gling bgrod rigs la ni// 'os par thos nas 'dod ldan gyur// rgya mtshor 'gro ba rtsom pa yi// tshogs la chags shing gus ldan de// ma yis bzlog par gyur mod kyang // ldog pa nyid du khas ma blangs// de nas ma ni mya ngan 
324a4(mdo 'grel): gyis// 'khrugs shing rkang pa la 'gyel bas// gdug pa de yis dpal bzhin du// rkang pas rab tu spangs nas song // dang por byis pa 'brul cing yi ge byed brjod yid 'ong bdud rtsi'i char dga'abebs// de nas dul bas yid la re ba'i dga'
324a5(mdo 'grel): ston rgyas pa brgya yis dga' ba 'dzin// phyi nas mi bzad lang tsho tsha ba drag pos brlang po dag tu smra byed mkhas// gsal bar nags po brtsegs pa ltar rtsub ngan pa'i bu yis sdug bsngal gdung bar byed/ rin chen sgrub par 'dod 
324a6(mdo 'grel): pa de// ma yi mya ngan yangs par bzhin// rgya mtsho'i drung du phyi nas ni// gzings la rab tu zhon te song // de nas de yi gzings chen ni// rab rnon chu srin sen po yi// sog le drag pos dral bar byas// 'jug ngogs dag tu zhig par 
324a7(mdo 'grel): gyur// blo gros rab 'phyar de yis ni// ma yi bsam bcom khur lci bas// gzings ni zhig par gyur pa des// dmod pa bzhin du rmongs pa thob// de nas shing gi tshal pa thob// dal gyis 'du shes thob pa des// chu gter 
324a8(mdo 'grel): gyis ni ngogs phyin nas// nags tshal chen po'i nang du zhugs// gcig pu bstan nyams 'gro ba des// skye bo med sar yun ring na// grong khyer rtse dga' can zhes pa// dga' ba mchog ni thob par gyur// bzhin ras zla zer 
324b1(mdo 'grel): tshogs rnams kyis// zla ba'i 'od ni spro byed pa// lha yi bu mo bzhi dag gis// gus bcas mgron ni byas pa de// gser gyi rdzing bu dag gi 'gram// rin chen 'khri shing dga' ba'i tshal/ nor bu'i khang pa khri stan can// der ni longs 
324b2(mdo 'grel): spyod ldan par gyur// rgud pa dag ni bde ba'i mtha'// pun tshogs nyon mongs dag la mdza'// lus can rnams la ri mos kyis// nges pa nyid du 'khor ba yin// dga' mgur spyod pa la chags pa'i// ri dgas mig can de dag rnams// 
324b3(mdo 'grel): de dang rol pas yun ring du// skal bzang don byas nyid dag thob// khyod kyis grong khyer lho yi lam// bdag nyid kun gyis spang bya zhes// de dag gis brjod tshe na de// lhag par de ni 'gro 'dod gyur// rang dbang mngon par mi 'dod 
324b4(mdo 'grel): cing // nges par bsdams pa'i mi mthun phyogs// srog chags rnams ni bkag pa la// pal chen gus pa lhag par 'phel// de nas dge mtshan gyis drangs te// lho yi phyogs kyi lam de nas// song bas rtag tu sbyor 
324b5(mdo 'grel): zhes pa// lha yi grong khyer gzhan pa thob// der ni de bzhin lha mo brgyad// spyad bya nyid du gyur rnams kyis// de la rim gro'i bkod pa dag/ de las lhag pa yun ring byas// de dag rnams kyis rim pa des// lho yi lam ni bkag 
324b6(mdo 'grel): pa na// de ni dge mtshan las song bas// grong khyer gsum pa dga' byed thob// der ni rim pa de nyid kyis// rtse dgas rnam par rol de la// lha mo bcu drug dga' mgu yi// longs spyod spyad bya nyid du gyur// de dag gis kyang 
324b7(mdo 'grel): bkag pa yi// lho yi lam nas song gyur pa// gus bcas de yis khang bzang ni// tshangs pa'i mchog ces bya bar phyin// de nas der lha mo gzhan// sum cu rtsa gnyis longs spyod kyi// skal bzang gis ni yang dag thob// de bzhin 
324b8(mdo 'grel): lho yi lam nas song // de ni song bas mi srun pa'o// grogs bzhin nyon mongs tshogs kyi gnas// lcags kyi rang bzhin rngub po yi// grong khyer ngan 'gro mang ba thob// der de nang du zhugs pa na// rim pas mal sgo rnams ni// 
325a1(mdo 'grel): su zhig dag gis bsgribs pa bzhin// mtshams med bsdams pa nyid du gyur// de yi nang na skyes bu ni// lus chen gnas pa de yis mthong // mtha' dag nyon mongs skyon rnams kyi// snod ni shin tu che ba bzhin// bcing 
325a2(mdo 'grel): shing rgyun tu khrag rgyun 'bab// de yi spyi bor 'khor lo ni// rnon po 'bar bas dkrigs pa dag/ yongs su 'khor ba mthong bar gyur// rang gi mgo las zags pa yi// rnag khrag gis ni zas sgrub pa// de mthong drag pos yid byung 
325a3(mdo 'grel): nas// mdza' bo'i bu mos rab smras pa// gdung ba drag pos non khyod su// 'di ni las dag ci yi 'bras// zhes des snying rjes dris pa na// skyes bu de la rab smras pa// bdag gi ma la gnod byed do// 'di ni las de nyid kyi 'bras// 
325a4(mdo 'grel): de dag zos nas de yang ni// sdig pa dran nas rigs par gyur// de yis bsams pa bdag la yang // ma la gnod byas sdig pa yod// sdig pa rab tu brjod pa'i grogs// dran par byed 'di bdag gis mthong // b+hi ba yis na 
325a5(mdo 'grel): sngon gyi// nags nas ri dgas rgyu ba bzhin// sdig des bde ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// nga nyid drangs pa ma yin nam// zhes pa'i bsam pas de 'khrugs shing // sgo bsdams sngon nas gnas pa'i tshe// snying ni kun tu 'dar 
325a6(mdo 'grel): byed pa'i// skad ni mkha' las rab grags pa// yul rings bcings pa nges par khrol// gsar du 'ongs pa dam du chings// gsar pa bcings la bcings pa 'grol// 'di ni mtshams kyi dus la bab// ces sgra mkha' 
325a7(mdo 'grel): las grags pa'i tshe// skyes bu dgrol skad cig las// mdza' bo'i bu mo'i mgo la ni// 'khor lo rab tu 'bar ba lhung // de dus gnad gcad gdung bas gzing // gsar bcings mdza' bo'i bu mo des// bcings pa grol bar 
325a8(mdo 'grel): gyur pa yi// skyes bu de la rab smras pa lha mo rjes su chags ldan longs spyod yid ni 'phrog pa can// grong khyer nor bu'i khang khyim mdzes pa de dag yongs gtang nas// sdig pa'i las kyi zag pa shin tu rab tu gyur pas drangs// khyim rnams/ 
325b1(mdo 'grel): la bzhin sa 'di nyid du phyugs bdag 'ongs par gyur// gang na 'di yi las kyi 'khri shing cha yis yongs bsgrubs pa// dus kyis yongs sprin spyad bya nyid du gyur pa mdun na gnas// nges par spyad bya stobs ldan 'di yis mchog tu 
325b2(mdo 'grel): 'gugs par byed// de yis bkug nas kyang ni dbang med mi rnams 'jug par byed// ma la gnod pa byas rnams kyi// nyon mongs spyod mtshams ji snyed dus// skye bo kha cig bdag lta bu// gsar du 'ong bar 'gyur ram nI// 
325b3(mdo 'grel): zhes pa lus can 'khor lo ni// rab tu 'bar ba'i rtses btsam zhing // gzir ba de yi tshig thos nas// skyes bus de la rab smras pa// lo ni stong phrag drug cu dang // lo ni brgya phrag drug cu dang // nyon mongs nye bar longs spyod 'di// 
325b4(mdo 'grel): sdig pa'i las can rnams la des// ma la gnod pa byas pa yi// sdig can rnams la 'di na gnas// 'jigs su rung ba gzhan dag yod// gzhan yang de lta 'ong bar 'gyur// des brjod shin tu bzod dka' de// mdza' bo'i 
325b5(mdo 'grel): bu mos thos gyur nas// rab gdung sdug bsngal myong ba las// gzhan dag gzir la brtse bas smras// da ni sdig pa byed pa'i mi// gang gis rab tu 'ong 'gyur ba// de dag don du 'khor lo 'di// bdag gi mgo la gnas gyur cig/ 
325b6(mdo 'grel): 'di lta'i gdung ba drag cing ring // de dag rnams kyis ji ltar bzod// bdag nyid gcig pu gdung gyur la// thams cad gdung med gnas gyur cig/ 'khor lo rang gi 'bras bcad nas// gzhan gyi don du bdag gis gzung // skye 
325b7(mdo 'grel): po rang nyid gdung med pas// gzhan gyi gdung ba yong mi shes// sems can phan tshe la snying rje yis// gzir ba de yis 'di brjod tshe// dam pa'i kun rtog mthu yis ni// de yi 'khor lo mkha' la song // yal 'dab dag ni 
325b8(mdo 'grel): gdung ba 'phrog cing me tog grags snyan dkar po rgyas par byed// 'phral la dri bzang legs ldan longs spyod skal bzang phun sum tshogs pa slar yang 'dzin// dam pa'i kun rtog 'khri shing snying rje'i brlan ldan dam pa 
326a1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi snying la ni// gang tshe yang dag btab pa de tshe ro ldan 'bras bu ci dang cis ming skyed// snying rje'i bsod nams bdag nyid kyis// skad cig de la sdig zad de// lus ni yongs su btang nas de// lha yi gnas su
