326a2(mdo 'grel): lhar gyur to// nga nyid sngon tshe byams bdag nyid// mdza' bo'i bu mo nyid gyur te// ma ni rkang pa rab 'bangs pas// sdug bsngal gnas skabs de dag tho ba// kaR+Sha pa Na sa ma la ni// mchod pas lha mo'i gnas kyang thob// de skad
326a3(mdo 'grel): ma yi srid zhu ni// chos kyi mchog tu bcom ldan gsung // ma ni bkra shis phreng ba yon tan dang ldan pa ni gnyis gshin cod pan te// de dag dgyes slad gang gi spyi bor zhabs kyi pad+mo rab tu 'god byed pa// phyogs kun yongs su 'gengs 
326a4(mdo 'grel): par brtson pa'i grags pa phun tshogs rab tu gsal brgyas// rtag tu dga' ston bsod nams rgyan ldan de dag 'gro ba'i mchod bya nyid du 'gyur// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa 
326a5(mdo 'grel): dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ mdza' bo'i bu mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// gang gis mchod 'os mchod par sgrub la me tog la sogs te// sems med rnams kyang 'os pa'i sems 
326a6(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa nyid du gyur// rgyal ba gus pa'i khyad par bsten pa rnams la bsngags 'os shing // dad pa rab rgyas bdud rtsi'i rgyun thigs de dag rgyal gyur cig/ mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal du sngon// dben par bzhugs pa'i
326a7(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das// rgyal ba de la mngon phyogs te// mgon med zas sbyin gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan khyod kyi gus pa bzhin// kun du cher 'os yon tan grags// bdag gi bu mo ma ga d+ha// bzang mo dar la bab par gyur// 
326a8(mdo 'grel): grong khyer bu ram shing 'phel gyi// dpal ldan don mthun mgon po'i bu// khyu mchog byin zhes bya ba ni// de yi lag pa 'dzin par 'dod// bcom ldan gal te bzod na bdag/ bu mo de ni de la ster// nor srog khyod kyi dbang 
326b1(mdo 'grel): gyur bdag/ khyod kyi bka' yi rjes su 'brang // deng 'di gsol tshe bcom ldan 'das// dri med mnyes gshin bsam ldan pas// ci skyon bu mo de la ni// sbyin pas mdzod ces bka' stsal to// ston pa'i bka' ni rab bzung 
326b2(mdo 'grel): nas// de la gus pas phyag 'tshal te// dpal ldan mgon med zas sbyin ni// rang gi khang par rab tu song // de nas 'byor pa che dang bcas// bu mo mag dra bzang mo// rin chen gos mang rab ster der// 'os pa de rab tu byin// 
326b3(mdo 'grel): de nas byin pa'i mag d+ha// bzang mo thag ring yul bgrod cing // bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs dran nas// mig ni mchi ma dang bcas gyur// grong khyer bu ram shing 'phel du// yun ring zhig na des sleb nas// rtag tu khro yi 
326b4(mdo 'grel): khyim du ni// bdag po'i bkur stil chags gyur// de nas nam zhig stug mo ni// grangs las 'das pa 'god brtson zhing // zas kyi tshogs rnams stor byed pa// nor can zhes pas de la spras// mag d+ha bzang mchod pa yi// 
326b5(mdo 'grel): byad thams cad chas dag mdzod// 'gro bas mchod bya yon tan can// skye bo mang bar ba dag khyim 'ong // bla ma skye bo thams cad kyis// zhe sa'i gnas su mchod bya ba// kun rmongs zad sbyor zad byed pa// de dag rnams ni 'ong bar 
326b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur// zhes des brjod pa de ni der// dge slong tshogs la mchod pa des// yongs su rtag par shes gyur nas// rtsom pa de la chags par gyur// de nas nyin gzhan khyim du ni// skra dang smar rab 'bal zhing // dka' thub 
326b7(mdo 'grel): drag pos kun nyon mongs// gcer bu zad byed pa rnams zhugs// ma he sran ma rtswa yi zas// goms pas rags par gyur pa bzhin// gos med ngo tsha med de dag/ mag rna bzang gis gzong nas// tha ma'i drung du ngo tsha ste// 
326b8(mdo 'grel): bzhin ni gos kyis rab bsgribs nas// skyo dang chags bral gyis dud pas// sgyug mo'i skye bo la smras pa// gang 'dir phyogs gos rnams kyi yang // mdun du bud med skye bo 'khod// kye ma kun tu spyod pa 'di// shin tu 
327a1(mdo 'grel): yun ring lon nas mthong // mi min rwa dang bral gyur pa// dul ba 'di dag khyed kyi ni// khyim nas gsol byed 'di dag la// bud med ngo tsha med dam ci// gang gis kha zas ma btang ba// de yis gos ni ji ltar 
327a2(mdo 'grel): gtong // ma bsdams rim pa 'di ni ci// khyed ni gnas min dag la gus// sku ni rab tu 'bal ba'i las dag nyid kyi brtse ba med pa drag po bstan// skye bos bcas las mdoms dkris gos dag spangs pas tshul khrims kyi 
327a3(mdo 'grel): ni gtam nyid ci// tshul chos rtsom pa dang ldan 'jigs byed bzhin la khro ba rang nyid rnam par bsten// dul ba dang ldan gcer bu 'di dag phyugs rnams bzhin du zas rnams tshol bar byed// gang na phyugs 'di mchod bya ba// 
327a4(mdo 'grel): de na spang bar bya ba su// yang na 'di ni yul gyi skyon// song ba'i rjes su 'gro ba'i lugs// zhes spras chags bral dang ldan ma// de la sgyug mos lan smras pa// bzang mo khyod kyi yab kyi ni// khang par ji 'dra mchod pa smos// 
327a5(mdo 'grel): des spras bdag gi pa khyim du// snying rjes 'gro ba thams cad ni// khyad 'phags dge ba la sbyor ba'i// bcom ldan rgyal ba mchod par byed// bsam gtan la chags g.yo med spyan ldan mdzes sdug rdzogs pa'i rgya mtsho ste/ 
327a6(mdo 'grel): shangs kyi rgyud ni yangs shing drang po zam stegs dag tu gyur pa 'dzin// rab brkyang mdzes ldan rgyan gyis stong pa'i snyan gyi zhags pa mngon dga' de// mdzes pa nyid kyis mkhas rnams nang du zhi ba ci yang rgyas par byed// bla zer 
327a7(mdo 'grel): ltar mdzes de ni lag gnyis glang chen lag pa'i rnam pa dang // snang ba rab rgyas dbu la lhan skyes rab bkrus rang bzhin nor bu dang // lag mthil du son ri mo dung dang rgyal mtshan chu skyes phreng ba ste// zhi ba'i rang bzhin rgyal srid chen 
327a8(mdo 'grel): po la 'os mtshan nyid rnam par 'dzin// thub chen rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa skyed byed de yi ni// rang bzhin mngon par 'dod pa'i rtag pa kun dang bral ba nyid// dran pa'i sa gzhi bag med gnas ni lhag ma med par byas// chags/ 
327b1(mdo 'grel): pa rab tu btang ba'i mchu ni shin tu dmar dang bcas// grol ba lhag par 'grogs pa'i mdza' gzugs dang ldan byams pa dag ni yid la nyal// bzod pa de yi rang bzhin byed cing brtse ba snying la dam du mnyam par sbyor// yid 'ong / 
327b2(mdo 'grel): mang po la chags kun gyi bsam pa rgyas byed sngon med thub pa ni// de yi zhi ba sngon med bdag nyid chags bral snying po can ni legs par mtshon// tshul khrims dugu la dang ldan// dam pa rnams yid sgrib bral nyid// gang gi 
327b3(mdo 'grel): rab tu byung bas 'dzin// de dag bdag cag khyim du mchod// thams cad bsrung ba'i nor bu gang // dran pa yis kyang srid pa'i sbrul// chags sdang drag po'i mche ldan pas// slar yang skye bo la gnod med// ces pa de tshig rnab 
327b4(mdo 'grel): yi// bcud len zos nas sgyug mo ni// 'bral la rab dang dri ma med// dga' mgu ldan pas de la smras// de ni lta ba'i thabs 'ga' zhig/ mchog gi bzhin ldan yod dam ci// khyod kyi bsod nam pa 'brel pa las// ded 
327b5(mdo 'grel): kyang bdud rtsi'i gnas 'thob pa 'am// zhes pa sgyug mos gus ldan blos// tshul dang mthun par de la zhus// bdag gis khyed la de bstan zhes// gus dang bkur ba ldan mas smras// dam bca' chen po'i tshogs kyi ni// 
327b6(mdo 'grel): khur dag khyer bar 'dod pa yis// srod la mal stan srang la 'dzegs// skad cig bsam gtan bskyangs par gyur// de nas khang bzang la 'dzegs te// bcom ldan ston pa'i phyogs su ni// phyag 'tshal mchod bya mchod 
327b7(mdo 'grel): 'os pa'i// me tog snyim pa rab tu gtor// de yi gnas su mngon phyogs des// me tog bdug pa chus mchod nas// yangs pa'i mig ni kun dga' yis// mchi mas 'gags pas rab smras pa// bcom ldan thugs 
327b8(mdo 'grel): rje 'os pa bdag/ dkon mchog gsum po rnams spangs te// khyod kyi gnas kyi ri dgas bzhin// shin tu thag ring yul 'dir phyin// khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma zung gi skyabs ni thob pa bdag/ ring du gnas par gyur kyang
328a1(mdo 'grel): / spyan gyis reg mdzod brtse ba can// mnyes gshin mnyen pa'i blo ldan chen po rnams kyi thugs rje ni// yul gzhan ring por phyin pa rnams la chung ba nyid mi 'gyur// 'bangs kyi bu mo bdag gi deng // bcom ldan 
328a2(mdo 'grel): khyod ni mgron du gnyer// nang par byon pas bdag la ni// khyab bdag khengs pa gnang bar mdzod// ces pa brjod nas des 'phangs pa// rnam par bkra ba'i me tog phreng // gus pa'i pho nya sog bcas bzhin// nam mkha' 
328a3(mdo 'grel): las ni rab tu song // dkar dang dmar dang ser dang sngon po dag gi me tog phreng // bdug pa'i dubs bkra ba dal gyis mkha' la 'gro ba de// bde sogs bdag po'i gzhu yi 'khri shing yang dag rgyu ba ni// chu 'dzin gzhon nu
328a4(mdo 'grel): dag la rab tu chags bzhin yul ring mdzes// de nas rgyal byed tshal song nas// skad cig gis ni me tog phreng // gus pa dag dang ldan pa de// ston pa'i zhabs pad dag la lhung // bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas kyang // ma ga d+ha 
328a5(mdo 'grel): ni bzang mo yi// 'dod pa kun mkhyen thugs rje yis// kun dga' bo la mngon du gsungs// grong khyer bu ram shing 'phel du// nang par bdag cag 'gro bar bya// mag d+ha bzang dge 'dun dang // bcas pa'i bdag mchod don du
328a6(mdo 'grel): gnyer// 'di nas grong de dpag tshad ni// drug cu lhag pa'i brgya phrag ste// nyi ma phyed kyis 'gro bar bya// 'di la thogs 'khor rigs pa min// gang gang rdzu 'phrul chen po yis// mkha' la 'gro nus mthu ldan pa// de dang de la/ 
328a7(mdo 'grel): khyod kyi ni// mgron du gnyer ba'i tshul shing byin// ces pa bde gshegs kyis bskul des// nyin phyed bgrod pas phyin pa dang // tshul shing gis ni mgron gnyer ba// dge slong rnams la rab tu bshad// rdzu 'phrul che ldan thams/ 
328a8(mdo 'grel): cad kyis// des ni tshul shing blangs pa'i tshe// gang po bum par sngas bya ba// rgan po yis kyang rim par blangs// mthu ni thob pa min pa des// tshul shing dag la lag brkyang tshe// cung zad 'dzum dkar bzhin ras can// kun
328b1(mdo 'grel): dga' bo yis de la smras// mgon med zas sbyin khyim du ni// rkang pa nyid kyis 'gro bya min// dpag tshad drug cu dang bcas brgya// nyin phyed kyis ni bzla bar bya// zhes pa des brjod rgan po ni// skyengs pas bzhin ras rnam par 
328b2(mdo 'grel): dud// bsams te rang gi sde bdun du// dman pa'i dngos po bzod pa dka'// thogs med dus su bsags pa yi// nyon mongs skye dang dga' ba sogs// 'bad pa can gyis gzhom nus na// rdzu 'phrul gnas ni 'thob la ci// 
328b3(mdo 'grel): chags bral drag po'i blo gros kyis// de ltar sems shing dag pa yi// sems ldan de la skad cig gi/ rdzu 'phrul chen po rab tu skyes// de nas mtshan mo 'das gyur te// snga dro dge slong thams cad ni// sna tshogs lha yi chas ldan pa'i 
328b4(mdo 'grel): gzhal yas khang nas mkha' la gshegs// skabs der rtsom pa chen po yi// tshogs kyis yongs su gang gyur pa// bdag po'i khyim na bcom ldan 'das// lta 'dod ma ga d+ha bzang mo// me tog bdug pa'i mchod pa yi// bkod/ 
328b5(mdo 'grel): pa 'dzin la mngon phyogs shing // stug mo gyos po khyo rnams dang // lhan cig khang bzangs la 'dzegs 'khod// de nas rta yi shing ltar gnas// dge slong kun shes go r+t+ti n+ya// rnam mang ngo mtshar rdzu 'phrul ni// mchog ldan dang / 
328b6(mdo 'grel): por rab tu mthong // nyi ma dang mtshungs de mthong nas// ya mtshan gyos sogs dga' ba yis// ma ga d+ha bzang la smras pa// bcom ldan zhes pa 'di'am ci// des smras 'di ni bcom ldan min// dge slong kun shas goN+Di/ 
328b7(mdo 'grel): rgya// 'od zer dman pa min pa 'di// nyi ma dag dang mtshungs par mthong // de nas rim gyis shing rta yis// byon pa'i tshen gyos sogs kyis// bzang mo bcom ldan 'di lam ci// 'di 'am ci zhes rab tu smras// des
328b8(mdo 'grel): smras 'di ni ston pa min// 'di dag de yi bka' la 'os// dge slong rab zhi bsngags par 'os// dka' thub rab 'bar 'od zer dri med can// gser ljon mdzes pas dga' ba ri yi ni// rtse mo la zhon sngon la byon pa gang // ngo 
329a1(mdo 'grel): mthar byed par ni ga zugs na bzhin// dpal ldan da / slong 'di ni 'ad grangs che// chun cang sbyin zab pa'i 'bru ma can// gdang lnga'i shing rta dgul gnas pa gang // mkha' las mngon byon pa'i dge slong 
329a2(mdo 'grel): sal sa kyis bzhugs hU~Ms// gnyis zungs pa'i/ ga du// man gams pas kyang // tsun pa'i ga song 'didi sa rnams// bsod rnams ldan ma chog sod+d+has na 
329a3(mdo 'grel): !// gser ba bain+d+ha d+ha mi gru ba can// rin chen gug sar dgyis mtshan nyon// phyogs ni bzang gis 'gengs byon pa gang // dge slong ni nyidam gags pa zhes chags// gang gis pa'a' ldi la no ga/ shog zung gas 
329a4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin ba tu gastor ba'i 'chi med lam// mgyogs pa rgyas pas rnam par gcod byed pa// dge slong 'di ni byams pa'i bu gang po// zhing stobs chu gnyer che gang mchog gi las// shin tu zhi ba mtha' med dag la gnas// 'di 
329a5(mdo 'grel): kyi bdud rtsis phyogs ni mA sh+tsa s+ho// mthu ldan dag slong 'di ni thul lo// pa kyi la yangs pa'i 'azhi shing ni// rnam pa dag la bas dkris pas mngo dga' zhon/ bsod nams gas la rdugs mngon par ra

329a8(mdo 'grel): bar snang 'dzum rlabs dga' ldan par// byed cing dka' thub gter gang byen pa 'di// dge slong ba lan dbad sA zhes brjod// me tog rab rgyas 'bri shing byas pa yi// nags chal nang na bzhugs shing byon pa gang // mr-i 
329b1(mdo 'grel): dman khyim gyi dpal la ltos med pa'i// dge slong 'di ni rna ba bye bar grags// gser gyi 'od kyis phyogs cha rnam par rgyan// lhun po'i gzugs gzhan bzhin du legs par mtshon// 'khor los sgyur gang mkha' la mdzes pa

329b3(mdo 'grel): dge slong tshogs 'di byon// de ltar de yi rim pas bshad gyur pa'i// dge slong dge 'dun khyad 'phags bzhin mthong nas// gzhan dag mtshon min de dag mtshungs par ni// dga' dang rmad byung gus pa'i dbang nyid gyur// de nas/ 
329b4(mdo 'grel): rab 'bar gser gyi phye ma'i gos// nyi ma brgya ltar gsar pa 'gro la byung // gdung ba'i khyad par ma lus zhi byed pas// bsil zer phreng ba brgya ltar bsil ba yang // de nas nor bdag brgya byin tshangs sogs blon po rnams 
329b5(mdo 'grel): kyis ni// rgya chen nam mkha' 'grod pa bsten cing rjes su bgrod pa phul// 'chi med grong gi bu mos me tog tshogs ni gtor ba las// rgyal ba'i zla ba bsod nams ldan pa rnams kyi mig lam gyur// grong khyer sgo lam bco brgyad 
329b6(mdo 'grel): ldan pa der// mtshungs pa'i sku ni bcu bdun dang bcas pas// rab zhugs ma ga d+ha ni bzang mo'i khyim// zla shel rin chen rdo yi rang bzhin byas// der ni yo byad rdzogs pa rnam mang gis// mngon par mchod cing kun gyis phyag 
329b7(mdo 'grel): 'tshal te// grong pa'i skye bo dag gis kun nas mchod// rtsig par gzugs brnyan snang de phyi nas kyang // bcom ldan brtse ldan dge 'dun dang bcas pas// brtse bas mchod pa blangs nas rjes gzung ni// gzigs pa'i 
329b8(mdo 'grel): cha yis ma ga d+ha bzang mo// gnyen dang bcas pa rnams la bka' drin bsgrubs// ma ga d+ha bzang gyos sogs sde dang bcas// grong pa'i skye bo kun dang bcas pa yang // de tshe ston pa'i bstan pa dag gis ni// de dus 
330a1(mdo 'grel): bden mthong bsam pa dag par gyur// dge bas rjes 'brel ma ga d+ha bzang gi/ bsod nams mthu ni yangs pa mthong gyur nas// dge slong de dag gis der dge mtshan las// de yi sngon byung rgyal ba dag la 
330a2(mdo 'grel): dris// ma ga d+ha bzang dge ba'i rgyu dag ni// tshogs su de dag gis dris bcom ldan 'das// kun gzigs de yis tshems kyi 'od rnams kyis// phyogs sgor snang ba sbyin zhing rab gsungs pa// ba ra t+na si dag tu sngon// 
330a3(mdo 'grel): sa bdag mdzes pa kri ki yi// bum gser phre ba can zhes pa// gser phreng sgra dang ldan pa byung // ston pa 'od srungs zhes pa la// rtag tu gus dang ldan ma des// grogs mo brgya phrag lnga dang ni// lhan cig dag tu rim gro

331b8(mdo 'grel): bshes gnyen dge rtsa ldan// zhi ba bsnyen 'di mche ba las// chu yi tshogs ni 'khrungs par 'gyur// de ltar grags pa'i bshes gnyen gyis// skye ba gzhan la byin pa ni// rgyal bas gsung thos gus pa yi// dge slong rnams/ 
332a1(mdo 'grel): ni ya mtshan gyur// bde ba dri med chus gang zhi ba ni// kha ba'i rlabs ldan rgyal ba bsten pa dag/ thob nas 'khor ba mya ngan thang la ni// yongs 'khyam sred pa'i gtong bar byed// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos

332a3(mdo 'grel): pa dag ni rab spangs nas// 'phral la snying rje'i 'od zer snang ba rab tu rgyas pa yis// skyon sel ci yang yongs su gdud ba dag kyang 'phrog byed pa// sangs rgyas 'od stong ldan pas dam pa'i lam ni ston par byed// grong 
332a4(mdo 'grel): khye rgyal po'i khab na sngon// ka lan da ka'i gnas zhes pa// 'od ma'i tshal na bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bzhugs// grong khyer ded dpon don byin gyi// chung ma rno mo zhes bya ba// bu nyid dag ni 
332a5(mdo 'grel): dus gcig tu// mtshem nyid du byung bar gyur// pa ni lnga pa nyid gyur cing // nor dang 'khor ni zad pa'i tshe// shar ku mtshams byir zhes bya ba// de dag ma yis tshegs kyis bskyed// ma yi tshig gis chom rkun la// rab 
332a6(mdo 'grel): zhugs byis pa de dag gis// khyim bla dag gi nor chung dang // snod rnams dal gyis brlag par byas// ma dang pha yi dul ba yis ni rung ba nyid 'gyur zhing // de yi btang snyoms nyid kyis 'dul ba min pa'i g.yang la lhung // 
332a7(mdo 'grel): rang gi skye ba sngon bskye dpag chags dag dang 'brel pa las// byis pa rnams ni til bzhin gzhan gyi rang bzhin sten par byed// rim gyis de dag cher skyes te// chom rkun dar ba ba nyid du gyur// 'dzeg dang mtshams 'bigs la 
332a8(mdo 'grel): sogs kyis// grong khyer pa yi nor rnams blangs// de dag bya ba nyan rna yis// shes nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras// de dag ma dang bcas pa ni// skad cig nyid kyis gsod par springs// gzhan gyi nor gyi gang zhig za byed 
332b1(mdo 'grel): gang zhig 'thung bar byed// bde ba'i bsam pas yul gyi lam ni gang zhig nyams myong byed// ma dpyad dga' bar bya ba'i ba de la gus pa de nyid ni// smin par gyur pa srog ni nyams byed mi bzad zong dag yin// yul gyi 
332b2(mdo 'grel): btung bas rgyags shing 'khrugs pa rnams kyi chags pa gang // rku dang sreg dang gsod pas thob pa'i nor gyis rab bskyed pa// de ni yongs smin rkang lag bcad dang gsal shing la zhon pas// yongs zags khrag gi rgyun gyis phyi 
332b3(mdo 'grel): rol dag tu 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas gsod pa'i phreng bas mtshan// sngon dmar gos kyis g.yogs de dag/ lta ru 'ongs pa'i skye bos bskur// gsod pa'i gnas su nye bar song // brtse ldan kun mkhyen gyis mkhyen nas// 
332b4(mdo 'grel): rang nyid sa der mngon phyogs te// rjes su gzung ba'i bka' drin gyis// bcings pa dag dang bral bar mdzad// kun mkhyen bka' yis de dag ni// rgyal pos btang zhing sdig pa grol// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa
332b5(mdo 'grel): la// rab tu byung nas bstan pa thob// ye shes 'byor 'bar de dag ni// ma dang bcas pa mthong gyur nas// dge slong gis dris dge mtshan las// de gtam bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// sngon gyi skye ba dag la yang 
332b6(mdo 'grel): 'di dag bdag gis rab tu bsrungs// de tshe 'di dag nyid kyi ma// stag mo 'jigs rung gzugs ldan gyur// de dus byang chub sems dpa' ni// brtse bas lus can rnams kyi gnyen// snying rje'i rdul zhes bya ba yi// sa skyong// 
332b7(mdo 'grel): bur ni nga nyid gyur// nam zhig bkres pas nyen pa yis// phru gu 'di dag za rtsom pa'i// stag mo de ni rang gi lus// byin nas bdag gis rnam par bzlog/ las kyi lhag ma da lta yang // 'di dag chom rkun nyid du gyur// stag mo de ni 
332b8(mdo 'grel): ma 'di ste// 'di dag bdag gis rab tu bsrungs// zhes gsungs bcom ldan thugs rjes yis// rgya mtsho 'byung po la dgongs pa// dge slong tshogs dang bcas pa dag/ rgyal byed tshal du rab tu gshegs// bdud rtsi ro yi 
333a1(mdo 'grel): char bzhin mi 'dod sel// 'dod pa dam pa'i gzigs pa gang lhung bas// lhung ba rnams kyang bsod nams kyis mtho ba'i// bsngags par 'os par mdzad pa rgyal gyur cig/ ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i 
333a2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ sgeg mo la lus byin pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / zla ba kun dga' nyi ma'i rab gsal dang // me yi tsha ba rlung 
333a3(mdo 'grel): gi mgyogs pa dang // snying rje la dga' skye bo che rnams kyi// gzhan la phan pa lhan skyes rang bzhin yin// 'phags rgyal skyed mos tshal du mngon// rgyal po dpal ldan 'char byed ni// rtse dga'i ro dang ldan pa dag/ btsun
333a4(mdo 'grel): mor bcas pa rnam par gnas// de yi mdzes ma ut+pal mig/ me tog zu la chags pa rnams// thub pa brgya phrag lnga rnams ni// 'dod dgar 'ongs pa dag gis mthong // phrag dog khro ba skyong ba des// dga' bar mig bkod de 
333a5(mdo 'grel): dag rnams// rkang lag bcad pa'i khrag gis ni// 'dam la nyal ba dag tu byas// mi bzad gnad bcad tshe de yis// gzir cing cho nge ldan de dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan thugs rje yis// sdum pa'i spyan gyis rab tu 
333a6(mdo 'grel): gzigs// de yi gzigs pa bdud rtsi yi// char ltar reg pas de dag rnams// srog bzung rkang lag legs par 'byar// gdung ba dang bral yang dag langs// de nas rab rdzogs de dag la// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos
333a7(mdo 'grel): bstan mdzad// gang gis myur du de dag rnams sa// phyir mi 'ong 'bras dar ba thob// de mthong dge slong mtshar bcas pas// dris shing bcom ldan rgyal ba yis// gsungs pa sngon yang 'di dag rnams// bdag gis brtse/ 
333a8(mdo 'grel): ba nyid kyis bzung // ba ra NI si dag tu sngon// rgyal po tshangs byin dag gis ni// 'byed byed sdig pa byas pa yi// blon po lnga brgya nges par bskrad// rgyal pos 'jigs pas yang dag gdung // mya ngam lam du bgrod de 
333b1(mdo 'grel): dag/ so ga grib ma chu med par// mi bzad skob pas lhung bar gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gnyis 'thung che// bzang po zhes pas de dag mthong // de dag tshe de'i 'das phug nas// snying rjes gdung ba dang bcas gyur// chu dang 
333b2(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba 'bras ster des// ring po ring po dag nas chu// lag pa shin tu che bas blangs// de dag skom pa dang bral byas// de yi dga' bas rtag tu ni// srog gi gzungs dag nges par bstan// rgya che ngal ba rab zhi ba// de dag der ni ngal 
333b3(mdo 'grel): bsos thob// de nas dus kyis so ldan pa// lus ni btang ba de nyid kyi// lus dag sbyangs nas de dag gis// lha la 'os pa'i mchod pa byas// dgon par bdag ni glang po yis// sdug bsngal de las blon po ni// sngon bsgral de/ 
333b4(mdo 'grel): dag la lta yang // thub pa 'di dag gi mi 'dod las// zhes pa gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das// sems can kun sgrol brtul zhugs can// thub pa'i tshogs kyis mchod byed cing // rang gi dka' thub nags su gshegs// 
333b5(mdo 'grel): ston pa'i thugs rje bdud rtsi'i chu bo ni// ma lus bde dang dge ba'i pho nya ste// srid pa'i mya ngan gdung bsil grib ma dang // ma bzhin skyed par byed pa rgyal gyur cig/ ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i/ 
333b6(mdo 'grel): rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ glang po'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // rnam sdang skyon gyi dug gis yid ni sun phyugs gyur rnams kyi// dam pa dag la gnod pa sgrub la 'bad
333b7(mdo 'grel): pa rab rdo gang // de nyid gal te de yi yon tan rab 'bar rjes byed par// gyur na srid 'dir su zhig rgya cher gnod dang ldan par 'gyur// rgyal ba rgyal po'i khab dang nye// 'od ma'i tshal na rgyu ba na// lhas byin gyis ni sdang bas sngon// 
333b8(mdo 'grel): rab tu bskul ba'i dka' thub pa// de yis byin pa'i mtshon cha can// smin 'khyog 'jigs su rung ba'i bzhin// khro bas dul ba nyams gyur pa'i// rtsom pa chen pos mngon par gtses// brgya phrag lnga yi dka' thub can// de
334a1(mdo 'grel): bab// dag gis 'phangs mtshon gyi char// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la ni// pad+ma ut+pal tshogs nyid gyur// dam pa rnams la rnon po yi// mtshon yang 'jam pa sten byed de// sdang ba'i dug gis byugs gyur pa// sdig pa can 
334a2(mdo 'grel): gyi sems ni min// ston pa'i sku ni sgrib byed pa// nor bu'i rang bzhin khang pa brtsegs// nam mkha'i 'od ni rab 'khrungs te// lta bdag ni bzlog ma gyur// de nas dka' thub cen de dag/ ngal zhing ngo tsha bzhin dud pas// 
334a3(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i rgya mtsho rab dang ba// ston pa yi ni zhabs la gtugs// bcom ldan gyis kyang bu la bzhin// rab tu dang ldan de dag la// gnod byed la yang khro med pas// chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad// chen po rnams kyi yid ni// 
334a4(mdo 'grel): 'khrus pa'i rnam 'phrul med pa yi// bde dang zhi ba la brten bsod nams bzod pa dag gi chu// dri med bsil ba dag dang ldan pa phan mi 'jug pa ni// de thob khro ba'i rdul gyis rnyog pa dag tu yong mi 'gyur// snyan pas chos 
334a5(mdo 'grel): bstan rab byung gis// bsam pa rab phyis de dag gis// zag pa kun lus rnam grol ba'i// dgra bcom nyid ni rab tu thob// skabs der 'ongs pa'i dge slong ni// gtam de thos shing ngo mtshar dang // bcas pas 'di ci 
334a6(mdo 'grel): zhes pa dris// rgyal bas de dag la gsungs pa// sngon gyi skye ba dag la yang // shin tu gnod byas 'di dag la// rnam 'gyur med pa bdag gis ni// rab tu dang bas nges par bltas// rgya mtsho dag tu 'gro ba la// gzings 
334a7(mdo 'grel): ni chag par gyur tshe sngon// 'di dag kA shi'i yul skyes pa'i// tshe ngabs srog la the tshom thob// de la bdag ni rus sbal gyis// rgyab tu bkod nas rab tu bsgral// 'tsho ba thob cing pha rol tu// phyin nas ngal bsos rnam
334a8(mdo 'grel): par bsten// rab tu bsgral bas yongs ngal te// bdag ni skad cig gnyid log che// bdag sha za 'dod de dag rnams// thams cad bdag ni gsod par brtson// rdo yo char chen rab spros kyang // khog pa rab tu bstan 
334b1(mdo 'grel): ldan zhing // gong bu'i dbyibs can bdag gi ni// lus ni dag cing nyams ma gyur// de nas bkres pas yongs nyen te// mthong nas snying rjes bdag 'khrugs pas// rang gi de dag rnams la lus// byin nas bya ba byas nyid gyur// 
334b2(mdo 'grel): sngon gyi tshong pa de dag ding // dka' thub can ni 'di dag gyur// gnod pa byas kyang snying rje yis// bdag gis dge ba dag la bkod// de dag sngon tshe bdag nyid che// ston pa 'od srungs bstan pa la// rab byung thob nas de yi 
334b3(mdo 'grel): 'bras// da lta skal ldan dag tu skyes// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa 'di// thos nas dge slong rnams kyis ni// de yi bzod pas gzhi bzhin// khur dag bzod pa rab tu bsngags// gang zhig tshul khrims dri med 
334b4(mdo 'grel): bsil ba'i chu ldan sems can bsam pa dbugs 'byin byed// khon gyi rdul ni rab tu dag byed bzod pa'i chu bo sems la rtag gnas pa// de dag bzlog dka' dgra yi gnod la khro ba'i me 'bar phreng bas rnam bslad par// 
334b5(mdo 'grel): sred par rab bskyed rgya cher gdung bas yongs 'dris rnam 'gyur dag tu 'gyur ma yin// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ rus sbal gyi rtogs 
334b6(mdo 'grel): pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // rigs kyi ri ba dag gi rtse mo shin tu mtho ba dang // dma' zhing mi gtsang tshogs dang phyag dar khrod kyis gang bar yang // nyin mo 'dren pa'i snang ba mtshungs par phan 
334b7(mdo 'grel): byed bdag nyid can// 'di ni bye brag med par 'jug par nges par 'bab pa nyid// grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu sngon// 'od ma'i tshal bzhugs rgyal ba la// mu ge'i tshe na bkres pa yis// yongs nyen gyad rnams skyabs su song // / 
334b8(mdo 'grel): snying rje'i dpag bsam rkang 'thung gis// mngon par 'dod pa'i zas byin nas// gnas skabs ngan pa zhi ba'i slad// de dag rnams la chos bstan mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes gzung gis// dge ba rgyas pa thob pa 
335a1(mdo 'grel): rnams// dgra bcom gnas ni thob gyung nas// 'gro bas mchod bya nyid du gyur// dman pa shin tu mthor gyur pa// de mthong grong khyer gnas pa rnams// rtag tu de dag rigs la ni// smod cing phrag dog ldan par gyur// 
335a2(mdo 'grel): kye ma dag pa'i bstan pa la// bcom ldan 'das kyis kla klo'i gyad// 'os min rnams la dgra bcom gnas// nges par bstan zhes de dag smras// chung ngu 'byor pa mi chung la// gsar pa'i spro dga' mi bzod pa'i// skye bo ngo tsha 
335a3(mdo 'grel): skyed byed pa'i// skye ba mchog tu rab gsal byed// rgyal ba'i bka' yis sgra mi snyan// gling du mkha' las 'gro 'ong byas// mthu yis gyad ni de dag rnams// mi bdag skye bor bcas pas mchod// de dag grong pas phyag byas te// 
335a4(mdo 'grel): rab dang bkur byas de dag rnams// rang yon yon tan mchod 'os pas// dge slong rnams kyi mchog nyid gyur// de nas de mthus ya mtshan pa'i// dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan la// de yi bsod nams rgya mtshan dris// 
335a5(mdo 'grel): de la thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs// sngon gyi skye bar kA sha yi// yul mtha' dka' thub tshal du bdag/ mngon shes lnga ldan dka' thub can// dge ba'i ngang tshul zhes par gyur// der ni rdzong gi gyad 'di dag/ sngon tshe 
335a6(mdo 'grel): thub pa dag tu gyur// bdag gis dge bstan de dag rnams// mngon shes lnga pa nyid du gyur// skye ba 'di yang bsod nams de'i// bag chags goms pa'i dga' ba yis// gyad 'di rnams ni 'khor ba yi// nyon mongs 
335a7(mdo 'grel): dag las bdag gis bsgral// 'di dag rnams sngon ston pa ni// 'od srungs drung du rab byung ste// rgyal po'i gnas su gnas par gyur// de yis da lta gyad nyid gyur// ces pa gyad rnams dag gi ni// skye ba sngar byung bcom ldan 
335a8(mdo 'grel): 'das// thams cad gzigs pas gsungs pa dag/ thos nas dge slong ya mtshan gyur// gza' yi bdag po'i snang bas rjes gzung bas// mun pa'i tshogs kyi rnam par zum gyur pa'i// 'dam skyes chu dang bcas pa rnams 
335b1(mdo 'grel): dag kyang // mkhas pa cod pan dungs nyid du 'gyur // zhes pa dge ba'i dbang bas byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i nags pa sad pa dpagapas bkyi kri shing las/ dga' thub pa'i rtags pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab sed gu 
335b2(mdo 'grel): bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // lus can lus dang de bzhin yid kyi ni// sred pa'i rang bzhin nad chen 'phrog byed pa// 'jig rten kun gyi 'jig rten pa ral gnyen// sangs rgyas bcom ldan bdud rtsi'i gter nyid do// mnyan/ 
335b3(mdo 'grel): yid du sngon bcom ldan 'das// rgyal ba'i gzigs pa bdud rtsi yis// bye ban kyis gzing rnams dang // dge slong chags kyangasas par mdzad// mnyes gshin gyis ni ya mtshan pa'i// dge slong tshogs la de gsung 
335b4(mdo 'grel): sngon gyi skye ba dag la yang // bdag gis khyed rnams bsas par byas// bdag ston paraNAs na// mi bdag padra can zhes pa// gzing ba thams cad sel la chags// skye dgu'i ba dang mtshungs par gyu / 
335b5(mdo 'grel): nam zhig ga rnam gyi sbyin gyis ni// yul dang dus rnam bzad las// thong pa rnams la bzod dka' ye// nad ni rab turgyas par byung // dran pa ldan gyi tshogs dang ni// ni dang shes pa'i ltur ba las// bdag gis 
335b6(mdo 'grel): bran tshigs bsgrubs byas pa// de dag bsos pa nyid mgyung // de dag na ni bzlag pa la// nya can ngog tags pa// mtshan nyid shes pa'i sman pas bstan// nyabs 'ga' yang thob mabyung// nyid med pas skye ba rnams// 
335b7(mdo 'grel): gr-ig sa the tsho masbyor che bdag/ de dag tshang mi bzad pas// sdug bsngal gyis gzeng snyed rjelas// nad bathun la pan 'os pa// r-i hrI ng+ka li kar ni bdag/ b+hur ces smon lam btu la zhugs kyis// bag mangs nas sus dag 
335b8(mdo 'grel): 'phangs// gzir ba'i smon lam de yis ni// chu ba bA ra dag gi chur// gad cig gis bdag ra hi ta'i// nyani shin tu chen por gyur// de yi nya ni nyer sbyar bas// grong khyer na gnas de dag kun// bdud rtsi yis ni gang pa bzhin/ 
336a1(mdo 'grel): 6// 'phral la bsos pa nyid dugung // de nyid dge slong byed rnams te// de ring bdag gis nad las bsngal// sems can rnams kyi rang bskyabs pas// rtag tu bdag ni rad dang bral// bde gshegs 'khor ba'i nad 
336a2(mdo 'grel): kyis ni// sman pas de skad gsungs pa dag/ dge slong bsos pa de dag gis// thos nas dga' mgu rangs pa thob// shin tu chung ba'i rtswa dang mtshungs pa yis// lus dang byin pa gang la rtse dga' can// gzhan pa na yid dang / 
336a3(mdo 'grel): bral ba min rnams kyis// snying stobs bcas paci yang rnam par gsal// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ pad+ma can gyi rdzogs pa brjod 
336a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// / gang gi bsam par tha med byang chub 'dod// bdud rtsi'i bo nya dang po tha tshes bzhin// bsod nams kyis nigs du 'jug byed pa// snying stobs rgya mtsho su zheg der phyag 'o 
336a5(mdo 'grel): rkyal byed tshal bzhugs rgyal ba la// dpal ldan ko sa ma yi dbang // gsal rgyal dge mtshan la chags shing // rab tu btud pas sngor zhus pa// khyed kyi yang dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub bag chags dang po ni// sngon gyi skye ba 
336a6(mdo 'grel): gang la skyes// 'od zer rgya che bcom ldan gsungs// sa bdag gis 'di dris de la// tshems kyi 'od zer yid kyi rdzing // gtsang ma'i ngang pa'i phreng ston cing // bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa// grong khyer 'od ldan dag tu 
336a7(mdo 'grel): sngon// rab gsalas bdag gter du ni// gang tshe bdag gyur de che bdag/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub blo gros gyur// glang po chags ldan grang mo la// dga' ba'i zhags pas rab tu drangs// gnas su 'khyams nas gang gi tshe// 
336a8(mdo 'grel): da ni nye bar 'ongs gyur pa// de tshe glang chen sna chen po// kun tu bgrod kyis de la smras// sa bdag bdag gi bslab pa yis// glang po dag ni rab tu 'ongs// 'dod chags kyis ni yang dag drangs// dul ba brjed pa'i glang po 'di// 
336b1(mdo 'grel): yon tan dkyil 'khor yid bstan pa// nges par rnam 'gyur dag tu gyur// lus 'dzin 'dod chags dran pas rab bskyed dran 'phrog bstan pa 'joms pa ni// me dang nyi ma min pas gdung zhing dmod pa min pas dmyal bar byed// 
336b2(mdo 'grel): long dang mtshan mo min pa'i rab rib lag 'gro'i rdzas min mi bzad dug/ chang min myos byed dma' rin ltung byed 'byung po min pa'i sgo byed do// zhes pa kun bgrod kyis smras che// de la mi bdag gis smras pa// chags bral yul la chags 
336b3(mdo 'grel): med pa// 'ga' zhig 'khor ba na yod dam// zhes pa sa yi bdag pos dris// kun tu bgrod kyis de la smras// 'gro ba 'di na de bzhin gshegs// 'khor ba med pa 'dod chags bral// dam pa'i snod dang yon
336b4(mdo 'grel): tan can// sems can kun la phan mdzad pa// rgyal po sangs rgyas sgron ma yi// 'od kyis thams cad gsal bar mdzad// de dag thos nas sa yi bdag/ mchog tu rab dang sems ldan pa'i// snying la rdzogs pa'i/ 
336b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub kyi// bag chags 'phral la rab tu 'khrungs// sngon gyi bsod nams mthu yis ni// dge ba rgyas pa yang dag thob// de yis yang dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub thob slad smon lam byas// de ni sngon gyi skye 
336b6(mdo 'grel): ba la// rdza mkhan khyim bdag ces par gyur// de yis dbul tshe gus pa yis// bu ram zan gyis rgyal ba mchod// de yi bsod nams smon lam gyis// rab gsal nyid thob de yi ni// sems la byang chub myu gu bskrun// 
336b7(mdo 'grel): da lta ba dag la 'bras 'di grub// dang po dag pa'i byang chub sems bskyed pa// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa de ni der// bdud rtsi bzhin du thos pa'i khyor ba yis// ko sa la dbang des 'thungs rgyal sar song // 
336b8(mdo 'grel): zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ bsod nams rab gsal gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya pa'o// // gang zhig skyed byed tsha
337a1(mdo 'grel): zer ldan pa rgyu ba'i zhabs ni nye bar bsten pa 'dzin// gang gis ma ni tho rangs snang ba mchod 'os rtag par rgyun tu rab gsal 'char// skye bo thams cad dga' ba'i snga dro zhing nyin mo dag la bsngags par 
337a2(mdo 'grel): 'os// de yi rjes 'brang 'jig rten 'di 'am gzhan du 'gar yang mun pas reg mi 'gyur// sa dbang zas gtsang grags pa lhag ma yi// gnas skabs gyur tshe de yi lus la ni// de bzhin gshegs pa dag mchog gsal 
337a3(mdo 'grel): mdzad pas// gus pas mchod mdzad mchod rten dag kyang mdzad// dben pa'i spyong tshul 'jig rten thun mong men// ji ltar bzhed par 'jig rten lam 'jug pa// de la the tshom ya mtshan gyis gang ba'i// dge slong tshogs 
337a4(mdo 'grel): kyis mngon du phyogs te dris// mi nyams bla na med pa'i byang chub gnas// chags pa spangs pas 'jig rten spyod btang ba// 'gro ba'i bla khyod bla ma la gus pas// tha snyad spyod la 'jug pa 'di ni ci// bcom ldan chos 
337a5(mdo 'grel): gzigs dag gis der gsungs pa// dge ba'i gnas su gyur pa lus ngag gi/ nur gyur pa ma dag ni mkhas rnams kyi// tha ma yis kyang mchod 'os zhe sar 'os// dang por mtha' dag bsod nams la 'dug pa'i// pha ma gang gI 
337a6(mdo 'grel): rtag tu mi mchod pa// de dag chos kyang chos min nyid 'gyur zhing // ye shes snang ba nag po nyid du 'gyur// skye ba gzhan la gus dang zhes yis// dka' thub la zhugs pa ma long ba dag/ khyim la chags btang ba dag gis mchod
337a7(mdo 'grel): ba yis// lha bzhin rtag pa nyid du mnyes par byas// kA shi'i grong du gnyis skyes gnyen bcas kyi// chung mgau ta mi ka zhes la sngon// rigs ni dag cing gtsang bar byed pa'i bu// blo ldan rdzobasangs can zhes bya ba byung // khyod shugs 
337a8(mdo 'grel): de dag rgas pas long ba thob// bu la khyim bkod nags mtha' dag tu song // mkhas pa rnams ni rga ba 'jug pa na// dben pa mchog tu dar ba nyid du gyur// de dag bu ni kun spyod yon tan gyis// rgyal pos 'dun na 'don du rab 
337b1(mdo 'grel): zhus kyang // pha ma'i mchod pal chags lang tsho can// bsod nams dka' thub nags der de tshe song // mkhas pa de yis 'bad pas rtsa ba dang // 'bras bu dang bcas pas rim gro byas// chog shes yid ni rab tu dang ba skyes// 
337b2(mdo 'grel): de yi pha ma dag gis rab dga' thob// de nas nam zhig rngon la rtse ba yis// de dag bsti gnas dang nye chu klung 'gram// ma he gnyis 'thung dbang gis mi dman pa'i// sa der mi yi bdag po tsharas byin 'ongs// skabs der der ni ri 
337b3(mdo 'grel): dgas pags pas mtshan// chus gang bum pa len pa'i sngo bsangs can// ri dgas don gnyer rgyal pos ring po nas// rna ba'i bar du drangs pa'i mda' yis bsnun// mi srun tshig gis bzhin du mda' rnon ni// bde med las kyis 
337b4(mdo 'grel): nye bar gnas pa de// gnad du zug pas drag tu phug pa des// rnam par g.yo zhing dal gyis rab smras pa// kye ma shin tu 'phags pa min pa su// snying rje'i bsam pa med pas rgyu med du// sdig pa ma spyad bya min la chags nas/ srog 
337b5(mdo 'grel): ni 'phrog par byed pa'i mda' 'di 'phangs// nags na pha ma'i lus 'dzin du gnas pa// mig rab nyams pa'i dbyig par gyur pa bdag/ kyi hud bsad tshe re med de dag bsad// gsum gsod drag po'i 'bad 'di su zhig gi/ zhes 
337b6(mdo 'grel): pagadung bas 'khrul sgra bram ze de// sma ra'i ri mo gsar chags mi bdag gis// bur ba dang bcas tsU ta gsar pa dag/ shing mkhan dag gis bcad bzhin mdun du mthong // bla ma'i nyon mongs khyad par bsam pas gdung // 
337b7(mdo 'grel): 'bar ba'i me rtse lta bur spyod pa'i mda'// sgros mtshan srog gi mi mthun phyogs gyur pa// gser gyi ltong can snying la 'dzin byed cing // chu klung ngogs na 'gre ldog byed pa de// mthong nas mi dbar brtan pa rab tu nyams// gzi byin 
337b8(mdo 'grel): bral ba rang gi mda' de yis// bsnun pa bzhin du rgya che gdung bar gyur// de la des spras thub pa ri dgas kyi// pags pas lus stod g.yogs pa khyod ni bdag/ rab tu rmongs bcom mo dam pa kye// bdag nyid gnod pa'i me 
338a1(mdo 'grel): yis gzhom mi 'os// zhes pa rgyal po gzir ba'i tshig thos nas// ral pa'i tshogs bkra ga zhon nu rang bzhin gyis// khro med yid ldan snying stobs gter gyis ni// drag por gdung ba bzod byas de la smras// rgyal po dka' 
338a2(mdo 'grel): thub mod pas 'jigs don med// khro bral ba dag dang bdag gi pa ma dag/ lor ba srog 'brog gnod pa 'di la yang // khyod la dmod pa dag ni 'dor mi 'gyur// srid par srog chags rang gis byas pa'i las// 'khrul med 
338a3(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu can rnams dus su ni// bde dang sdug bsngal yon tan rgyas pa dang // skyon dang dmod pa gsod pa'i slad du 'gyur// gang zhig la ma nas dal gyis 'gro ba ltung zhing lus ni rab tu nyams pa 'thob// gang zhig lam 'bras/ 
338a4(mdo 'grel): g.yang sar yongs su 'khyams shing rgyug pa nyams pa med par 'jug/ gang zhig lan gcig ma yin mkhas pa nyams shing dpal bsten le lo can// las kyi ri mo rtsig pa med par bdag nyid kun gyis bkod de rnam par bkra/ 
338a5(mdo 'grel): bdag gi chu bram phye ma med pa 'di// pha ma skom pas gzir la 'tsho bar ni// gzhung bzang la brten brtse bas blun pa'i blos// myur bar song ste khyod kyis sbyin par bya// zhes pa mgrin pa'i bar du srog rgyu zhing // dbugs 
338a6(mdo 'grel): brtsegs ngal bas sgra bsgribs chung ngur brjod// bzhin ni phyi rol phyogs pa'i mda' dag la// thub pa des ni skyengs pa ston bzhin mdzad// de nas sa dbang mchog tu rab gdung bas// bum pa blangs nas de dag bste/ 
338a7(mdo 'grel): gnas phyin// rgan rgon bu cig ldan pa de dag mthong // de dag gam du 'gro bar yong ma nus// ring nas rdog skra dag la rna gtod cing // mdza' bas rab tu 'dod ldan bu zhes pa// smra ba de dag la ni nyer btud de// dmod pas// 
338a8(mdo 'grel): nyams pa mi 'dod rgyal pos smras// glang chen myos pa'i tshul gyis a mra'i shing // 'joms bzhin gang gis gzhon nu rab bcom pa// skyes mchog 'khri shing dag gi sta re sbub// rdeg pa'i skal ldan bdag ni khyed sras min// 
338b1(mdo 'grel): bdag gi mda' yis lus bcom khyod kyi sras// de ni sdug bsngal gyur nas chu 'gram nyal// sdig pa'i gdung ba che las tsha grang dang // bcas pa'i dmod drag bdag gi spyi bor dor // nor 'dzin bdag pos de skad brjod tsam 
338b2(mdo 'grel): las// rdo rjes bcom bzhin brtan pa nyams de dag/ shin tu bzod dka' mya ngan las 'jigs bzhin// rab tu che ba rmongs pa'i phug nar zhugs// de nas rgyal pos chu grang gtor de dag/ ji zhig ltar stes 'du shes cha 
338b3(mdo 'grel): shas thob// sa bdag khyod kyi bdag cag pu drung du// khrid ces snying rjes rab smra ba de dag smra// de nas de yis chu klung nye bar khrid// gleng dang sgron med nye bar bying gyur pas// lag pas mda' bsnun bu la reg byas nas// de 
338b4(mdo 'grel): yi mda' yis phrag bzhin de dag 'gyel// bu cig bla ma dag la mnyes gshin yang // pa margan long mgo med btang nas ni// ci slad blo brar mtho ris khyod 'gro zhes// de dag gis ni de la dam 'khrud smras// bu khyod me yi sbyin 
338b5(mdo 'grel): sreg la dga' zhing // bla ma'i lha dang ldan pas bdag cag ni// zol med gus pa'i mchod pas mnyes byas pa'i// bden pa des khyod zug rngu med gyur cig/ ces pa bla ma dag gi snying stobs rdzogs// snying rjes gzir ba'i 
338b6(mdo 'grel): bden tshig brjod tsam las// brgya byin mngon phyogs bdud rtsis bran pa yis// gzhon nu rma dang bral zhing bsos par byas// bdag ni de tshe der gus brtul zhugs can// thub pa'i gzhon nu sngo ba sangs can der gyur// 
338b7(mdo 'grel): shAkya'i rigs 'khrungs mchod bya bdag gi yang // 'bad nas mcho dbya ba ma de dag go/ de ltar rnam mang chos kyi rtsa ba ni// bde gshegs kyis gsungs dge slong gis thos nas// bla ma bsten pa'i brtul zhugs dang 
338b8(mdo 'grel): mtshungs pa// dam pa'i spyod pa gzhan dag med par sems// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ sngo bsangs can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i 
339a1(mdo 'grel): yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa gcig pa'o// // brtan pa'i sbyin pas skye bo dman pa rnams kyi gdung ba sel// tshul khrims kyis ni skye bo dam pa'i yid dag tshim par byed// shes rab stobs kyis kyang ni dben pa dang / 
339a2(mdo 'grel): bral gti mug 'phrog/ brtson 'grus kyis ni 'jigs su ring ba'i 'jigs pa bzlog par byed// chos kyi bka' yis mnyan yod na// dge ba sems can la ston cing // rgyal ba rgyal byed tshal bzhugs la// dge slong 
339a3(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis sngon dris pa// bcom ldan khyod kyis brgya byin dang // sa bdag gzugs can snying po dang // dge slong kun shes kau N+Ti n+ya// bden pa mthong ba dag la bkod// de yi zhar la lha rnams ni// 'dum phrag gnyis dang de 
339a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin du// khri phrag bzhi yis bden pa ni// mthong ba'i snod nyid rab tu thob// kun la phan mdzad khyod kyi 'di// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin nam// yon tan bsod nams rjes 'gro ma// skye bar goms pa'i rab dang yin// 
339a5(mdo 'grel): dge slong rnams kyis 'di brjod gsan// bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa// bdag gi blo gros gzhan phan la// goms pas lhan cig skyes pa nyid// skye ba 'dir bdag sems can la// phan par dga' ba ci zhig mtshar// 
339a6(mdo 'grel): rtag tu goms las seng+ge dang // glang sogs skye bar 'di la 'gyur// sngon tshe ded dpon lho phyogs pa// drag pos 'brangs pa'i bud med dang // don mthun 'bum phrag gnyis rjes 'brang // chu gter dag gi ngogs su phyin// 
339a7(mdo 'grel): de dus dus ni gzhan pa bzhin// 'gro ba za ba la chags pa// 'jigs rung lus rgyas sbrul chen ni// pham pa zhes pa byung bar gyur// skye ba kun gyi nyon mongs kyi// skrag pa bzhin du bzod dka' de// mthong nas brtan pa rnam
339a8(mdo 'grel): par nyams// de dag dkrugs pa bzhin du gyur// gdengs can de yi lus kyis ni// lam dag kun nas bskor ba'i tshe// bsam bral dus kyi kha skor gnas// de dag rnams kyis tshe nge bton// ma lus lha rnams bstod pa 
339b1(mdo 'grel): yis// skyabs pa'i grwa ldan de dag gi/ tshe de phyogs kun khyab byed pa// snying rje'i lhani rgyas par gyur// de nas se de'i dgrag gnas// grags pa'i ral can zhes pa dang // de yi grogs po glang po che// man d+ha ra yi sar+b+ba de 
339b2(mdo 'grel): thos// rgyud pa skyob pa la chags shing // yid ni zhing rjes drangs gyur pa// don mthun skyob la dus byas pa'i// bstan pa de dag 'ongs par gyur// de nas klung chen po yi// lus can dag la seng+ge zhon// shugs kyis 
339b3(mdo 'grel): bstan nas sbrul chen ni// srog dang bral ba dag tu byas// de yi srog ni 'gro dus su// dbugs kyi rlung ni sreg byed dag/ rab tu 'bar bas seng+ge dang // glang po dag ni thal bar byas// de nas de dpon de rnams kyis// de dag 
339b4(mdo 'grel): lus la mchod pa'i slad// mchod rten byas nas de dag gi/ grags pa dang 'grogs phyogs su song // nga nyid de tshe don mthun la// srog ster seng+ge dag tu gyur// lhas byin dag ni sbrul chen te// sha ri'i bu ni glang po che// snying stob 
339b5(mdo 'grel): zla ba de yi spyod pa legs byas rab tu gsal// kun la phan par byed mkhas grags shing chen po dag tu 'os// rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag thos nas dpa 'a thob gyur pa'i// dge slong de dag rnams kyis tshig gi so sor 
339b6(mdo 'grel): rab tu bsngags// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtog pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ se ne'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa gnyis pa'o// / do shal rab gsapa 
339b7(mdo 'grel): gos mchog cod pan dang // gdugs dang rnga yab dkar pos 'dzum pa'i dpal// mchog gi longs spyod gal bzang dga' sngon gyis// bdag nyid chen po'i legs byas gsal bar byed// chos kyi 'byor pa rab rgyas pa'i// mthuni 
339b8(mdo 'grel): rgyas par mthong ba las// ya mtshan dge slong tshogs la ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gsungs pa// skye ba gzhan la tha med kyi// ye shes gzi byin ma thob kyang // bdag la ngo mtshar bcas pa'i dpal// legs byas gsal 
340a1(mdo 'grel): bar byed pa byung // byang gi phyogs kyi grong khyer dag/ rdo rje can zhes bya bar ni// rgyal po phyag na rdo rje bzhin// rdo rje gtum po zhes par gyur// grong khyer gang gi bdag tu ni// sa bdag lhun po btul nas de'i/ 
340a2(mdo 'grel): bu mo snar ma zhes bya ba// de thob bdud rtsi'i zer gyis bzhin// de yis de la bu dag ni// nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs pa bskyed// gang la nor bu'i gdugs dag ni// bkra ba lhan cig skyes pas mdzes// de yi bsod nams mthu 
340a3(mdo 'grel): yis ni// rtag tu bsams pas nyer gnas pa// lha yi rgyan dang longs spyod dag/ grong khyer pa yis nyams myong gyur// longs spyod dga' ba'i gong bu des// gang phyir grong khyer yongs btang ba// de phyir sa bdag sras de ni// / 
340a4(mdo 'grel): dga' ba'i bong bu zhes par gyur// pha yi mjug tu rgyal srid thob// grags pa rgyas de phyogs rnams su// 'byung po kun la rang 'dod kyi// longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa bstan// blon po blo ngan blo ngan zhes// bya ba de 
340a5(mdo 'grel): la chags bral gyur// yon tan can la sdang ba ni// bdag nyid dam pa'i rang bzhin yin// de yi ma mes sa bdag ni// ldan po springs yig rnams kyis des// sngon gyi gnod pa dran pa yis// g.yul la mngon par phyogs/ 
340a6(mdo 'grel): par byas// khro ba mchog tu rab 'bar ba// 'phral la rgyas shing gsod brtson de// stobs rab rgyas pas pho nya springs// bu mo'i bu la rab bstan pa// bu mo'i bu khyod dgra yi bu// bdag nyid ngan pa khyod kyi phas// dkyil 
340a7(mdo 'grel): 'khor nyams pa khyod byas nas// grags pa bzhin du bu mo phrogs// ma nyams sa 'di rang 'dod kyis// stsol cig gal te ma yin na// rang nyid 'ongs khyod mtha' 'khob tu// skyabs pa'i mgron du bdag gis bya// ma mes gyis 
340a8(mdo 'grel): ni rab bstan pa// de dag thos nas sa yi bdag/ skye bo rlag la snying rje bas// de la dang bar byed du song // dmag dpung ring zhing g.yul gyi ni// sdums la chas des gru dag gi/ gang gA'i 'gram na gnas pa yi// ma mes grong / 
340b1(mdo 'grel): khyer dag tu phyin// blon po g.yog sde dang bcas pa// de yi kun rtog rtse dga' yis// lha yi zas ni rab 'khrungs pa// sa bdag lhun pos mthong gyur nas// 'di ni lha zhes nges byas te// rang nyid de yi drung song nas// mchi/ 
340b2(mdo 'grel): ma zag cing mgrin par bzung // rin chen kun gyis rab tu mchod// de yis gus pas mchod pa des// rang gi grong khyer phyin nas ni// 'jam gling skye bo lha yi ni// longs spyod lhar bcas lhag par bsgrubs// de spyod phran 
340b3(mdo 'grel): tshogs la mtshen te// dge slong gis dris rgyal ba ni// kun mkhyen gyis kyang de dag la// de yi phun tshogs rgyu mtshan gsungs// ba ra NA sir skye gzhan de// bram ze rtsu ba can zhes gyur// de yis nad kyis gzir ba yis// 
340b4(mdo 'grel): rang sangs rgyas la sman dag ni// bsos pa'i mtshams la thug par byas// gdung ba gang la gdungs kyang bzung // bsod nams des rgyal gdugs can de// lha yi longs spyod snod du gyur// nga nyid dga' ba'i gong bu de// blo ngan 
340b5(mdo 'grel): de yang lhas byin no// zhes pa bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa// thos nas dge slong ya mtshan gyur// kye ma gang zhig yon tan 'dzin dang 'byor pa'i mthu dang ni// lha yi nye bar longs spyod skal bzang srid pa'i bdag po
340b6(mdo 'grel): dang // ring du gnas shing sdug par gyur pa'i gdung bar lhung ba dag/ skyob cing yongs su 'don pa de dag bsod nams rnam 'phrul yin// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpagabs 
340b7(mdo 'grel): gyi 'khri shing las dga' ba'i gong bu'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa gsum pa'o// // legs pa'i lam la yid la re ba rab rgyas grub gyur cing // dam pa'i legs byas dri med 'jug ngogs gtsang ma bsngags 
340b8(mdo 'grel): par 'os// 'jigs rung 'khor ba'i chu srin 'byung gnas dag gi za ma stegs gyur// dam pa'i grogs nyid dge ba spo ba'i rang bzhin pho nya yin// mnyan du yod pa dag tu sngon// khyim bdag pad+ma zhes pa'i bu// ngad pa zhes bya/ 
341a1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan gyi// 'bad pas dgra bcom gnas la ni// rab dang dri med snying rje yi// gzigs pa bdud rtsis bzung mthong nas// rjes 'dzin brtson pas 'brel de la// de slong rnams kyis rab gsol pa// 
341a2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan rigs kyi bu 'di ni// bag chags lhag ma dag gi yul// dran pa mazhi rab byung yang // khyim la mngon par phyogs par gyur// de ni rab 'bad bcom ldan gyis// 'dul ba dag la rnam par sbyar// kye marje bzung 
341a3(mdo 'grel): chen po yis// kun rmongs dag dang bral bar mdzod// de skad dge slong ya mtshan zhing // dga' ba'i bdud rtsi bran pas zhus// gus la mnyes gshin bcom ldan 'das// thams cad mkhyen pas der gsungs pa// sngon 
341a4(mdo 'grel): yang bdag gis dge ba la// 'di ni 'bad nas rnam par bkod// sngon ni dka' thub nags su 'di// thub pa brtul zhugs bzang zhes gyur// de dus de yi gnas su bdag/ ri bor gsal bar smra byed pa// de yi gtam la yid 
341a5(mdo 'grel): gzugs skyes// mdza' ba dang ldan rtag gnas gyur// de nas char med kyis bcom ste// rtsa ba 'bras bu chus mchi// nags su yid byung gus pa de// grong mthar 'gro bar 'dod par gyur// bdag gis gus pa de la spras/ 
341a6(mdo 'grel): dam pa khyod ni rnam par mkhas// dka' thub nosasan dka' thub kyi// nags ni yongs btang ji ltar rigs// rnam mang 'bral ba'i mya ngan du// bying ba'i skye bos gang ba'i khyim// rmongs pa'i gdon gyi nyon mongs kyis/ 
341a7(mdo 'grel): bzung bar gyur pa grong gis// bud med lcags sgrog mu cor bzod dka' bu yi zhags pa dang // g.yog 'khor gyis dkrigs brtan pa'i gnyen gyi dra ba dang // mi srun tshogs pa'i nad dang blo ngan gyis bcings mun chen 
341a8(mdo 'grel): can// btang ba'i khyim la blo ldan su zhig slar yang reg par byed// sna tshogs 'bral ba'i mya ngan sug po yang yang rmongs paskyed par byed// nor ni lan tshwa'i zas rnams dag gis sred pa mchog tu yongs su spel// mi bzad 
341b1(mdo 'grel): yul la chags pa goms pas sems ni blun par byas gyur pa// nyon mongs zhing gi khyim na gnas pa rnams kyi skye ba zad par 'gyur// skye bo med pa'i nags su zhi ba'i khyad par dag gis tshim pa rnams// yul gyis longs 
341b2(mdo 'grel): spyod la chags chang gis blo gros myos shing g.yo mi 'gyur// mdza' bo dang bral du ba rgyas pas mig ni mchi mas 'khrug mi 'gyur// gzer dang 'thab mo khro dang gdung ba'i tshogs rnams dag gis sreg mi 'gyur// nags las 
341b3(mdo 'grel): yid byung grong la chags// grong las yid byung nags tshal dran// skyes bu rnams ni rab zhi las// phyir phyogs zhar la 'byung ba yin// gong gi dul ba'i g.yon la khyod// dus min blo gros yod ma byed// grong dang 'grogs 
341b4(mdo 'grel): pas yul la ni// chags rnams thog ma nyid du 'ching// dus kyis 'di nyid du ni khyod// 'bras bu thob pa 'byung bar 'gyur// bdag gi sha ni dag pa yis// da ni srog gi gzungs dag mdzod// ces pa brjod nas bdag gis 
341b5(mdo 'grel): ni/ nye ba'i me la rang nyid mchongs// des kyang myur du rab blangs nas// yongs su 'khyud de bdag la smras// gzu lums po'i 'gal ba 'di// khyod ni ci yi slad du byed// nags 'di las ni bdag mi 'gro/ khyod mtshungs 
341b6(mdo 'grel): mdza' bo ga la rnyed// de yis gus pa de brjod cing // bdag gis mkha' la bltas pa'i tshe// 'phral la char ni rab 'bab pa// gang gis sa gzhi 'bras bcas gyur// de nas gus bcas thub pa des// mngon par shes pa lnga thob nas// bdag la spras pa dag/ 
341b7(mdo 'grel): pa yi// snying stobs 'di yis khyod ci bzhed// ces pa de yis gus pas dris// de nas bdag gis de la smras// bdag ni spyod pa 'di dag gis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod// skye ba gzhan la 'gro ba rnams// bsgral/ 
341b8(mdo 'grel): slang rgyal bar bdag gyur cig/ ces brjod de yis bdag la smras// khyod ni de bzhin gshegs par gyur// gang tshe yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// thams cad mkhyen par khyod gyur pa// de tshe bdag gis lus gzhan ni/ 
342a1(mdo 'grel): khyod kyi rjes su gzung bar bya// dam pa de yi tshig 'di ni// mdza' bas bdag gis kha yis blangs// ri bong de nga skye ba 'dir// sangs rgyas nyid ni yang dag thob// khyim bdag bu ni ngang pa 'di// grub pa brtul/ 
342a2(mdo 'grel): zhugs bzang zhes pa// de yin sngon gyi rab 'bad ni// dran pas bdag gis dge la bkod// de ltar dgus la mnyes gshen pa// thams cad gzigs pa rgyal ba yis// rang gi sngon byung gsungs pa dag/ thos nas de dag 
342a3(mdo 'grel): yamatshan gyur// rdza mkha' bzhin du mtshang med pa'i 'bras// skyed byed dge ba'i spyod pas 'di la gnas// nyen mo'i bdag dang yangs 'dris btang gyur pa// bsil zer mdzes pa'i dpal ni mtshungs med bzhin// 
342a4(mdo 'grel): zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtog pa brjod pa dpag bsam kyi 'chi shing las rib dgardzogs pa'i yul 'dab ste brgya rtsa bzhi pa'o// / lhag nyis gang zhig zhes pas kun su 
342a5(mdo 'grel): gtsang ma rnams la ni// rdzun gyi skyon brjod mi bzang dug ni rab tu spro byed pa// sdig smod yongs su gdung ba bcud mas bzing ba de dag ni// mi bzad 'dod bya min pa'i rab gzhung du 'jug par 'gyur// kha cher ri ye 
342a6(mdo 'grel): gnas su ni// raM ba ta ka zhes pa sngon// 'byung po kun la brtse ba'i gnas// dge slong brtul zhugs bcang ba byud // nam zhig de yi bum nang du// shing shun dur smrig dag gis ni// nags tshal dben pa'i gnas suni 
342a7(mdo 'grel): tshasags kha ni bsgyung ba byas// skabs deng dus ma'i be'u nyams// bram ze phra ma can zhes pa// sgri ba ba lang zabar ni// dag pa dang ldan tshol du 'das// de yis ril ring po nas// chos gos chos khu mchod pa yi// ma las 
342a8(mdo 'grel): rgyas pa'i du bdag/ mthong nas be'u bcos par bsams// de nas mtshan cha lag rnams dang // skan cig gnyis kyis ril 'jigs// dge slong rib ta la ni// mngon phyogs dul bas rab dris pa// 'phags pa'adi 
342b1(mdo 'grel): dad cigag sa pa// sa pa de la gus pas rnaMs// babang pa 'di nigs 'ang mas// rab tapas de la wAs// gnas skabs deng ni ston pad kyi// de ma las sbyin ma yin gyi// 'dzad pa den pa la ga/ ga zag chu da bcas 
342b2(mdo 'grel): bA zlar // zlab byed 'khrug pa yad pa na// ba ba rdzu pasngal cing 'thung shi // ga ba dag kyang dag pa pa shang // dzas byung cas med nyid du 'byung // rda gyis sdig pags pa kyang dang // skye gzo dang bcas nas byung/ 
342b3(mdo 'grel): 'di dag pa mad rnams ma yin pa// yongs na mtshan nyid mngon du ma yin// skyes parnams nas byas bden rngubs smin pa 'dus su na~M// dz+yo rnams rab tu rgyas shing sa tan dag na nyams par zung // b+ha na rgyan cim/ 
342b4(mdo 'grel): 'byur tho gros rnam par bsad par 'gyur// mngon par 'joms pa chen po sangs par su dang su ma~M ltung // 'gal ba'i sha sa~M dr-i dang ni// khrag gis kyang ni dgas pa yi// bram ze de yaM bum par ni// chos gas sha nyid gyur ba 
342b5(mdo 'grel): bltas// skyon ni mngon sum mthong gyur nas// khro ba'i rnam 'gyur dbyibs ldan zhing // mi bzang sdig pas 'dar ba des// spod cing de la rab smras pa// kye ma dam pa'i kun spyod ldan// maM med nags su gnas pa 'di// gang gi 
342b6(mdo 'grel): las ni 'di 'dra ba// 'dir ni su yang mthong ba med// rab tu byung bar lus b+hUr cing // bya ba kra kra'i skye bor 'os// sdig pas bsgribs pa'i rdzun gyis ni// brtul zhugs ni nyid su yis shes// zhes des rmod bcas brjod pa'i tshe/ 
342b7(mdo 'grel): rab ta yis rab bsams pa// skyon ni mngon sum mtshan 'di la// lan mang bdag ni ci zhig smra// bdag gi 'di ni las bcom zhes// badz+rad kyang su zhig ba den par 'dzin// mngon sum gsang ba'i sgrub ni// bzha gang dag gi 
342b8(mdo 'grel): gnas su 'gyur// mi spa 'ba' zhig la brten te// nye bar gnas pa kun bzod bya// bdag la bcos su med pa 'di// chu las ma ni rab tu 'thung ba// skyon la yon tan phul b+hang mAr du yon tan dag la gyon// bdud rtsi'i gnas la/ 
343a1(mdo 'grel): dug dang dug la yang ni bdud rtsi ste// nges par myong bya dus ni mig 'phrul byed pa'i bud med 'di// rtag tu rmad byung rang bzhin nyid ni rab tu ston par byed// ces sems de ni mi smra bas// gnyis skyes lhag par khros 
343a2(mdo 'grel): gyur te// sdig pa bzhin du sbom pa yi// dbyug pa mgo la yang dag bsnan// khrag gis bgos de gnyis skyes des// bcings nas sa bdag mdun sar khrid// de bzhin sha dang bcas par bstan// btson khang dag gi mgron 
343a3(mdo 'grel): du byas// skyon med dag ni nyon mongs spyod// sdig pa sbas pa dang gyur pa// dbang med mtshar ba'i rnam pa la// su yi dag pa su yis shes// btson khang dag tu bcing ba de// dus kyis brjod par gyur pa na// be'u thob nas 
343a4(mdo 'grel): gnyis skyes ni// tshul ngan ngo tshas cad mi smra// de nas lo ni bcu gnyis na// nam mkha'i skad kyis rtogs bya shing // de slob kyis sbran mi bdag gi/ dge slong bcings pa dag las bkrol// btson ra dag las keng rus 
343a5(mdo 'grel): bzhin// rid pa'i rnam pa mdog mi sdug/ gos med sgra ni gyen du langs// de ni yi dgas bzhin du 'thon// kye mardo steng ri mo bzhin// las kyi rgyun ni g.yo ba med// gang phyir mngon shes thob pas kyang // drag po'i nyon mongs 
343a6(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal thob// de mthong sa bdag dga' bo ni// drag por 'gyod pas rab gdungs pas// bdag med las byung ba dag nyid kyis// bsod nams dman pa nyid la smad// de yis dge slong zhabs la gtugs// dang byas// 
343a7(mdo 'grel): gos kyis g.yogs nas smras// mi shes las skyes bdag gi skyon// 'phags pa khyod kyis bzod par 'os// gnyis skyes de yis de tshe nyid// be'u dag ni thams cad thob// sdig can bdag ni gti mug gis// khyod nyid bcings pa 
343a8(mdo 'grel): brjed par gyur// mdun sar khyod ni su yis kyang // skal bzhan pas yod ma shes// sa bdag lhung bar thob pa na// dag pa rnams la chad ba lhung // sa yi mgon pos 'di brjod tshe// bzod pas bsam pa rab bkrus pa// rib 
343b1(mdo 'grel): ta yis de la smras// rgyal po bdag la khro ba med// ci yang khyod kyis gnod ma byas// nyon mongs rgya che lhur gyur pa// bdag la rang las mtshungs pa'i 'bras// smin pa de ni nye bar gnas// gang zhig 'dod ldan nyid kyis rgud pa kun 
343b2(mdo 'grel): gyis mgrin nas 'dzin par byed pa dang // gang zhig phun tshogs yan lag thams cad lhag pa'i longs spyod skal bzang nyams byed dang // gang zhig rang 'dod bde ba'i gnas su rnam par rtse dang gang zhig ring du 'ching byed pa// 
343b3(mdo 'grel): de dag skyes bu rnams kyi rang las 'khor ba'i 'khri shing smin pa'i 'bras bu bkra/ zhes smra de la mi bdag gis// dge mtshan dag las rab smras pa// blo bzang khyod kyi 'di yang ni// las ngan ci yi 'bras bu yin// des smras par 
343b4(mdo 'grel): NA sir sngon// ku tha zhes pa gdug spyod can// ba la ra rka zhing de ye shes// zas ni sgrub pa dag tu gyur// nam zhig ba lang bsad pa yi// sha bzung 'jigs nas bros pa bdag/ ba lang bsrung ba 'khor bcas rnams// khros pa 
343b5(mdo 'grel): yis ni mngon par gtses// de nas bdag gis nye bar ni// gsar pa'i sha dag rab bkod nas// rang sangs rgyas ni chom rkun no// zhes pa de dag rnams la bstan// ba lang gsod sdig drag pos khros// de dag gis de sha 
343b6(mdo 'grel): mthong nas// 'bad nas 'di ni gsad bya zhes// tshogs pa rnams kyis bcings te bzung // de nas 'gyod pas bdag gis ni// nyi ma bcu gnyis na song ste// bdag gis sdig byas zhes brjod nas// de ni btson ra dag nas 
343b7(mdo 'grel): btang // sdig pa de smin bdag gis ni// dmyal bar yun ring nyams myong nas// skye ba 'dir yang nyon mongs ni// lo ni bcu gnyis rab tu thob// zhes brjod mi bdag la gsol nas// lha dang lha min rab 'dud thob// rdzu 'phrul 
343b8(mdo 'grel): bstan na ri ba ta// dge slong rnams dang lhan gcig song // bden med skyon gyi bye brag rigs pa ni// mngon sum du mtshon mi nyams mtshan nyid kyis// brlang pos zil mnan skye bo dam pa ni// yul gzhan dag tu bcings nga 
344a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin ci zhig brjod// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las re ba ta yi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa lnga pa'o// 
344a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal bar 'dod rnams bzhin du stobs kyis ni// bzod dka' 'khor ba'i dgra yi stobs bcom nas// dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid chen po ni// rgyas pa bstan pa rnams kyis thob par 'gyur// gang tshe grong khyer lta bu'i 
344a3(mdo 'grel): mdo// bcom ldan gyis gsungs de yi tshe// dge slong rnams kyi dge mtshan las// dris pa de yi rab gsungs pa// grong khyer gser can zhes pa ni// skye bo mtho ris 'od ldan byung // der ni mi bdag 'od dang ldan// gser 
344a4(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba byung bar gyur// de yi dga' ba mchog tu ni// rab tu rgyas pa dag gi gnas// bu ni gser gyi go cha dang // bu mo ga ser 'od dag tu gyur// dus kyis lang tsho la mdzes shing // nu ma'i me tog phun bus mdzes// mdze 
344a5(mdo 'grel): pa de mdzes dpyid kyi ni// yid 'ong dbyibs can 'khri shing bzhin// gzhon la mdza' bas yongs 'dris pa// blon po'i bu gzhon 'dod ldan ni// 'dod pa'i snying po zhes pa yis// de la dal gyis 'dod pa bsten// me tog dus su 
344a6(mdo 'grel): rab zhugs shing // lang tshe can gyi brtan 'phrog che// ske ma dang 'grogs bung ba ni// yang dag rgyu ba su yis zlogs// bu mo spyod tshul nyams pa dag/ shes nas sa bdag khengs ldan ni// mi bzad mya ngan khro ba yi// me gany+dzi 
344a7(mdo 'grel): dag la mtshungs par zhugs// khengs pa bsten pa rnams la bsod nams kyis// mtshed 'os rigs ni bu mos dman par 'gyur// bslang bya min pa'i slong ba'i gdong bzhin du// skad cig gis ni bu mos rigs nyams 
344a8(mdo 'grel): byed// de nas sa yi bdag po'i bkas// bu mo blon po'i bu de yang // bka' ni byed pa rnams dag gis// zangs nas gsod pa'i gnas su khyer// de nas skyabs ni zhu byed pa// de dag snying rje rgyas pa yi// rgyal sras kyis 
344b1(mdo 'grel): ni rang grol las// grong khyer gzhan pa dag tu khrid// de nas sa bdag brtse med cing // khros pas dgra ni drag po bzhin// bu ni nges par rab bskrad de// mtha' 'khob nags kyi 'gron du byas// snying stobs chu gter bas

344b3(mdo 'grel): pa nyid ni mthong bar gyur// de yis gtong ba'i rgyud dag dris// de yis ming por yongs shes nas// mdza' bas mchi ma'i char 'bebs shing // de la lan ni rab smras pa// ming po n+ya gro d+ha brten pa'i// gnod sbyin stobs chen 
344b4(mdo 'grel): snan byed pa// drug cu'i grangs kyis grong khyer 'di// skye bo med pa dag tu byas// 'di brlag lhag ma da lta ni// bdag dang blon po'i bu de ste// da ni khyod kyi dpung pa yi// stobs mthus bdag cag skyabs pa nyid// ces pa sring mo'i

344b7(mdo 'grel): nas// sa yi bdag po gser gyis ni// spring yid dag gi 'bad pas bos// yab gyis cod pan bcings gyur cing // rgyal tsha ba gzi brjid ldan gyur pa// dbang po dbang gyur de yis// gling bzhi ldan pa dbang du byas// 'khor ba bzhin du/ 
344b8(mdo 'grel): dgra yi sde// gang gis kun tu brlag byas pa// dpal ldan rgyal po'i gzhon nu der// nga nyid de yi dus na gyur// snying stobs mdzes ldan dam chos seng+ge'i khril spos pa yis ni nyer zhugs shing // tshul khrims gtsug tor dang ldan 
345a1(mdo 'grel): dben pa'i chu yis mngon par dbang bskur dpal thob pas// mi zad rgya che srid pa'i nyon mongs phreng ba rgyud mar gyur pa'i dgra bcom nas// rab zhi thob cing kun las rgyal ba dag gis myar 'das sa de spyod par byed/ 
345a2(mdo 'grel): gnod sbyin dang mtshungs nyon mongs brlag byas nas// shin tu dri med grong khyer lta bu yi// mya ngan 'da' ba 'ga' zhig dag gis thog// ces pa gsungs nas bcom ldan rnam par gnas// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang

345a8(mdo 'grel): sa bdag snying ni gzung bar byas// gnas skabs der ni rgyal po yis// bu mo gzhon nu dbyangs can ma// ba ga ma can gyi nang song bas// legs ldan tshig gis legs bshad blangs// rna ba'i bdud rtsi 'dod pa yis// legs 
345b1(mdo 'grel): bshad khyim bdag gis zos nas// spu long myu gu'i rnam pa can// de yi rang bzhin dang khyim song // de nas zas dang rtse dga' gtang // legs bshad kyis ni bsam pa grogs// gnyid kyis dbul ba de yis ni// rang

346a1(mdo 'grel): thob nas mi yi bdag/ ya mtshan bcas pa de la dris// ci slad rin chen rab btang nas// legs bshad tsam ni khyod la bzung // bu mo de yi tshig dag la// drang po khyod ni yid ches ldan// legs bshad
