346b7(mdo 'grel): ldan legs bshad chu gter de ni phyag byar 'os// gang gis oM yig dag las gya gyu kho na mchog tu bslabs kyis gzhan ma yin// gang gi kha nas swa sti'i tshig ni gsal ba nam yang nges par mi 'byung zhing// khro ba 'bar 
346b8(mdo 'grel): pas bzhin ni mdog bral mi srun rigs byed gter gyur de dag gis// drag po'i gnod pa bzhin du rgya che gtam gyi snyan dngags dag ni ji ltar bzod// dge dbang zhes pa'i snyan dngags mkhan gyi rtog pa brjod pa 
347a1(mdo 'grel): dpag bsam 'khri shing 'di byas nas// da ni dam pa'i chos kyi smon lam 'di dag blo gros nor ldan blo yis 'dzin// rgyal ba'i yon tan sgrogs byed pasdebs las bdag gis bsod nams gang zhig nyer bsgrubs pa// de yi skye 
347a2(mdo 'grel): bo 'di ni sems can mtha' dag dge la rtag tu brtson gyur cig/ 'khor bas che bar yongs su ngal zhing 'dod pa'i chang gis myos pa nyid 'dzin la// gti mug rgyas pa'i mun pa dag gis mi gzu ma nyal zhing dran pa yis// 'gro 
347a3(mdo 'grel): ba rab tu rtogs par sgrub la chas shing skyon rnams ma lus 'joms byed pa// 'od dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan sangs rgyas rab tu sad pa nyid la rtag tu bstod// kun dga' gnyen gyur lan cig min par rgya che yid can la/ 
347a4(mdo 'grel): legs bshad 'od kyis bde ba kun gyi nye bar bstan pa sgrub// dri med rang rigs chu gter dag gi dga' ba'i dbang // grags pa gsal ba skyed byed yab la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa dag byed 
347a5(mdo 'grel): tshig ni smin pa'i gter// sprul byed bsod nams brtag pa dge ba'i mngon par sbyor ba 'di// bla ma legs byas ldan pa bka' ni rab tu sbyin mdzad pas// yongs su rdzogs pa'i slad du bdag la skal ba'i cha shas 
347a6(mdo 'grel): mdzad/ gang zhig phug tu rgyal ba'i rtogs brjod dang // gser gyi gzugs brnyan rab tu rgyas par gyur// mig ni bdud rtsi bkra ba'i ri mo chags// de ni gtsug lag khang gi dus kyi mda'// dbyangs can pir gyis rnam 
347a7(mdo 'grel): par bkra ba yi// rtogs pa brjod pa'i yi ge'i rim pas bris// gang 'di bsod nams rang bzhin gtsug lag khang // don chen dam pa dga' byed yab kyis bsgrubs// phyogs su po ti'i phreng ba rab bkod pa'i// gzugs// 
347a8(mdo 'grel): brnyan tshogs ni brtan par rab chags pa// de ni chu dang mes bskyed nyer 'tshe yi// dus bzhi 'jig kyang nyams pa yod ma yin// de la rtogs brjod gcig gi gzugs brnyan 'di// mi zad bsod nams la chags 
347b1(mdo 'grel): bdag kyang dgod// bdag nyid chen po der nas rjes 'brang ba// shin tu chung yang 'bad med chen por 'gyur// thos pa'i phyogs kyis btung bya'i bdud rtsi snyan pa dag gi rgun// dri bzang khang ba bzhin gyi pad+mo'i gnas su sgrogs 
347b2(mdo 'grel): byed pa// bung ba'i na chung dang mtshungs lab kyi sad la btud nas ni// rgan dngags rgya tsha'i khyad par lhag ma bdag gis rdzogs par byas// mdzes mgasar du sngags pa'i dga' sngon dang lga yi mthu ldan dpal dang ni// da 
347b3(mdo 'grel): babargyan gyi nye bar longs spyod dba' rlabs rtswa yi rtse dga' btang byas nas// gus bcas gang dag brtse bas gzhan gyi srog ni bskyab par bsgrub la rang gi lus// zol med sbyin la g.yo ba med pa de la bdag cag phyag 
347b4(mdo 'grel): 'tshal lo// dpal ldan rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang // sprin gyi tog ni sprin bzhin du// slong ba'i gdung ba 'phrog pa dag/ grong khyer gser du byung bar gyur// gang gi dpag bsam shing las 'khrungs// rtag tu gsar pa gsar 
347b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i dpal// grags pa'i me tog bsod nams kyi// dri bzang rgyas pa rnam par mdzes// chu gter las ni zla ba bzhin// sprin gyi bzhon pa de yi sras// shin tu lhag pa'i bsod nams rnams// gsar du tshogs pa bzhin du 
347b6(mdo 'grel): gyur// dam pa'i skye bo legs byas dang // yon tan ldan pa dul ba dang // 'byor pa ldan pa gtor bas bzhin// de ni sras po de yis mdzes// de yis bu la dpag ba sa ma shing // rgyal srid che dang bcas gtad nas// dka' 
347b7(mdo 'grel): thub slad du zhi ba'i gnas// ma la yang ni dben pas song // yab ni btsun mo dang 'grogs te// dpal btang dka' thub nags song tshe// sprin gyi bzhon pa 'byor pa dag/ thob pa yi sa ni rab bsams pa// bla ma bsten pa 
347b8(mdo 'grel): dang bral ba// bdag la dpal 'di bde med gyur// mig gis dman pa dag la ni// ri mo'i gnas dag 'bral med bzhin// yab kyi zhabs la gtugs tshe sen mo'i 'od kyi phreng ba yis// rnam par mdzes pa'i cod 
348a1(mdo 'grel): pan dang ldan de yis bka' nyan pa'i// rna rgyan gyis brgyan dpal ni ji ltar bdag la sngon gyur pa// da lta 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'byor pa dag la de lta med// ces bsams de yis 'jig rten ni// kun la phan slad
348a2(mdo 'grel): rang nyid kyi// dpag bsam rkang 'thur gser gyi char// 'bebs pa dag tu bstar byas nas// rgyal srid chen po rab btang ste// yab kyi bsti gnas dag tu song // 'jig rten gsum gyi snying po yi// dbang phyug sems 
348a3(mdo 'grel): yangs rnams la na// rgyal srid can pa btang nas de// bal ya yi dang song tshe// dpag bsam ldan pas sa gzhan// gsar rjes yangs bkang mkha' las // sprin gyi bzhin pas rab na// dpal gyi dum bus 
348a4(mdo 'grel): brgyan par phyin// pha ma'i zhabs pad bsten pa yis// 'bral ba'i gdung ba rab tu btang // skabs der tsan dan 'khri shing rlung bzhon gyis// bskyod cing shugs rings glal ba bsten rnams la// 'dod pa'i grogs por gyur
348a5(mdo 'grel): pa dpyid kyis ni// mngon par 'dod pa'i spyod tshul rab tu bstan// khyo bral 'dod ldan ma yi mi mthun phyogs// lho phyogs rlung ni yang yang rab tu ldang // 'gro las rgyal slang nya yi rgyal mtshan gyis// rlung gi mtshon ni 
348a6(mdo 'grel): 'phral la rab sbyar bzhin// rkang drug dkyil 'khor dag gis ma spras pa// stug por rgyas pas lci ba nyid gyur pa'i// tsu ta'i shing gis mi phyed phyag rgya bcings// lang tsho can la mngon 'dod bslab pa byas// dpyid kyi 
348a7(mdo 'grel): dpal mo dag gi rna ba'i rgyan// ri bo'i ngos la mya ngan med pa mdzes// grong khyer ma yi rkang pas rab bsnun pas// yal 'dab gsar pa dag la tshon 'phos bzhin// mdzes ma'i kha yi chang gis dga' ldan pa// 'dod 
348a8(mdo 'grel): thas 'din la ldan bdag nyid la// nas bral shang kun na sa pa dpal smras pazhin// 'angs lanas rnams 'as par babatang dang // e s+phutrangs nas dang bang ga sa 
348b1(mdo 'grel): de// / mdza' bo dag la dang bar byed mthong nas// sin+da bA ra me tog gis rgod bzhin// ge sar rgyas pa'i khur bsten pA la sha'i// phreng ba mdzes pa dpyid kyi seng+ge yis// khengs ldan ma yi khengs pa glang po la// bsnun pa'i
348b2(mdo 'grel): khrag bsgos sder mo'i phreng ba bzhin// rna bar skan sgrogs khu byu ga bu mo yis// reg la shi ri Shas mig ka Ni kar// sna la ge sar rdul tshogs rgyas pa yis// me tog 'byung gnas dpal gyis dga' char pa ba// bur 
348b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i na chung rnam 'phrul longs spyad ldan// sbrang rtsis myos shing rnam par 'khyam dus der// me tog rab rgyas 'khri shing tshal gyi gzhir// rig 'dzin rgyal po'i sras ni rnam par rgyu// des der gser las bsgrubs pa'i 
348b4(mdo 'grel): khang par ni// grub pas rab tu gnas byas rin chen gzugs// go ri mchod nas rgyud mangs glu len pa'o// zla ba gsar pa lta bu'i bu mo mthong // yid srubs 'tsho slad go ra mnyes pa yi// sgrub byed la ni rab tu 
348b5(mdo 'grel): gnas byas pa// 'dod pa'i chung ma gzhan bzhin de mthong nas// sprin gyi bzhon pa ya mtshan rgya cher gyur// de nas ri dgas mig yangs ngo tsha yis// dud pas glu mthar rgyud mangs pad pa nas// dal gyis phab pas// 
348b6(mdo 'grel): rig 'dzin rgyal po'i bu// mnga' bzhag 'dod pa dag dang mtshungs pa mthong mig zer mdzes pa'i rgyan ldan mngon 'dod des// phan tshun lta bar byed pa'i rnam 'phrul gyis// yid ni nyes par mtshams sbyor po nya 
348b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin// de dag bar du 'gro dang 'ong bar byas// gsar mthong la yang phyogs su ltung byas pa// 'dod pa pad mtsho'i ngang pa'i rgyal mo des// skye ba gzhan du goms pa'i ro las bzhin// de yi yi mtsha 
348b8(mdo 'grel): zhing dang bar zhugs// rin chen zla bar dri med ri bong dang // bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'ben la dran pa'i mda'// rab rgyas pad+mo dag tu bur ba bzhin// chags ldan de yis sems la'ang de zhugs gyur// grogs so bu mo'i 
349a1(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa dang bcas der// 'dod pa gsar skyes ngo tshas spun byed cing // brtan yang rmad byung gzugs kyis drangs gyur pa// rigs 'dzin zla bas dben par mngon phyogs smras// smin legs ci slang sngon 
349a2(mdo 'grel): du 'ongs pa la// phe bas smras bkur ba'i cha ni khyod mi byed// dam pa'i kun spyod yon tan gyis mdzes gzugs// legs ldan rigs kyi rjes mthun rnam par 'dzin// kha na ma tho med lus khyod lus mchog/ dran pa'i 
349a3(mdo 'grel): rgyan ni gsar pa zla ba ltar// mdzes pa mu tig nor bu nyid 'di ni// rab tu mtho ba'i rigs min gang las thob// yang na mdzes ma khyod ni mthong gyur pa// bdud rtsis brlan pa red la rim gro byas// mdzes sdug dga' ster 
349a4(mdo 'grel): ri bong gis mtshan pa'i// ri mo su la phebs par smra bar byed// 'on kyang dga' bas nged kyi dag mtshan tsam// gsal ba'i slad du khyod kyis 'di smros shig/ dam pa'i phyogs lhung mngon phyogs byed pa yis// su yi rig 
349a5(mdo 'grel): nikhyod kyis rgyas par byas// zhes pa rig 'dzin cod pan dag gis tshig/ 'dod dgongs snying po can de thos gyur nas// ngo tshas de ni mi spa ldan gyur gar// de tshe grogs mo ma ta la kas spras// gzhon nu rig 'dzin rgyal 
349a6(mdo 'grel): rigs bdud rtsi yi// chu gter gyi ni zla ba khyod 'dir grags// nged kyi grong na grub pa'i rtse dga' mas// lus med lus ldan khyod ni glu lan byed// dpag bsam shing sbyin rtse dgas rab grags pa// khyod kyi grags pa yon/ 
349a7(mdo 'grel): tan mthu yi rgyan// zla ltar dkar ba 'di yi rna rgyan du// ming po nor gyi bshes gnyen dag gis byas// sems dpa' chen po de khyod grogs mos gtams// dar ma'i nyes spyod bya bas ji ltar 'os// khyad par che rnams bdun 
349a8(mdo 'grel): du bu mo ne// ngo tshas rnam par thul ba'i rang bzhin gyur// bu mo 'di ni grub rigs chu gtar gyi// zla ba grub bdag sna tshogs nor gyi ste// gang gis mdzes pa skyed tshal du rtse tshe// rtag pa nyid du ku mu da rgyas par byed// ma 
349b1(mdo 'grel): yang skyes 'khri shing gsar bzhin phra// dang por 'khrungs gyur yal 'dab ltar dmar mchu// bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin ma la ya can ni// rtag tu lha dang lha min mngon 'dod pas// zhes des spras par gyur pa na// nyung ru ma// 
349b2(mdo 'grel): rgan po mngon phyogs te// myur bar 'ongs pa'i shugs bcas pas// grub bdag bu mo la smras pa// dge ma nor gyi bshes gnyen dang // lhan cig pho brang 'khor na 'khod// khyod kyi bag ma'i gtam la chags// yab ni khyod 
349b3(mdo 'grel): la lta bar 'tshal// zhes pa de yis brjod pa'i 'phral// grogs mo dang bcas mig bzang ma// yid ni sprin gyi gzhon pa la// rnam par bkod nas dal gyis song // grogs mo phyi nas 'khod la de// gtam gyi zol 
349b4(mdo 'grel): gyis yang dang yang // mdzes ma rnam par lta byed cing // le lo'i goms pas 'gro ba'i tshe// mngon 'dod gsar pa la brten zhing // phrag dog gis bzhin brtan pas btang // lam der mig ni gtad pa yi// gzhon nu 
349b5(mdo 'grel): yis ni rab bsams pa// kye ma ri dgas phrug gu'i mig/ pha yi drung du 'gro byed ma// de yis 'jigs bzhin chags bcas kyi// yid ni bdag la gtams par byas// dbugs kyi ral dub 'bad pas 'gog la 
349b6(mdo 'grel): chags shing sgra med dag tu rnam par gnas// mthong ba'i 'jigs las shin tu dogs pas 'khrugs shing dben pa rung yang rab 'dar bcas// yid srubs dag gi mda' yis rab tu bsnyun che skyengs pa yis ni chags 
349b7(mdo 'grel): shing gnas// lus phra tshom rkun ma de bdag yid la zhugs lam gang nas ni yongs mi shes// zhes pa yun ring bsam nas rdol 'khod// yid srub bka' yi yul du gyur pa des// kun rtog par gyis mdun du ri dgas 
349b8(mdo 'grel): mig/ yang yang mngon bris mig ni g.yo med gyur// de nas me tog rdul dang rdul gyis gang // nags tshal dben par rkang pa'i mtsho skyes rgya// 'khor lo rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan rjes 'brang nas// de yi drung du rtsed 
350a1(mdo 'grel): grogs gnyen bzang 'ongs// mngon 'dod gsar pa'i khyad par bsam pa yis// sems ni rab tu bkag de des mthong nas// dran pa'i bka' yis brtan pa btsongs pa la// ngo mtshar bcas pa'i rnam 'gyur rgyu dag dris// 
350a2(mdo 'grel): grogs po brtan pa'i gter gyur khyod la yang // shin tu gdung ba'i gnas 'di nyer bstan cing // bsam pa la brten mig ni g.yo med pa// brtan med rnam pa ci zhig nyams su myong // zhes pa yid gcugs gnas ni grogs po 
350a3(mdo 'grel): dag/ rab tu 'bad cing gus pas dris pa ni// shugs rings mthun phyogs rlung gis rjes dpag bya// dran pa'i mda' lhung gzhon nus de la spras// grogs po sngon spros sdel skyo ldan pa'i// byed po yis ni gzugs gsar ri 
350a4(mdo 'grel): mo dag/ grub rigs rgya mtsho'i zla ba ri mo bzhin// mdzes pa'i rang bzhin bu mo bdag gis mthong // de yi bzhin gyi pad+mo mdzes sdug rgyas pas gzi byin nyams pa'i zla ba dang // de yi mig dag mdzes pas mig gi dpal 
350a5(mdo 'grel): ni rab tu nyams pa'i ri dgas dag/ grags pa zhi zhing sdug bsngal mtshungs pas mtshan mo so sor skyengs te zhum pa yi// bdag nyid dag ni bsam pa g.yo med 'grogs pa 'di nyid mthong bar bdag rtog go// mthong ba'i 
350a6(mdo 'grel): rnam 'phrul gsar pa yin mod kyang // mig gi mdzes pa rna ba'i rgyan byas des// mngon 'dod gsar pa nyams su myong byed pa'i// rang gi ngo bo bdag la gsal bar byas// der ni glo bur 'dar zhing g.yo ldan sgra dag sgrogs 
350a7(mdo 'grel): par byed pa'i 'og pa ga la// 'jigs pas rab tu zhi bar byed bzhin yang yang gos dag sbyin nas lkug par byas// ngo tshas mi smra dang ldan bzhin du de yis rna ba'i ut+pal lhung ba la// 'khor zhing rgyu ba'i bung ba rnams kyi sgra yis 
350a8(mdo 'grel): bdag la legs par 'ongs sam byas// bzhin la zla ba brgya phrag dang ni mig gnyis dag la ut+pal sngon po'i nags// lag pa dag la pad rtsa gzhon nu rkang par pad+mo'i 'byung gnas rab rgyas pa// lus mchog sprul pa phra rab rdul 
350b1(mdo 'grel): dag gal te 'dod pas rab tu bkod pa na// me yi rang bzhin bzhin du de yis bdag yid mdza' bas phug pa ci slad sreg/ 'dod pa'i ku mud tshal gyi zla ba'i ri mo su zhig de// mig gi pad+mo rnam par rgyas pa'i rgyur ni bdag gis 
350b2(mdo 'grel): mthong // gang gi mdzes pa'i rnam 'phrul bdud rtsi'i chu bo 'thung ba yis// tsha ba'i dug tu gsal byed rmongs pa rtag tu rgyas par gyur// ma la ya can zhes pa'i bu mo ri dgas mig can de// rtse dga'i bla ma me tog mtshon gyi 
350b3(mdo 'grel): rol rtsed skyed byed ma// dri med grub rig bdud rtsi'i chu gter dag gi rgyu skar ba dag/ sna tshogs nor dag gi ni bu mo yin zhes bdag gis thos// zhes pa rigs 'dzin rgyal po dag gi bu// yid 'byung gsar pa rgyas pa'i tshig 
350b4(mdo 'grel): thos nas// dri za'i gzhon nu yid gzugs dag gis// kus ldan gnyen bzang gis ni de la spras// grags po dga' bas khyod kyi mngon 'dod 'di// yon tan mthu dag mtshungs pa'i gnas la spos// legs byas ldan pa 
350b5(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi re ba ni// nges par dam pa'i lam du 'gro bar 'gyur// lha yi bu mo bltas pas mi g.yo ba// khyod kyi brtan pa gang gis g.yo bzhin byed// dga' ma'i bdag po dag gi ru mtshon de// skal ldan 'jig rten gsum gyi mtshon/ 
350b6(mdo 'grel): bya nyid// 'gro la nya yi mtshan mo rgyal ba dang ldan gcig pu mchog tu mdzes// sngo bsangs sde la mchog gi 'byor pa 'dzin pa de nyid skal pa bzang // gang dang bral bas mtshan mo'i so sor bdud rtsi'i zer ni gzi byin nyam// 
350b7(mdo 'grel): dal gyis sen mo'i kha ris gsar pa phra ba nyid 'dzin lus dang ldan// brtan pa sten cig khyod kyi 'dod pa gang // de ni 'bad men lag pa'i rtsen gnas// grub pa dag sna tshogs nor las bu mo de// khyod kyi yab kyi khyod kyi don 
350b8(mdo 'grel): du bslangs// 'od ldan zla bas mtshan mo la bzhin gang gi bu mo la// 'gro gsum dga' bas yang dag sbyor ba bdag gi skal ba bzang // zhes pa brjod nas grub pa'i bdag po gus dang dga' bas gang // bu mo yin bag ma'i dga'/ 
351a1(mdo 'grel): ston de nyid skyong bar gyur// grogs po nang par khyod kyi rtse dga'i dga' ston yangs pa dag/ mdzes ma dang 'grogs bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ldan pa de 'byung ste// gang la yon tan mtshungs pa 'grogs pa dag ni 
351a2(mdo 'grel): mthong bas na// skye bo shin tu yun ring byed po bsngags pa byed par 'gyur// zhes pa grogs po'i tshig de thos gyur nas// dga' ba'i rang bzhin yangs pa 'phral rgyas de// nyin mo'i lhag ma du ma'i dus mtshungs par// zla 
351a3(mdo 'grel): yiyis rtog cing rang gi gnas su song // de nas thun mtshams bu mo dang // 'grogs pas gur gum 'phos pa bzhin// nam mkha' yi ni sbrid tshal du// nyi ma chags rtag ldan par 'gyur// pa can dga' nyin mo'i mthar// 
351a4(mdo 'grel): na ri'i ngos la 'khod pa na// de yi mjug tu thun mtshams ni// rkang pa bsten pa la chags mdzes// de nas nub phyogs chu gter du// nyin mo'i dbang phyug rab lhung tshe// de las 'thor ba'i thigs pa bzhin// skar ma 
351a5(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis nam mkha' gang // dal gyis mun pa chung ngu gnag/ mtshan mos srid pa'i gnod dag las// thun mtshams dmar ba'i chang 'thungs nas// myos pa bzhin du skad cig 'khyams// de nas bde sogs mdzes pa 
351a6(mdo 'grel): yaM// rtse dga' gnas pa shar gyi phyogs// zla 'char snang ba nye ba ni// tsan dan dag gis mtshan bzhin mdzes// de nas bdud rtsi skyed pa ni// longs spyod can gyi longs spyod kyi// skal bzang rtsi dga' khyad par can/ 
351a7(mdo 'grel): bsangs gdong gi khyad can shar// zla ba'i rtse dgar mngon phyogs pa'o// ku mu ldan pa mthor gyur nas// thobs zhum bzhin pad+ma can// gzi byin nyams shing zlum par gyur// zla ba'i thig legasar pa dang // skar ma'i tshogs kyi 
351a8(mdo 'grel): do shal can// sngo bsangs ma de thub pa ni// dul ba'i mi mthun phyogs nyid gyur// de nas mtshan de khang bzang du// sred ldan ma la ya can ma// gnyid med sprin gyi bzhon pa yi// bsam gtan ldan pas rab bsams pa/ 
351b1(mdo 'grel): bdag ni bag mar nye ba ye// bar na gnas pa'i mi mthun phyogs// mtshan ma 'di ni thun brgya dang // ldan pa bzhin du yang mi mdzad// kye mnam mkha'i spyod mos tshal// rgya sa me tog 'dzum ldan pa// ri bor can 'grogs 
351b2(mdo 'grel): dga' ba yi// mtshan mo yis ni gtong mi byed// shin tu ring ba'i mtshan mo 'di// bdag gi dga' ba'i bgegs su gyur// rang nyid bde ba'i ror chags pa// su yis gzhan gyi gdung ba shes// zhes pa de yi bsam pa ni// 
351b3(mdo 'grel): gdung byed rjes su 'brel pa yi// nor bzhin du ni mtshan mo de// dal gyis mthong ba min par gyur// de nas skya reng gos dang ldan// brel bas zla ba'i me long zags// dga' ston nye ba la chas bzhin// snang ba ldan pa tha 
351b4(mdo 'grel): rang mdzes// pad+mo can gyi dga' ba shar// mtshan mo'i mun pa zhi pa na// 'byung po thams cad bde ba'i slad// mig gi dga' ston dag tu gyur// de nas pad+ma ldan pa yis// nyin byed zer 'dzin la zhugs che// bung ba'i na 
351b5(mdo 'grel): cha 'grogs pa yis// bkra shis glu dag rab tu bstan// de nas grub pa'i bdag po ni// phun tshogs mang ba'i khyim dag tu// bu mo'i bag ma'i dga' ston dag/ rtsom pa'i chas ni rab tu bstar// ci ste grub pa'i na chud kyis/ 
351b6(mdo 'grel): lha yaM gos dang rgyan rnams kyis// bu mo brgyan pa mthong gyur nas// lha mo rnams kyis phan tshun spras// 'di yi nu ma rab mdzes pa// da shal khur gyis rab tu bsgribs// mdzes sdug sgrib par byed pa yi// shin tu mang 
351b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i rgyan gyis ci// grogs mo lus phra nu ma'i ngos la rin chen phreng ba'i khur gyis ci zhig byed// khyod ni bkra bar rgyan la mkhas te mig bzang dag la mig sman 'dis kyang ci// bzhin ras zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la khyod kyis 
351b8(mdo 'grel): 'bad nas dga' bar bsgrubs pa'i tshon// gla rtsi dag gi dog pa rnams ni dri ma chags par byed pa 'di la ltos// de ltar kun rtog brjod pa yis// grags mos rgyan ni rnam 'phrul ni// bkra shis slad du rtags gyur pa/ 
352a1(mdo 'grel): shin tu chung ba dag kyang mdzes// de nas nam mkha'i gzhal yas khang // nor bu phreng ba'i zer phreng can// do shal ba gam can lta bus// sprin gyi gzhon pa rab tu 'ongs// yon tan la gus 'jig rten gsum 
352a2(mdo 'grel): gyis mchod// grub pa'i mgon pos mchod par gyur pa de// rigs 'dzin phreng ba brgya phrag rjes 'brang zhing // bstar byas bkra shis sa gzhi dag tu phyin// de nas rin chen gzhal yas khang gnas pa// yid skyes rtse 
352a3(mdo 'grel): dga'i 'khri shing bu mo ni// bag ma la dga' mdzes pa'i cha dag gis// phyogs la rgyan dag ster ba bzhin du 'ongs// grogs mo'i lag pas bskyod pa'i rnga yabartses// rna ba'i ut+pal yal 'dab lhur gyur pa// 'gram 
352a4(mdo 'grel): par reg pas skad cig de rab mdzes// rtags yon zla bas brgyan pa'i mtshan mo bzhin// de nas bag ma'i dga' ston chen po la// cho ga bzhin zhugs grub ba dag bu mo yi// lag bzung reg pa gsar pa'i bdud rtsi 
352a5(mdo 'grel): yis// rigs 'dzin rgyal po'i bu ni dga' bar gyur// khyo shug de dag lus ni bag ma'i tshe// do shal cher 'os rin chen la 'phos mdzes// mdza' bas snying lag skabs thob gyur nas// phan tshun rab tu dang bas 
352a6(mdo 'grel): zhugs pa bzhin// bag ma'i cho ga rab tu sbyar byas pa// mchod yon bsten pa de dag rgyal po'i khyams// glu dang gar ldan mtho ris ltar mdzes pa// rin chen stan bkod dga' ston 'os par song // de nas dga' ston 
352a7(mdo 'grel): spro ba'i khyad par gyi// gar gyis ngal bzhin 'dab brgya'i sbrang rtsi 'thungs// tsha zer ldan pa'i zer phreng nub ji yi// ngos la 'khod pas dal gyis ngal bsos bsnyen// de nas 'od chags nyin mo'i dpal dang ni// chags 
352a8(mdo 'grel): ldan thun mtshams dag kyang khrid byas nas// 'od zer phreng ba skyed tshal la chags bzhin// lhun po'i pha rol nges kyi sa gzhir song // rgyu skar g.yo ldan mtshan mor dgas mig/ nyin mo'i 'jug tu gos sngon ldan ma mthong // 
352b1(mdo 'grel): 'jigs shing 'khrul pas yang yang phyogs rnams su// rnam par blta zhing mngon par 'gro ba bzhin// de nas shar gyi ri rtser ri bong can// 'od zer phreng ba shel gyi dra bas bstan// ba gam cher mdzes dga' ston chen po
352b2(mdo 'grel): la// grub pa'i bu mo'i gar la blta ba bzhin// rgyu skar rgyu dang 'bras yos me tog gtor // mtshan mo zla bas bag mar blangs pa der// sbrang rtsi'i brtul zhugs sbrang rtsis myos pa can// ku mud 'byung gnas ci yang rab
352b3(mdo 'grel): dgar gyur// de nas nyams dga' dga' ston chen po der// phreng ba do shal rab 'bar dbu ba g.yo// grub pa'i na chung 'jig rten rnam par mdzes// zla shar bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho 'byur ba bzhin// de nas snga dro mchod ston
352b4(mdo 'grel): chen po ni// yongs su rgyas tshe grogs dang phrad pa yis// nyi 'od gzhon nus li khri'i tshogs kyis bzhin// grub pa'i grong du grong pa'i rtse dga' byung // dga' ston chen po rmad byung dga' ba'i sa// nyi ma drug ni dal gyis 
352b5(mdo 'grel): rab 'das te// nyi ma bdun pa'i dang po ri ngos la// rig 'dzin rgyal po'i bu ni rnam par rgyu// der ni gdengs ka'i nor bu'i 'od zer dag/ rab gsal dra bas snang ba rgyas byed pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs 
352b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin ras can// glu gzhon ma dang bcas pa mdun du mthong // mchi ma stug por rab 'bab thigs pa yis// phreng bas nu ma'i dkyil 'khor dkrigs gyur cing // rab drag mya ngan gyis bcom 'dar ba der// snying rje'i
352b7(mdo 'grel): tshe de rab tu bsangs pa thos// kyi hud mnyes gshin sa 'og nor bu'i sgron// ji ltar khyod ni brlag la nye ba thob// khyod gdong chu skyes kun dga'i tshogs bzhin mdzes// 'di ni bdag gis phyi nas gang du mthong // kyi hud 
352b8(mdo 'grel): dga' ma'i dga' ba'i dpyid// yid srubs mtshams kyor pho nya lang tshe 'dir// jig gnyen gyi srog gyur khyod za gyur// dus kyi gnyis 'thung gis bcom tsu ta bzhin// zhes pa de yi snying rje'i sgra thos nas// mya ngan zug rngu nad du rab zug pa/ 
353a1(mdo 'grel): rigs 'dzin rgyal po'i bu yis mngon phyogs te// de la bzod dka'i sdug bsngal rgyu dag dris// ma ma khyod kyi cho de drag po 'di// sdug bsngal drag po gsal byed ci las skyes// dge ba'i gzugs can dam pa
353a2(mdo 'grel): 'di la khyod// drag por kun tu 'dar byed ci zhig dogs// nges par dge ba dag la 'os pa'i lus// skye bo bzang po dang 'grogs bde ba ster// rnam pa 'di lta bu ni rab 'joms pa'i// rgud pa'i gnas nyid dag tu mi 'gyur ro// 
353a3(mdo 'grel): zhes pa de yi sdug bsngal dug 'phos 'khrugs// brtse ba'i rang bzhin de yis dris la des// 'bral bas 'jigs nas bu yi bzhin la mig/ phur pa btsugs bzhin de la rab smras pa// bcos thabs med par gyur pa ded 
353a4(mdo 'grel): kyi ni// sdug bsngal me dag thos pas khyod la ci// las ngan smin pas nyer gnas bzod dka' yi// rnam pa 'di ni bdag la dus min lhung // rgya che grags 'bar dung skyong rigs nyid kyi// myu gu bdag gis bu gzhon 'di la ni// 
353a5(mdo 'grel): byed po gdug pas rtsa ba 'joms pa yi// sta gri rnon po 'di ni chas su byas// rtag tu za bar ston byed mkha' lding la// thams cad brlag pa bsung slad re mos kyis// gdengs can 'dren pa dag gis klu re ni// gos 
353a6(mdo 'grel): dmar rtags kyis mtshan pa spring bar byed// gang 'di kha ba'i ri ni bkod pa yi// phung po pha rol mthong min mthong gyur pa// 'di ni gdengs can lus zos dor ba yi// keng rus phreng bas bsgrubs pa'i rus phung yin// 
353a7(mdo 'grel): mthar byed so yi drung du song gyur cing // gos dmar bka' ni rab tu bzung byas pa// bdag gi bu 'dis de ring rim gyis ni// de rigs rtsa ba 'joms pa'i res 'di thob// ces pa 'jigs pas myung du smra byed cing // bu de yis/ 
353a8(mdo 'grel): ni dbugs dag 'byin byed ma// de yis de ni gos 'dab kyis bsgribs nas// snying rje'i nga ro gsar por tshe de bton// kyi hud dung gi gtsug phud 'gro ba'i rgyan// gsod par 'gro la 'di ltar khyod ring ci// zhes brjod bu yi 
353b1(mdo 'grel): mgrin bzung de yi ni// phrag par bzhin bkod ma de rmongs par gyur// dal gyis 'du shes thob cing skrag ma de// be'u gcig ldan pa bzhin gzhon nus mthong // de yi sdug bsngal nags me bzlog pa'i thabs// brtse bas brlan 
353b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i blo yis rab bsams pa// snying rjes dman pa gang gis rtag tu ni// gzhan dag bcom nas lus ngan gso byed pa// kye ma 'dab chags dbang gis 'bad pa ni// gdug pas rjes su 'brel 'di rab tu dman// bu dang 
353b3(mdo 'grel): bral bar gyur pas bu med kyi// ma 'di nges pa nyid du 'tsho ma yin// gzhon nu shin tu gzhon pa'i lus can 'di// rang gi lus byin bdag gis bsrung bar bya// skad cig 'dis bsams de yis der smras pa// ma gcig 
353b4(mdo 'grel): khyod ni bu bcas rang sar song // klu dag gsod pa'i gnas su bdag mchis yis// gos dmar mtshan ma 'di ni bdag la stsol// zhes pa brtse ldan de yis brjod tsam la// yan lag 'khri shing 'dar des de la 
353b5(mdo 'grel): smras// 'gal ba 'di ni khyod kyis brjod ma bya// khyod ni dung gtsug las lhag bdag gi bu// bde med las kyi nyer gnas gnyid med mtsho// rmongs pa'i dba' rlabs ldan par bdag 'jug go/ nyes pa byed pa rnam 
353b6(mdo 'grel): la sdug bsngal ni// dus min stsogs kyi rdo ba bzod dka' lhung // dam pa'i snying stobs chu gter khyod kyi lus// 'gro ba'i mig dang srog gyur bskal pa ni// 'jig kyang mi 'jig mngon sum bsten byed kyi// bdud rtsi 
353b7(mdo 'grel): nye 'di dge legs ldan gyur cig/ ces pa de yis brjod cing 'bad pas des// rjes su bcings byas rang lus sbyin pa la// gang tshe sems spyod g.yo ba med gyur pa// de tshe dung gtsug gis kyang de la smras// mkha' lding 
353b8(mdo 'grel): zas su bdag spros dang por grub// 'di la byed po la ni ci zhig bya// rgyu med mnyes gshin dag las gnas smin 'dir// khyod ni log pa'i bsam pa byar mi 'os// khyod kyi lus ni yon tan rgyan dang ldan// tshul bzang 
354a1(mdo 'grel): yongs su rdzogs pa bdud rtsi'i gter// srid gsum 'tsho ba yis kyang bsrang bya 'di// rtswa mtshungs bdag don ji ltar btang bar 'os// srid pa'i nags tshal 'dir ni bdag lta bu// ka sha'i 'dab ma dang 
354a2(mdo 'grel): mtshungs rtag tu 'byung // bdud rtsi'i spun zar gyur pa yongs 'du'i shing // khyod lta bu ni phyi nas 'khrungs ma yin// skye gzhan bsod nams zong gis tshul bzang khyod// bdud rtsi bdud rtsi'i zer mthong dang bar mdzod// bdag
354a3(mdo 'grel): gi thugs khral dag gis yid gdung 'di// bdag nyid kun gyis khyod ni yod ma mdzad// rgya mtsho'i drung du lus bkod gau kar+Na// sha sbar myur du phyin nas phyag 'tshal te// ma ni sa 'og khang par rnam springs nas// mkha'
354a4(mdo 'grel): lding rdo der skyo med pa dag mchi'o// zhes brjod mgo yis sprin gyi gzhon pa la// rab tu btud nas klu 'di ma dang bcas// dpa' rlabs chen po'i lag pas dbu ba'i phreng // rab bkod go kaNa'i ngos su song // rig 'dzin 
354a5(mdo 'grel): bdag po dag gi bu yang der// de yi srog ni rab bsrung nges pa yis// 'gro bas mdun du nyung rum pa dag ni// lag na dges dmar thog nas 'od pa mthong // de nas nyung rum pa des phyag 'tshal nas// bkra shi sa gos zung 
354a6(mdo 'grel): de ni de la phul// dga' ston zhag bdun dag gi khrus kyi slad// cho ga bstar bas byon par mdzod ces smras// bzang po sngon la khyod song rjes nas ni// thogs 'gor med par bdag 'od shes par mdzod// ces brjod myur du de
354a7(mdo 'grel): btang dga' ba yis// gzhon nus stobs blo yis rab bsams pa// klu dag gsod pa'i rtags gyur gos dmar zung // 'dod pa 'di ni 'bad pa dang bral bar// al ba dag gis thob pas myur nyid du// lag 'gro 
354a8(mdo 'grel): dgras da can 'gro bar bya// nas pa sams gadrug gnar bu'i 'od zer na// dba' bang tshigs ma chung migs ni sba bar bgad// gzhan ni thags dag tu chags byas te// mnga' bring babs rtags ldan pa'i can song // 
354b1(mdo 'grel): brlan chags sbrul gyi zhag gis bran gyur cing // ngos ni khrag gis dmar ba der phyin nas// 'dzegs te mkha' lding 'ong ba mngon 'dod pas// de ni lus kyi stong pa sgribs rnam par gnas// de nas gser gyi khu ba'i dpa' 
354b2(mdo 'grel): rlabs ltar// mdzes pa'i glog drag tshogs kyi sprin dag ni// rab tu gsal bar gyur bzhin gang gis mkha'// rta gdong me 'bar rgya mtsho'i chu bzhin gyur// de nas gshog pa bskyod pas rab bskyed rgyas par rab dkrig 
354b3(mdo 'grel): rlung gi tshu gter 'khrug byed cing // nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis mnan gser gyi ri bo dang mtshungs 'dab chags dbang po ring nas mthong // gang gis dman pa'i 'gros dag gis ni ljon pa mtha' dag grubs par gyur cing saM 
354b4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin gyi// rtse ma cha dag ltung ba'i sgra drag gnod pas 'jigs pa bzhin du sa gzhi 'khrugs par gyur// de nas ri la 'jigs rung de rje bzhin// brtan pa'i lus can de yi rgyab tu ni// rdo rje ltar drag sder mo lugs kyu'i 
354b5(mdo 'grel): rtse// drag por snun byed klu dbang sgra dag lhung // 'phral la mkha' lding dag gis bsnun zhing lus ni gtubs par gyur mod kyang // gzhan srog bsrung la rab mang spu long gis rgyan lus can gzhon nu dag/ brtan pa yangs 
354b6(mdo 'grel): pas rtag tu bdag gi lus 'di sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'i// gdung ba ldan pa'i tshigs rnams bsrung ba'i nye 'khor cir cig ces pa bsams// de nas thug tshim 'jigs rung sgra ldan kha yis mngon bcom zhing // nges 
354b7(mdo 'grel): par gtubs kyang de ni g.yo med snying stobs brtan ldan tshe// lag 'gro 'di ni su zhes der ni 'dab chags rgyal po dag/ ya mtshan la chags rnam par nges slad g.yo ba med par gyur// de nas 'dab chags bdag po rab 
354b8(mdo 'grel): drag nyi ma'i phreng ba bzhin// gzi brjid ser skya rgya chen tshogs kyis phyogs ni ser byed pas// slar yang mngon btab myur du de yi mgo yi dum bu dag/ nor bu 'od dmar rab 'bar khrag rgyun lta bur rab gsal blangs/ 
355a1(mdo 'grel): gnas skabs der ni gzhon nu yi// ha ri tsan dan nags tshal du// sprin gyi tog ni btsun mo dang // lhan cig mna' ma dang ldan gnas// chu gter zla ba 'dod pa bzhin// bu ni lta bar 'dod gyur cing // snying la 
355a2(mdo 'grel): dogs pa gnas pa yis// bsams pas non pa bzhin smras pa// kye ma ci zhig da dung yang // bu ni sprin gyi bzhon pa dag/ ri mchog mtha' la blta ba yi// dge mtshan can de ma mthong ngo // ri 'di'i ngos la mkha' 
355a3(mdo 'grel): lding gi/ dus 'di 'bar ba rab tu zhugs// gang gis nam mkha' mi bzad pa'i// phyogs sreg 'ber ba lta bur gtogs// 'jigs pas lus nyams lag 'gro dag/ za 'dod gdengs can dgra yi ni// kun tu 
355a4(mdo 'grel): 'bigs byed snun pa'i sgra// 'jigs su rung bas dus 'dir 'jug/ de ltar the tshom rab rgyas shing // 'jigs bcas dogs pa la gnas tshe// gtsug gi nor bu khrag gis bsgos// mkha' las de ni mdun du lhung // 
355a5(mdo 'grel): mi bzad pa yi ltas ngan bzhin// mdun du sha dang sra dang ni// khrag bcas kyis gang de mthong nas// 'phral la de ni brgyal bar gyur// bdag po'i gtsug gi nor bu dag/ lhung mthong ma la ya can yang // rmongs 
355a6(mdo 'grel): pas mngon bcom stug mo dang // lhan chags gzhi dag la ltung // dal gyis 'du shes thob gyur nas// btsun mo mna' ma dbugs byung ste// blo ldan rig 'dzin bdag po yis// the tshom bsams nas rab smras pa// 
355a7(mdo 'grel): bu ni sprin gyi bzhon pa dag/ rang nyid song ste bdag gis blta// mkha' lding dus ni 'jigs rung 'di// las la the tshom ster byed yin// gtsug gi nor bu 'di lhung yang // nges pa nyid du mi rtag ste// 'di ni gdengs can mkha'// 
355a8(mdo 'grel): lding gis// za ba dag gi yin yang srid// 'jig pa'i rlung gis bsnun pa yi// rgyu skar rab tu g.yo ba bzhin// gdengs can rnams kyi nor bu ni// rtag tu 'di ltar nges par lhung // zhes pa brjod nas rig 'dzin dbang // 
355b1(mdo 'grel): de gnyis dang 'grogs rjes 'brang bcas// gdengs can gsod pa'i rdo ba can// sa 'dzin dag gi ngos su song // gnas skabs der ni dung gi gtsug/ gsod pa'i gos dmar dag dang ldan// chu gter ngogs su go 
355b2(mdo 'grel): kaNar// phyag 'tshal nas ni myur du 'ongs// sprin gyi bzhon pa mkha' lding gis// bsnun zhing gtubs pa mthong gyur nas// kyi hud bcom mo bslus so zhes// rnam par smra zhing sa la 'gyel// yang yang ri phug sgra brnyan/ 
355b3(mdo 'grel): gyis// tshe de dag dang ldan byed cing // mchi ma rab zags de yis ni// ldab ldib sgra yi cho de byas// kyi hud rgyu med gnyen gyur gdung ba can gyi snying rje bsod nams dag gi mtshams// gzhan gyi gdung bzhi byed 
355b4(mdo 'grel): srog rab sbyin la mngon phyogs mnyes gshin 'di ni ci// kyi hud tshul bzang gter dag khyod dang bral bas 'gro ba dag ni mun par gyur// bdud rtsi'i zer ni sgra gcan gyis zos nam mkha'i mdzes pa lta bu dag la 
355b5(mdo 'grel): brten// gzhan la rtse bas srog ni bskyab par bsgrub la kye ma srog ni gtong byed pa// khyod kyi lus ni bskal pa'i bar nas grags pa'i rang bzhin dag tu yang dag skyes// khyod kyis sdig can dung gi gtsug ni sdig pa'i 'dam 
355b6(mdo 'grel): rdza ba dog cing nyam nga ba// rtag tu 'chi dang brlag pa'i gnas gyur 'jigs rung smad pa'i khongs su ci slad 'phangs// zhes pa mu cor rab smra zhing // mkha' lding drung du 'gro ba yi// gdengs can gyis ni sprin gyi tog/ rjes/ 
355b7(mdo 'grel): 'brang bcas pa 'ong ba mthong // de la byung ba'i mtha' bshad nas// klu ni mya ngan gyis 'khrugs pas// dpung ba bslangs nas 'dab chags kyi/ gang zag la ni smad bcas smras// gdengs can la 'os rtags ni cung 
355b8(mdo 'grel): zad nyid kyang ma brtags par// rig 'dzin 'di ni ci srad bcom zhing ngas bsad nam mkha' lding // khyod kyis dang por ma dpyad steng du yongs rdzogs sdig pa yi// gdung ba'i lam bsten thub chod 'di yis mtshar byas 
356a1(mdo 'grel): mtshar ba byas// 'di thos sprin gyi bzhon pa ni// mdun du lus nyams mthor gyur nas// sprin gyi tog ni btsun mo dang // bcas pa rab tu brgyal bar gyur// de nas ma la ya can gyis// mdun du mkha' lding dag gis 
356a2(mdo 'grel): khyo// drag bsnun gtugs pa'i dbyibs can dag/ mthong nas 'tsho ba phyed thob gyur// brtan yang ri shod lhung ba bzhin// ma bcom na yang de bcom bzhin// 'tsho ba ldan yang 'tsho med bzhin// rab tu 'khyam yang g.yo 
356a3(mdo 'grel): med gyur// brtan pa'i grogs bzhin rgyal ba yis// yan lag kun la 'khyud cing bsdams// rmongs pas dbang dang bral ba des// yud tsam ci yang rig ma gyur// dal gyis 'du shes thob gyur cing // thams cad gdung ba smra 
356a4(mdo 'grel): ban// mkha' lding chags bral sbyangs pa yis// mya ngan ldan pa dag tu gyur// da dus 'tshe ba gtong bar ni// nges byas brtan pa bzung ba yi// pha ma dag gis sprin gyi ni// bzhon pa lus zos la spras pa// bya min 
356a5(mdo 'grel): 'di la rab zhugs bu// nged kyi srog ni 'phrog byed pa// gzhan la snying rje'i ngang tshul can// khyod kyi rtsub po 'di ni ci// 'gro ba'i tshogs ni rgud pa dag/ bsrung ba'i rin chen lus 'di ni// nges par ma bsrung bu khyod 
356a6(mdo 'grel): kyis// legs byas dag ni ci zhig bya// zhes pa smra ba'i pha ma la// spyi bo 'dar bas phyag 'tshal nas// bzod dka' srog ni rab g.yo zhing // yi ge 'thor bar rab smras pa// yab cig khyod kyi bka' med par// 
356a7(mdo 'grel): rang gi 'di byas bdag gi ni// phyi ma med pa'i phyag 'di yis// khyod la rab tu dang mtshon// skad cig 'jig pa'i lus 'di ni// yongs su 'gyur ba mi mtshon tshe// lus can rnams kyi skye ba yi// bgrod pa gzhan phan snying 
356a8(mdo 'grel): ba nyid// lus can rnams kyi tshe 'di mgyogs pa'i rlung gi rtsi dga' yis// bskyod pa'i 'khri shing 'dab ma la gnas chu thigs rnam par g.yo// rgyun tu gzer ba la phan bsod nams gnas la yo byad ni// bsgrubs byas/ 
356b1(mdo 'grel): brtan pa'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// pha ma mchi ma can la 'di// brjod nas mdun du 'dab chags dbang // 'gyod pa chen pos rang gis ni// nyes byas smod cing gnas pa dag/ de yis snying stobs 'bad pa ni// chags 
356b2(mdo 'grel): bral bla mas dag byas nas// klu ni za ba las ldog la// kun tu rtogs pa brtan po byas// de nas mi bzad mtha' yi dbugs// yi ge rab tu 'khrul pa can// mig ni rab tu zum pa de// snying stobs gsal ba'i lhag 
356b3(mdo 'grel): mar gyur// de nas sreg khang rab spras pa// 'os shing me tog gos kyis spras// me yi mdun du mngon phyogs te// 'jug 'dod de yi dga' mas smras// bdag gi gus pas mnyes byas pa// 'byung ba'i dga' ma bcom 
356b4(mdo 'grel): ldan mas// rigs 'dzin kun gyi kha lo skur// mchog ni bdag la rab tu 'byin// gang zhig zhag bdun nyid kyis bdag/ bu mo yugs sa'i skal ldan gyur// dag pa'i tshig 'di bdag la ni// ci slad bden pa min// 
356b5(mdo 'grel): par gyur// bdag gi skye ba gzhan du yang // 'os pa 'di nyid bdag gyur cig/ ces brjod de yi sa man d+ha ra'i// me tog skem pa me la gtor// de nas bdud rtsi'i bum pa yis// lag pa'i mtsho skyes brel pa yi// ri skyes// 
356b6(mdo 'grel): nga nyi mang na byugs te// dga' bas bu mo khrod bad// de ni 'tshe zhes brjod byed cing // bzhin gyi 'dakyis thugs bkung \u0f7f// bdud kyi'i chang na gag // seMn bzhin pa ra bsaso// dmas 
356b7(mdo 'grel): pa na// sprin gyi bzhon pa rab bsos nas// bsad pa'i klu rnams bsos pa ni// mkha' lding dag la slar yang zhus// de nas de yi bdud rtsi'i char// spros pas gdengs can thams cad ni// gdengs ka nor bu'i 'od rgyas 
356b8(mdo 'grel): pa'i// snang ba dang ldan rab tu langs// de nas dga' dang rmad byung yid srubs rnams// mtshungs par mngon par sbyor bas 'dar byed cing // dpag bsam 'khri shing yang dag rgyu ba bzhin// grub pa'i bu mo bdag po'i drung du song// 
357a1(mdo 'grel): de nas lhun po gshog pa ldan pa bzhin// 'dab chags dbang pos gzhon nu mngon mchod song // sprin gyi gzhon pa dag la mngon phyogs pa'i// dung gi gtsug ni lta bas ngoms ma gyur// de nas byang chub 
357a2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa'i spyi bor lha yi bdag po yis// mdzes pa'i pad+mos rab gtor me tog rgyas pa'i char// bung ba'i tshogs kyis skra yis yon tan gtod byas sgra dbyangs bzhin// 'chi med dga' ba'i tshogs kyis phyogs
357a3(mdo 'grel): ni yongs su gang ba babs// pha ma dag la phyag 'tshal de dag zhabs kyi pad+mar gtsug gi nor bu chags// de dag dga' ba'i mchi ma zags pas dga' bas dbang skur dga' ston legs par bsgrubs// snying stobs// 
357a4(mdo 'grel): chu gnyer gsod nams tshogs ni yongs rdzogs sprin gyi bzhon pas skad cig las// gsal bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal gyi mtshan ma rin chen rnams ni yang dag thob// de nas lha yi bdag pos gus pa dang ldan 
357a5(mdo 'grel): pa/ dga' bas mngon phyogs rang gi bstan la mngon dbang bskur// skabs gsum tshogs kyis phyag byar 'os pa'i grags pa can// 'khor los sgyur ba de yis yun ring dpal dag bsnyen// de ltar rang gi sba ba 
357a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyi tshul 'di da// bsod nams nyer bstan dag la rgyal bas gsungs pa ni// bdag gis bsdebs las dge ba'i mchog ni gang thob des// sems can thams cad mngon par 'byung ba nyid gyur cig/ byang chub 
357a7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing dge ba'i dbang pos mdzad pa las de nyid kyi sras zla ba'i dbang pos mdzad pa sprin gyi bzhon pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa brgyad pa'o// / 
357a8(mdo 'grel): dpal ldan rgyal po'i cod pan thon// blo bzang mi dbang zhes rigs la// gdengs can dbang bzhin longs spyod can// longs spyod ldan pa'i dbang po byung // snying stobs gter gyur de yi bu// yon tan rin chen 
357b1(mdo 'grel): tshogs kyi gnas// dpal ldan tshig ni bdud rtsi bskyed// rgya mtsho dang mtshungs rgya mtsho byung // de yi bu ni rab gsal dbang // sbyin pa'i bsod nams dag gis ni// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'os// sa la rab/ 
357b2(mdo 'grel): gsal dbang mtshungs byung // de yi bu ni dge ba'i dbang // snyan dngags mkhan dbang zla shar bzhin// gang gi grags pa zla ba'i 'od// dam pa'i yid ni rangs par byed// gnyis skyes pa yi skye bo dga'// rtsom pa thams 
357b3(mdo 'grel): cad skul byed pa// dga' ba'i grags pa gang gis ni// bsod nams dang po'i pho nyar gyur// nam zhig bde bar 'khod de la// grogs po yon tan ldan pa'i mchog/ legs byas grags ldan pade gshegs pa// 
357b4(mdo 'grel): naka zhes pas rab smras pa// blon po sa 'chos byin sogs kyis// rtog dpyod rim pa rab spangs te// btus shing btus nas rab bsdebs pa// tshigs bcad rkyang bar bsdams pa dag/ lam cig nyid kyi rjes 
357b5(mdo 'grel): 'brangs pa// mchog tu zab cing rab tu dka'// rgya cher bsngags pa rgyal ba yi// skyes rab dag gi phreng ba yod// khyod kyis rtogs pa brjod pa yi// rim pas mdor bsdus rab rgyas pa// dga' bas de bzhin gshegs 
357b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i gtam// bsnyen pa dag ni bya bar 'os// de yis dul bas 'di brjod tshe// gtam de bya bar rab tu brtsams// rtogs pa brjod pa gsum byas nas// shin tu ring bas dor bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal ba bcom ldan 
357b7(mdo 'grel): 'das// gang gis rmi lam du bskul te// rtogs pa brjod pa'i don bsdu ba'i// rtsom pa de yis slar yang blangs// de nas shes rab snang ba can// slob dpon brtson 'grus bzang zhes pa// legs byas rab tu 'bar 
357b8(mdo 'grel): bar grags// rgyal ba'i bka' yi bstan bcos la// yid ni yongs su rab gnas pa// rang nyid de khyim mngon phyogs te// zab mo lung gi lam 'dir ni// rin chen sgron ma nyid du gyur// bdag gi yab kyis rtogs pa brjod 
358a1(mdo 'grel): brgya rtsa bdun ni byas pa la// zla ba'i dbang po bdag gis gcig/ bkra shis rdzogs pa'i slad du byas// gang gi lag sod bstan bcos ni// thams cad dag pa nyid 'gyur ba// slob dpon nyi ma'i dpal de
358a2(mdo 'grel): 'dir// yi ge 'god pa'i don du zhus// lo ni nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi// sa ga'i dkar phyogs shar ba na// rgyal ba'i skye ba'i dga' ston tshe// dpag bsam 'khri shing 'di byas so// 'jig rten mgon po gang gis sdig pa'i dgra 
358a3(mdo 'grel): bcom tshe na grags pa ni// sgrol ma khro gnyer can 'khrungs phyogs su spro ba ci yang legs par song // sa yi bdag po yongs su brtan pa mtha' yas de ni sa skyong tshe// rab zhi bde ba can rnams tshim pa'i slad du gzhung 'di 
358a4(mdo 'grel): rnams sprul lo// khyed kyi 'khor ba mtha' med bzlog dka' blo nyams rnams kyi rab zhi 'brog/ rmongs pa chen po'i khang pa rgya che lam du gdung ba'i tshogs kyi khur// rgyags dang sdang ba'i gzhi ma yul gyi dug gi snying po rnam 
358a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur can// rab rib dag gis yongs su bsgribs pa rgyal ba'i 'od kyis 'phrogs gyur cig/ bsam pa dri ma med pa rnams ni mchog tu tshim byed cing // mdzes shing rab dang skal bzang legs byas dag dang rab tu 
358a6(mdo 'grel): ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang snyan dngags dag/ rnam pa rgyas pa 'di ni 'gro rnams dga' ba'i slad gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs su// gang zhigs bdag rabags pa/ 
358a7(mdo 'grel): gyis// glang chen mthong nas zhi ba thob// de bzhin gshegs des khyed la srungs// gang zhig dpal sdes lus byin dang // de bzhin nor bu gtsug nor gyis// nga las nu yang 'jig rten rgyal// zla ba'i 'od kyis mgo bo sbyin/ 
358a8(mdo 'grel): shin tu dga' ba'i skye bar gang // ba da ra yi gling bgrod byas// gang zhig ri mo'i gzugs brnyan gyis// mu tig can gyi rjes gzung mdzad// gang zhig dpal sras la bstan dang // me skyes skal ldan dus gsungs dang / 
358b1(mdo 'grel): mngal nas 'byung ba bstan pa dang // gang zhig dga' bo'i mdzes mal// chags pa dag ni 'bad pas gsal// gang zhig shAkya brlag byas pas// 'phags skyes po ni dmyal bar gsungs// gang zhig gnod sbyin 
358b2(mdo 'grel): bud med ni// 'phrog ma dul bar mdzad pa dang // cho 'phrul rab tu bstan pa dang // gang zhig lha las babs pa dang // gang zhig mkha' la rdo ba 'phangs// byams pa dag ni lung bstan dang // gang zhig ma long 
358b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin dang ni// shA ri'i bu yi gtam mchog gsungs// bsod nams mtshan nyid rnam 'gyur can// gro bzhin bye rnar gang gyur dang // gang zhig a mra skyong ma'i spyod// legs byas la'o gsungs pa dang // gang 
358b4(mdo 'grel): zhig rgyal byed chal bzung dang // yab dang mjal ba mdzad pa dang // thams cad sgrol gyi skye bar gang // bu dang chung ma la sogs byin// shAkya'i rigs su 'khrungs gyur pa// gang gis mngon par 'byung 
358b5(mdo 'grel): ba mdzad// bdud ni rnam par btul mdzad nas// shAkya 'byung ba gang gsungs dang // skye ba gzhan la dpal ldan gang // gro bzhin bye ba nyi shur gyur// gang zhig nor skyong zhes pa yi// glang chen dag ni 
358b6(mdo 'grel): myos pa btul// gang zhig ka shi'i mdzes pa yis// zhi slad bzod pa rnam par bsams// sems can phan byed ri dgas gang // gser gyi logs zhes bya bar gyur// gnod byed la yang rnam 'gyur med// 
358b7(mdo 'grel): dge byed dag tu gang gyur dang // rang gi chung ma'i sdig spyod las// khyad par lo ma gang chags bral// dga' bo nyer dga'i klu dag la// gang gis zhi ba bstan pa dang // brtse ba'i gtor gyis gang zhig gis// khyim legs sbyin la

359a1(mdo 'grel): bas rnam 'gyur med ldan gyur// ser skya 'jigs rung chu srin dbyibs// gang gis nyon mongs dag las dkrol// mi bdag u drA ya na la// gang gis sdig las grol ba bstan// mkhas pa'i 'byor pa gang
359a2(mdo 'grel): zhig gis// bsod nams dag las 'khrungs par gsungs// mi bdag skye dgu'i dpag bsam shing // gser mdog ces par gang gyur dang // gser gyi lag pa'i spyod tshul gyis// legs byas gang gis rab tu bsngags// gang 
359a3(mdo 'grel): gis ma skyes dgra yi pha// de yis bcings la rab dgongs dang // byas shes kr-i kir gang gyur dang // gang gis sA li ka bar gsungs// yi bzhin nor bu nor sbyin gang // don kun grub par gyur pa dang // dpal ldan gser gyi 
359a4(mdo 'grel): glang po dang // glang po can zhes gang gyur dang // gang zhig gnyis 'thung so stug gyur// gang zhig las bcu spyad pa dang // gang gis gser ldan rtogs brjod la// stag mo la ni rang lus byin// mi bdag bsod nams mi 
359a5(mdo 'grel): dman gang // slong ba kun gyi gnyen gyur dang // mi bdag legs bshad tshol ba ni// srog gis legs bshad nye ba dang // nad kyis gzir ba kun 'phrog gang // sems can dman zhes brjod gyur dang // 'dab chags bskyab la// 
359a6(mdo 'grel): rang lus gter// thams cad ster bar gang gyur dang // gang gis klu ni ba lang skyong // gzigs pa nyid kyis zhi bar mdzad// gang gi mthu yis nor 'dzin ni// rin chen mchod rten gyis mtshan gyur// nad kyis gzir ba skyob pa'i 
359a7(mdo 'grel): gnyen// bsod nams stobs su gang gyur dang // tshul ldan kun la lar gang gyur// gang gis klu ni zhi bar mdzad// gang zhig zhing la bkra shes gyur// zhing ldan grags sbyin zhes bya dang // gang gis 'od srungs rjes gzung 
359a8(mdo 'grel): mdzad// gang gis mi 'am ci mo thob// ragacig thob par gang gyur dang // sa skyong bu ni snyan dngags mkhan// gang gis dge slong dge 'dun srungs// dgra bcom gnas su skyed mdzad dang // pad+ma can gyi tshul rab gsungs// 
359b1(mdo 'grel): gang zhig chos rgyal rab tu gnas// gang phyir nyi ma'i gung pa yis// kha cher gtsug lag khang mchod bsgrubs// shA na'i gos kyis bcom brlag tu// gang zhig gtsug lag khang sprul dang // gang gis mjug tu nyer sras ni// bdud 
359b2(mdo 'grel): las rgyal bar gyur pa dang // mi bdag mya ngan med pa dang // gang dran klu la bka' bkod dang // gang gis sa gzhi'i sbyin pa gsungs// de nas rten cing 'brel 'byung yang // be dur yi nyon mongs bkrol// / 
359b3(mdo 'grel): gang gis ke ne ya la bstan// gang gis brgya byin lhung ba dang // nye bar slar yang bstan par mdzad// gang zhig kau sha la ni// dbang chen sde yis 'dod pa byin// 
359b4(mdo 'grel): gang gis mthar thug gyur pa na// rab bzang gi ni rjes bzung mdzad// sngon gyi bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rgyu yi mchog tu gang gyur dang // dmyal bar srid pa'i go cha yi//

361a1(mdo 'grel): dang 'gal bar byed pa rnams sun 'byin pa'i nus pa can/ byams pa dang snying rje chen pos chab srid zhi ba dang / nges pa'i sgo nis skyong bar mdzad pa'i/ ta'i si tu chen po byang chub
